n7fpZ82DQXj5b7HQiASzhg.text: A-mazing!!!!!! Loved it! Waitress kept my drink full and kept my husbands beers coming. Husband had burger with onion rings and I had the pulled pork on top of mine!! will definitely making  the drive to come back again. Fries had just the right amount of spice to them

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

hXGgUQmgLyxf9kubptwZwA.text: First of all, the restaurant's A/C wasn't working properly since it was quite warm (even muggy.) The server welcomed us briefly and took our order a few minutes later. We waited for over 15 mins until we had to ask another server to bring our drinks and she apologized for her fellow server's mishap. While all of this was taking place we noticed our original server was having a laugh (flirting) with a fellow coworker.  The burgers weren't that good but the fries were very good, though. A tip, order the small version of the burger of your choosing since it's actually quite big. I wouldn't imagine having the large sized burger, unless I haven't eaten for a day or two.  Maybe I had bad luck with my server and the joint's temperature control, but who knows it could be business as usual at RBT. Will not be back in a while.

uf_VQcgpBou6dWnIHB-Xxw.text: I went here based on a recommendation from a friend. I had the bacon and blue burger with fries. The pretzel bun was very good. The burger was average, but the other burgers on the menu sounded good, too. I will go back to try the others.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon and Blue Burger with fries.

imAiIlDipJhZnR0Lb1h_Fg.text: It was really really good! Food was yummy and service was excellent. K was our bartender and server and she was on it.  Tried the hangover burger and it was out of my comfort zone but really good. Pretzel bun was good but I would do a regular bun next time. Wings were our starter and they were good with the homemade Wing sauce (bomb) It was a fun place to try !

tsWuFZgSrsq5TG8Wa5LObg.text: Wanted  to try something different what a Very nice surprise. Enjoyed a Porkster with Dennis a great share burger

8--0ROlMRCH04Ox2jiwzaA.text: Shut up. Go Here. And get the Mac Gnarly Burger or any burger...yum.  Beachy vibe...awesome fries too man i'm hungry. Just do it.

U7zvxRNB1EpoBzw5QLXLPQ.text: Absolutely the BEST burgers in phoenix! The mac n cheese burger is out of this world! The ghost burger will have your taste buds jumping! The decor will definitely keep your eyes busy and the burgers will fill you up! Sweet Potato tots are incredible!

g1lKYi3CkgFPjT6fomK0vw.text: Overrated. I honestly don't understand why this place has such great reviews. I don't think it's that's great. Service is awesome thou and so is the ambience, but the food is nothing special.

bzrLlJ5-LEAML69us1Xutg.text: I've been here twice before and every time I've received top level customer service whether they were slammed with people lined up out the door or just wandering in and getting seated immediately. Yesterday I came in a little early thinking there might be a wait considering it would be what peak happy hour is (happy hour is all day Thursday!) But instead I was sat immediately, the waitress was so nice and brought me some water while I looked over the menu for a drink. I chose their New Belgium seasonal IPA which wasn't bad for an IPA but I can feel really hit or miss on IPAS, I drank about half of it before asking for a blue moon instead - defeated by feeling adventurous. Never once did she rush when my friend was late, when it took us forever to order as we were catching up, and she was nothing but patient and accommodating the entire time - I was impressed because we definitely sat there twice as long as the other patrons. I ordered the Hawaiian barbecue burger, rare, with the tator tots. Everything was PERFECT. Burger rode the line of rare and raw but honestly I can't even complain about that because there is nothing to me more annoying than ordering a burger rare and getting it medium well at best - kudos guys! She made sure our drinks were thoroughly filled throughout the entire experience and when the check came I was shocked to see she hadn't charged me for the IPA! I was definitely planning on paying for it considering I had drank just about half but that little detail was nice and it was even nicer to see that a year between both visits no amount of customer service, quality or value was lacking. Simply impressive!

Tg5v9tt0pw1cX9G7_3Dv8g.text: Love the atmosphere and the food is great! The sweet potato tots are really good. I went one time and the terrible service and when I mentioned something about it to the owner they immediately addressed it and bent over backwards to make sure my friends and I left happy!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Blue cheese bacon burger and sweet potato tots!

stoHZpDCDQcxp7n6eIRUuA.text: Peanut butter and Sriracha burger is the best burger I've ever had. I go back to this place just for the sweet potatoes tater tots.

SITVacdVGRfr03SvUHb4bQ.text: I loved this place. It was fantastic. If I could have I would have eaten two Rehab burgers. So delicious. I will be back when I get back to Scottsdale in October.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Couldnt help eating some of the onion rings before taking the pic.

AGWt4s_49wuVnIky5erGIQ.text: My hamburger was excellent cook just right. The burger was full of favor and the prices are not bad at all.

t515Ge2lYOKfw0rb7VMdrA.text: I can't understand why this place gets such high ratings.  The burgers are just not good.   The meat was flavorless and tasted low quality.  The fries and tots were ok, but nothing special.  The worst part was the service-we waited an hour to receive our burgers.  The only highlight was the Jamaican corn side dish.  I would not return.

2Fz1mY-r3e_xOvduNmdZrA.text: Sweet lord order the pig wings now......(did you do it yet?) .... you get a pound of pig knuckles (like little ribs) with a little bark on the outside and crazy tender on the inside, saturated with an amazing homemade spicy pineapple BBQ sauce. You'll want this sauce on everything! We were lucky enough to have sat down next to one of the chefs at the bar, a super nice gentleman who suggested what I should order and I did not fail to take his advice. I got the PBJ and Bacon Burger which the menu said "will freak your mouth out with a ridiculously delicious flavor combination"........ the menu was right! Bacon, grape jelly, sriracha sauce and this amazing homemade peanut butter somehow combine to form a flavor nirvana. I paired this with their sweet potato tater tots which were dusted in some kind of brown sugar love. Yummers! At this point if your hangover is not fully cured, you have to try the toasted s'more milkshake made with dutch chocolate and toasted almond vodka. Next time I'm going to try the spa treated clams and the Jamaican Corn.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Toasted s&#39;more milkshake!

UiezEIglgnDwlLfoT3Em3Q.text: My girlfriend took me here for the first time today. So I'm one of those people who likes his meat well done lol trust me people I know I here it everyday that you loose all the flavor when it's well done but that's how I like it. Nevertheless I ordered my burger well done and when I received it it was medium at best I'm not one to complain so I didn't say anything and I ate it. Wasn't bad but I would still rather it been well done still a great place

EkHyLAnKOlWWXsYKOMKqCw.text: PB&J Burger, Thank me later :) A very cool, laid back restaurant with a creative menu.  I am a burger fanatic and Rehab is a must try!  The service was very friendly, they have a full bar and I've tried burgers with peanut butter before, but never with jelly and I must admit, the jelly takes it to new heights.  My kind of place - casual, fun, friendly and unique menu items.  BOOKMARK it!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pot Brownies
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J BURGER a MUST TRY!!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chili burger!

gKd_HEfDeEJRxxObuuAMpg.text: Not sure if it was just a off day or what not but...  Had to clarify our order twice with the waitress and it still got messed up. Not a custom order or anything, we just had never been their before so all the options for buns, sizes and cooking temperature were never asked so we never got want we expected. Slow and inattentive throughout our stay, really bad.  Burgers were really nothing special. Patties were tough and flavorless (ordered medium and rare respectfully). Toppings were ok but they seem to try to counter their mediocrity with huge portions. Fries were underdone and just... meh. I wanted to love this place based on its pictures, and the food /looked/ good, but just didn't taste good at all. With the lousy service it was a total fail unfortunately :-/

G49zKliSA4iKBgXBUyA9dA.text: Amazing burgers! Highly recommend the Hangover burger with the chorizo patty! Very very good place!

DuB2simxUFGJSVrqK2DUMg.text: I LOVE this place! The burgers are always amazing, bartenders are friendly and make great drinks, and even when it's busy service is efficient. Sweet potato tots always, and you can't go wrong with any of the burgers.

wgvQOlKhfm6mnlSbAnbHAA.text: I just went here tonight for the first time! I ordered the hangover burger and medium wings! Everything was so good! The staff was really nice as well! They have so many cool burgers on the menu!

Prt1pxRWsBPATD2d0--U8A.text: Delicious tasty burgers. You will be happy with anything from the menu. Great friendly staff. Clean environment. We will be stopping by on every ASU visit.

TbOLBrIfnvvzPxm4hM2AuQ.text: First stop in Scottsdale. It's all around great. One of the best bartenders ever. We had the wings, they were delicious and juicy. There's a burger for everyone! Breads for your buns are great, I had the pretzel bun and it was amazing.  Sides are plentiful with your burger and all the dipping sauces you will need. Definitely worth the visit.

3-qbY_ZjrgvSLT7_e5tQtA.text: I love me some burgers and this place has some great burgers! It can get busy at certain times and its not very big so if you don't want to wait plan accordingly.   If you are a fan of a good burger this for sure is a place you should try out.

wyHhLkrRTOilkpUMoFinZw.text: nothing too exciting about this place to me. onion rings didn't have much flavor and weren't even really hot, the burgers were bland even w all the toppings on them. the fries weren't bad. place isn't awful but it's really not that good either. the staff however was great, very friendly and really attentive. I'm guessing all the good rating are in regard to the drinks and cute waitresses cause the food wasn't really good in my opinion.

9taehTGuH9zw79WWBLRKRw.text: The food, atmosphere and staff are awesome. From the pretzel bun to the sweet potato tots and even the homemade pasta, this place is a must try.

94FuvtrG3D1Hy0rYE2HhHQ.text: I've been a fan of rehab burger since they opened. They have amazing burgers and the atmosphere is great! However I stopped in yesterday to grab a to go order about 30 minutes before closing and when I say it was horrible wow it was horrible! I was so disappointed to find the pesto pasta i had ordered was a mush of over cooked noodles, chunky alfredo sauce, and a few diced tomatoes scattered about. I also came across the occasional jalapeno. Maybe was it my fault for ordering a pasta dish at a burger place? I also ordered a side cesear salad and it could not have also been more disappointing the croutons were obviously from a bag, not fresh at all, there was no parmesan on the salad and their menu described only lettuce and these disgusting stale croutons. I paid $15 for this meal and when i say it was the worst $15 i've ever spent i mean it! It's so sad for me to see a restaurant i've loved forever put out this kind of product I hope they get it together, sadly this has turned me away from the restaurant and i doubt i will be returning.

TYHtfjE4IwRnYQNdIBJW1A.text: 2 thumbs up! Our server, Tina was great! I am on a continuous quest for the best , according to me, hamburger. I wasn't sure which direction I was going to go in and Tina directed me to the Hangover burger. Perfect! I always like my burgers rare and again perfect. Definitely within my top 5 burgers. Thanks

S_-kdry3K-KMMIiUbt8m2w.text: Worst food I have ever had. Worst service I have ever had. We were seated right away but then it took about 10 minutes to get waters (at this time the restaurant was not busy). Waiter took our order, and food took extremely long. The food came out and the quesadilla was cold and chicken was cold as if it wasn't cooked all the way.  My burger and all of its toppings were also cold like it had been sitting for 15+ minutes. The grossest part was that I ordered the burger with medium temp. It was not medium, it was practically raw with the center still being cold from the fridge (meaning it wasn't cooked through). I got food poising that night. It's a shame because I had heard so many good reviews on this place. I highly DO NOT recommend.

BR8EDaYLgZENKLWWS0jS9g.text: I booked a 20 person reservation here for a work group and they were fantastic to work with.  The service was also great once we arrived and everyone was blown away by how much food each plate had.  I was told to try the sweet potato tots and I loved them!  They accidentally had given me fries instead, so to fix it they brought out a giant plate of the tots - very generous!  I have to say I wasn't overly wowed by my burger (I did a create-your-own), but it definitely was delicious.  My co-worker ordered the mac 'n cheese burger; I got to try it and I loved the little bit of sriracha spice it had.  That thing was overflowing with mac 'n cheese everywhere; it was quite the sight to see! Loved the atmosphere there with its fun vibes.  Definitely recommend!

lJIPBWGYdCZd6RV08ZtSgg.text: We were in the area visiting a friend at Honor Health Osborne and saw Rehab Burger while driving home. We remembered hearing of R.B. on an episode of Check Please! Arizona on PBS and thought we would try it for the first time. We were both blown away with the unique menu assortment of burgers. Who would think of making a PB&J burger?!?!?! The food was delicious and the server Liz was great at making suggestions to chose from. We will be back soon!

S4DKrGRJ0br0weVuSatEjA.text: I love Rehab, and will miss it! Best Mac n Cheese burger, Best Sweet Potato Tots, Best Pretzel Buns!  Always great food, the margaritas a little sweet, but overall great!  Staff all great, and the one that wasn't didn't work there too long..   For sure hungry for some food form here right about now!

zKG5a7FFT-DNr2Ih1i-bgg.text: Husband and I went a bit overboard at the pool so we woke up late and needed good food ASAP - burger rehab was the closest answer without a wait. BOOM SOLD!  Luckily in the desert there was this funny little place with super great service and a menu filled with creative options.  Usually my husband is pretty apprehensive about trying new, weird food combos but we were on vacation so I think he was feeling adventurous - we got the bacon peanut butter & jelly one and the spicy Mac and cheese one with sweet potato tatter tots and whoaaaaa we were not disappointed!  Please note: This is NOT DATE FOOD!   It's as messy as it is delicious and it really takes commitment to a FULL BITE each time in order to get the fully balance of the flavors. The portions are huge too!  The menu was put together with much  creativity and the staff was really passionate about being welcoming and kind. We sat at the bar and noticed several regulars they called by name - a good sign of a good place.  Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon PB&amp;J carnage - ugh so good!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon PB&amp;J burger!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The most delicious sweet potato tots!

vKnf176S0KfZJNrJeKoJdw.text: Great burger!  Great service!!  I'd come back again!  Lots of choices if you like burgers prepared in a non-traditional way. Plenty of other choices as well if you don't want a burger.

LdQ6a_3sWJaBh34O4AizaA.text: The Bomb.com! This place has every burger imaginable and they do not disappoint! Absolutely delicious! Some burgers were too adventurous for me but I'm sure they would be awesome if your up to trying something different. The atmosphere and vibe in the restaurant is also cool. Very hipster and trendy. The sweet potatoes that you can get with the burgers were sooooo GOOD! I had the backyard BBQ burger and it was to die for! I also brought my daughter with me who isn't even a year old yet and they were very accommodating to us.

p5bcAMyv56ZjzHjROE14vA.text: The only reason I gave this place 3 stars was because the burgers were over cooked and dry. The service was WONDERFUL they really take the time to help you understand the menu and make suggestions. The sweet potato tots should not be missed and the pesto aoli was bomb. I'm pretty sure based on the rave reviews I just caught them on a bad day.

1ClKOwTHMkPWkH1T88xwRg.text: Wow, one word discerned the food the service and ambiance. Poor describes the restroom situation. Had to wait in line 20 minutes to wash my hands, if you don't to use the facilities great if you do terrible.  The burger was juicy and hot until I was done. I added the onion rings which were not greasy at all and the only dessert they serve the brownie with ice cream is to die for.  Can't wait to go back next week with my daughters. My wife and I sat outside and enjoyed a perfect afternoon.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Best dessert I have had in many years, wow.

Uaboc53o5FQEBFEQAkp1sw.text: Omg this place is fantastic! I had the burger with the Mac & cheese & siracha and wow was that good! They have 2 size patties so you have a choice.  Service was great, super busy at lunch, happy atmosphere. Will be back for sure, this place is beyond delicious!

i9UrUdTXHcUJnJRJ5DHlkA.text: Best burgers you'll ever eat. Super creative menu and an awesome atmosphere. Great service! Can't wait to go back.

6tCrW4CncCYiLGk9OEbp3Q.text: Great spot for burgers beer and a relaxed atmosphere. They have two size of burgers 5 and 10 ounce both are delicious. A good deal on specialty burgers around $10-13 for the 10oz, plus comes with a side. Has a theme to the place. Easy going friendly informative attentive staff.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Inside Rare 10oz Bacon, havariti cheese, fried egg, green chili burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Courtney the best bartender
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. 1/2 fries n O&#39;rings.

BSQIYQFVNdg5POYqBhaAhw.text: AMAZING burger! I had the swiss and mushrooms, on pretzel buns. Perfect! I liked the sweet potato tots, but I would have  liked even more if they were crispier. I keep the 5 * for the outstanding burger

ghhZlxj4M-CVZ_rsUWalIQ.text: I can see why they win best burger! They have the BEST burger hands down. Perfectly cooked. I had the Jalapeno Popper burger delicious. Love the cute decor will be back for burgers and drinks. Great place to start you're night.

n0hrs1FVS5OwBrE10DpIUA.text: Stopped in there with a friend for the first time and was very impressed! Plenty of parking, fun and friendly vibe as soon as you walk in. Had the ghost burger which was delicious and the bun fit the burger size too. Since we sat at the bar we thoroughly enjoyed the fun banter with our bartender Courtney!  Since I eat out a lot this place seems to have gotten it right with the fun dining concept. I'll be back!

vg4yiTugckSYRpwPUPICWQ.text: Stopped by here on an early Sunday evening. Placed was pretty packed, however they managed to get us a corner table. Burgers were delicious but they really should season their offerings just a bit more. My burger was a bit under seasoned as was my son's mac and cheese. All in all, I would come back to this place. Bonus points to our waitress who brought us milk for my son in a styrofoam cup with a lid, and didn't fill the damn cup all 24oz!! So my son was actually able to eat his dinner without filling up on milk.

dsibCr7pel27PK-taMn5mw.text: Very creative burgers type, good service great food. The 5 oz was big enough can't imagine the 10 oz.

-EDXIAPy5gdDUJ8u5t1sCg.text: OMG!!!!!!!  I got the mac and cheese burger when I visited this place about 2 months ago and I LOVED IT!!!!!!  It was an amazing mac and cheese dish on a burger!!!!  I cannot believe how amazing there food is!!!!  I even loved the fries and I am hard to please with fries!  EVERYONE should go here and try as many burgers as they can!!!!  The atmosphere is awesome and the service is fantastic!!!  I cannot wait to go back!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. So Amazing!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac n Cheese Burger!

LpBaAaY8VK25ZwyZJbCiAQ.text: This place is so good! Went here yesterday and found out they have happy hour everyday of the week from 11 am - 6 pm, can't beat that! Not only are their burgers good but I think that they have the best onion rings in all of Arizona and my boyfriend said the same thing about their sweet potato tots. I got the relapse size chili cheese burger, and my boyfriend got the relapse size of the porkster burger (yes a burger topped with pulled pork lol) and both were still huge and so delicious. This isn't typically a regular spot for us because we leave in a food coma but we love it every time we come!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chilly cheese burger and porkster burger!

c7DA1EQkiBMUjJaCeh8kzw.text: Absolutely amazing and worth every calorie. My family and I shared the PB&J burger, Philly burger, and the Mac and Cheese burger. They were all incredible! The PB&J burger had a little spicy kick. I am glad I tried it, but I wouldn't want to eat an entire burger on my own. The Philly Burger and the Mac and Cheese burger were another story... I could eat those on my own. The fries were incredible and my family loved the sweet potato tots. The onion rings were ok, but not the best I have had. We will be coming again. SO good!

5krBNkJFhQS-RkdwMJelHw.text: Amazingggg. Hands down not only best burgers that are creative, but allll the food is good here. We've had the pasta, chicken wings, calamari, fish tacos and more. All the food has been amazing.   Recently one of our visits the manager was a little bit of a jerk. It was a Friday night and they were swamped, but still... he came off as very irritated and made us a little uncomfortable. Only complaint we've ever had and only issue with staff yet. Servers are always very nice and helpful.   If you want some amazing food with a great atmosphere give this place a try!

u2GG1Tj5ozFz-cDneiU8XA.text: BEST WINGS IN SCOTTSDALE. I'm not kidding. My boyfriend and I have been coming here since before we even lived in the state of Arizona. We've finally gotten our orders down. At first, we'd order a little bit of everything and be absolutely stuffed about halfway through. Now, we stick with splitting a caesar salad and each ordering 6 wings. I'm obsessed with the gold medal sauce (don't like spicy things); like...I'd like to take a bath in it. Such a fun spot, great location and Sunday happy hour! Do yourself a favor and stop in. Also, I don't eat red meat but every single person I've talked to about this place has recommended just about every burger, so I assume those are great too. They're also dog friendly!

h5K9Nx_x8gVlQ5tlauap3w.text: The service was great. I was seated right away and everyone kept up with my table. The music and atmosphere were good too. The blue cheese burger I ordered sucked terribly. There was more shredded lettuce then burger and no blue cheese or bacon. When I called the waiter back he said it's cooked into the dry ass patty they served. So disappointed, the did bring me some blue cheese to put in it but come on. It was the driest hockey puck of q burger and if I wasn't 9 months pregnant and starving at the time I would've sent it back and ordered something else.

cmTgQ8MeU6ZcQzgymca-Fw.text: I love this place....  I can never decide what burger I want any time I go here because they are all so good.   Also the sweet potato tots!  Seriously awesome go try it.  One of the best burgers in Scottsdale

Ewzy7Z2UAvWwTU_G9C1HyQ.text: Great burgers, great service, and delicious fries! Will definitely come back again! :)

YCrJCizz2bwOPa5GuTHCDw.text: This place is great! The food was delicious, and the service spectacular.  We came here for lunch and sat out on the patio. About 10 minutes in, a Roto-Rooter truck unexpectedly pulled up next to the restaurant and began doing its thing - think loud noise and terrible smell. The staff of Rehab quickly moved everyone inside and shut the doors to keep the offending noise and smells out. They were apologetic (even though it wasn't their fault) and the rapid response to an unanticipated interruption during the prime lunch hour was impressive.  Food came out and was amazing. I'll be back next time I'm in Scottsdale.

dIiyZXiC_lolE-QD8pnPJA.text: I haven't felt relaxed in a long time, but sitting down (wait was 30 minutes), outside with my glass of wine, hearing the familiar tunes of my home (Hawaii), I felt my body completely relax. Our waitress was amazing! She was so friendly and helpful, as this was our first time. We didn't get appetizers because we knew some awesomeness was on its way.  I chose a bacon cheeseburger with onion rings, hubby got the pbj burger with fries, MIL got the ghost burger with sweet potato fries and her boyfriend got the bigger beefstro burger with the corn on the cob. All of the sides and burgers were so good!! We saved room for the pot brownies with ice cream. Omg. Best dessert ever! Everything came at a decent time and everything was wonderful and relaxing. We will definitely be back to try new things!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon cheeseburger on a pretzel bun with onion rings

up6Ar6pQdfPhE8HDTPG86Q.text: Ok. I watched a review of this place and my friend at work dared me to try the PBJ Burger. I'm a little adventurous and did it. AMAZING!!!!! It did NOT disappoint. If you want to have fun and explore a little, they have flavor combos that really will blow you away. Try it!

0zJbuDSSF1UXyzXTYprDFw.text: Excellent burger. If you are gluten free be aware that the sweet potato tots might be coated.  Would return.

OpPWJ5UYpDs8LWj6TM5_Fg.text: Amazing burger and great prices on happy hour beers! The service wasn't the best, but it wasn't awful either. I look forward to coming back and trying other burgers as well as their large tequila menu

St0-cO7y5Y8uX9BKbk4img.text: We picked this restaurant passed on the Yelp reviews and were not disappointed.  Walked into a busy restaurant on a Monday afternoon of Spring Break.  The hostess was great about getting a table cleaned off for us quickly though.  We were seated and immediately greeted by a friendly server.  We ordered the Corona Ritas because why not!  There were great.  My son had the wings and mixed 2 sauces on our server's recommendation.  He LOVED them.  My daughter had a plain burger and I had the Hatch Chili Burger.  The burgers were so good!  The meat is very favorable and tender.  Fries were good but not the best I've ever had.  Love the vibe of the restaurant too.  We almost went back while we were in town but didn't want to be lame.  Ha!  Wish we had though.

9NtFrQeFnYMNyelOIrk9CA.text: Great chili burger and porkster burger, super onion rings....ya gotta try this place!

mrYk1R9-a4BsoAf5zmbOJw.text: Holy cow!! This place is simply magnificent! The burger was over the top and delish. Their burger choices vary from the expected to some crazy combinations. I mean... A PB&J burger with bacon & siracha???  Whaaaaaat??? I will certainly return, and I think I just may try that PB&J!!! Give an idea how awesome this place is? To get a table had a 30-minute wait at 2:00 on a weekday!! Be sure to get Kaye at the bar, she is fantastic!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. BYOB burger with Havarti cheese and onion rings.

b3sH96oYsVGlZwuiTmNk2g.text: How Rehab won a Phoenix magazine award, I'll never know. I had a vegetarian option, the Noogie, and it was loaded with grilled eggplant, portabella and havarti but lacking in flavor. Beer was pricey at $5 Pacifico bottles, and my friend's green chili burger looked horrible and tastes mediocre.   Service was way too relaxed, and everyone looked unimaginatively dumpy.

OD0cfrQMr76bs7o8ijYGug.text: I'll start with the positive, I loved the atmosphere, it was a cool vibe but that's all that I can really comment on that I enjoyed.  I found this place incredibly disappointing and I really wanted to like it.  I went there based on the yelp reviews and was really looking forward to it.  I ordered the patty melt which clearly wasn't a good choice.  I like to think of myself as a bit of a patty melt expert, it is probably my favorite cheat meal. This one was not worth the cheat.... a patty melt is supposed to be on "grilled rye" the bread was not grilled at all, it was simply dry lightly toasted marble rye, so disappointing, I pulled the burger off of the bread, no use in wasting carb intake on dry bread.  The burger itself was ok at best, I've had better at Denny's and that's pretty sad. The staff seemed friendly but not very accommodating, I don't like over anxious servers but maybe a check in occasionally would have been nice... bottom line, would I go back? Not a chance.

xbPnOfNx1a3dyJ92HCjsYA.text: 09/26/12 3.5 stars. For my second visit, I brought Mom, her two sisters, and a cousin along to take advantage of a Yelp deal I bought for Mom. We couldn't sit at the community table we had enjoyed before, since it was reserved for another party, but we were able to get a five-top by getting two tables next to each other. The weather was much cooler than on our first visit, so we were comfortable in that aspect; However, the music, which had gone from tropical/surfing sounds to loud contemporary/rap/rock music, so a few of us (at least an aunt and me) were annoyed. Rehab now offers Four Peaks' Peach ale on tap! Sheryl (sp?), our friendly and energetic server, informed me that the bar began to serve it this past Saturday-- hurray!! I'm so happy this has come to pass, since I've only seen this peach ale offered at three other bars/restaurants BESIDES Four Peaks: Tempe's Lucky Break (during a Yelp event held there), Vincitorio's, and Mac's Grill and Bar. Rehab offers $3 draughts during happy hour! Be wary of their happy hour food menu pricing though, as they're only $1 off apps... Since Mom and I had just eaten brunch right before our massage session, we weren't hungry, but I had planned on at least enjoying a half-pint of peach ale or a little bit of wine while my aunts and cousin enjoyed their burgers. We decided to order the app Sheryl suggested, the Pigs' wings ($9/HH) yelp.com/biz_photos/3l54..., her favorite, which comes with a peach-habanero BBQ sauce made in-house. An aunt spied calamari ($6.50/HH) yelp.com/biz_photos/3l54... on the menu, and since that is also Mom's favorite app, I asked Sheryl to bring some for the table, as well. Mom and her two sisters decided to split two Rehab-sized burgers (mushroom and swiss, $11, and green chile hatch, $10.50) and their sides of fries and sweet po"tot"oes. My young cousin thought she was ordering a sandwich when she went for the Chile Con Fritos ($8). Since I had been disappointed with the chocolate milkshake sample we were given on our first visit, I decided I'd take up Ken's offer to try one of their alcoholic versions on this visit. Ken was absent, however, so I asked bartender John what my options were, and we decided on a vanilla-based liqueur, Frangelico, and Kahlua concoction ($8). yelp.com/biz_photos/3l54... My aunts enjoyed the calamari! The pigs' wings were also good-- I enjoyed the outer crispiness and the sweet spiciness of the sauce. I don't think I'd order it again, though, and the same goes for the calamari, which weren't as crispy as I like them to be, plus I wasn't wowed by the "original marinara." Personally, I'd just concentrate on the burgers. I waited too long on trying the fries (as I mentioned, I wasn't hungry, and I concentrated on enjoying the sips of peach ale and the milkshake), for they were already soggy. My aunt had sliced a portion of the hatch green chile burger for me to have, enough for two or three bites, and I still found it very tasty, even though I'd forgotten to add some chipotle aioli. I don't think cousin enjoyed her Chile con Fritos, which didn't look very appetizing to me (and corn-based Fritos isn't something I can eat any longer) and she, the aunts, and my Mom didn't find the kitchen's idea of using a Fritos bag instead of an aluminum sheet to line the platter amusing. I thought it showed Rehab's playful side, but you can't please everyone. Come to think of it, I don't think it's wise to use a bag with so much ink as a liner when food's involved. Hmm... Last, but not least, the milkshake, which was much thicker, and that's a very good thing! I enjoyed the first few sips, but the sweetness started to get too cloying by the mid-mark, and that's with all of us sampling. I would only order this if I could share it with one or more people, and if I were to crave for alcoholic ice cream, I'll just head over to Lee's Cream Liquors! :)) Props again to the management/owners on stocking up on Four Peaks Peach ale. It's nice to patronize local bars/eateries local-based beverages and food!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

lRORqWI_gsc0JoMlEnO1Vg.text: Once again a visit to burger rehab therapy. The best food the best service. Thank you Roco for once again the best service ever. Not a glass went dry, when the kids are taken care of first and fed fast. Everyone left happy and full. I've never had a bad meal and there were 16 off us and like I said we were well taken care of. And the food was amazing as always. Peanut Butter and jelly burger, chili burger, mushroom and Swiss, bacon burger, quesadilla, Mac and cheese and a spicy Mac and cheese burger, fish and chips. Sweet potato tots, onion rings, French fries.  That's how my friends from Colorado roll .  Yum

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

RSt4yjdGbX78_4sUWkRd_Q.text: Not impressed. Their burgers are big but they weren't that tasty. I went there due to the raving Yelp reviews but was sorely disappointed. I tried them twice hoping the first time was just an off day because they were super slammed but no, I would rather go to hop doddy or in and out.

P6qtN-BSxr8-eBQqXGkIzQ.text: Why does this place not have a/c? We were sweating like crazy in this joint. It was PACKED and I think it's because it's one of those places people want to love.   Gotta say, however, I wasn't impressed. I see a lot of "burger snobs" in the reviews. Hmm... I love burgers, it's my favorite food, but I wasn't impressed. The kitchen also messed up our orders and the waitress did, too. She did try to correct it however, so I'm not complaining too much.   The food was good, the atmosphere is very college-sports-bar place, just like everything else in the area, but as far as a hands down fantastic burger? Hmm... I'll say it's 4-stars, but not 5.

4HPctUjU5PMU_uBdIE8YlA.text: This place never fails to amaze me. The wait is very long, then again I am going most often on Friday and Saturday nights. The service is great and the waiters/waitresses are always friendly and amazing. Most recently, I've journeyed over to try something new. I was recommended a few options but one that was mentioned multiple times was the Mac n Cheese Burger. The presentation is pretty intense and the taste is so amazing. I for sure will be returning to try more of the various options they have available. Keep up the great work.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Mac n Cheese

YDkguYLGV2taP7JaHIO7Qg.text: I stumbled on this place as I was in Scottsdale for business. Didn't have a taste for burgers but wanted to swing by because of the high ratings. I'm pretty adventurous, so to see a menu filled with all kinds of burger combinations I'd never seen or experienced peaked my interest more. I ordered to PB&J burger with sweet potato tator tots. The burger, to my surprise was pretty good. I really didn't know what to expect but I'd definitely recommend to a friend. It's one of those things that you loved while in the moment but wouldn't try again, like Mardi Gras, lol. The only reason I gave this place 4 stars instead of 5 were the employees at the bar (2 men) where I was sitting. Let's just say they were way more attentive to the hot blonde sitting 4 seats down to pay the other folks at the bar much attention.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J burger with sweet potato tots

5eZEg5ZSD5Ik6u3PZEOGNA.text: Visited this establishment last night, my second visit. I had been here with an out of town friend over the holidays for cocktails but did not eat on that occasion. Last night we ordered burgers, my friend got the Chili Cheeseburger and french fries, I ordered the Hatch Green Chile Burger with fries, on a GF bun. It was really not tasty at all. I didn't even finish it. The fries were meh. My friend said his burger was ok but not the greatest chili burger he's had. I think this place really hopes you will down a couple of their tequila shooters from their extensive list so that you won't know how awful the burgers really are. Our server, although polite, was clearly paying more attention to other tables, from what we heard they sounded like regulars, or maybe friends of hers. The atmosphere is trendy and fun, too bad the food is not comparable.

P6dNGAVGGeFkETQULuWsKg.text: My burger wasnt cooked the way I ordered it however they made me another one on the house. I loved the burger and I am definitly going back!

_a2ZlRfFm7GPpe3sH13CoA.text: Delicious!!  By far, the peanut butter, jelly, and sriracha burger is my favorite but all of them are amazing!  I also love the sweet potato tots with all the various aiolis.  Hands down my favorite place to get a burger in Old Town.

9mVIoHnnRBkzJ1lV93VzhA.text: Probably one of the best burgers I've ever had the pretzel bun was excellent you must go to here to have a burger and chillax read on the back of the menu of the guys come up with the burger joint

7Wfrut3ZkltfGf0Z48g6yA.text: Rehab Burger Therapy is all about the Southern California, beachy, laid-back surfer vibe in the middle of Downtown Scottsdale, AZ complete with palm tree and surfboard-esque decor- which is cute. I mean, they tried it. Overall, I felt that everything was "fine." The 5oz Relapse bacon cheeseburger is a good portion size for me to share and it was pretty standard in terms of taste. Nothing I have to run back to have again. Their fries were very good and they had a little bit of seasoning which I appreciated. Probably the best thing I had. Overall, this place is A-OK, but nothing I'd rush out to take friends to. But they do have off-brand Jawbreakers at the door when you leave.

cOnhlouavuTZbsWjzWPfKQ.text: I had the Hangover burger (fried egg, bacon, cheese, and green chili). The relapse size was perfect, the rehab size would have been way too much. The burger comes with a side of fries or tots. I got the fries. They were good but nothing to rave about. I like to have my fries with a side of honey mustard but they didn't have any, so that was kind of annoying. No big deal though.   There is outdoor seating. A lot of customers had their dogs with them. Super cute.   I would recommend this restaurant to others. The food was good, the atmosphere was fun, and the service was quick and friendly.

YbEWy6nJI8U3Tfzy5Cjnbw.text: Can't wait to get back for a dessert item I spied on the menu - some kind of delectable brownie concoction, but I digress. The place has the coolest beach vibe with groovy art, tv, and music making it work. Very friendly service, and the menu is ridiculously impressive. Their burgers cannot be beat and your choices/combinations are limitless. I had a pineapple bbq backyard burger with giant crunchy onion rings atop. I couldn't get the thing to smash below a 4" gap and had to make do with knife and fork. Hubby had the bacon/egg burger combo (can't remember the names of these bad boys) but they were both cooked to perfection, juicy, and the bun... oh my land. Don't miss out on the sweet potato tots - full of flavor and crispy good. Next time, I may share a burger so I can land that dessert. Will be SOON.

2fVI7tCFPe9bTp8w7KW7IQ.text: Love this place, you will NOT be disappointed!!! Great food, fun vibe and awesome service!!!

wbOv_AiOWAWFjRZOOJf9nw.text: Wow!  This place did not let me down.  Respect to whoever came up with the hamburger ideas and more.  I wish I had one near my house in Utah.  Bravo! Bravooooooo!

Tex19UedIsNXxxbdG1aElQ.text: We were definitely not impressed with the food at Rehab this past Saturday night.   We ordered the calamari, a Jalapeno Popper burger and a Mushroom and Swiss burger. The calamari was fishy smelling, overly breaded, and really fatty and greasy. The Popper burger was under seasoned and just lacked something. The mushroom and Swiss burger also lacked seasoning. It also didn't even have mayo or some kind of condiment on the bun. Just a dry, naked bun. The sweet potato tots and fries were great.   The staff was friendly and attentive, however. One note I would love for the restaurant to see is that it would be great to have a small place with benches or seats outside for people to wait. I have some physical limitations and sitting on a curb or standing for 30 min for a table is too long.

f8jwmuHkOoslvbPkHs904A.text: So what do you want to know about this place.  You walk in and you think yourself at a beach bar in the Caribbean or maybe the Texas coast?  Surf Boards and fish surround this place.  Sadly I didn't not imbibe in their mixed drink selection as I can only tell by the fare they'd be luscious as well.  I forget my Waitress' name but she had this attitude and spunk that was perfect and was packed with tips when asked.  That tells me she at least had eaten something there.  So there's two way about stopping your colon, the 10 oz or the 5 oz.  I went the 10oz route with the Porkster and Tots.  Well everyone got the tots.  My Step-Dad got the Ghost, and girlfriend the Mac and Cheese...oh that mac and cheese was delish, like word.  Maybe I'll just sneak back around and get some of that sometime.  I had been waiting to come here after a long workout and am glad I did so this day.  That Porkster was delicious, 10oz of prime ground juicy beef with cheddar and 8 oz of luscious pulled pork all on a pretzel bun.  Just nom.  Can't go wrong here.

Tots came with a pineapple aoli dipping sauce that paired perfectly making them the best tots I ever had. I will go back if I get back this way. I highly recommend!

wCtVDuemEMfvIyzEVeVwDA.text: Seriously one of the best hamburgers I've ever had in my life. I got the mac n cheese burger the first time and the mc gnarly the second. The serving sizes and portions are made for giants so you definitely get your money's worth. Don't go if your in the mood go eat your feelings as you may accidentally eat your own body weight. 708I1E2wGG8yFw4mstgocQ.text: Met some family for a dinner after flying in for vacation and this was the perfect spot. Our server was amazing and he recommended his favorites to us and DID NOT DISAPPOINT! My dad and I ate a late lunch so we weren't super hungry but we got the chicken wings with the tangy pineapple bbq sauce and it was delicious! My aunt got the PB and J burger and she said that was good as well. Hospitality was key and they really took care of us. Will definitely recommend to anyone I know that is coming into the area.

jqfVoYEuVNyQe-jaFEd6Vw.text: Rehab Burger Therapy is my new favorite burger spot, not just in the Phoenix area, but in the US. Honestly, I've never had a better hamburger. The quality of the ground sirloin they use is second to none and it is apparent from the taste and texture. I had the Big Beefstro Burger and my wife had the Porkster Burger. These burgers have got to be on the top of the list for anyone who is a True carnivore. The portions are huge, the presentation beautiful, and the service is wonderful. Needless to say, we'll be back.

D-BgB1SiMhC7nQWvaUTRnA.text: We came here on black friday and it was super busy. We waited about 30 minutes and it was well worth the wait. I got the jalapeno popper burger and french fries. IT was soo amazing. I tried their pineapple bbq sauce and it soo good. I put it on my sandwhich and it made it EVEN better! I love this place and will be back next time I visit.

BD-rEbeRM5O-cYAOcD8psQ.text: From the atmosphere down to the food this place is amazing. I ordered a BYOB with sweet tots. The burger was perfect and tasted amazing and I was able to get a gluten free bun! The tots were good but the fries are way better (I stole a few from my son's plate.) My husband loved his burger as well. Our waitress was great and so patient!

rdXbdBMKuh1kDxnNC73juA.text: This place is completely amazing! Food was beyond delicious and inventive. They are very accommodating and almost one step ahead in making suggestions. And the service was spectacular. The decor was fun. Recommend HIGHLY!

q6p3IDGyC505ZtXWhtXEew.text: This does not happen often that I completely disagree with the rating of the "masses" but I really struggled to see what's so great about this spot. I have been in the past to a number of spots specializing in throwing literally anything on a burger (peanut butter, chocolate, sardines, etc) and attracting a crowd just because of that. My genuine impression of Rehab was no different.  The decor is junk yard meets a restaurant, but has some recurring themes to it and tries to be badass with the bikes and all. It reminded me a bit of the theme at the Vortex in Atlanta, just not satanic. Stuff like that does not get me excited, but perhaps some people enjoy it. I'll just skip that and go straight to the one darn thing that matters, the food.  Onion Rings were mediocre, but huge. The Fish burger was quite disappointing, the fish itself was tasteless, but the burger was huge. So just picture getting something huge that you aren't really excited about eating. I've had better ingredient quality at airport restaurants. The pretzel bun was kind of cool and the only reason I'd give this spot more than 2 stars. I presume the idea is to eat this thing like an animal, as there was literally no way to fit it in the mouth. I was fine with that. My coworker had one of the beef burgers and was also rather disappointed by the meat quality. If you do come here, I'd suggest doing it more for a beer instead of food. If you want a damn good burger, hit up Relish Bistro at the Phoenician.

X1l-MouCuOFxSJD1whmvow.text: Stopped in for lunch. The PBJ and Bacon burger was so good. Service was great. Will for sure be back next time we are in town.

earGkFqy838qXI_9GOQ1Yw.text: This place is awesome.  Staff were super friendly and atmosphere had a cool vibe. We had the spicy mac n cheese and hangover burger, both were great. The sweet potato taters were super yummy as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicey mac n cheese burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Sweet potatoes from heaven

dCOb1E7OlbyjkiGUku769Q.text: Wow! Truly an incredible burger! Visiting from California and came across this place on yelp and had to check it out. I'm so glad I did because it did not disappoint! I ordered the Porkster burger and added deep fried jalapenos. Was loaded with bbq pulled pork, so much I was glad I ordered it with the relapse (5oz) patty. This was the perfect sweet/spicy burger I was looking for! Awesome house made bbq sauce to match. Would definitely be back if I was looking for the best burger spot. Cool vibe as well but super busy. Get their early to put your name in.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

8UDW2zHe5_BmIuHM2R9v2A.text: Came here on a Friday night and shared the PB&J Bacon Burger 10oz! So. Much. Flavor. Sweet jelly, spicy peanut butter and crispy bacon. Cooked to perfection, huge portions, and quick service. We were in and out within 30 minutes. We sat on the patio which was decked out in surfer themed decor.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

gq5zU7DGjDsdl8WPaQw0eA.text: Our server Alisha was on the ball big time. She kept walking by keeping a solid eye on every table in her section. It was nice to have a rock star, professional server taking care of us.  We've been here many times. We often come here when we bike to Old Town Scottsdale, especially for spring training games and general #barcycle rides.  Tonight, I had the Bacon and Blue. The burger has the blue cheese and bacon embedded in it. Does make it a little less messy while eating. I had the kaiser wheat bun. Everything was delicious. I ordered the burger medium rare and it was spot-on. The flavors were amazing. Because, umm, cheese and bacon and beef. Also, try the spicy ketchup. Yum.   Love their fries with the skin on. Beer was cold. There was oxygen in the room because we didn't pass out. This is a great little place right off Scottsdale Rd. Highly recommended.
