aZdJJC0OWAPVvFEZf4zwFg.text: My boyfriend and I shared a Popper Burger and Spinach salad.  It was one of the best burgers I have ever had.  The fries were good - but the burger was outstanding.  The salad was also top notch.  It was crowded so we had to sit at the bar - but that ended up being OK.  The burger was perfectly cooked (medium) and loaded with cream cheese.  Melted cheddar on top of that.  Deep fried jalapenos on top of that.  It was loaded and luscious.    The salad was huge - plenty of strawberries, goat cheese and pecans.  I wish I lived in Scottsdale because I would definitely return.

5htcJa9hLqqyKPBw8u2eag.text: They take a long time but these burgers are really good with a good char yet still juicy. But 20-25 minutes is a long time to wait after ordering so get a drink and appetizers if you're really hungry.

AKXrkcjBZ1XQUx7MGRlSrA.text: Oh burger! Came in and sat at the bar on a Sunday evening. There was baseball on TV and burgers to eat. The PB &J burger. I was a little skeptical of how this was going to be but with the umami of the beef and bacon and the sweetness of the peanut butter and jelly it was such a surprisingly amazing combo. The only thing I wish they had done was have a better separation between the peanut butter and the pickle. Not my favorite combo in the world.  The hatch burger with a turkey patty was also a great combo.  Try the home made mustard!

HWy3Ti72Y8tW2ld8g6aWRA.text: Amazing PB and J burger!  Took an old friend to this restaurant tonight!  3rd time there. This place has amazing food.  Great service. Loved it.

JVB7TrpMC29oH-xz64-csQ.text: Tractor pulled pork is my favorite permanent menu item, as their sauce is rich and tangy but sweet enough to balance it well. Sweet Potato tots, are you kidding me? So amazing! And their happy hour is one of the best in Scottsdale! Pb&j Sriracha burger is not for the squeamish, it's messy, it's spicy, and it's daring, but a must-try for any gourmet burger lovers.

hO3aIHrAnAyJWsRzaS2Aag.text: The 4.5 star reviews convinced me to try this place. Pictures of burgers looked amazing. I'll never know how good they were because we never had a chance to order. My brother and I sat at the bar, ordered beers right away, got menus then were ignored for 20 minutes. I tried to get someone's attention behind the bar but I guess they didn't hear me. The bartender finally stood right in front of us and I said we were ready to order whenever he was. He looked at us with no expression and after a few seconds he said ok as soon as I serve these beers and he walked away. Not sure what these employees think, but there are lots of other places to spend my money with better attitudes.  We went next door. Had great service. Spent our money there. Now I realize that the $45 Rehab didn't get from us won't put them out of business but if enough patrons are treated like this it will eventually make a difference.  We won't be back.

vb0c0fhhE6cr3JiCxJeUoQ.text: my husband and I found this on accident and now take anyone that comes to visit us! I also let my clients at work know about it, it reminds me of my home-state,California and the burgers are delicious! you taste the quality in the meat.

QwYbK4sBTff83QCq8Y88NQ.text: I got sick after lunch, I don't think I will ever step foot into this place.  Good luck

l1CeF1y8YuDdi7UU_Nn2cQ.text: Stopped in while in Phoenix, had the Mac and cheese burger, it was very good, cool restaurant and fun atmosphere

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and cheese

qytGO_wn3kLNQYPVGzYDJg.text: Wow, I am really sorry that I waited so long to try this place. And really, the only reason I did was because I had a groupon (Amazon Local, actually). It was a deal for couples where you get to share one appetizer and then you each get a burger and then share a dessert. Wow, that was a lot of food! We ended up taking most of it home because their burgers are huge. I ordered their special for the night which had sirracha, peanut butter, jelly, and bacon on it. I know it sounds a little crazy but it was incredibly good. And I loved the pretzel bun; a lot of burger places try to do a pretzel bun but are unsuccessful at it. All the burgers on the menu had a lot of interesting toppings and most of them sounded pretty good. The best part for me was the sweet potato tater tots. Those were fantastic! We also ordered wings which hubby said were pretty good (I didn't try any). And for dessert they were out of the pot brownies so we got a strawberry milkshake which tasted like it was made with fresh fruit. Mmmm good!!  I really liked the laid back island vibe of this place. They had a lot of surfer and beach paraphernalia decorating the walls. It was fun without being too corny. And I really liked the music, too. Some surf and some rock. While we were there they played a lot of Sublime which always puts a smile on my face since it takes me back to my college days. Everyone seemed really friendly and our waiter was awesome!  I definitely will return. I wish I had found out about this place while I was still working in Old Town!

1mtlakefmbuBjt5sHKoALQ.text: This place is my new all time favorite!! Amazing food, atmosphere, and service!  They have every burger creation that you can imagine and the quality is excellent.  I haven't had one thing on the menu that wasn't good!  I hope they open a Rehab Burger Therapy in Gilbert! I recommend the PB and J burger, and the Pig Wings as an appetizer.

1IpmelYnyzKSMMBhzfC6Qw.text: Great food and great service.  Prices are a little expensive, but you can easily get two meals out of the larger sized burgers.

3-EXfG7fdGPVq4svzLJYoA.text: I don't think I have ever had a more enthusiastic server in my life. A short brunette helped my girlfriend and I out, and obviously loved her job. The burger I got was huge and delicious.  The fries and tots were great, too. The patio was perfect on such a beautiful day.   This is a great spot to relax with a burger/sandwich and beer.  Enjoy!

S3JM65wNQfSat8lv2KY_aA.text: Spicy Mac N  cheese burger is so ono!  Would have loved to have had the moco Loco burger they are featuring this weekend.  Winner winner no matter!  Ask for Alyssa, she's awesome!

Vg7lhWiuhNZPvAIlyD9H3A.text: Came in simply because it was close to my hotel. Tucked away just off Indian School road, you wouldn't expect such a gem behind a simple, friendly facade. Themed like a Hawaiian dive, it is anything but. The staff was friendly, the music was always reggae, and the air conditioning was a kiss compared to the dry, desert heat outside.  I had the Know Poblano burger (small) with sweet poTOToes, caramel milkshake on the side. Delicious all around. The owner gave me some 1:1 service, suggesting the spicy ketchup, coming out also with a teriyaki dip as well. I can only recommend this place and will definitely be coming back next time I'm in AZ.

d6gtJzNTpBHez9lxlBZXpw.text: We visited based on rave yelp reviews, and now we can say we've been there. :/  we sat at the bar & service was fine, although they ran out of gluten free buns (on a Wednesday??) so I had to eat a burger patty with watery iceberg lettuce. There were many burger offerings, so that was kind of fun, if you don't care about how bad all the ingredients are for you . So if you are a health conscious person, you might want to pass on this place.

kCieB8GA6oJnspPE0NrNOQ.text: On the advice of the other customers at the communal table I sat at and the advice of the waitstaff I tried the peanut butter and jelly and Siraccha burger... And as bizarre as that sounds... it was amazing!  Can't wait to go back and try a few of the other interesting combinations.

2kO5Bp_23jUScrDk7yPGIQ.text: I like everything about this place! From the food, drinks, staff and atmosphere I've never had any complaints. I'm a burger guy and the burgers here are better than most in Scottsdale. This is a tough location and several restaurants have failed here in the past few years. I see this concept staying here for a long time as it's always packed.  Go check this place out!!

1eBlZliC2xlr3WdzaRkrzA.text: Really solid burgers and salads.   Everything on the menu comes in HUGE portions so consider sharing.  The wait staff is really nice!   If you are in the mood for a burger - this is a good eat!

fOyKU_SoL4jHqFrPeltfAg.text: This place was average. We made a trip down here to old town Scottsdale due to the great reviews. The place was very busy and we luckily got a table. The server was nice but the wait for the food to come out took a while. We had the hangover burger with sweet potato tots. The bread was not super soft. The green chilies in the burger were not spicy at all. The burger was also a bit dry and lacked flavor. The tots were really good. With all the hype and reviews we thought this place would be amazing. It was average at best. Won't be back...

Kn_zc6HIglDEyF9W_GOzZg.text: This place is pretty damn good. I tried the mushroom and Swiss burger and it was very flavorful. The onion rings were just as good. We had to wait for about 20 minutes and our big boobed waitress was a little slow but other than that everything was great. Definitely recommend

1FbH9uaYgKSWvEqXhWgAWw.text: I had the Hatch Burger and Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger. Great food but the service is a little slow.

XyRXcrzzkrHpmaqQyw7Bdw.text: I know this is a burger joint. I went in to try out the burgers. They were decent. The fries too. Sorry to report, the burger was not the star of the show. This review is all about the Pig Wings. I have had some in Orlando a while back and they were my first encounter. The Pig Wings at Rehab are more of a Hawaiin Fusion BBQ sauce. In my opinion is an improvement from the first ones I tried in Orlando. So, needless to say, I'm hooked. So much so that I have had them for lunch more times than I would like to admit.  The service was great. The place gets busy so be sure to keep that in mind during lunch or dinner times on the weekends. The menu is extensive and they offer beyond the burgers and wings mentioned. It is for sure a spot that anyone can find something on the menu to sample. Check it out.

QKjXpbXpufWId9swpRlwaw.text: The PB&J burger is one of my favorite burgers ever and I always look forward to coming here. I also really love the Mac n cheese burger. The staff are friendly and helpful which is always nice. Oddly enough, the tortilla chips and guac are especially good for a burger place. Also, make sure you get the ice cream brownie desert!

eTpdjd1qgE_tp_C8_dGSpQ.text: It was jumping on Thursday night.  We had to sit at the bar which wasn't a big deal.  Would definitely recommend this place fun atmosphere. I had the mushroom n Swiss burger which was excellent.  My boyfriend had the Hawaiian burger.   Quick service, other than waiting for our mojitos.   Bar tender needs to be more friendly, seems patrons were a bother other than two woman he knew at the bar.   All of the female employees were very attentive and made sure everyone at the bar was happy.  Would go back but get a table next time.

mWANniVyCiRtn-RALCFkRA.text: I was very impressed, fast service, great food, friendly staff, unique menu.. The owner of this establishment should be very very proud. Keep up the good work!

qjA_KrLVTwuXE8v-72sF0g.text: This place is great. Amazing patio, delicious burger. Place is more than packed on sat after spring training game and still phenomenal service with a smile from our server Lauren!

wqw8ak6NUsP0OHOyx2mW6A.text: YUM! Oooooohhhhh yesssssss. Yes. I could eat here everyday if my wallet (and stomach) would allow it.

saNwcIuQH1tTGGZDppV1dQ.text: Excellent food.  One of the best burgers I've ever had.  Staff was overly nice, clean restaurant, and nice environment

8B8YDzr5VPUX8vdE0-l4lA.text: This place is soooo good. I love the burgers, they are awesome. The menu has a wide variety, and I have tried a few other things, and they too were delicious. Happy hour is also great. Love the place, the atmosphere and the help have always been great.

hBGubs2y1fnbXvLkY5hiCA.text: Went here with a massive hangover....left feeling great!! The onion rings were legendary.....I ordered the Mac gnarly burger, and it was the size of a human head. Leftovers for dinner! A definite thumbs up!

loKU0Eb8LHzOY40f-5f2Aw.text: My Regional manager loves burgers and was pretty faithful to Culinary Dropout whenever he was in town. I pleaded him to venture out and took him to Rehab. Our waitress suggested the PBJ and after some convincing, we decided on that and the Blue Cheese. My manager took a bite of his half of the PBJ and I asked him how it was... Silence. He continued to eat his half and then stared at my half. He said it was the most mind blowing experience he'd ever had. I took a bite into my half and immediately knew what he was talking about. It is definitely unexpected. The mixture of creamy, sweet and spicy....there are no words!

zv2Hj-xzHtSpWgiMyDtHjg.text: Eh, wanted to see for myself what the hype was all about. The burgers here are normal and nothing to scream about. They do have pretty insane flavors like a PB&J burger, which was pretty good. However the meat is mediocre and the ingredients are alright. I was hoping it would be fresher. The side salad was mostly lettuce and the pomegranate dressing just tasted like vinegar. Service can be better also.

JggJXPGBLtHAZLULzeN5xg.text: This place is a great find! A bit off The main strip of Old Town Scottsdale, which makes for a great location, free parking round the back to boot. My boyfriend got the Pescado Barracho and he loved it, his only complaint was that they gave him a lot of fish, so he had some left over, which isn't a real complaint. I was a bit adventurous and got the PBJ Bacon Burger and it was awesome! Great service, great food - we'll definitely be coming back.

XUoKvvzi2dt2-qbAhqtbBw.text: FUN place with good burgers and fantastic sweet pot tots!  Patio was too busy so were inside and it was loud but nice, fun decor and excellent service.  The regular and turkey burgers were outstanding and the pretzel buns added to them.  Lots of choices on sauces.

aKEE8lNyDzEEXPh_G1VXkA.text: Ok, you know how sometimes when you eat a burger you think I need a little more...just a few more bites? Well, that did not happen here! I ordered the 10 oz bacon bleu burger on the pretzel bun and it was huge! I got the onion rings and they are amazing compared to other places. I also tried the fries with the spicy ketchup which our server told us is based in habanero and it had the perfect amount of kick. If you want a good burger, give Rehab Burger a chance. By the way, never go into other places named rehab because A. Quitting is for wussies and B. The food isnt as tasty!

M7UJAWdCbwm1qZIb1BzPfw.text: This place was really GOOD!  Great, quick service out on the patio.  The Margatini was perfectly chilled, the Bacon Cheeseburger was delicious (with all the fixins); even the Sweet PotTOT's were perfect!!!

--W1glx1y0k9at0V0PMOqQ.text: The service was very very slow. The waitresses and hostesses were dressed very young and not very professional. (I get this is a chill restaurant with a chill vibe, but when the employees look like they just left the gym with tight spandex leggings, form-fitting tank tops, and messy buns, I couldn't tell who worked there and who was dining there). However, the sweet potato tots were TO DIE FOR (I found myself craving them weeks later) and the burger was really good. I will definitely be back to try the PBJ & Bacon Burger that everyone has raved about, but the slow service could absolutely use some improvement.

CoWM6s9pOKmqOjKird95DQ.text: Love this place.  The pig wings are a must!   They are sweet with a slow perfect burn.

Qseo3GQKZUFW6tMejhmDlg.text: Whenever I visit Scottsdale this is where I go. Great burgers and the best wings ever. Hoping to be back in June. Great atmosphere and service and prices are not bad. Cold beer as well which is always a Plus in Arizona.

NHHEot4sfsRdUpQqkfrwRQ.text: I have been here twice and both times have been great. They really have a nice service staff & very Attentive! Food is pretty good as well! They seem to be always busy but super glad you are there with them. Well done!

8-KgKlN9IGQ0cype6TLOzg.text: Best burger joint in Scottsdale!!! Food is always great and staff is always friendly!!! Definitely a must when deciding on places to go!!!

yAYHUhYSpjQuJRtuOdBydg.text: I have been going to rehab burger for years! Funny thing tho, I don't eat red meat, but I get their Da Vinci salad every time! It's my favorite chicken salad and the portion is shareable! I have to take half home every time! Today a couple of my friends and I came in to grab a quick bite for lunch and ended up staying unusually long and ordering more food because we were enjoying ourselves so much. Kay was waiting on us and was exceptionally helpful, knowledgable of the menu and specials, friendly, and with a fun personality to boot! Always a good meal, great staff, and I love the beachy decor!

J7PTk5HAR830w6yQTax52Q.text: The burgers here are great and have an awesome and interesting selection. The sweet potato tater tots are delicious, and the decor of this place is great. The downside is the service was awful, the server I had had an attitude and the alcohol selection left a lot to be desired. Oh well will give it another shot later on when I get a chance, but won't be drinking here.

lq6z-r5r5Xb7TgegmIE-KQ.text: I attempted to dine-in but the wait time to be seated was insane. Figured that was a good sign of how tasty the food was so I ordered a Hawaiian burger (rehab size) to go with a side of sweet potato tots. I wandered around town until it was ready, about 20 minutes later. Took the burger back to my hotel. It was HUGE. I'm embarrassed to say I ate the entire thing in one sitting. Super juicy, and the aioli on the side was amazing. The tots were a bit soggy...was like eating fried mush. Also, this experience cost me somewhere around $12-14. A little spendy. But, it was an awesome, juicy burger. Would do a relapse size next time.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

om3Z1WB1C2hCv2t3-92hbQ.text: Rude hostess, holding tables but they don't take reservations???? according to host?? Take a class on hosting - call a heads are the same as reservations!?!?  Team of 10u baseball families from bel air.... Avoid this spot. Rude

w46lwxEk_licvIkhnnTx8Q.text: Awesome. Chicken breast version of Poblano Burger. Great fries. Service was top notch. Thanks!!

pf9U5Xafu8Nj-gfXYxQ3Ig.text: Just had the worst experience here and I will 100% not be returning. I waited over 15 minutes and the server did not come to my table nor even address me. I told the hostess I am leaving and am disgusted at the level of non-service. Train your employees better please. Completely awful service.

tkUqPvzsuY3tTd8JDYsyMg.text: This place is amazing!!!! Burgers are huge!! and absolutely delicious!!!  The service is always impeccable, and the staff is super friendly! They are usually packed, but even then, food still gets delivered in a couple of minutes. About 10 minutes.  I go to school nearby so I try to come here as much as possible!

aQHJ_KlcTFhlSIB3B3ICxA.text: My all time favorite hamburger.  Make sure you get the pretzel bun.  You definitely need 2 hands to hold this sandwich.

Sz20img75wcZkE5YUDk8uw.text: Oh. My. Goodness.  This place is incredible. All four of us LOVED our burger. Including one notoriously picky kid who said (after 2 bites), "This is a 5-star burger." Service was great! So glad we came!

GyHAx3TvQTiqbSIlXbzIzg.text: Ok.  Just had a crazy good burger. Here it is: 10oz of beef, pretzel bun, delicious good thick bacon, sirachi, and .... Wait for it .... PEANUT BUTTER AND JELLY!!!   Crazy but off the hook good!! The spicy nutty sweet flavor was harmony! My son Jack (PB&J and burger guy would love this) Love it!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Z3RyCi2M07RA4I7Lgmcvww.text: I've visited this establishment a couple times with friends. It's always a fun time there's a lot of energy and friendly servers. Great time all around.

GkK2DkWBikyad8-fNM06Bw.text: Hella Goooooood! Yelp has done it again! The reviews are spot on. Rehab is definitely a great place for a burger! I had the Mac n Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger with extra bacon. It wasn't as spicy as I thought it would be however I wasn't disappointed. My husband had the PB and J. It was pretty good as well (messy but good) if we had to choose our favorite it would be the Mac and cheese. Definitely coming back! Thanks Ryan for the great service!

in9Q-G1c_79HtpZbyY1KyA.text: Bah humbug. I admit this used to be my fav burger joint in Scottsdale. Maybe they had an off night but all of our burgers were just so-so. Fries were nothing great and soggy onion rings. And to top it off, asked for lettuce and tomato on my burger and they served it on the side, not a nice crisp leaf of iceberg but shredded browning wilted lettuce. How somebody let that leave the kitchen to sit on a table. Embarrassing. Let's hope it was a misfire but not sure I will return anytime soon. On a positive note, cheap happy hour beers on draft all night (Thursday in Dec.)

Zf-FkC20bk3TgQaNgH7k4Q.text: Went here a few year ago as I moved to AZ. Their atmosphere is friendly and their Mac and cheese burger was all I wanted in the world. I enjoyed everything but the parking experience, which had to be done next door in public parking. Nothing wrong with that but I didn't really know what to expect!

5c365CSQVSUPNOIE-2eo0g.text: Our burger was cooked to perfection. Fried calamari dish was well done. The size of both dishes was very big.  All day happy hour on beverages is unbeatable.

WYNLQjc1PUMLMOBZHcZfMg.text: Today I took my kids and my husband to this restaurant. I got the sweet potato tater tots they were literally the bomb! Also our server was Sam she was really kind. She did really well and it was only her third day!!!! This restaurant had some "bomb" beers. Also if you are a vegetarian they have great salads. The burgers were normal size and good tasting. #bomb.com!!!!! Hahaha tell your family and friends!!!

5tQ8An_-ZcVv0rek25nE6Q.text: OH MY GOD!  By far the yummiest burer i have had in a long time!  What a great menu!  The sweet poTOTo tots were amazing with the pineapple dipping sauce.  Not too sweet but a perfect combo with these perfectly sized crunchy tots!  Cold beer, awesome drinks and their happy hour rocks! EVERYTHING here is amazing! Get the pretzel bun!!!!!!!!!  Will definitely be going back and i can't wait!

vKJg1-WSc81s5-f7q9vh0g.text: So happy we found this place!  Great food, great atmosphere & Great waitstaff!  Loved that our waiter suggested to try the PB&J burger as an appetizer with sweet potatoes fries. It's fabulous!  PB&J with burger, bacon, sriracha sauce on a pretzel bun.  We will be back!

61Q_pofAOEp7kRVQkXea0g.text: Their burgers are amazing...you won't be disappointed!  Bartender was cool and staff was very engaging.  I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Wow!!  The food is amazing!!  Bartender very attentive. A lot for your money!

rFBsV5WeIeAcH8Y4dp8Bvg.text: Meth heads are casing the corral parking lot and stealing stuff out of cars..park out front.no cameras or security on lot...happened on 10.5.17...lunchtime...very bad experience...dont care for food myself. Good luck

wvJ3Cye6wBSGQPAE-Y8u8Q.text: The burgers here are best in town . The sweet potato tots are reason enough to go here . They have an array of different dipping sauces to choose from to accompany your dish . I really like the chipotle ranch and chipotle aioli.  I've tried just about all the burgers and my top two by far are the Bistro Burger and the siracha peanut butter burger .  If you're on the fence about ordering a peanut butter burger or maybe you've had one in the past and didn't care for it , pull the trigger on this one . The flavors are excellent and it will change your whole perspective on what you thought a burger should taste like . Service is always great and they always have good happy hour specials. If you're in town and looking for a great burger you have to check this place out . You won't regret it . Just make sure you don't order the rehab size burger if you plan on going out drinking and walking around . Rehab size will put you in a good coma and you'll be in Netflix and  Pajamas mode in a hurry . Not that it's a bad thing ...

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bistro Burger with Sweet potato tots
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Peanut butter siracha burger with fries

3hytF0owKWmTj4toi1gmZw.text: On a Saturday afternoon we decided to come here. The restaurant was really busy but the servers would take a long time to come around and check on us, the burgers came out cold and the fries were also cold; from what I've heard about this place, I had real high expectations and they all came crumbling down.

O0RNIzUukUqucxLC-HTv_A.text: They have the best burgers anywhere in Phoenix!  Great seasoning and excellent varieties.  Very creative with flavors that I haven't seen anywhere else before.    One drawback was cold fries.  We complained and happily got a new batch.  They were cold, too, so we just ate them.

K1MoNKT6YcBtrSkSwcplFg.text: Whoever came up with adding Sriracha to the PBJ burger is a genius!  The Sriracha added just the right amount of heat to let you know it had come to the party without kicking the door down with a pink wig on and screaming, "I'm here!"  Great stuff, love this place.

6PcPOsd9_J03T44IVTZh7g.text: Been here 3 times now and this burgers just can't fail,  best in town for sure,  great atmosphere,  great service.

cyb6GEsd4aZFOPKZzrflVw.text: The burgers were huge and they have pretzel buns! I had the veggie burger and the patty was yummy and not too crumbly. Sweet potato tots delish! Fast and friendly service too.

uHsQFUgoVhVQ-5WSH1XG3Q.text: Popped into Rehab Burger after a busy shopping day at Fashion Square.  We arrived for an early dinner and were immediately seated.  The decor inside is cute... definitely surfer/California vibe.  I like it.  It was a bit hot inside... could have used the AC turned down a notch or two.  Service was great... our waitress offered her recommendations and was very friendly/helpful.  The burgers were great... messy, but great.  I had a standard cheese burger with thousand dressing (I don't remember what it was called).  It was fab... everything you'd want in a burger.  The Hubs had a burger with pulled pork on top.  He ate every bite and was in 7th heaven.  Both of us felt our sides were pretty cold... fries for me and tots for him.  They would have been much better hot, but they were still pretty good.  We were able to get some beers on happy hour, which was great.  We will surely hit this place up again.  Next time, I want to try that pot brownie... sounded delish.

lMxNbVmHzB9A-Z8Y4769VQ.text: Wundabar!! My friend and I both got the PBJ bacon burger on a pretzel bun and I have been dreaming about it ever since! It was a treat to the tastebuds and so messy it was awesome. I got onion rings and my friend got sweet potato tater tots and both were amazing. Our service was great and our waitress promised is that this burger would change our lives and it did!

oRMeO6F08CD56sN8DojcVA.text: This place was founded by the same people who started Oregano's Pizza. It has some of the same type of vibe, but a burger vibe instead of Italian. The hamburger was very good, but I probably wouldn't call it great. Mine was a little over cooked and therefore a little dryer than I like. I didn't go with the fries, so I can't comment on them. Instead I went with the onion rings and they were also very good. I look forward to going back and trying some of the other items on the menu.

-vVtk-XvzW7UOHJOvq8jDA.text: Good bergers. Interesting menu. Be careful ordering the large Berger unless you are real hungry. Good margaritas.

9zOjJ7lIzBlJcMoWuZBV2g.text: This is a great burger spot, I had trouble deciding between the Hawaiian and the Mac and cheese one, I was very happy with the Hawaiian.. Service was a bit slow at the outside bar top, compared to what people were getting around us, so I'd recommend getting a table if outside or sitting inside.. But everyone was friendly and the burgers delish.

qMui4sKZiia-ZM9MFdaW1A.text: My birthday party at Rehab Burger was so much fun. Nine ladies kept Rocco busy, he was charming and quick to take care of us. Most of us had burgers, and I had the mushroom and Swiss and it was perfect. The fries were crisp and tasty, same with the onion rings. One of the dipping sauces has pineapple- it's light for a hot day! Rocco brought me a brownie with toasted marshmallows, ice cream with chocolate and caramel drizzled all over. Perfect for a party and atmosphere is summertime happy!

lIh47JCQGrcJzsZIBAZYWQ.text: Absolutely the best burger in-town!  The staff is incredible and makes for an even better dining experience...

YwQlNC8hxNfhBB8yNzYabA.text: I had heard several people rave about this place,  so my family and I decided to give it a try while out in the area tonight.   The raves were justified.  While I am not a red meat eater, the menu caters to all types.  Veggie burgers,  chicken burgers,  chorizo burgers and of course good old fashioned beef burgers.   I had a turkey Hawaiian burger on a pretzel bun with Jamaican corn.  They were simply incredible and complimented each other perfectly.   My wife had the turkey bacon cheeseburger with onion rings.  The onion rings were huge and flavorful.   Our server CW was prompt, efficient and helpful.   When we were done,  we all agreed it would be worth the 30 minute v drive to go there again.

6jA7m6YN0Ma9-2W6NnMYGw.text: This. Was. Amazing!  PBJ Sriracha burger has made me look at life in a whole new way!

A3hZrgFFM4PrDjInAETdxA.text: Really awesome burgers! The atmosphere was kind of hawaiian barish.  The staff are really nice and attentive.  We got the pb&j burger and I really forgot the second one.. he said it was like a big mac.    Pb&j- SO good, gotta say it has super umami flavoring.  Has to be the peanut butter and shiracha.  A warning though it can get overwhelming so I would share this.   Big mac?-  Nothing special just a burger with lots of toppings and overwhelming sauce.  So I guess not knowing the name of it isn't that bad.    It can get crowded so I'd come early if you dont want to wait.  I remember these people right behind me and up in my personal bubble.. felt so weird. But I guess the awesome burger made up for it

i7QWJTJPagkDVrogyT_7pA.text: Great! Love to see out on the patio. Bring your appetite, the burgers are huge and the sweet potato tots are to die for!

mOjHJsYdYZ6V3Hi1ZXljWw.text: It's 9pm on a Saturday night and you've just gotten through roughly six stoutly beers and the drunk bees in your stomach are making it known they want company. This is the place to go.   I start off with the fried calamari, which were cooked to absolute perfection, not a soggy piece among them, a whole meal's worth by themselves. For my main course, the Hatch Chile Cheeseburger with a turkey substitute and the pretzel bun, and an overabundance of sweet potato tots with a chipotle aoli sauce to dip them in. I am in food heaven here. THe chiles gave the burger such a good amount of heat and the flavor...intense.   My companion and I then split one of the Pot Brownies, reese's style, cuz you gotta have peanut butter with chocolate to cut that much chocolate. I'm not sure if it's because the dessert was thought up by a pot head or because of the cast iron EasyBake pot it comes in but this darkened brick of brown love is delivered, swimming in a lake of what I soon discover is mallow creme, and topped with (you have to mention you want it or you'll sadly go without) two scoops of vanilla ice cream. It's not a dessert for the faint of heart or with diabetes, because if you don't already have to take regular insulin injections you probably will after consuming it.  Whether stoned, high, drunk, or just come down with a super case of the munchies, this little gem in SoSco will hit all your right buttons.

QwDnCG0RGhQMOC9azr8Wmw.text: A friend of mine told me that Rehab Burger Therapy was better then 5 Guys.  Yeah...right.  But I thought I'd give it a try. So my best friend and I went down on a Tuesday afternoon.  What a cute place! It reminded me of a place I bar-tended at in Florida! Very relaxed, reggae on the speakers...awesome! Our waitress was the best! I didn't get her name (and I meant to!) but she was knowledgeable, entertaining, and patient with us...and super fast, though we were there at around 3:30 PM in order to avoid any rush.  I ordered the Know Poblano Burger (Relapse size) on a pretzel bun with the Sweet PoTOToes...it was out of this world!! Cooked to order, in this case medium, and covered in these spicy, grilled onions and a HUGE poblano pepper!! Our waitress brought us each 2 different dipping sauces as well...Spicy Ketchup and Chipotle Aioli. Both were excellent on my Sweet PoTOToes, which are sweet potato tater tots!!  My bestie ordered the Hatch Chile Cheeseburger (Rehab size) on a pretzel bun with the skin on, homemade/cut fries. He LOVED his burger so much I think he bgan a serious relationship with it!!  For dessert (we really ARE pigs!) we shared a Pot Brownie...O...M...G...!!! Two brownies with marshmallow cream in between, baked, and coated with Hershey's Sauce!! It could not have gotten any better!!  This place is a gem! We adored EVERY minute of our time there and we will most definitely be back...as many times as our waist sizes allow!!

EOx8QmCBD9oX1w1eWfS2cw.text: Great chill burger place in Scottsdale! Love their decor and music (think various reggae, alternative, classic rock, etc.). A well-misted patio w/ample umbrellas defending the harsh Sonoran sun always is appreciated!  Shared their fried calamari - wonderful! Big chunks in a delish coating of herbs. Served w/lemon wedge and aioli sauce.  Good Happy Hour prices - $2 for Bud Light drafts? Can't complain - I can dig for that under my car seat.   Service very friendly and attentive. Recommend outside on patio but the flies are driving me batty! Maybe consider adding some citronella candles?

zxYJRQiLFjsxhpWrTUn9SA.text: Great burger!! I had the hangover burger with pretzel bun and sweet potato tots.  The burger was full of flavor and almost too much to eat (5oz).  Not only was the food great the service was even better.  There was limited seating when I arrived, but the hostess made a spot for me at the bar area.  The waiters and waitresses were all exceptional, equal to what you would expect from a high end steakhouse.  I will definitely come back the next time in in town!

qtYusA8u58_qSCa36-WKYQ.text: This was my first time to this restaurant and I would definitely go back! The atmosphere is like a tiki bar. The prices are decent and the service is great. Most importantly, the food was really good.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Coco Nutty and onion rings!

u7FCnjOcmU9iDfme6waM9A.text: It's all in the name ....  If you want a drink/hungover over the top burger to drool over look no further. It's tucked away off the corner where R&R is and gets lost in the loud Sunday funday-ers except if you're looking for it (which is not a bad thing). I highly recommend their sweet potato tots! The inside has a dive bar/cheeseburger in paradise vibe that is friendly and welcoming. No worries about dressing up here ! Staff could be a little more friendly but otherwise for a burger joint it really hits the spot !

R30XJ7r4WXRnLX4VjHvXPw.text: Amazing burgers and fries!!! My husband fell asleep after eating this burger haha. The drinks were great also and the service was fantastic. The place is small so you may have a wait but it's well worth it!

JVD6j-urtbDw2uvmBouyiQ.text: My wife, sister-in-law, brother-in-law and I went to Rehab Burger yesterday for lunch. I don't usually write reviews but the place was better than great. All of the wait staff were fantastic, friendly and always checking to make sure all our needs were taken care of. My wife and I shared the 10oz PBJ burger never had one before but it was probably the best burger I ever had.   If you have never been here before, do yourself a favor stop by for lunch and try it out you will not be disappointed.  Great place, great staff and great food.

uV510YbgSgwLtE-BuxHcgA.text: Awesome burger and fun atmosphere. Had the PB&J burger a little messy but worth it (don't wear your favorite shirt). Waitress was very attentive as was all the staff. I will definitely be back.

EDuVBjLDkw-MEruN4eucTw.text: I had the best hamburger in my life today!!!  After a short wait I ordered the Bigger Bistro Burger. It features shaved rib eye along with fire roasted poblano peppers and sauteed onions. I left off the havarti cheese. It was amazing. Huge (I had the 5oz size) and cooked perfectly. My wife ordered the Backyard BBQ burger and it was excellent as well.   It's a cool place with some nice outdoor tables to take advantage of Scottsdale's amazing weather. So glad we walked past the other busy places and entered "rehab". I feel another relapse coming!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

tCgitjI5qG9eQsVkA3Ce_w.text: The atmosphere here is great! In regards to food-- I recommend the PBJ Burger... one of THE best burgers I've ever had. You'd think that peanut butter, grape jelly, bacon and burgers don't go together, but the combination is nothing short of magical. Get the sweet potato tots to go with this and you will literally be the closest to heaven you've ever been.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PBJ Burger

ASyftG8995HCzSiekDJaug.text: We came on a Sunday afternoon and had to wait about 25 minutes for a party of two. There is parking along downtown: there's a parking lot right next to the restaurant (with underground parking) and there's also three hour parking along the streets.  They have happy hour 11am-6pm daily and all day Thursday. You can check in and get chips and salsa for $3.99.  PIG WINGS ($11.50) - They give about 8 pig wings per order. I really enjoyed the tenderness of the wing along with the sweetness and spiciness of the sauce. It was literally fall off the bone which is always a good sign. 4/5  SPICY MAC-N-CHEESE BURGER ($15.50, REHAB) - There are two different sizes of burger patties: 10oz Rehab and 5oz Relapse. We got the rehab because we were splitting the burger. I expected the burger to be spicier than it was given that spicy is in the name of the burger. The mac n cheese didn't have as much cheesiness or just taste in general. There were a couple jalapenos but even those weren't really spicy. 3.5/5  SWEET POTOTOES - We ordered these alongside our burger and oh my goodness these are so addicting. I could eat these for days and would never get enough of them. I loved dipping them in the orange-colored sauce (don't know what it is but it was delicious together). 5/5  If you're from the SoCal area, this place reminds me a lot of PB Cantina and Cabo Cantina in terms of their decorations and drinks. Their happy hours are a lot better but Rehab has much better burgers and other foods and isn't only a place to get wasted but a family friendly place to get lunch or dinner (doesn't mean you can't get wasted here though because their margaritas are good and strong).

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac-n-cheese burger (Rehab) with sweet poTOToes ($15.50)
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pig wings ($11.50)
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

YX4LuSd5cxMd5SiEUdbvww.text: Great little spot I'd definitely visit again in the future. They have a nice, laid back vibe to the place. Not so busy when we ate a little early but it picked up when we were done. TVs everywhere but some just show a fish tank and another shows a sponsored channel, very odd.   Burgers were good. They have some traditional and some funny toppings. I had a solid BBQ burger on a pretzel bun. Hit the spot. Fries were delicious but the sweet potato tater tots looked intriguing. My buddy had the PB&J Sriracha burger. He loved it but I wasn't as big a fan.   Near the main stretch of a shopping and restaurant area but not in the middle of it. There's a bit garage and parking lot nearby.

toy4ZHQPnurCdlIkLeSs0Q.text: Unfortunately, we just could not give this local restaurant a fair handshake. We were seated fairly quickly in the corner of the crowded restaurant and there was NO air flow. Our female server was polite, took our drink orders quickly, BUT the stale hot air in the corner was too much to take. We dropped a $20 to our server because it was NOT her fault that the AC didn't exist. If you plan on going here, sit under a fan and it is easier to tolerate the heat. We were sooo bummed because their food looked sooo good in the pictures :(

NsGDMOseIW080LT-Xw5vSg.text: Well-balanced burger with an interesting twist. Peanut butter and jelly on the PBJ & bacon burger was an unexpected combination, but it worked surprisingly well. And a dash of sriracha sauce balanced out what could otherwise have been too sweet and a bit heavy. Mac N Cheese on the spicy Mac n cheese burger was not as salty or heavy as I expected, and it helped preserve the beef flavor of the burger patty. The combination of flavors was not extraordinary, but the burger was very well balanced and tasty.  The only downside was that the font on the menu was too small to read especially under the dim light.  Other than that, the restaurant was overall good with nice customer service and relaxing ambiance.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PBJ &amp; bacon burger and spicy mac n cheese burger

MTY19z_qN90I5jDLAiIZQQ.text: Awesome!!!! Had the BYOB in a gluten free bun. The sweet potatoes didn't disappoint. Super cute place in downtown Scottsdale.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Byob burger and sweet potatoes.

OYE-aT1u24Kn3IIteWZLHQ.text: Love this place and probably my favorite hamburger in the valley. Gets a bit busy during lunch, when I am typically there.

Lg7Gjq4Lh_NzFv3S8gkLdw.text: Amazing burgers and atmosphere! We shared and enjoyed the Bacon and Blue Burger on the pretzel bun with the sweet potato tots and it was every bit as good as we had hoped! I would highly recommend trying this place out!

MMlhdo5gsUn3-AkLxS6X_g.text: Location:  10/10 old town Scottsdale ( a bit hard to find parking )  Cleanliness + appearance:  10/10 clean   Staff:  10/10 super friendly   Occasion:  10/10 good for date night ( fast service)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

IJwjULA1BxdFPT9aafpXPw.text: Came here with my coworker and we had the absolute pleasure of being served by Jessica...I am one that loves awesome customer service, and Jessica did just that! The place was packed and there wasn't a moment she didn't check on us. We absolutely loved our food, and that's coming from someone that doesn't really eat burgers! We will for sure venture back in there again!

Gpb6In8YgbbBn_KOCJmxBw.text: With a glut of burger places you better be damn good to be therapy!  This was a choice really due to the crappy service and lackluster menus from places around it. I try to shy away from burgers but this seemed like a good choice. I will say it's a nice room, large and open and not to loud. Service was pretty good and I grabbed a spot at the bar. They have a good selection of beers (as all trendy burger places do) and a pretty good selection of burgers, salads and wraps (as all the burger places do).   I ordered the fried jalapenos burger and I have to say it was less than impressive. I couldn't decide on fries or sweet potato tots so I got both. Good came out quick but for the exception of the meat and the tots everything else was cold!  I don't even know how you do that?  Flavors were good (like every other burger place).   I don't know if I'd bother coming back. There are some places a few block down, but I guess in the immediate area and compared to the neighbors I may.   KT

ddYvYyWM02Bq_koupR_cbA.text: The ambiance here is very good. Lots of knick knacks on the wall, etc. I ordered the black bean burger. I don't normally eat vegetarian foods but I had heard good things so I gave it a try. It was very good, but does not replace a meat patty. But I can see how people who don't eat meat would enjoy it.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

OVOqYCaSkVLw2Fpg_aUNSw.text: PB&J burger... Enough said!  I was very skeptical to try this my first few visits, but was finally coersed into it and quite glad that I was!  So unique and delicious!  I also love their sweet potato tots and that they have so many unique homemade dipping sauces.  For an appetizer, I HIGHLY recommend the pig wings-so delicious!  The onion rings are nice and big and fat and fresh and delicious as well. It's a friendly beachy California sort of vibe, and I always have a very pleasant experience with the service at Rehab Burger.

U7ELdvwXF2WPEaslspww7Q.text: Great environment! Very nice bar tender/waitress Kay, great personality! The corn on the cobb is the bomb.com! I had the Philly Cheese burger, and added the sauteed mushrooms on the pretzel bun, I got the fries/sweet potato tater tot mix. I also tried the Garlic Sriracha Aioli, pineapple teriyaki Aioli, chipotle Aioli, and pesto Aioli, all pretty good! Happy hour is from 11am-6pm daily and 11am-Close on Thursdays with good items on the happy hour menu! I will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Philly Bacon Cheeseburger - Relapse with mushrooms.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Jamaican Corn and sauces

ojMyAZIuDpjZuhJz2D5E5A.text: Oh my gosh! You absolutely MUST eat here! The spicy mac n cheese burger was amazing and the sweet potato tots are like nothing you've ever tasted. I chose the pesto aioli dipping sauce to go with them & I just about got every last drop out of that cup. So dang good but really large portions. I ate my leftovers 2 hrs later & I'm not even ashamed. Go, eat now!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

LY6G4lr1Ru4VWUzWU2Mraw.text: Great burgers! First time here and certainly not my last!!! Going to set up a time to come back here and bring friends!!!! Wish there were more places closer towards chandler

KHksE9JY5YN00wZeOb4zXA.text: Try the peanut butter and jelly burger! A friend recommended it to me and I was hesitant at first, but was not disappointed. Clean place with a good atmosphere.

F_rkyKpvgw79mNCoVipnQQ.text: Suspect is a dastardly good-looking male, 5'11 and a megawatt smile. Shocking detail is he doesn't have his own talk show. Victim is one of Texas's Finest, leather black and white skin, weight is 840 lbs, and taste, Amazingly Fantastic. Suspect used a steak knife to cut in half and then dressed the victim in manchego cheese, grilled-spicy onions and covered its body in a brioche bun. The scene was horrific, with juices spilling out everywhere. One witness even described a friendly woman serving the suspect with water refills and a pleasant disposition.

7yKi1wMtPWvt5QYRQ_YSyA.text: This place is great!  Fantastic burgers with a hip atmosphere, reminiscent of "Hodad's" of ocean beach, ca. Not because of the hundreds of different burgers, but because of the decor, etc.   I would say this is the second best burger joint I've ever been to. Number one being Hodad's, and number three being the old Bobcat Bite that used to be in Santa Fe, nm.   My favorite items are the relapse green chile burger, the street corn, and the onion rings.  Definitely try the pretzel roll buns.  Always fresh, cooked right, and great service, even when it's packed.   (I hear they may be opening a second location...  lets hope!)

riXJoAKroIhF-XMi7Ou_Pw.text: While traveling for work I stopped here to give them a try. The burgers here were really good and the bar staff was friendly.  I had a burger and fries that hit the spot. I would def come back here when I return

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

jKoPft5prqsqAjnmNUUWPQ.text: This place was so-so. The burgers are a little extra and crazy, but still quite delicious. The reason why I gave 4 stars is because I most likely won't be going back. One and done kind of place. Good drink specials though.

xOvZTzqlZbpygwxHEp5GGw.text: Great burgers and fries! Small place but nice and friendly.

mNJAXapa9QAKdYU7SKADpA.text: One of the best burgers I've had and I don't eat red meat. I ordered a turkey burger with chipotle and pesto sauce on the side.... I'm drooling just thinking about it lol. And their tater tots were perfect. Staff was super friendly and beer selection was on point. Great hole in the wall place I'll be sure to come back and visit

PU6dMS8bnc_QCk7fwGshXQ.text: great burgers.  I would recommend stepping out if your comfort zone.  We split two different ones, the pbandj and the hangover.  Loved them both.

c7FzFx7Rik2aPt_c80UOPQ.text: The food is the only thing that saved this review.  Just my experience here. I am sure there has been better and worse but this was mine: We put our name in and we're told it would be a 15 minute wait. No problem, went to the bar for a drink. 15 mins go by and a party of 3, just like ours, walks in and gets sat immediately. I bring it to their attention and they get us sat at a different table shortly after. Confusing a mojito with a margarita, no silverware, forgetting condiments. Maybe just a bad day..... I'll go back again though, the food was that good.

AAdujyMi9CRSXlaEB-tSHw.text: Best Hamburgers in Arizona. Big selection and a lot of food. I got the Backyard BBQ Burger And was amazing. By far best Burger I ever had. Will be returning soon to try rest of the menu.

jerqZ8vjK_gfc2Shywpxaw.text: Veggie burger was bland and mushy. Cheeseburger was okay and fries were cold and over seasoned and dry. They tasted frozen. Very average experience. Would not recommend! Server was great but who cares if the food isn't good. I give it one step above drive thru barely

dPzxte5-oW20f3kGZ7JPoA.text: You don't need my review to know that these burgers are delicious and creative. But what I will add is the fact that they have a GF bun. It's often a great inconvenience to have to find a place that's serves anything GF. I was going to opt for lettuce wrap but glad they had an actual bun. Their sweet potato tater tots are delicious! I was really impressed overall. Highly recommend this place to try.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Tropical treatment!

6HuJYMLd7mMjIRIjAFN84Q.text: I'm from out of town and was looking for a place to eat. We just got done seeing the aquarium and wanted to try a burger place. I saw Rehab had a really good rating, so decided to get food to go from there. I got the bigger beefstro burger and my husband got the Hawaiian burger. We thought both were ok. We didn't like the sauce that came with either burger. I ate my burger without the wasabi sauce and it was ok. I felt like it was missing something. My husband put bbq sauce on his burger instead. I felt like his burger was missing something too. I think it's expensive for what it is.

4QxzJaazGQyIlj51Rptilw.text: When you need a good solid burger, this is the place to go.  My fav is the hatch chili burger. I highly suggest requesting their chipotle aioli and smearing that on your bun...makes it pure perfection!  They also have gluten free buns for those of us whose tummies hate gluten!  When busy, it's a bit noisy inside, but a fun atmosphere.  Staff is friendly, service is pretty good, but the burgers make this a must-visit if you're anywhere near Scottsdale.

JlM-prPv4Tr7edw2eCLh0g.text: After hearing lots of people rave about Rehab Burger therapy I figured I would take my family and try it out .. it was Mothers Day so sort of busy but we got seated right away on the patio .. our server brought us waters quickly and we ordered .. he brought my kid's drinks right away and some how forgot my drink and my friend's drink.. so after we reminded him he finally brought us our order .. food was good I got the PB & J burger and it was pretty good .. I thought I ordered sweet potato fries as did my daughter and we were served sweet potato tots.. oh well ..  never heard a Hppy Mother's Day either lol .. Anyway it was good but I think I'll try a few other places before coming back ..

thnULfsahFonBXOOf5Sa9w.text: Stopped in for lunch and was promptly greeted with a smile. We decided to do at the bar and had a fantastic bartender/server Rian. This is a guy who really likes his job. We told him we were from out of town and He made us feel like home and seemed genuinely happy and welcomed us. Told us about the happy hour and made a few menu suggestions. The burgers are awesome! This is a must do if you want a great burger, everything else that came from the kitchen looked great as well.   If you stop in, look up Rian, he'll treat you right! I wish we had him back home!!!

70D1DGqptOaYs1rA5rJBGw.text: Best burger in AZ hands down.  If you are hungry this is the place for you.  Rehab has a wide variety of creative and imaginative burgers.  There beef patties are cooked to perfection.  The burgers i recommend there are the spicy Mac n Cheese burger and always choose the pretzel bun for your burgers.  The mac n cheese has a nice little sriracha kick to it which pares great with the meat of the burger.  The second burger i recommend is the PB&J burger.  Yes, i said it PB&J.  By far the best burger on the menu.  Be sure to get the sweet potato tots with the pinapple aoli.  Wow knock your socks off.  There Onion rings are massive and super crispy and the dipping sauce is a chipotle ranch which is on another level of awesomeness!  If you have room for dessert you have to get the pot brownie.  Nice warm brownie with the with the cool feel of the ice cream which is drenched in chocolate, peanut butter, and marshmallow.  You cant go wrong with the menu.  The food there is well worth the wait.  So WAIT!!!  BrandonFitFoodie

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J Burger with Sweet Potato Tots and Pinapple aoli
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Donut Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Donut Burger

iRquoFjfzyu2ZneAguzLkQ.text: My favorite burger joint in the valley. They have some very unique burgers to try. I've had several and liked every one.

1wNsinq92vUJWwgT4oZCng.text: Rehab was just what we needed, without realizing it! Were searching for a place with a local feel and they certainly delivered. The food was fresh and varied; everyone at the table sampled. The onion rings were especially delicious. Best of all, free parking at the surface lot next door!

vVumPc0pkr3c15TDhkVCrQ.text: Very laid back surfer burger bar.  Enough burger combinations to suit any preference.  The Hatch Chile burger was an awesome pairing of a medium spicy large chile, thick cheddar slice, and cooked to a perfectly requested medium rare 10 oz patty.  Had to resist the fries so I could put it all away.

jqRBNpyrRlWzevCmWUJabA.text: This place is so great there is a line outside the door!  Staff is friendly we were seated quickly and the environment is totally casual.  The menu is pretty extensive with plenty of burger choices as well  as sides.  My bbq burger was great, the sauce was sweet and smoky, and the onion rings I ordered were perfect.  I received 5 huge ones.  Wait staff is really friendly and makes you feel completely comfortable.  I'm definitely going to be back.

1o27EQbrlhoUWHd-TzGnQg.text: One of the best burgers I've ever had! The mac n cheese burger was unbelievable, the poblano was equally as good and the service was incredible. Great experience!

eWehZ8n21QqjmZxf1PUOVQ.text: I went to Phoenix this weekend and my brother told me I needed to try this place. I wish I would have listened to my brother's suggestion and ordered the "Beefstro" burger. I ordered the "Mac Gnarley" burger, which was good, but not as good as some of the others. My boyfriend ordered the a pulled pork burger, that was Delicious! The Beefstro my brother ordered was apparently amazing (I didn't have the chance to try it, he eats really fast!) The salsa was pretty tasty, but I would have liked some better chips.   The place has a fun atmosphere with mostly high top tables, there are plenty of TVs to watch sports, and our server was super sweet and helpful.   When you go, get the fries. I had the sweet potato fries, and they were a little too sweet for my taste, and were in the tater tot style (little pops or pieces I guess).   Oh and beer was cold. Very important. :)

yEXAvw5zYY9JMeSVtw7E-w.text: Gold Medal Wings!  I know it's Rehab BURGER but if you haven't tried the wings you are missing out!  The sauce is simply amazing melt in your mouth delicious. The best wings in AZ

yQC2YIq0E8_3JxepWhx4gA.text: It is awesome food. People who work there are nice. I do burger wrapped in lettuce. My husband favorite restrant. It's has 2 location tempe,az and scottsdale,az.

ckQmGj-0roR9BM_CYdVe4Q.text: wow, I don't eat burger much, so not qualified to say this would be the best burger so far. but based on what I had in the past from other burger places, this one hit the spot as one of the great burger.

rU8kq6Ggd240y8Z8_U1QTg.text: We stopped in on a whim while visiting old town Scottsdale and were very pleasantly surprised.  The burger was excellent!  The place was packed, even on a Saturday late afternoon, so the service was a bit slow, but the staff was friendly when we did interact with them. If you are a burger aficionado, and I would definitely suggest a visit if you are in the area.

ertc82L2OoZLRY5CoZ4AsA.text: I had the peanut butter and jelly and bacon burger! It was amazing! Definitely recommend the sweet potato tots and the aoili sauce. I found the waitress funny and really kind. Definitely a place I will bring my husband to when we come back! Next time I want to try the mac and cheese burger

xWYGiH4cBUeNX01XNNFn9w.text: Sprint training is here! It was crazy insane in here on a Saturday afternoon. Wait time for a table was 1hour. We sat at the bar; which turn out to be a pleasant experience. We spoke with several vacationers.   The bar service was prompt; staff were courteous. I order the relapse bacon cheeseburger on a pretzel bun. Yum! I had a choice of sweet potatoe fries, tater tots, or regular fries. I choose the regular fries. What a burger! I was stuffed halfway thru the meal!  I enjoyed the meal, the atmosphere, and the service!

l9x0MrGZ4JGR32d40ntKhg.text: Great lunch spot, enjoyed the vibe of the place and the food was great. Poblano burger with substitute of the chorizo patty, excellent. What really made our day was our top notch server who answered questions and provided some local suggestions for further fun. Highly recommend!

J2RG4v8cLzB9C10VTd3yQw.text: We went to Scottsdale for a visit and chose this bar for lunch. I ordered a BBQ burger with grilled corn (medium) and my husband ordered one with onion rings. We checked in and had chips and salsa as well. My burger was super delicious. But I was a bit surprised by the size of onion rings here. Overall we were satisfied and this place worth a visit:

wFD3MRuREMy1M1E3wFRcUg.text: fantastic. reasonably busy on a saturday night. We were able to grab seats at the bar. Food- - portions are enormous. My wife's saladwas enough for 2 people to eat for 2 days. - bacon and blue burger was amazing. perfectly cooked (med. rare) and flavor was outstanding.  Drinks- - Margatini was great  - drink service was prompt and quick on refills  Service- - overall fantastic, prompt and courteous,

YT98JtTmXHF_frLF6JurHg.text: My Arizona experience continues. Was craving a really good hardy burger at the end of class today and this was one the first places that came up on Google. Called in a to go order for the Rehab Burger Mushroom Swiss style on the pretzel bun. Didn't realize how far this was from my hotel, but it was worth it. They really do make a very tasty burger here! I will have to make at least two more trips to this place before I head back to Southern California.

7gKSrig10tliUlFDJb22DQ.text: CAUTION: Only eat here if you want to be throughly happy!   I'm from out of town and found this burger haven on yelp. We started off with the chips and salsa yelp check in offer. The chips has a really good seasoning with a hint of lime. The salsa was fresh, had a good bit to it, thick so it stays on the chip and satisfied that little spot that needed instant filling before our burger!   After looking at the pictures I decided that it would be best if the other person I was with and I split a burger because we didn't think we could finish one on our own! My assumption was correct. We got the PORKSTER BURGER and it was delicious!! The perfect amount of meat, you definitely get your money's worth. We got the Sweet Potato tots that are extremely addicting!! And the sauces that accompany it are very complimenting. I enjoyed the Chipotle sauce while the person I was with liked the pineapple Teriyaki best.   The service was excellent. Everyone there was happy, helpful and attentive, which was refreshing! The vibes are laid back and allow you to "chillax" which is written on the TV screens of floating fish.   We will definitely be back! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The pork burger and sweet potato tots. Yummmm!!

sqCnfNlOiCJfc0ZxL73bVg.text: This is a good place to grab a burger and drinks with friends. The burgers are not the best, but are good. That combined with the cool environment make it a quality joint. We sat at the bar so we could watch the games while eating. Our bartender was attentive, knowledgable and friendly. They have good drinks specials. Also, they have special burgers off menu so be sure to ask about them.  I ordered the PBJ & Bacon Burger. It comes with peanut butter, grape jelly, Sriracha sauce and bacon. The burger meat its self is just ok. The toppings made the burger very good. The flavors combine extremely well together. It is a rich burger with the peanut butter, but well worth it. My only mistake was ordering the 10 ounce burger. The five ounce would have been plenty of food for me.  For my side I chose the Jamaican Corn. It is grilled and then briefly fried. It creates a very interesting texture. The flash fry hit some of the flavors. If I was to go again I would add some sauce at the end to give some of that flavor back.

D3YvdLgzKjJM1peJSg5cDw.text: We came here on the recommendation of one of the store owners and we enjoyed ourselves. I had the Mac and Cheese Burger and my husband had the Prime Rib burger. The waiter asked me if I wanted the regular size, which I thought meant the smaller size, but it was the bigger one. It was HUGE! The meat was really good and cooked well. The bread was good and didn't fall apart as I ate it. The mac and cheese on it was ok, but was a little bland. It had bacon and green chiles in it, but could have used some salt or hot sauce to flavor it. I got sweet potato tots with mine and really enjoyed them. My husbands burger was also huge, but due to all the toppings, he felt that the meat to bun ratio was not right and his sandwich was left falling apart from not enough bun to hold it all together. Both of us had enough burger left over to take home for dinner. Next time I would order a smaller burger.   The service was friendly and our waiter chatted with us and provided us with suggestions. The environment was fun. Overall it was a good experience and I would go back again, but I might try something different next time, maybe a spicier burger.

bNLKRc4uZ4N1RsQtzSB7JA.text: We have tried about 4-5 of their burgers now. First off yummy!!!! The unique varieties make it an experience. 4 stars because I personally ordered medium rare but the burger felt dry to my taste. My colleagues all loved their burger and did not have the same complaint. Also 4 stars because the burger architecture made it so it did not hold up well while eating, the burger was half in my hand and half on the plate.   Overall burgers were good not great and no where near my favorite place. You should patronage this establishment for sure, I will continue my search for the beat burger joint elsewhere.

S8KNjW5Rp7IfujD3rYUg4A.text: I had the mushroom swiss burger and my husband had the turkey burger. He absolutely loved his! Mine was good but the fries were not hot. Not the biggest deal breaker. They were super busy and our server was awesome! But I'm sure it's hard to get everything out hot when under super busy conditions.

KRL52UM1826dLfzmaWUaFw.text: First time getting to try Rehab Burger Therapy. Went with this family on a Saturday afternoon and it was crowded but we were seated nearly immediately. The waitress asked if it was our first time and explained the menu to us and noticed we had kids and (since there isn't a kids menu) named some of the most ordered items for kids. She warned us that the portions were large and are usually split between children.   We ordered the Spicy Mac n Cheese burger and the Jalapeno Popper burger, as well as the Quesadilla and a grilled cheese for the kids. I opted for onion rings and we also got fries and the sweet potato tots. The burgers were delicious as were the sides. The kids were happy with their choice, it was definitely a lot of food. You can't leave this place hungry. The waitress was nice and attentive, the food was great. Definitely happy we decided to give it a try. We will be back.

1AGXmtdiwDiJSxjEW0RVTA.text: Great service thank you Ben and the staff here but most of all the food was very off the chain delicious, the Rehab Beefstro! Yummo!! We will be back and have more amazing mouth melting greatness

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Awesome sauce!!! No for real!! The sauce on everything is good!!

4gfcuU_N9tJk9diQIUMwiA.text: If you eat here regularly and you eat a rehab burger (not a relapse burger) expect to gain about 20 pounds per week.  The 10-ounce rehab burger, which comes in many mouth-watering disguises, is not a burger for the meek. It starts at about 5 inches in height and, if served with a pretzel bun and a variety of added toppings, it may reach a staggering 10 inches in height. You will find it a challenge to get your mouth around it and when you do be prepared to catch the juices that slop out of the enormous concoction. You want fries with that? Of course you do, especially as they come automatically with your burger. You can have regular fries or sweet potato tots. Chips and salsa--why not. Beer-what the heck, go for broke. Enjoy this exceptional burger joint with its surfing, motor-cycling and California style decor. The waitresses are all very attentive and will serve you with a smile. There is outdoor seating but I don't recommend eating there during the summer as it will be really hot out there. This is a primo burger restaurant that knows how to serve you a man-size succulent repast. If you aren't that hungry order a relapse burger as it will only be five ounces and it will still fill you up.

e8WMy_bgv7WqprJ2k2KHUw.text: Burgers are divine! You can even get a donut as your bun choice which I did not do because I already put my order in! But any place that offers tots on the side is pretty much a winner in my book. Burgers were a little messy but let's be honest, you can't really fit it in your mouth. Give your taste buds what they've been asking for!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pretzel bun burger with tots

RtsPSUMYZ30TUi3A7D6-RA.text: Great burger joint with a good music playing.  I tried the PB and J burger, which is surprisingly pretty good.  Girlfriend had the veggie burger and said it was delicious as well.  We came at 1pm on a Saturday, which happened to be the time the farmers market next door ended.  Things were pretty hectic but we squeezed into some open seating outside on the railing.  It took a little bit to get service but the waitress was pleasant and kind.  Hostess could use s little guidance and some slight tweaks would make things run smoother, but either way we would definitely eat here again!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB and J burger on a pretzel bun.

RMxAmC3bG01haRapC-wH_w.text: While we were definitely coming during a lunch rush, the total time for full service was definitely a bit longer than I would expect of what is ultimately still a burger joint.   Our total time from the moment we sat down, at the bar till the time we left was approximately 1hr. That was for 2 burgers & 2 waters.   The burgers were quite good, and filling. Portion were not overly large, but still large enough to leave me completely full. The sweet potato tots were moist on the inside and crisp on the outside.

_Glmva6K7vSgjuTcpCEesg.text: The burgers here are excellent and so are the sweet potato tots.   They are especially good with the sauce they serve them with.  I tried the jalapeno popper burger, which was fantastic.  The burger itself is so flavorful and there are so many options to top it with.  Will definitely be back to try others.

2ZkJtTRt0L-P9sm6OEBqgQ.text: Great burgers, great fries, sauces, and drinks. So far, my favorite burger in the Valley - this includes in-n-out, the Stand, paradise valley burger company, and the other familiar franchises.  The service was outstanding. Some of the best i've experienced in a long time

1VY3Feszv8_eTaKs9rxOEg.text: Love Rehab Burger.  Great atmosphere, service with a smile.  Love their fish tacos, and the peanut butter/jelly bacon burger is unbelievable.  Beers are super cold, great prices.  Get a seat on the patio and people watch.  Enjoy

gG6k1JKakKeXzru4ygQIaw.text: Good burgers and decent service.  If try it again to check it out.  Good assortment of burgers.  Good quality food

0QVS-kBZaEa_0EfR-hDGJA.text: "YUM" If you are a Burger lover, put this place on your list. The Burger patty itself burst with flavor, aside from building some creative Burgers they nailed the flavors of what a Burger should be! Aside from their lively ambiance the entire Staff is working endlessly to make your experience great!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Cool Decor - We totally felt like we were at the Beach, so beware this place puts you in PartyMode!

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Backyard BBQ Burger - Although Ken&#39;s sauce is spicy, I added the &#34;Ghost Pepper Jack Cheese&#34; taking this Burger to another level!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Spicy Mac-N-Cheese Burger, my daughter changed the cheese to the &#34;Ghost Pepper Jack Cheese&#34; and it kicked it up a notch!

wwWcBNVokwO7V7xwmikFbw.text: So I needed to go try out the most ridiculous burger I could and this was the place. You know what, it is more of a kids place than not on one hand, and yet again it is not due to full bar and higher quality/prices.   So the whole party was adventurous, but I went with the PB&J burger Rehab Size w a side of onion rings. So it came in, and I have pictures, and I was impressed. Now the PB ran down the sides and invited for a messy meal, so I went for it with knife and fork as a proper European. It was good. I mean, it was interesting on a novelty level. The peanut butter was powerful, and the jelly kinda just provided a sweet tone. The burger itself was amazing and the pretzel bun was stellar. The 5 massively onion rings was a little disappointing at first, but they delivered. They were huge - in my opinion a little too big actually. I mean it looks great, but the onion becomes slightly underdone this way and provides the crunch to a thick breading. But back to the burger. This place can cook burgers for sure. It was a big meal. I was full all night on this one burger - I didn't even finish all my onion rings.   I will come back here, for the burgers alone - but then I will go for something else. PB&J burger was interesting but will never become a staple. So burger was a hit, the onion rings were not my style. Too big. Fries were good though. And everybody was happy with their burgers.    Our waitress was cute and personable. She gave her opinion on food and drinks when asked for it, which is something I really like. But besides that she was quite confused. She mixed and matched up orders on the bills, and then she lost a credit card - but found it again. Just one of those things that doesn't impress.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J Burger and Onion Rings
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J Burger

JZJjjoIpdlTxmXczkFNnIw.text: Great Burger place. Good service and great food. Hard to beat. Popular and can get very busy. So be prepared to wait. It`s worth it.

-F0hBXWvryWa72XebbGoOg.text: Excellent! Happy hour all day. We enjoyed the Bacon Blue burger and it was perfect. Save room for dessert. We had the brownie marshmallow fluff toasted with ice cream. And it was fantastic.

nh48MbskxuudbklsmSoRWg.text: Love their burgers, It can get super busy but it's a sign that they are good, right? Great friendly service too

FuDG4KR2WiNN-Clc295iXg.text: OMG the burgers were sooo good. A group of us all ordered different burgers and were not disappointed in any of them. The winner is there PB and J burger hands down.

SMobD5zbNJTlHBeOKIcEoQ.text: Amazing and Yummy. Mac and cheese burger with bacon and a turkey party. Good night!!! Love it. Our server was bomb too.
