Finally, the other day when I had a taste for a Plaza Burger (burger with sour cream and chopped onions) Rehab was the only burger place I could identify nearby that definitely had sour cream on the menu.   I walked in for a late lunch, and luckily found a seat at the bar. The place was packed both inside and outside. The staff was really swamped, but my server took the time to flash me a big smile when she came to take my order. I ordered my relapse (small, 5oz) burger medium rare with sour cream and onions. I was about to order sweet potato tots, but the woman to the left of me looked like she was really enjoying her skin on fries, so I decided on them instead.  When my server brought my food, she again smiled, and I noticed that she made a point of smiling at everyone. It was a nice touch. My fries were hot, delicious, crispy and perfectly salted. My burger, unfortunately, was over cooked (well done). I didn't take the time to send it back because I was very hungry, and short of time. I did mention it to the server and she indicated that the kitchen tends to overcook the small burgers. She suggested that the rehab burger (large, 10oz) is more likely to be cooked to the desired level of doneness, but I also might want to order the small burger rare the next time. (I appreciated the information) She offered to have it remade, but I had already nearly finished it. It wasn't bad by any means, just more done than I like. If I could have given an award to her for friendly service, I would have done so.   Overall I liked the place and enjoyed my food enough to go back and take a friend a few days later. We ordered our small burgers rare (with lots of emphasis..) and we received perfectly cooked burgers, although our fries were barely warm. We were short of time and happy with our burgers and let the cool fries slide. She loved the Hatch Burger, and I stuck with my sour cream and onion burger again.

ZatCk9bn2g3r7U5_kDRhGA.text: Rehab is by far the best burger joint in the Valley. My favorite burger there use to be the Mac and Cheese burger. Best homemade mac and cheese I have ever had until recently. They seemed to have changed the recipe because when I went there this last time it was horrible. It made me nauseous. I'll never order that again, good thing they still have a menu full of other amazing food.

YJ0A5W2E32NoUrtXXw8eSA.text: It was late on a Friday evening and we didn't have a reservation, so we did have to wait a little for a table,  because we had 5 and they had very few larger tables.  But that was just our bad planning.  The hostess up front was so friendly and kept checking in on us to give us status which I appreciated, and once a table became available, their team rushed to get it cleaned up for us.  Their options are great, with something for everyone.  I had my 4 year old with me, and even though they don't have a kids menu, the waitress advised of the options they could make for her.  She had a chicken breast and fries, and she loved it.  Most everyone at the table had burgers and fries, which were pretty great, and the sauce options for dipping were awesome.  I had the Beijing Salad.  It was huge and like nothing I have had anywhere else.  Very spicy, but the waitress offered Ranch to cool me down.  I love hot, so it was very good for me.  We sat outside, and it reminded me of being in Baja.  Loved it. I will go back again.

UOOEhGncVZMeNI5gmgeBFg.text: Great food, casual environment and good drinks!  It gets crowded at lunch so make sure to come early.

O5gm_HB21u1CHF7VcEjziQ.text: I was seriously craving a burger while I was in AZ and decided to come here and check it out.  My guy and I came in around noonish and were promptly seated outside.  It was a nice day out but the sun was beating on us so we decided to move inside.  As we were looking at the menu, we realized there was happy hour til 3.  Sweet.  We ordered a couple of beers and the hangover burger burger (rehab) to share and regular fries.  The burger was a perfect medium with all the juices, cheese and sauces blending together so deliciously.  I could taste a hint of the hatch green chili which gave it a nice little kick.  Loved the fried egg, loved the bacon= great burger!  I'm glad I shared it though because between the beers and fries, I was barely able to finish my half of the burger.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover burger and fries

cuwl6OmxZGdiqU1ZRXlOhQ.text: My favorite Burger Joint in all of Arizona! Sweet potato tots are always on point and service is constantly 5.  Burgers are always cooked as ordered, never any complaints!

vxx9XKl8Eqyl82Bg_KENnA.text: The burger was good but EVERYTHING was cold. Cold burger, cold fries and SLOW service. The house salad had a ton of cheap shredded cheese on it.?The key to a good burger place is to server HOT fries and a hot burger.

REXfFJ9qWKFYihh567n9tg.text: I really enjoyed this place. Burgers are super yummy. Atmosphere was  chill, lots of energy and people. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Try the Ghost burger.

bFODBJHYifCuNcBBO-fMfA.text: In a world of extremely good burger joints, Rehab is a place to try.  I wasn't "wowed".  I thought it was a good burger, mediocre fries, and not enough parking, and too high of a price.  Does not come close to knocking The Aioli Burger off the top mark, but I don't think this place would be a disappointment to anybody.  Id be a fan with better parking.

HOICwMssiXIuxEUuffMiyQ.text: Burger was huge! Not the best I have ever had though! Could have been a little more juicy! Fries were average. Very busy but good service. Owners show their presence.

7GQuS8R-l3lYEEcLm-rjNA.text: Had lunch here...Momster had a Turkey Burger and I had the Chicken Caesar Salad. The prices were reasonable, the service was fine and we wound up taking most of our meals home. The atmosphere was very relaxed, and the owner would check in on us to make sure things were going well. This was in addition to our server's inquiries. They have a nice, varied menu and you feel like you want to settle in. It was crazy hot when we were in Scottsdale and I love the heat, but it seemed like the air was a bit too much. That's a small quibble given the rest of the experience. Next time (and there will be a next time), we'll just sit outside and enjoy the misters!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

dk-9iVw3higRFePgcdJ37A.text: The most stars for the Hawaiian vibe; cute fun place.  However,  I don't know what the fuss is about.  Yes there is a pile of Mac and cheese on the burger but that's it?  I personally didn't care for the texture of the hamburger meat.   It was too dense for my taste.     I'm glad I checked it out but think the ratings are too high given my experience.    Not to mention they ask you how are things tasting about 10 times while you try to eat.   Tip:  let people enjoy the place don't ask so much!!

9uLOj5ApUGRNfugMK6kG2g.text: Great atmosphere and great food. Burgers are really good, good beer selection, but the sweet potato tater tots are the best thing there!

eN-mSFXYphoLkXpXV53q1g.text: Divine burgers, great bar staff (we sat at the bar and the bartenders were friendly, accomodating and fun).  Hubby had the Hangover Burger and raved about it.  I had the Chili Cheeseburger which was yum and also had the sweet potato tator tots.   Also, the bartenders are very, very generous with their pours which was cool.  The atmosphere, decor, food, music and vide was fun.  We had a great time and hope to return someday soon.  Living in Denver, where there are a lot of fantastic burger places, this was a gem and highly recommend.

T0IGXWjdmzsZ9sZQ8b703A.text: It's worth a trip here to experience the burgers. They are legit serving sizes - I eat a lot and I have trouble with the big burgers here. I'd actually suggest going smaller burgers on a date or something because you'll be waddling around town afterwards.  It's a nice vibe here as well. Space isn't very big and it's been crowded the times I've gone, so there might be a wait.

B96L0Y1hbQ3MlowrR2kVwA.text: My first ( last) time visit. Fri 2 pm.   I wouldn't recommend this place unless it's 11 pm your already drunk and you want warm food that's half way decent.  First, Its very small inside. The bathroom was dirty, and nothing to wipe hands on.  Waitresses, All haggard. Seem like they have been burnt out of the business and couldn't get employment other places than Dennys. ( being 100 percent honest) My waitress was horrible, not attentive, Never brought napkins or refills,  forgot items etc.  Food came med warm, sent fries back because cold.   I wouldn't repeat. I do suggest the health dept do a food and cleaning check.

uSvUph-gOh8S0Pcs2IGB3A.text: Awesome burgers at great prices in a casual bar environment. The hatch burger (10oz) outsized the bun and had a generous amount of cheese and pepper slice. Sweet potato tots were amazingly good - why do these not exist anywhere else?! Great side sauces.

nUvrUrWgupQ8PL8UzFMjew.text: Great experience and delicious burgers.  My wife's was BYOB but I took the plunge and went for the Porkster Burger.  Wow!  Will visit again next time in PHX.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Kitschy decor
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Porkster.  A 10-ounce burger smothered in BBQ pulled pork.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Build Your Own Burger

aPxSv_eKWvDuXnVDt0MyTg.text: Best Burgers Ever!! Cool find with a cool vibe! Waiter was fantastic! Burgers were amazing, and sweet potato tots!! Would definitely go back! So many choices, it's hard to pick one! Love that you can get 5 or 10 oz burgers. Decor is fun, surf themed.

dy3CShTvBBGY2t5_0wS-6A.text: Omg this is the best burger spot I have ever been to this shit is amazing it made me tear

l794YHZGXjUB02JrVi0oBg.text: My husband and I recently moved to the area and stopped by this place on Friday night after reading Yelp reviews. We absolutely loved it! The atmosphere was laid back and had a great vibe. In addition to having an incredible burger menu, they have a great bar/beer selection. I had the jalapeno popper burger and my husband had the hangover burger. We loved every bite and cannot wait to return!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

aDYk9dQvg-bfZinSABuNEg.text: This should be a 5 star. So I will tell you what makes it less. I have order from here or eaten there total of 5 or six times. The burgers can be really really good. Or they can leave you wondering if you ordered from a different place the previous time. The burgers do not consistently taste the same. One time it was... dare I say... bland.  Here is another reason why they lost a star. There are times they are listed as open but are not. So you see the hours and decide what you want and guess what? Yes. You call and no answer. Worse. They answer and tell you they are not taking to go orders because... the kitchen is too busy? Anyway. If you are ordering, call first and then roll the dice. The question you have to ask yourself is... Am I feeling lucky tonight?... well are ya... punk? ...  Hope you got the reference.

jkU87KiPbpi0ZlqL2YSHRw.text: Awesome burger!  Had the Jalapeno popper burger.  Great flavor definitely worth revising on a future trip.  Service was great and the staff friendly.  Was also good for the kids!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Philly Cheesesteak burger- rehab- 5 oz
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Jalapeño Popper Burger- Relapse 10 oz
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

S1SqN_etm58Lyt5MVbF9LQ.text: The PB&J is off the chain, don't do it On your first date unless you can do no wrong in there eyes already

en2S9IHVTkkvb3QafV_gUg.text: Sometimes THE BIG DOG HAS GOT TO EAT.  Enter Rehab. Glutton's Paradise. Gordo Nirvana.  Rehab Burger has caused so much plaque build up they could own a trophy shop.  Rehab Burger has made Scottsdale so fat they call it the Bounce Castle.  Burgers so fat they got a zip code bigger than yo mama's.  Burgers so juicy your farts will be sharts for days.  Burgers so thick Nicki Minaj got jealous and wrote a diss track.  Nuf said. When I gots to eats, I hits the streets and get my 'Hab on.  WHEN BIG DOG NEED TO EAT, HE NEED TO EAT THE REHAB MEAT

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

IPmD5Odjef-9hYsK5RYw-Q.text: Holy cow, literally! One of the best bacon cheeseburger I have had. I don't know if it was the bacon, the burger, the pretzel bun or just the combo. Mmmmm.  Portions are very large as described in other reviews and photos. No kids menu but my little ones shared a hotdog and fries and left very full. My other daughter had the pasta alfredo and said its the best she has ever had. Even said it was better than olive gardens which is HUGE for her.   Not a lot of parking up front but a parking lot next door. The restuarant itself was smaller. We got there around 5:30 pm on a Tuesday and it was already busy. Luckily we didnt have to wait but if we had arrived 20 minutes later we would have been waiting awhile. We almost didn't come here because another yelper said it wasn't that kid friendly due to sitting. Sitting is rough and I would partially agree with not being kid friendly but defitinely somewhere you can take your kids if they can sit still.   You can get 7% cash back and $3.99 chips and salsa for checking in.   Staff was also super friendly and can handle a big crowd.   Can't wait to go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Alfredo. Sworn to be better than OG.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Build your own burger with fries. Bacon and pretzel bun. Delicious.

7sUOnI-a3AxFbgJiQlidLg.text: This is the second time I've been here and it's been great both times! Sometimes it gets busy and loud but the music it's good and the servers are super nice!  The first time I had the Jalapeno Popper Burger and this last time was the Spicy Mac n Cheese Burger. The meat cane cooked the way I asked!  The only reason it wasn't a 5-Star was that the tots came out soggy and the mac n cheese wasn't really spicy, but I'd definitely go again!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy mac and cheese burger!

im7YGe9yb8HWEGvurKCl1Q.text: Great food great vegetarian options food came hot and fresh love the Frys and tots come here off hours to avoid busy times

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

brDHzELUOlwdUHSh2UCMSg.text: If you are looking for crazy over the top burgers with amazing service this is the place for you. Love the people that work here and the place has some crazy burgers.

TIrU28cZ4aDEzMdIKYzTqQ.text: Ate there Last night.  Due to great yelp reviews.  Service was great. Food was not. Ordered burger medium.  Served well done and dry.  No one else like there burger either.  Alll dry. Won't go back.

ZbjLG3MwcrTkdSvdL4zzuQ.text: Great place, great service.  My Poblano Burger was perfect, and I enjoyed the sweet potato tots. Ask for Courtney, she was amazing!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

OKxBj6l9V46rCi4FFYSIgA.text: Nothing great about it. We waited for an hour thinking food will be worth the wait - it turned out to be opposite where the burgers were mediocre and mac n cheese was subpar. Portions are huge but strictly OK in terms of taste. Never going again!

4rjmKUZ1oQ0uXNNBaM_Utw.text: *This is not a fancy burger place! Come here in sandals or feel super over dressed.  I came here for a work event recently, and I know it's been in Scottsdale forever but I somehow have never stopped by. The interior is like that of a beach shack, they specialize in burgers clearly, but they also have a lot of other options like fish tacos and some fried appetizers.   I ordered the margatini which was pretty much everything I like in a glass, a fancy martini glass at that! I don't really know where my aversion to frozen beverages came from, but I hate frozen margaritas, and I'm so happy they have a different option. But, that being said, all my coworkers loved their frozen drinks.   We ordered the calamari and chips and salsa to start. The calamari was excellent, the chips and salsa weren't anything special. For entrees many people did the BYOB and sweet potato tots, they all looked amazing! I ordered a turkey burger with a lettuce "bun" and their onion rings. I loved the turkey burger itself, but the lettuce wrap was more like a bunch of little lettuce pieces, like a salad. The onion rings with the chipotle aioli are a must!   We as a group skipped dessert. I will say this was reasonably priced and the serving sizes were huge. For a super casual vibe and quick service I'll definitely come back.

UQdbcSF8XbbHygJ1N6X8IQ.text: If you're craving a burger, well then you need to get your booty to Rehab Burger Therapy. Super fun vibe and lots of energy in this restaurant. Get their early, it gets busy at lunch. Great people watching too.  I came here last week and ordered the pulled pork and ham sandwich, could only eat half of it, so filling and so delicious.   Wouldn't recommend bringing kids here, lots of high top tables and chairs, more of an adult hamburger joint.

Qk3R7QMnBsX2YQm1IrcHxw.text: I tried Rehab Burger Therapy for the first time last week and it was decent. We had the chips with salsa and guac- the guac wasn't very tasty but the chips were fresh and warm. I ordered the jalapeno popper burger with grilled chicken on a pretzel bun with sweet potato fries. The sandwich was good because of everything that was loaded on it but I couldn't finish it all and the fries were pretty tasty. It was very warm on the inside of the restaurant as if the air wasn't working properly but they tried compensating with portable fans. I wouldn't rush back anytime soon but I would try another type of burger combo.

_sJXwSeYsvLf6muzf2GBAg.text: I came here with five of my friends. This place is normally pretty packed and you'll end up waiting in line a pretty long time. The burgers you get here are honestly the most unique burgers I've  Ever seen . They have a peanut butter burger and a bunch of other ones that I'm sure you guys have never tasted. So if you're down to try new stuff I love burgers got a pop into this place. I think this burger place was maybe just a little too much for me. That's why gave them only three stars it's a personal opinion. Sometimes I like my burgers more simple

sRWf5z-R6vxNbVd2eDn-4w.text: Low-key, island-feel burger bar. Quite busy during dinnertime weeknights.  Mac-and-cheese burger is two meals in itself - pretty tasty with the Pablano peppers. Onion rings were a bit over breaded. Sweet potato tots were overly sweet for my liking, the island corn was tasty. Next time we'll try the PB&J burger.

tWE5bdWIMEXjzbY8e8YURA.text: Pretty cool place and good burgers. I liked it because it's different from the rest of Scottsdale. Staff was friendly, tables and silverware were clean and the whole vibe was casual and inviting. Our burgers were huge and tasty. There are many varieties on the menu. It is also reasonably priced. There was nothing negative about it and that's why I gave it 5 stars. I love these little places like this one. Local, small, inviting, casual and amazing food.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My burger had pulled pork on top of it.... Awesome!!!

o9rDja9fa8jKd23mA_tz1w.text: It is a cool space with lots of TVs, neat decor and an EXCELLENT FOH staff. Really fun environment. Great bar with a great list of drinks.  Had the Backyard BBQ Burger. Pineapple BBQ sauce is a treat. Really enjoyed that. Otherwise the burger pretty  bland. Needed work. Fries were great.  There is a saying that says "you can put it on the walls or you can put it on the plate". If you are looking for great food go elsewhere but if you are looking for a great place to hang out, have drinks and eat decent food, this is your place.

dT99YS8tZvUkjjKYX3n6uw.text: My friends and I came here and we were blown away by the service we received. We were seated instantly, our server was great. I ordered the pb&j burger, I was pleasantly surprised how amazing it was! We were impressed by how well the staff including the hostess becca handled the rush of customers coming in. When we were paying our tab, a customer yelled at the the hostess. She handled the situation so well, and even tho the situation might of upset her she smiled and whole heartedly thanked us for coming to rehab. We will definitely be back because of the service we received! Who ever owns this place needs to give Becca a raise or a pat on the back for being so great at her job!

UGsdkUnedU6iSh1HfuPmCA.text: Great burger. Got a little smoky and hot inside but other then that no complaints. Amazing food

AEfNtFKftEjTwPue8mBLRw.text: This was my favorite spot in town when I visit Scottsdale...until tonight. Just got in after a long day of travel, was told I could sit anywhere. Sat at the counter outside, such a nice spot on a wam night!  Was not greeted by someone asking for a drink order, but instead that they were closed. I asked if I could order take out at the bar and was told that would be fine. Walked up to the bartender who said, oh sorry, we're closed.    I did have a chance to speak to the owner, who was apologetic and offered a seat and to keep the kitchen open for me, I'd lost my taste for Rehab Burger.   Would I go again? Yes, if in the neighborhood. Would I drive all over Phoenix after a long day of travel like tonight? No.

dqNNjh5MfNCEM1fny_IR4w.text: Not too bad.  Lotsa hype, other also commenting they heard about it on the internet.  Service is excellent.  The corn is a treat.  We got the PBJ burger, just what you'd expect it to taste like.  Also, the beefstro with shaved ribeye.  I though I ordered the double, but only one patty plus shaved meat.  Burger meet was ok, this is about toppings. And quantity.  Not bad.  Then again, I may not be in the burger mood.  Ordered rare, although it seemed medium rare.  Slight gastro trouble later in the eve, couldn't swear it was caused by that meal.  If I lived here I would try it again.

jezEfM1jkRc03KJwdmEGGQ.text: My fellow AA members (affordable alcohol), you need not worry about your massive hangover!  For it has become a burger, yes The Hangover is not just a movie & a state of "man I'm never gonna drink like that anymore" feeling; you know who you are Mr. Patron! Now a Hangover is also a burger served at the Rehab Burger Therapy!  When I first walked into this bar I thought of Bar Rescue on Spike -- where's Jon Taffer!?  The place had some pretty cool decor and design; surfboards, guitars, and an aquatic background.    Anyways, I sat at the bar where I was greeted with a smile.  Great service here I must add!  Read the menu up and down and decided to go with the Hangover.  Boys, I saw her first!  It was DE-licous with a capitol D!  For Damn!!! That was good!  Medium done with bacon, fried egg, colby cheese, and green chilies - Yum!  I went with the Relapse, which was a smaller version of the regular sized burger.  HH everyday till 6pm so if you can make it I definitely would stop by.    The place has the rock n roll, surfer, tiki ambience.  Reminded my friend of Hawaii she claims.  I've never been to HI, but personal I'm content with being at the Rehab for now with a few drinks and enjoying a Hangover - yes I said enjoy the Hangover. - Enjoy!

x-63R-Fj-kIjZes3ZunwIA.text: Excellent first time visit.  Cold beer and fresh onion rings, can't go wrong.  Thanks Rian and "Serious Mike"!

E4FdVzLz94kRhEm5CzvGTA.text: This is hands down my favorite burger place in old town. Definitely get the pretzel bun and if you like hott then ask them for the ghost pepper cheese for that extra kick that's on the secret menu!

SkRsKNUuyNnoNd3VnOARGQ.text: Dig this place! Liked the decor. Loved the food. My wife and I both had the hangover burger with the brioche bun, friggin yuuuum! She had the sweet tots and I had onion rigs. My Mom came along and she had the pork wings.  Service was on spot. Wish we could have stayed and tried more on the menu. Definitely will be back next time in town.

AKTNNlnDAQdy9IA9dFuTlw.text: Came here because if the reviews. Waited a short time and sat in the communal table. If you don't like sitting next to a stranger eating don't come here. Ordered the pb&j berger and split it with my younger son. Older boy ordered a plain burger and my husband order a spicy burger (can't remember the name). The burgers came with a huge plate of fries. The server was attentive and very interested if we like the peanut butter and jelly burger. It was fabulous. I know it sounds gross but it was super yummy. Everyone loved the burgers and we almost finished them. Lotsa stuff on the walls to entertain and play I spy. Next time I'm in Scottsdale again I will definitely come back!!

muyduimRK83UegVGPOTJWQ.text: Always a wait. Honestly the place should be bigger they could just buy out the pawn shop next door and open the place up a lot more. There is a queso bean dip that is outstanding! Best thing there.

r1AA-CwbxuBIOjJSjCbTHw.text: The reason we picked out this place is because they have gluten free buns! Which is awesome, cause I still like to eat burgers even if I can't have gluten!  The burger tasted delicious, the fries were really good (and as a Belgian you can say I know a thing or two about fries) and the staff was super friendly! We'll return to this place.  I would suggest to make a reservation, since this place seems really popular..

1is0xgGxRiBYINFeVG2f4w.text: I don't particularly enjoy eating out. But this place was a pleasure!  I don't recall the last time I went to a place where every item brought out was stupendous. I ate with two others and we all shared, so I sampled three burgers, four sides (one person doubled up), and all the sauces. I loved every single thing!  I just moved here from Chicago and have been rather disappointed with the food here but this place gives me hope.  Also, our service was amazing.  Not just our waitress, but the entire staff went out of the way to make our table comfortable. Super impressed.  I'll be back!

wVg8oPPREcthoSaiPHrFZw.text: A gem in old town!!!  This was a roll of the dice tonight. We wanted a burger and we were around Scottsdale. It came up on Yelp with great reviews.  My only complaint is that there is not one closer to my home in QC.    The food was great!! Burger cooked perfect.  Had an appetizer of the Pig Wings.  A must!! They would be a great Happy Hour order.   In the mood or a burger and don't want the standard fast food, don't let the Old Town Scottsdale scare you away from trying this place!!  BTW... The owners are the same owners as Oregano's Pizza...

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chili Cheese Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pablano Burger

t_3ksqnZOV_udY1RMM_ZyA.text: My friend and I had lunch here today. It was 110 outside, and we were looking for relief from the heat. Sadly, it did not feel much better inside. When I mentioned it to our server, she actually said yeah it's 92 degrees in here, our ventilation sucks... So apparently this is an everyday thing, not an a/c on the fritz. 92 is not an ok temperature to have lunch indoors! Temperature aside, the service was friendly but VERY slow. I ordered the Beijing Beefstro salad. It was greasy and just not appetizing. I can take partial blame for ordering a a salad at a burger joint, but wow this salad was just gross. They did take it off the bill when I said it wasn't what I expected, so that's the bright side. My friend liked her chicken sandwich and sweet tots. I tasted the tots, and they were good. I don't think I'll come back here... definitely not in the summer.

3CIggnGYBQm6AOow3LLksA.text: Looooove this place! Awesome atmosphere and friendly staff. Get the PB&J Burger!

pnhHEDpAez6irsiUaqJR-A.text: One of the Best burgers in AZ love the beach vibe and I have been here 20+ times for food and its always consistant!

Ihe7Bim0e5Y6HkZzs49z1Q.text: Did not disappoint!!! Great service amazing food! Chips were excellent. Wings -good- wedge good- burger good- blew my mind!!!

I1hmqIK5ETiXQI1MeFYZ4g.text: La is one of the best servers ever. Very comfortable and very genuine!! I love her and the Mike Tai was obviously great but really sweet.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pbj and spicy Mac!

65glkeEEC4MEIzpNSCm67g.text: Came to Old Town for an event and thought we would could use a little Rehab.  Party of 4 on a Tuesday took about 20 min to be seated...5 min later only one other table occupied...people cleared out just after 8 PM.  We ordered 2 BYOBs, the Hawaiian,  and Mushroom and Swiss.  Oh!  We also ordered the chips salsa and guacamole from the Yelp check-in promo.  I would not recommend ordering those.  No flavor.  The portions, however,  are big and the meat is so good!  There's a blurb on the menu about the meat and why it's just perfect! The boys finished no problem, but the ladies will be packin'.  I really wanted the pot brownie for dessert but no room.  Service just mediocre.  No, "hello"'s, "welcome"s, nor "goodbye"s.  Food great, fun atmosphere.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Huge portions! I&#39;m stuffed!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Headed to rehab!

ivDoqNsfwIg2Qd8vBGFKaA.text: Stopped in to have lunch on a Sunday. To be fair we had a short wait and the waiter was great. The BBQ burger pineappple bbq sauce was outstanding as were the sweet potato tots.  The shakes were outstanding.   So why 3 stars?  The veggie burger was bland with no condiments. The margatini was awful. No balance and tasted like someone had taken old lime juice and dumped some tequila in it. When I told the waiter he tried to get it taken off the bill but "the manager wouldn't let him."  I'd even ordered another drink.   We'll try this again but cautiously.

bbWZ5SVzbLw_kJfblhxHSw.text: Husband and friend got food poisoning from eating here. Symptoms so severe he missed work next few days. When mentioning to others I was surprised to hear other people have experienced food poisoning from this chain. Eat at your own risk.

Zt8R5vzUmCdblB8lZwOYRA.text: Found this place while on a business trip via Yelp. I'm glad I did! Greeted timely at the door, and ate at the bar. The server/bartender was working hard and got to me in a reasonable time. I ordered the barbeque burger (5oz) on a pretzel bun with the sweet potato tots! The burger is delish! If I had a complaint-which I really don't-it would be that I wish the pickle were more crisp. But the bbq sauce is yummy and I rec'd a lemon in my water which I love. Served on a nice plate with silverware. Can't complain about that!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Backyard Barbeque Burger

fDXMdpd-lOP2Yi_kTykirw.text: This a good place for burgers. We sat outside. I got the Mac and cheese burger with onion rings. They were great. Our waitress was very funny and nice. Food came out very fast. Would come here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger - Relapse

kkk0dyhRY_b_kn5SYEuiKA.text: This is a cool joint. Great service and AMAZING food. My hubby had the PB&J burger and it was outstanding!!! Only downfall is the lack of options for kids. Other than that...highly highly recommended to visit when in the area.

7DeLU8iD3AebY-Dr8XDetA.text: Great, fun atmosphere!  Went for lunch in search of a decent burger for my husband   We struck out the other day and hit a home run today!  Burgers and fries I can take or leave, my husband on the other hand, loves burgers and fries.  I DEFINITELY would go back here.  My burger was over the top delicious, the sweet potato tots were my FAVORITE!  I want more, just thinking about them now.  I took 1/2 of my meal back to the room, for another meal, so did my  husband. Tasty, juicy, great options.  His only comment was he likes American cheese, which was not an option.  Service was excellent and bonus it was happy hour!  Happy hour ever day!  I would highly recommend it!!  1 Chili Cheesebuger on one create your own.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Qf-A-dJNtTIDigDbRGwG6A.text: This was my second time trying Rehab burger but at a different location (The first was the newer Tempe restaurant). We had a 15-20 minute wait which wasn't bad at all. We had actually tried to go here months earlier but there was a two hour wait so we went somewhere else. We browsed around the pawn shop next door to kill time and came back in about 20 minutes. Timing was perfect because they were just finishing up cleaning our table.   The check in offer on Yelp is for discounted chips and salsa ($3.99), the regular price is $5.50. We decided to forgo the offer since it was just a discounted price and go straight for the burgers! I forgot how many different choices there are on the menu, so many of them sounded good it was hard to decide. Finally, I spied the word Hatch chile... I can't resist anything with Hatch chile in it! The smaller 5 oz size automatically comes on a beef patty unless specified differently but if you get the 10 oz size you can get a different patty. I also spied beef chorizo patty... Chorizo and Hatch chile, what a perfect combo! Our server recommended the pretzel bun and anything up to medium for the doneness of the burger, so I went with the pretzel bun and medium rare patty. You also have a choice of sweet potato tots or fries but can upgrade to chili fries for an extra fee (I got the tots).  It took quite some time for our burgers to be made. I got hungrier and hungrier and the din from the other customers seemed to increase in volume as it got busier. Finally... our burgers arrived! Mine was piping hot with a generous serving of sweet potato tots. Biting into the burger, I liked the pretzel bun and the cheese was nicely melted over the patty. The actual patty was disappointing though. It had a very mild chorizo flavor and was like eating a hockey puck it was so overdone. I pulled back the bun and noticed the chile wasn't your typical Hatch chile color and was a very very dark green instead of light to medium green. It also didn't have the same flavor and texture as a Hatch chile...perhaps they pulled a switcheroo on me and used a Poblano instead?   I liked the sweet potato tots which had a soft sweetness with lightly crisp exterior. They did taste more sweet than your usual sweet potato though... Perhaps they mix in a generous amount of sugar in the sweet potato mixture?  My burger was $11 and I felt it was very overpriced for what I got. I haven't been really that impressed with their burgers so I suppose there's no need for me to go into burger rehab for Rehab Burger!  2.5/5

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Burger with sweet potato tots
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. &#34;Hatch&#34; chile burger

oche72IyEZo5Fq-RyLZI9A.text: Went to Rehab Burger and had the weekend special the Elvis Burger. 2 two hamburger patties.,Cheese bacon, fried caramelized banana, peanut butter, and a chocolate bar on a chocolate chip bun. Oh so Yummy!  Went great with the sweet potato tots.  Hope they make that again really soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Weekend Special The Elvis Burger

y3gsAPEIaqQUu2shU0Ekew.text: Our golf group just arrived in Scottsdale, was starving and hit up Rehab Burger. Quite possibly the best burger I've ever had and Salyna's service is even better.

vUK2us-O5jHljogpRA58tA.text: Checked this place out for our first trip to The AZ. Great atmosphere and the service was PHENOMENAL.  We started off with the pig wings and chili fries. Amazing off the bone rib lets and chili fries were spiced and cheesy. Had the bistro burger and wife had the patty melt. Perfectly cooked and nice portions! Thanks for the Burger Rehab

ohwRQKWRjR3XocxBBjG1qA.text: This is the second time we visited this restaurant with similar service. We were quoted a 25-30 minute wait by a very friendly woman. The place was very busy when we arrived and were happy to wait. We were definitely seated within that timeframe. But things went downhill from there. We waited almost 10 minutes to be greeted by our server and by then we were ready to order food and drinks-trying to speed up what was already feeling like poor service. We waited almost 45 minutes for food-not sure if the server forgot to put the order in or if the sauerkraut my husband wanted threw someone for a loop? All we ordered was a burger and hotdog. The buns are way too much bread and the food was just okay.

pSRQu_OTLg0rJfyWTxpCbA.text: Looking at the menu of endless options is overwhelming but so worth the time. The totally unique combinations like the Pretzel Bun Peanutbutter Jelly and Bacon Burger...OMG! Spicy Mac n Cheese Burger was also perfection.The sweet potato tots with their amazing dipping sauce. We could not finish the large portions and were glad we ordered the smaller size option. Can't wait to visit again.

H1C4Gu9wDJCV5LcDXMTb4Q.text: Cool place. Waitress was great. 3/3 burgers for my group were just okay. All of us got fries that were barely warm. Wings were good. Pretty disappointed overall based on so many other great reviews. Too many better options nearby to go again.

8BZ1gknYarei0Qc5fvySFQ.text: Large menu, large portions. Our party all enjoy different burger options, even a veggie burger. No frills kind of place. Join them for happy hour where you can get a $2.50 modelo. Most of us couldn't finish our burgers, felt stuffed on the way out! Enjoy.

RWB4epbOelnGsLveTgz5ug.text: I can't say it was my absolute favorite place but I'm not real sure why. The food was good, I had the mushroom Swiss burger but I think the feeling of it being really crowded was undesirable. Still 5 stars as you can't fault the business for being busy.   Pretzel buns and sweet tater tots are excellent!

8OjECVFFdTjq3FWL2GBhKw.text: While our waitress was very polite the service was very slow. Took 20 min for anyone to take our order then 30 min to wait for it to come out. We came here because we mistakenly thought it was family friendly. They do not have a kids menu! It was a loud bar. The food- all 4 items we ordered were not good. Our burgers were flavorless, the pasta was soggy, fries and onion rings were cold. Maybe if you're coming for a round of drinks it's good?

l84ZDFFElkDKbOEJnLnnQg.text: These burgers are so damn delicious. I always have to get one to go. I drive from el mirage to Scottsdale to eat here. Why?  Because they are the best burgers I've ever eaten. I love burgers, but these just make me wet thinking about them. Holy moly I just can't contain myself here. Let's nor forget to mention that the staff is fabulous and they have a pretty nice bar too. I love this place almost as much as my husband. He also almost lost a finger the first b time we came here together. I don't think he will ever try to take a sweet potato tater tot off of my plate again.....

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Cjrm77tC7QlPdtTcIa_xtg.text: Creative burger joint with a cool ambiance. Fun music, tap beer, miss the old style onion rings (extra crunchy) they changed them up so....Regardless, the burgers & fries are great!

gcxoP6sgT7ietKl7lugABA.text: This place never dissapoints.   Big portions,lots of flavors! Staff are always friendly and ready to help.  Great job guys.

aLZ1iyRlwPj925AWQ8VtHQ.text: Awesome experience. Being new to Scottsdale and craving a good burger this is the place to go.  The staff was very friendly and made it a great time.  Bacon and blue burger was amazing and will for sure return.  Reasonable prices and great happy hour menu.  Server was Britt and she made sure everything  was great.  The rest of the staff also made sure by always asking how things were every time walked by.    Overall great dining experience.

W94s9ylCV6mraXPUTtSh7A.text: Love this place ! Mine and my husband's favorite burger spot in Scottsdale! (All it's missing is the ocean view!) We like to split the double Gnarly Mac burger on pretzel bun with fries which is modeled after the Big Mac  (burger is always plenty but might want to order a second basket of fries if you're sharing!) I'm pregnant right now and totally missing their frozen Coronarita's - they're better than anyone's in our opinion! Service is always friendly and they are always busy- tend to wait 5-25 min for a table of 2. Try to hit it up on a Thursday when Happy Hour is open-close  or weekday 3-6!

PaO-Mhw62BBcPoA1unxfJQ.text: I have been dying to check out this place for awhile now! I was sooo excited when we finally got the chance to! The decor itself is really fun and busy. We were expecting them to be busy but luckily we got a couple seats at the bar which is open seating. The Bartender was fast with our drinks and very friendly. She was patient with explaining the burgers and the toppings. I chose the Ghost pepper burger and my wife got some mushroom burger with onion rings.   It didn't take long before we were staring down what looked like almost a undoable task. The burgers were huge! We dug right in and my wife was absolutely in love with hers. She told me she could tell this place used real mushrooms, not the canned stuff. As for mine.. Damn, I underestimated the hotness of Ghost Pepper.. It snuck up on me and it was a constant burn.. The whole time. I enjoyed it though (However, I didn't enjoy it 6 hrs later). The burger was cooked to perfection and the toppings were amazing. I do feel like they could have salted and peppered the meat a little bit though. Other then that It was bomb diggity! I will def make it back and try another one of their amazing burgers.

gdRwamDwleywEaE3_kYS9Q.text: Ghost burger is a MUST TRY! I ordered medium rare and came out just perfect, spicy grilled onions with the smooth avocado made an excellent combination. Friendly staff and great service, definitely will go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

wHtpUukkS5IXckGrJM96KA.text: TERRIBLE SERVICE! Was excited to stop in and try dessert. Came in at 8:58 pm, no one was willing to take us to a table finally a guy came and showed us to a table at 9:02 and a manager lady came out and said no we can't sit down because the kitchen was closed. Meanwhile someone was just coming out of the kitchen serving burgers to a table.

XqTsGXtVxU_zocDFPzowQg.text: 5-stars for the food.  Service probably only 4-stars at best.  Had the Ghost burger and the spicy Mac and Cheese one.  Both were excellent and the pork wings were tangy and awesome.  The place was so crazy busy and crowded that service just couldn't adequately accommodate everyone.  Staff were friendly though.  Will go again.

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Just a little brownie.

_zCukMCW4HOTMqQy4rTShw.text: Great burgers ! Way to much to even finish solo. We recommend maybe sharing a burger and fries. Chili  cheese  fries  are out of this world. This is definitely a spot you got to try while in Scottsdale

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. THE BYOB.

I1EoT6rIIm9qF4MTQarZ8A.text: So many burgers, so little time. Tried the Hawaiian burger because I've never seen anything on a menu like it. Boy was it good! Topped it off with sweet potato tater tots and the orange creamsicle shake to put me in a food coma. :)

iUENsJZ_tRfrxNO763Cksg.text: This place has really good service and the burgers are tasty. Lots of flavor combinations to appease your palate. We came here with two large families and the waitress was accommodating to the group on a busy sunday afternoon. I would def. eat here again when in need for a great burger!

fKi1OucxR7NsUDk9FS_9Fw.text: A winner in Old Town Scottsdale.  Sure it is a burger place, how good can it be? Well, I am telling you it is pretty darn good.    The vibe is a laid back kind of beachy shack, not huge with half of the seats outside. We had a great waiter who was helpful, friendly and checked on us often.    Good happy hour. Decent beer selection and the burgers are legit!  I had the hatch burger on the pretzel bun (beyond yum) and fries.  I loved it completely!    Really fun, laid back place.  I would come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Dining area

BDT_5Qm-CaI0_kQRTjNhSA.text: This is keeping up my streak of amazing restaurants I've tried in the past month or two, loved it! Was surprisingly busy when we went, which was on a weeknight, there were no tables available inside. Sign that this place has got to be good. Also I love the California-type decor and vibes going on, cool looking! We sat outside and the heat lamps were like burning us so when I go again if it's cold I'd probably wait it out and sit inside haha. Our server was awesome, very attentive. Wait staff deserves a high five! The menu was huge, and once I realized you could substitute a veggie patty for any of the regular burgers that made my decision a little harder. I decided to just get the regular veggie burger though because it comes with avocado! My boyfriend had a tough time choosing between the turkey burger or the bacon burger, but he couldn't resist the power of bacon. Another nice thing is that you can choose what kind of bun you want, wheat, pretzel, or brioche. We went for the brioche, but I'd like to try the pretzel! Was feeling indecisive for my side so I asked for half sweet potato tots and half regular fries. Was an excellent choice, best of both worlds haha. They were both perfectly crisp and yummy sides, the tots were especially good when I stuffed a few into my veggie burger. Oh and the veggie burger was phenomenal! It was kind of unique too which I love! White beans, black beans, and panko crusted, yum! Also the avocado on top was so fresh. I usually refuse to cut my burgers in half but this one I had to because it was massive. And messy! But so tasty. I liked the aioli it came with too, was the perfect touch. My boyfriend enjoyed everything as well and we both ate way too much haha. Can't wait to come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Veggie burger

zTt8g1yQraMJJHUrLElRvA.text: Really good, but be careful. They have two size burgers, and if you don't specify, guess the one you get? The big one. Even with a big appetite this burger was TOO big. Get the smaller one (5oz.) plenty big and cheaper unless you are REALLY REALLY hungry.   Also note, other than fries, the sides cost extra, but the side salad was pretty big. Overall prices were a bit high, even for Scottsdale, and the reviews for the sweet potato tots were not good at my table. Also service was friendly but also slow. On the plus side, they split our bill without even asking. I would go back, but definitely get the smaller burger, and stick to the side salad or coleslaw.

bTAWz7I1cVMxv7THPVGn3A.text: This used to a good place but wow the cook doesn't know how to make a burger that isn't rare lol. I had to send my order back twice because both times my burger was bleeding.

TfjAf7GfQanw7ockLi47FA.text: This place is amazing!!!!!! I've been going here for almost 5 years and never been disappointed. Best burgers specially Mac cheese burger HEAVEN. I absolutely recommend this place and whoever we took with us to this place, been satisfied as well! Like I said HEAVEN

WuNrtafupqbFBFoiY7aI4g.text: I believe I have went once or so but I order a hot dog with fries and just eat that plain. No complains just a simple girl- simple order. No condiments, no likey. Customer service could be a little better, mostly getting distracted or just busy but overall great.

oAIgraIl6gHt7mG2F6FdWA.text: Yummy! Definitely a place to share food. Perfect time to try something different.

XriF6S3iw6Y_qNOgPE7-Zg.text: We love Rehab burger the burger are always great tasting and the sweet potato fries a great compliment. My wife and daughter's favorite is the peanut butter and jelly with sriracha.

S0Jln5JNlnZuNXjerhWKgg.text: We ate here on 11/20/17 during happy hour. Our waitress Jori told us about the discounted beer options. My husband ordered the $1.75 can of Modelo. After getting back to our hotel room I noticed that we were charged full price for his beer. I called and spoke with a gentleman who said he was the manager. He apologized for this mistake and told me he would refund the full $5.00 to my husband's card. Well... here we are almost 2 months later and still no refund. Extremely disappointing. The food was adequate. Service was average. And the lack of accommodations for someone with a small child was impolite. I'm suppose to change my child's diaper on the restroom floor. Are you kidding me?!

oflzBxZhgNTaGb48T9fy5w.text: This is a great burger place. The service was great and our food was so good. The sweet potato tots are amazing and great with malt vinegar and ketchup. I definitely will eat here again. When the Ducks play Arizona this year.

_pWn9lKkjLz1t8jZET4v2A.text: The setting and ambiance is nice.   The server was friendly and did a good job   Menu with a lot of variety.   Way overpriced! The quality of food does not match the price of a $15 burger.   When we asked for a lettuce wrapped burger, the server let us know that they don't really do that and the cooks wouldn't  honor our request. The result was I thin piece of lettuce on each side of burger. Of course we couldn't pick it up and eat it.   Why would we expect quality on $15 burgers.   The sweet potato tots might've been good,  if they were fresh, but there was no way we were sending back after we got an idea of how the place responded to our lettuce wrap request.   Rehab should seriously go to In n Out Burger or Carl's Junior to see how proper lettuce wrap burgers are done with quality.   We won't be going back but the feedback from the rest of our group was good.   Good not great.

CFt8_vQs4cquEFuZJl4crQ.text: Been here many times.....If it's your 1st you will love it...but beware EVERYTHING is good here.  It is VERY possible that you eyes will be bigger than you belly!  If you like mac and chz, order that burger.  YUMMY!  Build your own is great too.  Pig wings are a hit - 2 thumbs up from my TX guests (chx wings too - Xtra crispy).  Cannot go wrong with anything.  Very, very tasty!  Definitely something for everyone!

NIA6lwQnHk9kgvPBSFj3fg.text: Fun atmosphere, great downtown old Scottsdale area. We arrived around 2pm had a bit of a wait. Seems like it's always busy. Great food, beer and service. Only complaint was the desert. Ordered the brownie sundae and it was awful. Everything else was great!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

3-227476e75mTyWmzFFuGA.text: Wow! This burger was amazing!! I got the 5 oz BYOB burger. The bun, meat, everything was just soooo good and the regular French fries were top notch! I will definitely revisit this place.

4eW_OfYRjsAz1St-ZLA_nA.text: Thanks to Yelp we found this little gem and oh boy! My husband's medium rare burger was perfect and my Wedge Salad with grilled chicken was piled high - crisp and fresh, it was too big to finish!   For a family of 3 to dine for under $50 was great!

NTzSyE_FGihw449Mf6RktQ.text: I've heard so many good things about this place, and so I was super excited to try it out. Went there today and ordered a Mushroom and Swiss burger and fries.  Burger was over cooked and not even exceptionally warm anymore. Fries were good. Server looked like she was either having a bad morning or still waking up, at 11:30am.  The grilled cheese my boyfriend ordered was pretty solid, but the milkshake could use something more than Hershey's syrup and milk with a scoop of vanilla.  Overall a pretty meh experience :/

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

2YR31PPFbq4cJI_DneIPmg.text: Great burgers! Stopped in for a quick meal on a layover in Phoenix. The staff was very accommodating and even though they were quite busy, they were able to seat and serve us quickly. We'll be back!

2Bjs5kE4LpSjYn1wzu17FQ.text: Rehab Burger is always consistently great! The staff is excellent and the food is always solid. The sweet potato tots are good but get half fries/half tots!

27TYLDFajJnGnL5-sSSIWw.text: Great burgers with an amazing variety of possible toppings.  Service was very good and happy hour topped it off.  I had the pulled pork sandwich and it was piled high with great seasoning.  The fries are seasoned and it wasn't to my liking but the onion rings were very good.  I would come back.

PvYTy5wyt2Fp7kvIQLvO-w.text: Love the service!   We were immediately seated upon arrival. The environment made us feel like we were next to the beach and having a burger. Our server was so adorable and very friendly.  We ordered the spicy mac and cheese burger with regular fries and I ordered the Hawaiian burger with pretzel bun along with sweet potatoe tots. We waited about 5-10 minutes and our delicious looking food came to us. My server also included different sauces for me to try.   The sweet potatoe tots were yummy with the Ketchum and by itself. They weren't crispy tots but a little on the soft side. Our burgers were hard to hold and eat so we just cut them up. My Hawaiian burger was a little bland, so it helped that I had a pickle to kick in some flavor. My friend couldn't find her patty under the mounds of mac and cheese she received between her hamburger bun, but she said it was pretty good! However, the amount of carbs were getting to her. What I liked most was our burgers were not disgustingly greasy and I didn't feel the nasty heaviness you usually feel after eating an epic burger.  Would really love to come back and try the other burgers though :)  love the friendliness and the ambience.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian burger and spicy mac and cheese burger. Sooo pretty!

VNgKQ4PcT_61U9YqAJqpQg.text: I showed up a little after 11 and by noon on a Wednesday the place was packed. That tells you how good these Burgers taste. I had the bacon and blue and I'm officially in love with a burger. Perfect flavors, perfectly messy with great music and a beach vibe.

GmXh3q2XQj8Lsey9N8O0lA.text: Great burgers!   Cooked to perfection and incredibly nice service every time we go.    The only thing I would warn about is their skillet brownie. It tastes like a charred burger because I'm assuming they use the same skillets for their brownies as they do their meat...so that was a little weird, but everything else made up for it.

dQ8nY_Rj-g52SPaIDxtGmA.text: Oh My Goshhhh the veggie burger and sweet potato tots are my favorite. Every time I eat there, that's what I'm gettin. The crispiness of the burger is mouth watering. Usually veggie burgers fall apart, are too moist, and lack flavor but not this one. Its perfect. Services is great and food always comes out perfect. I have no complaints. Amazingggg  Thank you Rehab for the awesome food!!

UuqVbVdfeYWYWI8xwB58hQ.text: First time eating there! Great food and service! Cold beer! We had a MacGnarlyRehab Burger! It was awesome ! Fries and onions rings! Can't wait to go back!great atmosphere! Fun place and busy!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. First time eating here! Was very impressed! Cold beer and great good! We had the Mac Gnarly Rehab! It was awesome! Can&#39;t wait to go back!

uKaat5o0jKSUJMa1wP2-pw.text: Amazing! PBJ Bacon burger and Spicy MAC n Cheese Burger. Seriously best ever. Great waitress too! Atmosphere was pub like with indoor or outdoor seating. Fair prices. The 5 oz burgers were plenty and I actually put some in a to go box for midnight munchies.  Don't know if any other burgers could top them, but from what we saw passing by on plates, I'd be willing to find out!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

ev6CPUjbSTJR3i0_EvX8iA.text: Sooooo good! I had been craving a turkey burger and Rehab did not disappoint! My husband got the chili cheese burger and ate it all before I could even process how I was going to eat the huge tower of turkey that was placed before me. I can't remember our servers name, but she was awesome! If you want a great burger, awesome atmosphere, and friendly service Rehab is the place to go!

9U9VUU72sKUNtr84edi4Zw.text: I had a craving for a burger so my husband took me here. It was amazing. I had the byo burger and it completely hit the spot. I also got the pot brownie with peanut butter Togo and it looked so delicious that I started eating it while waiting to pay.

IVvlUYMHZ2nQZi8jh7PltQ.text: Tried out Rehab finally for a nice Sunday brunch with some friends. The atmosphere was fun and beachy, which is a nice twist for Old Town. Parking is tough so expect to wait a little bit.  As for the meal, the burger is huge and absolutely love the pretzel bun twist. That might have been the best part of my meal. I tried to BBQ burger and it was decent, a little over cooked for my liking.  I also highly recommend the onion rings as a starter for the table to share! Lastly, I ordered a beer with my meal and I waited, waited, and it never came. The server finally realized but at that point I was almost done with my meal. If some of these things get fixed, my review may be able to get to 4 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. BBQ stylin burger

QwBokuj0l2gEMgT207Uk8g.text: I went here for the first time yesterday, and it was the best experience I've ever had in Scottsdale.  The bartender was very friendly, energetic and passionate, the food was out of this world, I had the BBQ burger on a pretzel roll with fries.  The BBQ sauce was spicier than I expected for a "house bbq sauce", they really went on a limb for that, I enjoy spicy foods so this was a welcomed surprise for me.    I had the smaller of the two burgers, which was huge!  I will be back anytime I'm in Scottsdale, I will send anyone who asks "where should I go in Scottsdale?" there.  Needless to say, I was impressed.

yq5Mj2O_owO-ZRJMS5wNEQ.text: Sooooo..... We had the chips and verde chicken to start and that was the shizz!!! I had the macaroni and cheese burger and my husband had the pb&j burger!! Both were super yummy and very filling for 5oz. Our server Laura was on point and most friendly! We will be back for sure!!!

0PwnmRGzMgKZ2J0hduk7Ng.text: Great place for a great burger , my boss tried to talk me into the PB and J burger swearing how good it is , I stuck to a trusted favorite " mushroom Swiss . Popular place , so get there early for good seating . Good burgers !!

xvWW2SdtmOoZ_558h0m2Lw.text: If you're wanting to get a good quality burger then come here. The burgers are huge and everything they have on the burgers is over flowing! I got the Mac N Cheese burger and it had jalapeno and poblano peppers on it. It was so good!!! The service is quick and the staff is very friendly. Definitely a place to hangout with friends if you're in Old Town!

pcw1-puVhZfVFoezO9oFjA.text: Food was awesome and the outside seating was comfortable and cool on a hot afternoon. If you love the band sublime then the music will take you back. The esthetic is very long beach California so it made me think of where I grew up. It is a little piece of the beach in downtown scottsdale.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. What&#39;s left of my porkster

cy6hsA6K6gcjeXcBz6TtSQ.text: Food is bomb, but so one needs to tell Aaron it's not the customers fault he hates his life #gtfoh

4IaJVcKwIdHxfwtR1sUfpQ.text: After reading some of the previous reviews . . . this place was definitely one burger joint that was on my to visit list . . . loved the curb appeal, and the inside decor was great . . . the food . . . well, how do I say it . . . not so special.  I ordered the Hatch Chili Cheese Burger Rehab on a prezel roll with Sweet Potato Tots . . .  when it arrived . . . it looked unbelievable . . . but the taste . . . kinda bland, seemed to lack any kind of seasoning . . . ordered it medium so that it would be nice and juicy . . . kinda dry, and while it was cooked to medium, it appeared to be a much leaner burger than I was expecting, and the pretzel bun . . . tasted kinda stale.  The sweet potato tots we okay . . . but again nothing special.  Will I ever visit Rehab Burger again . . . probably . . . but maybe if I sat at the bar and had a couple of adult beverages first . . . the burger and tots would taste better.

Bb-DX7LPt23sPTX4cMdLMw.text: The burger components, sauces and accompaniments were all good. I just don't feel the quality of the beef was that great or stood out in any way.

__h8lmriXpGO_cKUa-ATmQ.text: Wednesday lunch. 3 person party. Seated immediately @ noon. Waited on immediately. Drinks with the quickness. Atmosphere is chill. Has a Hawaii/So Cal beach vibe - like Islands but less corporate.   Burgers are enourmous. Had the Jalapeno Popper Burger, medium rare and subbed in onion rings. Burger was alright. Had a charbroil-flavor overtone to it, which, unfortunately was the predominate flavor. Also, there's too much going on with this burger. Massive amount of guacamole, little fired pieces of jalapenos seated within the guac and well, you need a knife and fork to eat it. I never have a problem with the size of a burger - it's a beautiful thing.   Going to try a more simple, straight-forward burger next time but if the overly-charbroiled flavor persists the second round, it'll be my last visit. I'm optimistic.  It's in line with Scottsdale Old Town pricing - $16 for a badass burger. Cheaper burgers are to be had, and for me, the next time will be less extravagant, which will obviously be better on the ole pocket book.

KnOgQFhof3gmx3uoq7VqrA.text: Turkey burger was excellent but didn't really care for the sweet tots. Other than that we loved everything!

zdL0NzIkefPdw4J1mLZPvQ.text: I went there the first time with two of my friends who had previous been.  The environment is very laid back, with serves in jean shorts and boat shoes.  The place itself isn't very big, and there's outside seating available, but we sat inside.   Despite the waitress not looking old enough to drink, she gave me a good recommendation to go with my turkey burger and sweet potato tots.  The burger itself was perfectly done and delicious, but not knock out amazing.  My friend has the PB&J burger, which, if I go back, I think I'm going to indulge in. The onion rings are HUGE and perfectly done and the side sauces are pretty inspired.   Definitely stop by if you're in the area and craving a burger.

2zJBY6br8gVV7myqxsfxfQ.text: This place has excellent burgers in two different sizes. All different combos that include the mouth watering PB and J burger. Their onion rings and tater tots are good. The cocktails are just so-so including watery margaritas. Stick to beer.    Its always busy so plan to wait during peak times, but you will enjoy it as you can get your burger fix on.

Pvfx2yHUTOKhWTWYKWvs7g.text: We were in Scottsdale on business and took our casual client here.  The inside is a fun decor with a smiling wait staff. Most of us had different kind of burgers, fish sandwich & pasta.  All the food was delicious.  There is a good selection of drinks and beer.  Even though it was a business dinner this place certainly made it so much fun!

v3Sy2aNdAkCKTyGloASXRQ.text: Fantastic burger? Sure.  Great atmosphere? Absolutely.  Friendly wait staff? Yes sir.   We enjoyed our meals. I had the No Poblano Burger "rehab 10oz" and fries. She had the turkey burger with onion rings. Both meals were delicious!   We were engaged in great conversation with our server, Devon, (a local AZ). I am glad we were here before the spring training crowd, because I doubt we'd get the chance to talk.   We will be back to try another burger ASAP!

FlS5NtL-L0mvYoWooU1EPw.text: We visited the Phoenix metro area from California and I can honestly say my first experience with a Arizona burger joint did not fail to impress.    The decor is something straight from a typical So Cal beach boardwalk: Lots of wood, surboards, bicycles, VW mini-buses, tiki torches...  All they were missing was the sand!  Plenty of flat screen TV's playing everything from surfing competitions, downhill MTB'ing and other various sporting events.  The overall atmosphere is clean, well presented and very laid back.  We had the Poblano and Mac Gnarly burgers, both of which were HUGE, cooked perfectly and very tasty.  The sweet poTOToes with Pineapple aioli recommended by our waitress were awesome.  The food was excellent, prices are very reasonable and the service was great.  Overall, a fantastic experience.  We'll be back!

f47gB-HlMeBl5zdG4Ukcdw.text: Thursday's are all day happy hours! Went here for the first time last night, it was great! I got the PBJ and Bacon with a turkey burger instead and the slaw. The burger was amazing, the slaw was very blan- I wouldn't pay the up charge for it again. Our server was super peppy, smiley and helpful. We will be back!

sVlJ5bRZBAha8T09V2xBEg.text: Got a PBJ &  Bacon Burger since they were out of the Mac and Cheese burger special. The PBJ burger was well cooked, the PBJ was a different combo but enexpectedly tasty, I would get it again. The sweet potato tots and the dipping sauce were a nice change from the usual fries and ketchup.  The downside to the restaurant was the wait. We were seated in under 5 minutes, but after that we waited almost 45 minutes from seated until our food finally showed up! There were people seated after us who got their food before and the same time as us. Not sure what the big hold up was.  TL;DR - tasty food, long wait. I'm not sure it was worth a 45 minute wait.

3FMl8VifBgeVeeqJY8T2fg.text: Such an original place. Go with an empty stomach...preferably don't eat for a day or so prior because you will be happily stuffed afterwards. Food is awesome, variety is fantastic and a must to visit if you are in the area. Staff is also super friendly.

fbVmhMj0YYAhmE4dykD_GA.text: i am a huge fan of this place went there twice in a week...sometimes the waitress are a bit obnoxious by cutting into us ordering to show the other waitress a pot smoking fish  while we were giving our order but all in all...Great  vibe, great price, great food.

XY7WwwrInAEuMYifBu_52Q.text: Had a fantastic time at this place. The service was great and very friendly people. The burger, sweet potato tater tots and brownie dessert was bomb dot com.   I have recommended this place to family and friends already.

flIsAefUGJJZxrZsdCGhyw.text: Waited 20 minutes to order.  Drinks forgotten. Pressured to purchase additional drinks. Food took 45 minutes from ordering. Tables that sat after us received food before. Server stopped bringing out our food to check with other tables. When order was requested to be canceled server rudely said it was already made a few times before finally canceling. Would never return worst service.

mJKYAhvYoiND4aIqf5mOlw.text: THIS. PLACE. GETS IT!  Awesome start to finish. It's so great to find a place that appreciates their customers.   Success in the restaurant business is tricky. You don't buy food, cook it, serve it, get paid and go out partying........ Sadly...that is the attitude at 7 out of 10 places, regardless of city/state....  Rehab Burgers is wonderful. Starting with the extremely friendly hostesses, the exceptionally friendly waitstaff, the amazing bartenders, and the whole time, the owners ARE ACTUALLY THERE, asking if everything is ok?  What a concept! Are you listening Scottsdale restaurant groups? (you know who you are)............So many places serve cheap food with an attitude, and get crowded for  happy hour 2-for-1 well drinks, and the doosh DJ playing loud house music from his jump-drive, wooo freaking hooo.......yes I am over 25....  Ok, anyway, went for Sunday afternoon Burger Rehab. Cold beer, reasonably priced, fresh burger, cooked the way i asked, fresh bun, amazing sweet potato tots, and homemade spicy ketchup (are you kidding me?)  The most important thing ............... staff... Exceeded expectations...  The food is great and reasonable. The staff is exceptional... THAT IS WHAT BRINGS PEOPLE BACK......Best, Duke .........

gTBi_O3HaV3ck1LPgJgKRQ.text: I think the words I am looking for are "HOLY HELL THEIR BURGERS ARE MASSIVE!" This place is always packed when I walk in but somehow they always accommodate us. Their service is attentive and the food! OH THE FOOD! Salads are huge, burgers are even bigger and I struggle to even eat half of it! Haven't been disappointed yet!

BiQHTolFuBvYkah2vy_e7Q.text: Went here yesterday with a couple friends and to be honest, I was quite impressed.  The staff wasn't too in your face and their burgers were phenomenal.   We started with some chicken wings that were scrumptious to say the least and didn't last long between the 3 of us.   A friend and I shared the "Rehab" size of the Chili Burger and it was delish. With the Pretzel bun and sweet potato tater tots, I was in love! Although her and I both agreed " WE WANT MORE CHILI!" on the burger next time.   I am now addicted  and the only treatment is more Rehab.

UEMO-VrIz5-gbeaFS0KsGA.text: I've eaten here several times and brought friends and family, they all love it.  Trust me and order the PB&J burger and sweet potato tots, delicious!  Staff is friendly, food is delicious, and beer is ice cold.  You'll love it!

6S3K4ieWAZeKRjbIFXTLrw.text: Wow.  Great burgers and an amazing club sandwich. We stopped in before a GIANTS Gabe and it was off the hook.  We will be back our service was great

M1d656tbMig3FIpyNm1m4g.text: I went here on the 24th of Feb and the place was packed. The decor is awesome and the vibe is hip. The entire staff was friendly and met my needs. I thought the burger was ok. I was expecting a much better burger for the $13.00 price I paid. I went here because of all the great yelp reviews, however was a little disappointed. I will be back to try a different burger to see if it changes my thoughts on the food.

DbVS3tZunFjooE0qhlcGVw.text: This was a great place to get something different. All three of us had something different and they were all excellent. Sweet potato fries with dipping sauce were fabulous.

KFKgev37_tJpHS1jduv4OA.text: We stopped by Rehab Burger Therapy for dinner before our Segway Tour and it did not disappoint!  It has a surf vibe decor and a large bar. I can't remember the exact prices, but we hit a good happy hour deal on Thursday around 5pm.  My veggie burger came with sweet potato tots which were delicious! I would definitely recommend.

ahpuT0JyD5BpzgusrtpomQ.text: 5 Star for scene...fun great vibe...it's like a beach bar. 5 Star for Staff...friendly, helpful and accommodating. 4 Star for the food. I had the bacon cheese burger and Buffalo Wings.  Cheese burger was cooked medium and was fairly large if you order the 10 ounce.  It was served with these amazing sweet potato tater tots and plenty of them that are worth going there alone for.  They are light and not greasy.  My Brioche bun was a nice compliment to the burger nice and fresh. Wings were  fine but I would say stick to the burger...AKA  why it's called Rehab Burger Therapy...it's a burger place.  Don't forget the margarita...high quality!  Check out the place if you are looking for a fun spot and be beach like spot.

Bfy-LeV_E6THYnjGnmOZbQ.text: Great happy hour times. The service was off the charts and the burgers are excellent! I had the hangover burger which had bacon and eggs and other good stuff. The burger was cooked to perfection. I will definitely be coming back!

QkdvMSC0_Ty8HDrr4_xFYA.text: ummmm PBJ & Bacon Burger.... whoever the heck came up with this is a freakin genius!!! if you like pb&j and you like bacon, then you will love this. crazy a$$ flavor combination, but it works. Sweet potato tots are pretty dang good too. i'll be back :)

dfs-CBP4t7X33nQ55jGfCQ.text: Great burger spot. Unfortunately I was there too meet family & friends for drinks. The girls had ordered a burger with pb & j & siracha?  I love burgers. I couldn't do it altogether tho. Love siracha. On the burger:awesome. Pb & j? Not on my juicy burger please. Separately it was fantastic. Sweet potato tots or was it fries? Ohmy!  I can't remember. Did I mention I was here for drinks?  In all, I would come back again. The menu looked delicious. Tip: public parking lot was just around the corner.

sz4nCBBi0c9capm6dmUHgw.text: Hands down one of the top 2 burgers I've had IN MY LIFE. Fresh baked bun, well seasoned meat... I had the mushroom and Swiss with grilled onions. Sweet potato tots were awesome. The place was completely packed and we still managed to get a great seat and fantastic service!

N0nOScX47E6XeZzforeZRw.text: Every time we order take away something is cold and the whole meal feels limp.  I've always enjoyed my meal while dining in.  If you want it to go, avoid calling ahead and instead order on the spot and relax at the bar while you wait.  Pineapple aioli and sweet po-TOT-oes for the win!

8NO5qDZZVhaY1UYOtbW8OA.text: Solid burger place. Got the chili cheeseburger with sweet potato tots, and had to waddle myself out of the restaurant. Food was tasty. Restaurant is super small, so you feel like you're sitting on top of other people. They should really consider expanding. Our server could have been a little more attentive with refilling out drinks, but no real customer service issues here.

zAjGHrIF2BIxvFnmIZwxuA.text: Best burger in town!!!!  I'm a pretzel bun kinda guy.  Try the clams too, you'll thank me! The calamari portion is huge as well!  Burgers are cooked to order, I always get the large on a pretzel bun with the works.  A go to place for us. Burgers are $10-12, comes with fries, sweet potato tots, or a small salad (not the greatest salad).  You will leave full! Full bar.  Service is good-great, especially at the Bar. Or ask for Kay!

e0pfCYbVkvKb5-VIvwK9xg.text: I'm here on vacation and was excited to try this place based on the yelp reviews. I love burger joints and always seek them out when I travel. This place had a five star vibe, but for me the food I sampled was a little more average than that. PBJ burger (which I usually love) was way too sweet for my taste. The sweet potato tater tots were paired with an odd, sweet sauce when I was looking for something savory. As a major plus, however, they accommodated 10 people on a busy Friday evening and they were very nice to the children.

wKvR9fPiBuUHYdKfqBhzUg.text: I was apprehensive about going there because it is on the other side of the valley and is a burger place.  I had no idea it was as good as the other reviews had provided and well worth the drive.  The atmosphere was great, staff was attentive, and manager really did show up at the table.  The beer was as cold and plentiful as identified, with all the favorites represented.    The food was spectacular and I had the Hangover, with my wife having the Pablo, which was also awesome.  Who knew?

hjCBi1ZcupTprjtQzT6xNw.text: Cool burger place. Asked waitress for recommendations on unique burger to choose and it was excellent. Will visit again when I return to scottsdale.

FC4EaebpaVCASwXHZLzMzg.text: Prices here are great... we got an incredible chicken green chili dip for $9.   Burgers can be made with a 5 oz patty for two or so dollars cheaper... my build your own was $8.75... with a sod Carla's.  Great place to stop when you are in Old Town Scottsdale... fun atmosphere with a relaxed vibe... just loved it.
