9GhqeLKfpaFvkxW64-6txw.text: My first time here let me tell you it did not disappoint, had the burger with shaved prime rib on it, juicy delicious bomb burger cooked just right ordered it medium and it was really juicy they also threw those delicious southwest chilies on it I love, wings and onion wings were really good too they combined two sauces for our wings that really went well together sweet and savory, beer bar the works, and our waiter was great, can't wait to come back when I'm back in the AZ, from Chicago where we have lots of great burger spots and this is in my top 5....

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Onion rings
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hot wings with a medium and honey sauce combined.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Shaved prime rib burger with sweet potato tater tots.

J-rvpvSVrmk8cPEuQwdhMA.text: Had the Alfredo San Carlo! Awesome pasta from a burger joint. Perfectly cooked and lots of cheese and alfredo sauce with garlic tomatoes and it ha a little spice to it as well! So great job guys! If the pasta is that good I can only imagine what the burgers taste like!

BKuPtolTMPmmucxmswtj9g.text: I don't give many 5 star reviews but this place deserves it. It's our second time in Scottsdale and for this second visit our first stop before we even checked into our resort was the Rehab Burger Bar!  First of all their margaritas are the best I have had. Order one of those right away while deciding on what burger you want to eat.   I ordered a bacon blue cheese burger, with everything mixed in the patty. Patty they make is huge! Burger was cooked perfectly and went well with my drink and sweet potato tots.  Atmosphere inside is great also. Very chill but a great bar atmosphere.  Only drawback is there are not one of these in Chicago!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Best margarita in Scottsdale

7d7mRUdfKT6BhfmBKOEaUg.text: I normally get a BYOB (build your own burger) on a pretzel bun, and it never disappoints!!  When I'm not getting that I try one of their salads. I've had them all and I love every one.  I like to end the meal with one of their "pot brownies" which is a brownie in a cast iron skillet with ice cream and marshmallow fluff. You can get it with Reese's or Hershey's, they're both amazing.

mzFYuVcQG4MRUbVcuGisTQ.text: This place was great upon entering. Crowded, good ambiance, really nice and friendly staff. It had everything you'd want walking into a restaurant.  Unfortunately, it stopped there. Burgers were just ok. Asked for mine medium rare and it was more medium/medium well. I've had better burgers in lots of other places.  You know it's not a great experience when you go to a place with "an amazing burger" and the best part was the onion rings.  Fun time, great service, below average food.

JpVHMkB9IOdgXSONQOMI2Q.text: Must have the pb&j burger it sounds odd but so incredibly good! The tots are yummy as well!

q10fPnWLT6MwzZ0Np2DxPg.text: I brought my haircutter here today to thank her for a nice job. We started off with the Calamari.  Large portions and very tasty. The marinara sauce could use a little more punch with more herbs.    I don't think I ever had a bad burger here. Great little place to grab a burger in downtown Scottsdale.  Burger was perfectly cooked.  Good bread that doesn't fall apart when you start grabbing your sandwich.  I think I've eaten most of their beef burgers except the PBJ (Peanut Butter and Jelly) burger.  PBJ on a burger doesn't really thrill me, but I've heard it's really popular.  My haircutter had the Hawaiian Burger and she loved it, but I think she would loved anything after finishing off three frozen margaritas.  I pity the person who gets their haircut after I drop her off at her shop. LOL.

fLCy4q1hzP6Cv_1ERsF5ZQ.text: This place has a very different approach from what most restaurants do. The nice colorful place with some unique objects inside and takes you to the ocean. I had the jalapeno popper burger and was really good. They have funny names for the menu items. Next time I come back, I will be in need of speech therapy.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

h_H40uGWpYzrjY0iYKlENg.text: Best Burgers I have ever had.  I know the PBJ + Bacon Burger sounds weird, but it is oh so good! Sweet and salty and spicy!   I ate there on three different occasions and every time my burger was perfectly cooked.  Onion rings were awesome too!

5NVA2ZfQigw6_XhspVkxig.text: They have a wide & wild selection of huge burgers and a really creative decor with surf boards, and cool things all over the walls and ceiling.  It has the feel of a young, hip bar & burger place where you'd go on vacation by the ocean.

xzKYqly-lWtRLL9fcKObuA.text: I ordered a bacon burger in a lettuce wrap. The meat was seasoned perfectly with a great hickory bacon flavor. I do have a gluten sensitivity, and they were very accommodating. Most of their sauces were gluten free except the aioli. Their sweet potato tater tots were delicious!! Definitely recommend this place. Despite the fact that I got a lettuce wrapped burger, they do offer a gluten free bun. If you're looking for a great burger joint this is the place to go!

W8x0KNkQ0zBxGsHLiVkOmQ.text: On a day out splurging with a group of friends, we decided burgers were the way to go! What we received was much more than a burger it was a fantastic experience all the way around.  We bombarded this place bathing suits, pool hair, and flip flops and fit in like they made the place for us.  Super laid back, beachy, bicycle on the boardwalk feel.  Absolutely opposite of what we are used to in Scottsdale, thank you for the breath of fresh air....literally.....great open air feel with patio a patio as well.  This place was busy so accommodating 6 may have not been easy, but the owner made it happen. ( The owner alone deserves  5 stars) alright enough gushing... The Food!!!!  We ordered the chili con Fritos appetizer Fritos smothered in just spicy enough chili with cheese and sour cream...terrific! Rodrigo Da Vinci salad~ zesty and creamy with huge chunks of Chicken.  Peppers onions, jalapenos!  Enough for all 6 to share  The tractor pull burger ~burger was cooked perfect medium and the Pulled pork on top was fall apart and rich with BBQ goodness. The PB&J Burger~ Ummmmm.. Go try this, I don't want to ruin the movie by telling you the best parts! The McGnarly~ burger cooked perfect again, it is along the lines of a Big Mac.....yet so deliciously done right. The Tuna fish sandwich~ the tuna salad was loaded with celery and onions.  It was fresh and cold and literally stood a foot high! It was a masterpiece made by cooks who show they care about what comes to your table!  I'm not usually this long winded, but if only one person sees how right these people have got it because they've read my babblings than hooray!

cTGmgKnog9LpnkJEAYO-kg.text: This is one of the best burgers I have ever had.  The buns are baked fresh daily.  The meat is cooked perfectly.  It was a flawless burger.  The pork quesadilla was also quite good.

M7EAUEiWe392k1YBzuDe-g.text: We are huge foodies, and we are so glad to have discovered Rehab Burger Therapy! Here, we had one of the best burgers we've ever had, and we've tried a lot of burgers.  As extreme food fans, we're always looking for a good burger with a twist, and we found it at Rehab Burger Therapy. We ordered the server's recommendation, which is their 'hangover burger', and we customized it.  This burger has a fried egg, bacon, colby jack cheese and a hatch green chili. We customized it to include their ghost pepper jack cheese and crispy onions with a side of hot sauce - and it was simply fantastic. No hot sauce was needed, the burger stood on it's own merits. :-)  Instead of ordering standard french fries, we opted for the Jamaican Corn, and WOW - phenomenal! I could order that every day. Our server told us that their Jamaican corn (which is a Jamaican-spiced corn-on-the-cob) is deep fried - and cooked this way, it was perfectly done, juicy and perfectly spiced. We've never had fried corn before, but it was definitely some of the best corn we've ever had.  Try their corn at least once when you visit - you will not be disappointed. And the burgers? You can't go wrong! Loved it!

DVUc5thKPnSsByR8AHZMfw.text: One of my favorite places for a burger. So many choices, and all are awesome. The fries and onion rings are fantastic. They offer a large variety of sauces for them. I recommend asking for a little of each until you narrow down your favs.   The service is always good and I love the fun beachy decor too.

hj8Gzn4bmIZ1It69212P4Q.text: Rehab burger is your total local dive bar but has a cool vibe to it as well. They offer great drink specials, and have a great burger menu. I had there Hangover burger with the sweet potato tots and to me it was pretty mediocre plus I ordered my burger medium rare and received a well done burger so of course I am sure that had something to do with the taste. Would I go back and give em another shot? Probably not considering there are alot more great burger joints in Scottsdale.

Po0CQHrrG94lBAypwYmEbA.text: Did not disappoint at all best onion rings I have ever had in my life, burger was excellent love this place would highly recommend

Zxx6POpaU_qYBDkhzoVy1A.text: Wow!! The food here is amazing! Extra big helpings and they will customize your order. Laid back atmosphere. We are outside. Be prepared to take food home! Chips and salsa and the sweet potatoes tots are a must! Every burger imaginable is there. Chicken turkey ham and veggie sandwiches options too

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Veggie noogie sandwich !! Huge

Q1Z8fCySU2PwGvotN_eAjQ.text: Had the pbj burger! It was so good glad I took the chance and tried something daring!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Then pic doesn&#39;t do it justice!

UVAQdq7IBOEDwC32NJrn8g.text: First off, my burger and tater tots were great. I got the large Porkster burger which is a hamburger patty topped with BBQ pulled pork - 10oz of meat overall. It came with cheese on a brioche bun and I could only finish half! The sweet potato tater tots were a nice side, especially with the pineapple terriyaki aioli sauce for dip. No complaints here!  My 10oz burger with tots, mom's 5oz burger with tots, and a lemonade came to just under $30.   However, had a big disappointment with the lunch time service. Our server was nice but way too much of a space case. He was really attentive until we got our food and then went MIA as the lunch hour started to pick up. Never got another refill on my drink, had to grab the usher for a to-go box, and when we finally got his attention after waiting for a bit we asked for the check and to try out the dessert ("Pot" brownie). Instead of dessert, we just got our check (sans dessert listed, with no mention of said dessert) so we just paid and left. Ain't nobody got time for that!

NHRPFpRX1ZMfsFU9xlJNew.text: This is a great place to eat!  My wife and I stopped here with outer two kids and we all found something to eat that we all enjoyed!  Service was friendly, attentive and prompt!  We will definitely come here again the next time we are in Scottsdale!

Qi-vOtUxBaCzzLit1_KmjA.text: Maybe my review isn't fair because I haven't eaten yet, but it's the first Saturday of March Madness and all tv's are on. Golden State San Antonio NBA game. We have asked several people to switch one tv but were told that there is a table here that will throw a fit if they change the channel. The food needs to be the best ever or I won't come back.

KBydUTstbsLrYtco58kOjw.text: Way over hyped. I was expecting greatness and didn't really get it. Bar is way too big for one bartender to handle plus server tickets for an entire restaurant. Burgers were alright kind of bland though. Order the spicy Mac and cheese and both the burger and macaroni was lacking

YKD5k5Owe20sUF4lauqNtg.text: My mom and I visited Rehab during a recent trip to the area for spring training. It was crowded, and there was a wait, but they were extremely accurate with their estimate, and we were able to walk around Old Town a little bit before we were seated.  Our server was wonderful - that perfect combination of chatty and unobtrusive, helpful and not annoying.  We started with chips and salsa as something to snack on, and they were good. I loved that there were two sizes of burgers to account for all appetites. I ended up having the chili cheeseburger with fries. It was actually not so messy that I couldn't pick it up and eat it on the bun - a rare feat for a chili cheeseburger.  The beer was cold, the food was good, and despite the crowd, we never felt hurried or neglected. Rehab is definitely worth a revisit the next time I'm in the area.

P9kCBk0oE6CHlJ0kwshpeQ.text: I don't know how anyone can give this place a negative review. The burgers were DELICIOUS. The wings were AMAZING. The service was AWESOME. And the atmosphere was SUPER FUN. David was our server and he was just about perfect. We can't wait to go back!

_we7sHga5XPyAzEw0NWQBQ.text: It's a good burger. But nothing out of this world amazing that I need to pay $15? It just feels forced. Nonetheless if you go, you'll get a good burger. I just feel like I can get a better one somewhere else with a better beer selection and atmosphere.

I3QxrJE9VPwEsXy6x2MC_A.text: Outstanding! Just came into town from Los Angeles and the servers went out of their way to take care of me! The pb&j burger was phenomenal so many depths of flavors, one of the servers (I think Jon?) even stated "you should close your eyes and experience everything that's happening right now!" Lol. They even had some tips on places I should visit while in town. I highly recommend this place, super friendly and great atmosphere!

WPRXJf6FsP9AwfXkprcv9A.text: Service was great, despite being busy. Had the mac n cheese burger. It was very good. But I've had better: Guy Fieri's place in Vegas dominates the domain of mac n cheese burgers.   If it weren't for my loyal devotion to Paradise Valley Burger's weekly special, I'd have given Rehab 5 stars. (If you're reading this PVBurger guy, I'm sorry for being infidelitous. Forgive me.)

xwFYgxGcYWknvDMcDQzKtA.text: Awesome place, great staff, very accommodating of our group and 2 young kids, and the food was fantastic. Hit them up!

eAaqyogZLaim-YAU71fNJg.text: If you get the PBJ Bacon burger, you will not regret it!!!!!! It also has sriracha, and I was hesitant to get it at first because it sounds absolutely gross, but you will be super surprised to discover how the flavors combine to create something amazing/incredible/mindblowing. I would have enjoyed just peanut butter on the burger, but the sriracha is a surprising balance to the sweetness of the grape jelly. I went with my family to Rehab Burger, and everybody else said my burger was better than theirs. I'm so happy I got it and I will be recommending it to everyone I know! I got it with a side of sweet potato tater tots, which by itself is enough for a second visit. The only thing I was disappointed with was the soggy onion rings but everything about the meal was worth it! I understand now why it was 45 minute wait.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PBJ Bacon &amp; sriracha burger

oAl7m7hdqcwx7ABd9a_jDA.text: Fun!  Great burger and beachy atmosphere..felt like Southern CA vacation.  No parking but good food!

W5fzrpmHymfIeEIzI3rzLw.text: If I'm in the Scottsdale area...and I'm in the mood for a burger...there is no better place than Rehab Burger!  This place is fantastic!  Every burger I've had there has been delicious, I just love their sweet potato tater tots and dipping sauces!  You will not be disappointed.

xW4IXnvC4nTJE_l5aeRhlg.text: A Scottsdale classic full of plenty of old school atmosphere. The BYOB allows you to create your own masterpiece and I like to add a shake to the mix. Not a place to bring your prom date, but covers all other occasions.

sgj4rLVlTYsYkLBbCR9qXQ.text: Food was amazing! Service was even better! The Spicy Mac n Cheese was delicious. All burgers were unique and well balance in flavor. Nothing was under-par. Highly recommend and will certainly return!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Dinner time

UNoQCIkfe6GmQXSzh28ZPg.text: Really enjoyed this place. Great service and excellent selection. Server was Jessica and she was fantastic. I'd recommend the gold medal sauce. It is amazing on the chicken wings and to put on your hamburger. My hangover burger was incredible. My friend had the Mac burger and it was a hit. My daughter had the ghost burger and thought it was okay. She loved the mac burger. Go for happy hour if you have time. If you want something unique then try the Jamaican corn. Overall- great food and fun atmosphere. I'll be back!

7WQVyd5GZYX4OL9pJEkIqQ.text: GET THE CALAMARI. I can't even. This place is an absolute MUST come back next time we're in town. SO GOOD.

2Nq773eAYtjpLsHYs_ZjEw.text: We loved this place!!!  DELICIOUS burgers!!  I had the relapse size (5 oz) Porkster Burger, which is a burger with a TON of spicy pulled pork on top on a brioche bun. It was holy yum. I got sweet potato tots for the side and I appreciated how their sweetness cooled off the spiciness of the barbecue sauce. My husband got the rehab size (10 oz) Jalepeno Popper Burger with fries and he loved it. Service was great, all the staff was friendly, the music was good and not too loud - great place for our dinner!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Porkster and Jalapeño Popper

4JCOjDBdcLm7bRnFtUw9Ag.text: Food was great tasting but my burger fell apart quite easily. Service was fantastic and our server was quite helpful with locating nice places to visit being that I wasn't from the area and only in town for the weekend.

bNuhN0RMgnG_mARl3CaZMQ.text: The PBJ burger was very good. I was hesitant to order it but it did not disappoint. Look forward to trying some more of their burger creations next time I'm in Phoenix.

tSNgzSKGeze3yoCNjWlX6A.text: Burgers are huge and tasty. Very loud restraunt but this is what it should be. I like the noise in a hip place with good beer and awesome food. Salads are enough for 2-3. You will not leave hungry.

BVNHdIvPVGp5np7Ajajemw.text: These appetizer ribs, piggies something?, are fantastic!!! The pineapple  dessert is to die for! This is a must stop by little stop!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

82XImWjpR661F-TTt5VLLg.text: Cool place with fun vibe. My friends ordered PBJ burger and the Mac Narly burger...both said they were great. Then it went off the rails....my Backyard Burger was a no show for about 15 min. Waitress apologized and said someone had touched my burger so the kitchen felt it needed to be redone. While I appreciate not eating something a stranger touched, my friends were completely done when mine finally showed and then....it was cold and overdone. The waitress was cool and adjusted the tab.

ctpjJUUhbwELS0c5aKab2g.text: Great Ghost burger! The service was amazing, really happy we went here :)

q3IWh3zQmKsVuyo_EMrnmQ.text: I was in Arizona for the weekend and happened to find this spot on yelp! It definitely didn't disappoint! I got the hangover burger....it was delish!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

34BHvqo4s8tbWXmx6_-22w.text: I ate at rehab! It was fantastic! Nicole was my server and she was absolutely the best! I had a great time and I will be back to see her again!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

5YurOMCstakAzhCZj2f8DQ.text: Came from Los Angeles first time trying this place and definitely coming back really good food and good prices for the portions! The service was really good the waitress name Kay was so nice and helpful. Wish they would open one in LA

JoBGXYcKNWvHogZbcWc6cg.text: I am retired military and needless to say I been around the world and ate at many restaurants. The food is amazing and the menu is very Inventive. It's a small Restaurant/bar but this is why it so unique. It has so much character and charisma backed by a staff that are friendly and Professional. But what stands out is the Environment that's created by the staff for the Customers. Me and my son felt welcomed and I like to thank Samm for being so nice to my son.

i205FLX4bRJNHgXSfQypUA.text: We shared the Hangover and it was really good. Burger cooked exactly MR the fries were hot and yummy, no extra charge for extra ranch OTS and the place had a super cool vibe. Happy we finally tried it and will be back for sure with the rest of my family.

Nie0PF3YUZxJSMVLXy89dQ.text: Good service, good food. Love chicken wings. Love how they decorating their place, feel like Hawaiian.

Lu6VYPEhU-V3IBtcXqnA4A.text: Love Rehab Burger have been going there for years when living in Old Town great service great food

Q5KRvkz6uElQzA02ZFvVmw.text: This place was fantastic. The space is cool and the servers/bartenders are very friendly. Everything on the menu looked outstanding and worth trying. I went with their award winning PB&J burger. It's well worth the "risk". It was outstanding as were the sweet potato tots I got with it. They also have a great cocktail menu and a decent selection of beers. I would definitely hit this place frequently if I was a Scottsdale local.

6iF7JM1Nb3lda56ts2BZAg.text: Great burgers and tots.  Seating isn't the most comfortable but a fun atmosphere.  Try the PB&J burger.  Sounds gross but is truly awesome.

R-22KdnEDrMYz2K--sXjBQ.text: Over 900 reviews? I was excited about trying this place.  When we walked in, I saw a few open tables but was told 15 mins wait... (It wasn't lunch or dinner time, i think it was around 3pm on Sunday).  After perhaps 5-7 mins wait, our table "became" available... but it seemed that particular table was available from the moment we walked in..  This place was very busy and slow service was expected.  When our server spilled a drink, she said "that's why I brought extra napkins..."    If you check in on yelp, it's $3.99 for chips and salsa.  Chips were thick and I wondered if these were homemade at this restaurant.  I ordered mimosa with cranberry juice. Never had one before and I thought I would try it. I think I prefer one with orange juice.  Now I know..  The burger I ordered was very big, I ate about 1/3 of it and couldn't eat anymore.  Very huge. Perhaps I wasn't that hungry, but I thought I had better burgers before.  Perhaps it was a bad day for me.

HrWKzl8hm4BtQSjzWFeofg.text: RBT is the place to be. Full of eclectic fun and outstanding food. The burgers are larger than life and made with love.  We ordered the chips and salsa which came to us as a thicker tortilla chip and a sweet salsa that complimented well.  We ordered the Porkster and the Bacon Cheeseburger both Relapse sized. I ate the pulled pork first thinking I could eat the burger next, but I was foolish! Add the sweet potato tots to that mess and I was so full there was little room for breathing.  Also keep in mind that Relapse size is still as big as your face, so order wise. Also a good time to go to RBT is in between the dinner and lunch rush. Even though the place serves the biggest burgers, the actual established is small. Lines form fast and in a blink.  We had great service and I also recommend the pretzel bun, just because I can and because it was delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Inside, where the magic happens.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Porkster Birger with sweet potato tots

IaanAm8cK_VsjxXT0ahV_A.text: Waiter on the patio was great. Attentive, knew the menu and answered questions. We ordered wings and the burger with brisket and wasabi mayo and a few drinks. The food was amazing! The Serrano vinegarette was hands down the best vinegarette I've ever had. Gonna stalk you to get the recipe. The burger, although we were missing the wasabi mayo due to being bun less I assume, was hands down best burger my husband has ever had. And this guy is picky! I had the wings, which I always order and seldom like, tasted fresh and juicy. All in all I would definitely come back and recommend to friends. Great job Rehab Burger!

6wiOEvYe-Y-IGeK3WaO75w.text: Great mushroom Swiss burger and great deals I. Happy Hour. Beer and burger after the ball game was like $15. Great big, huge hamburger too, I  will be coming back.

wiliDHx_bPMZFyuGjYndAg.text: I've been to rehab burger therapy several times and enjoyed it. I've even recommended people go there. It isn't the best burger in town but it's okay.  We had family plans to go last night and made a reservation a week in advance because there were going to be 8+ of us and I know how busy it would be on a Saturday.  When we arrived at the time of our reservation, we were told we hadn't made a reservation. When my mother persisted that we had made a reservation a week in advance she was yelled at the night manager and told that they only had one reservation that night and that it was filled.   ... He was extremely aggressive, condescending and frankly ridiculously rude... he didn't even take the time to actually check the reservations...   ... when he did, he discovered that we actually did have a reservation and came out trying to apologize for the wait... offering no explanation.   Turns out they had given our reservation out to another group and when he (night manager) found out about it, he yelled at the waitress who had made the mistake.   Listen, mistakes are made... that's easy to forgive.   ... But there is NO excuse for the way we were treated and particularly the way my mother was treated my the manager.   They did hustle to accommodate us and gave us free appetizers as an apology for the wait... unfortunately the damage was done.  I'll now actively not recommend burger rehab therapy and certainly won't go back.

iTBuxepUFXV2xuTUgIOQOQ.text: Amazing burgers with a wide range of unique flavors that surprise the pallet such as the peanut butter and jelly and  sriracha.  A surprisingly amazing burger. Well worth the 30 minute wait for lunch. The classic burgers were delicious if not one of the best, but you must explore the different and unique other flavors that make this place amazing. Let's not forget the French fries with the skin. You must! Eat here at least once!

dCfuUH0OIozWaWkBt59uSw.text: Rehab is one of the best burger establishments in Maricopa County.  I ordered some type of cheeseburger with thousand island dressing.  It was extremely messy and difficult to eat due to the thickly sliced pickles, but cutting it up made it easier to handle.  Some little sweet potato tots came with my burger and I also ordered a side of onion rings.  The onion rings were in my top 5.  No complaints there.  They automatically bring you ketchup, ranch, and a chipotle sauce for dipping.  Way to be on the ball, Rehab.  The sweet potato tots came with a yummy pineapple concoction for dipping.  It was good at first, but quickly became too sweet and I had to abandon it for the ranch and ketchup.  Everything was really good.  I would definitely go back.  Even their female employees were easy on the eyes.  Apparently, they are allowed to wear tight, revealing clothing to work.  Again, no complaints there.  In sum, go to Rehab if you like cute girls and awesome burgers.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Fish tacos w/ too much cabbage
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Mac w/ sweet potato tots
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Iv5mqBENqxDh3pyHRKgwQg.text: Solid little place. Burgers are delicious! I had the PB&J Bacon burger. Try it! It's salty and sweet! A bit messy but totally worth it. I got a side of sweet potato fries which are also good. However, I'd like them a little crispier so next time I might ask to have them made well done. This place also has a bunch of TVs all throughout the restaurant. It also has a full bar and seats at the bar are first come, first serve.

lfcQSkbX35fY7nSTY0rrBA.text: Great tasty burgers. I am so glad they offer the half-size version! Fabulous sweet potato tots! We'll be back!

Hk41pp19vC88EvVGGI0o-w.text: I finally made it in after seeing the incredible Yelp reviews... and wow, they did not disappoint! The depth and breadth of the menu is fantastic! You honestly cannot go wrong.  Hopefully the amazing Kay is working the bar, and you have made the proper choice of ponying up to the bar.... she is remarkable. She will even answer questions you didn't even know you had!  Enjoy! #yum

FLpNlLDaDPDrvpNvMQlerA.text: Today I'm having the pbj burger with sweet potato fries and like always great service and great atmosphere

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Today I&#39;m having the pbj burger with sweet potato fries and like always great service and great atmosphere

_3mkPz9g9llPXR_1jjB2lw.text: Absolutely an amazing burger. I decided to go with the ghost pepper burger. Oh man! Delicious but I now know the True meaning of rehab. That lasted a few days. I guess the sweats were pretty noticable because I was brought a cool tall glass of milk. I told them I was a man and didn't need milk! But asked if they could make it chocolate milk. That was the manly thing to do. She threw down on some Hersey's. I was able to save some dignity while putting the fire out. All and all, an outstanding burger and will definitely be in to get some chocolate milk again.

zROI9YQzcnAl_Xee3ouPsQ.text: Second visit two stars for service which was outstanding.  Food is just average at best. Old town has way too many options to ever go again.

hwx3PsNz6hp__IT8yOQh9Q.text: Had a veggie burger. I was not crazy about it. Seemed to be flavorless and there were cold spots due to the avocado. Lots of bread so it appeared to look really big but it didn't measure up to it. The sweet potato tots I didn't care for. However I do love regular potato tots but these didn't Measure up. I left the meal Unsatisfied.  I was very satisfied with the service. Very attentive, happy and outgoing. Fun atmosphere with sports on the TV and music

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Veggie burger

gZYv29TknFrWue2Fw9Wagg.text: Come here with a ravenous appetite because you will definitely be served a nice hefty burger!   We came to this beach-themed restaurant on a Sunday around noon. It was already buzzing with hungry rehabers. Wait time was only 15 minutes and we were seated at a communal table bench which is always fun!  We ordered calamari and mac n' cheese to start. The calamari was very heavily breaded, almost like fried fish sticks, but our friend loved them. The rehab sized mac n' cheese was delicious, but we could not even finish half of it between 3 people. I can't even imagine how big the relapse size is. I split a pretzel bun Hangover Burger and just half was a nice hearty and heavy meal for one. But because the slab of meat is thick, the inside wasn't as juicy as I hoped it would be. French fries and the tots were pretty standard. Overall, a pretty decent experience.   If you're hungry, Rehab Burger Therapy will definitely get the job done! :)

AA1yahlFl8rhMglMRpe9Hw.text: Outstanding burgers and sweet potato tots. The place has a great vibe as well. I felt like I was on a Carribean island.

5ml91V5UP2MZFNhx6-v2iQ.text: When visiting for a bachelorette weekend, we stayed in the Old Town area and were looking for something low key and delicious for dinner. Since I know on of the managers here, this was my suggestion.  Love the kitschy beach theme and that there were tables long enough for our whole group.  Everyone at our table tried something different, and thankfully there was something for everyone. The swimmers got their salads, the southern girls got their chicken sandwiches, and I got my ever holy PBJ & Bacon burger. Seriously, dont knock it til you try it. Im from MA, so I grew up eating peanut butter on burgers, but with jelly? And BACON?! I had to have it. Ah-mazing. Messy, but amazing.The sriracha is a nice touch too. It cuts through the sweetness of the grape jelly.  I highly recommend stopping in here. Thank for having us , Dave!

bY7TdGw15GhsCg_5HCej0Q.text: Since the last review I wrote over a year ago (it was delicious then), I can now say this is one of my favorite spots in AZ. The service and food are both amazing. I have yet to order something here that hasn't been delicious -- my favorites (besides the burgers, which are all amazing) are the wings, sweet potato tots, and the chili cheese fries.. SO good!!! The place gets very busy so get here early, also, all day happy hour on Thurs!

te2PtdupFz-AhEOthmbUnA.text: Best Bacon Burger in Valley!!!    Onion rings--- 10 of 10--- out of this world good !!!!  Shake--- 10 of 10---old fashioned shake-- tastes amazing   Hamburger---10 of 10--- the best for last. Just melts in your mouth. Delicious and amazing. Had their bacon burger but they have about 15 different specialty burgers

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

gO_-xBlzPt3ngojLMqV_bg.text: Nice place, if small and loud at times. Patio is nice in the winter, bar is always good. Staff has been great every time I've been in and more than willing to offer advice on the menu items...even suggesting items off-menu now and again.  Burgers are all pretty solid. I've tried a few, mostly on the spicy side, and none were all that spicy that they would scare away the average consumer. I would have liked a little more kick, but I can always add to it.  Tots are great. Other sides have always turned out well and their complement of dipping sauces are really nice.  Definitely worth a visit or two.

7xIr2WCP2JyI35T9qnlR0g.text: This place is great You have to try the pig wings they are amazing. The ghost pepper burger was great they actually cooked it the way I asked portions are huge they are not cheap at all Overall a great location great Ottmus fear great people the service was good I would be definitely coming back and I would highly recommend

FkH7gVJnfT9CxOucMKuOog.text: Great burgers and tots.  Wife and I split a burger and it was more than enough for two.  Busy but friendly staff!! Would go again

XtAKO6nMznHVD1axaPK0cg.text: Tremendous burgers... good prices.  This may be the best burger place I've ever been to.  Not much to look at but boy is the meat fresh.  Highlight of my visit to ASU to see my son.  Wish we had one back here in Boston.

Xce2yy1rj-znjtTmqpcqmA.text: I absolutely love this place!  Very relaxed atmosphere. Surfer vibe but always full.  Price a little high for burger and fries but they aren't a little flimsy patty on a normal sesame bun.  I get the small 5 oz patty but they do have a 10 oz. omg!  Different bun choices like pretzel which really give it a unique flavor.  Never been let down but today we got the large "gnarly". Which is all u want to say! It's a Big Mac on steroids!  The most delicious burger I've had here but so big couldn't fit it in my mouth!  Yum.  I was thinking about giving this a 4 star simply bc the service was just mediocre   But the food is really why we go and that deserves a 6!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. My Big Mac on steroids. Called the Gnarly!  I dare you to try and eat it without taking it apart ;)

dISaCO8zDcT4USW237kwfg.text: Great trendy hamburger restaurant.  Great place to people watch in downtown Scottsdale.  Lots of great hamburger combinations with a speciality pretzel crust. I really recommend the appetizer Nelson's Verde Con Pollo, i get every time I am there

WHhviXGzQtWKOGk-SHEx_Q.text: Great place for a fabulous burger and a beer. We had a salad and the Hawaiian Burger and left very satisfied! There are many options on the menu especially in the burger category, allowing you two sizes of meat patties and three choices of buns Loved our server, sorry I didn't get her name, who was very attentive! Great decor and atmosphere as well!

7Yl6id3t9wIHOhZGEsq2OA.text: So far so good. I had the Mac & Cheese burger on pretzel bun. I ordered the smallest one but it was still huge and i could not finish this burger. It was so so delicious tho, i had the regular fries with it. My fiance had the BBQ Burger, we ordered the smaller one and that was still a big burger also. He said it was very good also and had regular fries with his. The place was so Cali surfs up style but clean. Everyone was nice we were greeted as soon as we walked in.  Im hoping to go today since i have to drop off my rental car in Scottsdale. Im really wanting to check out the PB&J bacon burger i have been hearing so much about and jalapeno popper burger. This time ill try the sweet potatoe tots. I will be doing another review for the other burgers if i end up that way today.

uD_Z8EU1Qmw2mKNMeEMyTg.text: Plus: the burgers are excellent  Minus: the soundtrack switches from 311 to Rebelution  Plus: the burgers are awesome  Minus: beer selection is putrid   Plus: the burgers are amazing

zDq2EmKhZHBwjygWHCEcIQ.text: Stopped by Rehab on a Sunday afternoon. It was pretty busy but after a short wait we managed to snag a good spot on the patio.  I really liked the big selection of burgers and toppings possibilities that they offered. I ended up doing a BYOB (Build Your Own Burger) with cheddar, lettuce, tomato and thousand island dressing on a pretzel bun, along with the sweet potato fries. My boyfriend got the mac and cheese burger without the hot peppers and regular fries.  Our orders came out quickly. Mine came out with regular fries and when I mentioned that I had ordered the tots they brought me the tots with no hassle at all.  The burgers are big, even the smaller size. But they were very flavorful and the ingredients were fresh. The bun was nice and soft too - good bun to burger ratio.   The mac and cheese on the burger was a fun combo. They really load it on! And the tots and fries were good too.   Overall it's a lot of food, a cool laid back vibe and solid burgers for sure.

bOHLkQaBDfTxVSGcyOMqXQ.text: Great burgers... I've been a couple times already and the burgers have been consistently good!

ppAhRoD7cCEEhfzHyg8H8w.text: Wonderful food, great atmosphere, and wonderful service. Thank you from the Williams family.

vo5J920vgy6AzGeLLDQSMg.text: A very popular place in Scottsdale. We've come here twice and it was packed both times (inside and outside). The burgers here are average at best. I had tried both the Hawaiian burger and the BBQ burger. Sadly, the burgers were overcooked both times. I always like to eat my burgers medium rare...not medium well :/ I do have to say that the sweet potato tots are very tasty. Being from the tri state area, I am a bit spoiled when it comes to burgers...rehab is one of the more decent burger spots in Phoenix/Scottsdale.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian burger with sweet potato tots

G3hO-GlWtlL447NHgUL_UA.text: Great burgers and the calamari is awesome! I'm looking forward to trying their pig wings next time!
