MICCcqywDfEEGui1zus43g.text: Amazing place! It is definitely a hot spot in downtown Scottsdale. We waited almost 40 min for a table but it was worth the wait. Even though we waited that long,the food was fast and very tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac &amp; cheese burger!! Omg it was great!How to eat it? Eat the pasta on the sides, cut it in half and take a bite!

BRFEgDBNOaYxibzALWe28w.text: I was torn between a couple different burger options, and asked Kaye (server) for a number of recommendations.  I ended up with the ghost-pepper burger, which was delightfully flavorful without being crazy hot.  She was extremely helpful, including some suggestions I hadn't read on the menu (e.g. pretzel roll which was really good).  Even though it was a busy and hot night, she stopped on her way by to offer soda refills before the glass was even empty.  The burger (larger "rehab" portion) was ENORMOUS, with a ton of cheese and a bunch of sauted onions.  It was juicy and greasy, but in a very good/non-disgusting way.  The onion rings were pretty good, but not amazing.  I was intrigued by the "pot brownie" dessert, but had absolutely no room left to even consider it.  Really good food, really good service, and really good value.  If you leave there with any room left in your stomach, you've done something wrong. :)

O93q0r5VcNqboiussQHolw.text: My boys wanted a good burger for lunch today and this place surpassed it. They had the BYOD and loved every bite. The tacos and buffalo wings were good too. I tried one of each taco, fish, pork and chicken. I would get all three again. Thanks Rehab Burger Therapy for a great lunch!

9i-JTk-U5LhAwwdv9CR0KQ.text: I swear I used to LOVE this place.... it used to be amazing, but fast foward to three years later I really feel the quality has gone extremely down hill. I'm  sure I will probably never come back. But if you're new to it, and don't know what it used to be, you might like it. I might go into detail later, but all I will say for now is...you can do better Last thing... do not be fooled by the sauteed mushroom swiss burger!!! They do not know what Sautee  means,  they actually mean warmed up mushrooms

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. If you are calamari lover, don&#39;t get this...you&#39;ll be super disappointed

3e5YkT1e75gvaQUgJfL5lw.text: This is probably one of my favorite burger joints in the whole US!! They have a really great variety of amazing burgers. I've been here several times and I still can't wait to return every time. You can't go wrong here! This is the first restaurant I recommend to anyone asking for a bite to eat in Scottsdale.

YEuiuMvQpYSU8JzxSmaKuA.text: Rehab seems to be the answer to all my burger prayers. Huge portions, and the food is amazing. There can be a bit of a wait sometimes, and I'm actually not sure about the reservation policy. I have a really hard time deciding what I want because everything is so good. Seriously. The Mac n Cheese is awesome. I live further away from Rehab now, but I am already looking forward to my next trip there.

h9pKVzFopRXH5A66UYCW5Q.text: Went about 2 weeks ago because my Godfather took us! I got the Hawaiin burger and it was super good!! I added jalapenos to it because I lvoe spice. This place has a great atmosphere and fresh food. Really good and different burgers. Will be back soon. Also the price is fair!!

gFlYPBn2kqYiXu7BtaEhEw.text: Really delicious burgers and sweet potato fries! Kudos for having gluten free buns as well :)

xekC1Adbmv8Rve4fHceXhQ.text: Great food, great service... Awesome beach vibe! I have the hangover burger and shared some wings. Both were phenomenal. I really enjoyed the reggea playlist! Great spot to chill and eat after a long day at work!

EIzdCcC6IdWObF74Yl6EiA.text: Love rehab they are always busy, because it is so good! It's nice and convenient in old town!

ktKHX_x6ZYyacNZQH-0D3w.text: A good hamburger is one of my favorite meals.  Throw in some good sides and done!!  I ordered the Know Poblano burger and my wife ordered a basic salad with chicken.  Also got sweet potato tots and french fries to go with it.  The burger was amazing-perfectly cooked and the toppings did not outweigh the taste of the meat.  And the tots were on another level.  No complaints whatsoever about Rehab Burger.

i7zarNwZwPFRI0K3fBERgA.text: Awesome vibe, comfortable casual, delicious burger topped with pork!!! Great/friendly bartender(Courtney) made the night even better. Overall great experience.

d8-G2kHEZ6if0tRIJnTjYg.text: Burgers are pretty good!! Very unique and tasty but huge!! Been here a few times it's a good place to go for some comfort food.

ExT43mr9w97UAphGpHPKMw.text: Visited this place in Scottsdale recently and it was so good! They were packed even at 4pm on a Sunday. They have some really unique menu items (I had the peanut butter, jelly & bacon burger), delicious!! They need to bring some locations to Dallas/Ff Worth!

Tk7p8Q6D8yn73viVsDtfUw.text: PB&J burger is incredible. Outdoor seating was nice and the waitress was super attentive. Was very pleased with the experience.

wMQz8EoIh8QO9xyuVyo0oQ.text: Fantastic burgers and really tasty tots and fries! Tried the spicy mac n cheese and the ghost burger, both were really delicious. The mac n cheese on the mac n cheese burger could have gotten serious props on its on, but being on a burger just elevated its creamy, cheesy flavor even more. Ask for the diablo hot sauce to try on the ghost burger (SO FREAKIN GOOD).   The fries and sweet potato tots were also super yummy. Great potato-y flavor in both, and they went really well with the huge variety of sauces the waiter brought for dipping. Speaking of the waiter, the service was also very good, with the manner being a little casual and brusque, but everything we ordered and subsequent requests were treated graciously, and brought out very quickly. He also took the down to sit down (casual manner I was talking about), and explain which were the best and most popular burgers. He said the PBJ bacon burger is the most popular, but my friend thought it sounded gross so we didn't order it since we had decided to split them.   We got the smaller (relapse) size on both, and they were more than big enough, especially given the VERY generous portions of mac n cheese on the spicy mac burger and guac on the ghost.   Overall, a very well-rounded establishment with very good food. If you are a burger lover, you'll love this place, and it's easy to see why it was voted best burger in AZ last year. It was even most recently featured on the travel channel (last Sunday I believe).   PS Get the burgers on the pretzel bun!!

wRRDwlAwehrntPQchRkl-Q.text: Fantastic!   I have seen and heard about this cute burger joint for a long time and finally tried it the other day. We wanted to pick up burgers and fries for the championship march madness game and this place did not disappoint!   We had: 2 bacon cheeseburgers (one with an egg)  Poblano burger  2 orders of crispy fries onion rings wedge salad   Every single thing was delicious! The burgers were cooked to perfection and the fries as well as the bacon on our burgers were crispy and yummy. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because I didn't get the egg on my burger and the food wasn't ready when I was supposed to pick it up.   A great place for good food and a cool atmosphere; they have themselves a new frequent customer.

X7wDMZwqNDdoi3XaEhITwQ.text: This is the place to get a REAL BURGER... they have about 20 speciality selections. This is the best PB & Jelly burger ever! Always great food & service.

nYaE9Ge34L4y5h6q2GNsLw.text: This is a really well run restaurant, and creative. The host was really on top of his game during a busy dinner period,  and the service was fast. But, with so many great places in old town this just doesn't quite measure up.  The alcohol selection leaves a bit to be desired in terms of variety.   There are however, a lot of different, and unique burgers here. I tried the PB and J burger. I was hesitant to try it because I wasn't convinced the textures/flavors would win me over like it has for others who reviewed this restaurant.  Personally, the thickness of the peanut butter made it difficult for me to enjoy. I wouldn't order it again,  but it was worth trying.    Overall,  its a nice place to stop in if you're feeling adventurous and craving a different kind of burger from the norm.

4WvzoolK6La1bcXlUmAkLA.text: We went here right after a spring training game and it was packed, as expected. We had a 45 minute wait but were able to stand at the bar and have a drink while watching the NCAA tourney. The staff was very friendly despite is kind of being in the way!  When we got seated we got our food pretty quickly which was surprising given how busy it was. The burgers we had were great and you can choose a pretzel bun which was amazing.   I couldn't resist and had to order the mac N' cheese burger. It was good, a bit rich but it did have Mac N' cheese on it. Overall it was much easier to handle than I anticipated and I was very pleased.   I'll be visiting again while in Scottsdale. If recommend it to anyone in the area looking for a good burger and good prices.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Mac N&#39; cheese burger with a salad to try and compensate for clogging an artery!

CdZl6K0yxMF0sHw67JDaow.text: Great burger joint.  Party of six and we all had something different . The two best burgers (my opinion) were the bleu burger and the bbq burger. Big portion sizes and friendly service.

Dj-zgKrZ8t_s_MNTBUzrLg.text: Loved the burger!  Messy just the way I like it.  I had the bbq. Burger with all the fixings.

tfTWiojwrH6WwoC_UF7q-A.text: Stopped by on a Saturday afternoon while waiting for an oil change. Just wanted a good burger, and was definitely pleasantly surprised! I got the Turkey Burger, which was phenomenal, and not dry at all for a turkey burger, and my boyfriend got the Bacon & Blue. Both were amazing! P.S Get the sweet tots! Conner, our server, was speedy and personable! Definitely a good vibe if you're looking for a chill island-type burger joint.

EBLc7cIfHbVSAtcugD9lJA.text: The food and service was fantastic!  I got my food very quickly considering how busy they were on a Sunday at 1:30pm. I would highly recommend this place.

0TSomZb7U80ssFhi8WyJfg.text: over rated, over priced...snobby.  burgers are o.k. but not worth their prices.  Just because of location, I guess they can overcharge.

O82Mhf4GhKkemZMpfAePMA.text: This place was average.  I had the Hawaiian burger which was pretty dry and lacked flavor.  Server never came around to ask for more sauce or to check on us.  After we paid he told us to let him know if we needed anything.  That's not very helpful when you are about to leave.  Try doing that during the meal.

HAR0fL94JNspZK2BZNPQ2w.text: Really was craving a burger after hours of hiking. Had to take my dog with me cuz I felt bad that I left it at home all day. So I called and asked if they were pet friendly and they said yes on the patio. So we we went and our waiter was super nice, and quick. I noticed a burger called the PB&J burger was was taken back. I ignored it and moved on but when I asked what was good he said that was their most popular burger. So out of optimism I decided to try it and oh my gosh it was the best thing ever. There is no way to eat it clean so don't get it on a first date but when your with friends it's totally fine . It was so good and the sweet potato tots were a perfect side. Overall my experience and the food was amazing and I can't wait to be back!

4H6lLVhh81NuvBPE9EB-XQ.text: Awesome specialty burger place. Sweet potato tot's & onion rings were super good. Son got the PBJ & Bacon burger. He loved it. Definite beach atmosphere at this place & the service was nice.

QGhjf-4aadMJ9HHltKOyaA.text: We just had to go since we were in town for a therapy conference. We sat down and immediately saw a Rose All Day sign with sparkling rose for $20 a bottle. Then we had some really great service, kind, fun and attentive. We ordered spicy Mac and cheese burgers which were super rich but good. Had a great meal and lots of fun.

jL8eBSI_8QuynPQ__Z_8HQ.text: Was starving and came in here for lunch. Cute little beach theme beatnik place. Well...Burger and margarita it was...and did NOT disappoint! Also bartender Cortney was friendly and sweet. I am allergic to high fructose corn syrup. I asked her if she knew what was in the mix. She right away pulled the mix and showed me the label. Quality ingredients and Patron was on special. Oh hell yes! Burger was cooked perfectly and fries were yummy not greasy. It is SO NICE to see a kick back place use QUALITY ingredients. The burger meat is a mix of balanced flavors.  Coming back for sure. Keep it up guys! P.S. the music is perfect mix of beach and mello reggae. Fab. The owner of this business is a genius.

F3k9KNGJzV8jDzvB2ALmCQ.text: Incredible! We waited to get in at 11 Pm (when they opened) one of the first people to be seated and the places was packed. They were quick to seat and serve but still friendly and great service! Everything from appetizer, burger and sides where amazing. Definite must try. I had the bacon blue which was tender and cooked just right. Macaroni burger instagram worthy!  You won't regret trying this place.

7hJlHmZG0cHvMTiX-GrbJA.text: My girlfriend and I arrived in Phoenix around 11 am and decided to look for a place to eat for lunch in the Scottsdale area. This place stood out among the results and we were definitely not disappointed.  I got the porkster, my girlfriend got the wedge.  We also ordered a small side of spicy mac and chilli cheese fries.  Everything was absolutely delicious.  The burger was cooked to perfection and the pulled pork was so tender.  Visiting from Chicago, I'd happily return again!

0BNcJcWrFdhi5NkXewYCjw.text: Went here for the first time on Saturday. They were decently priced, especially for how big their burgers were! It was a nice little area, it had plenty of parking across the street. Husband had the PB&J burger which he loved. I was the simple soul and just got a cheese burger. We both loved our choices!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

e9BdYGykAFRmDNaCyqvm_Q.text: Oh my gosh, this was only my first time eating here, but it was sooo good you guys. We decided to come here thanks to you fellow Yelpers, and ordered the much raved about PB&J with bacon burger. I ordered it with the sweet potato tots, and the Chipotle aioli. The sauce alone was amazing, but then with the tots, it added some great spiciness. And okay so the burger was AMAZING. I could not even finish it all, and I got the 5oz (other option being the 10oz). I was hesitant at first, because what a weird combination! But PB&J is a classic, and when you add bacon the smokiness takes it to a whole other level. Our waitress was attentive, and the ambiance is fun. I went on a Sunday evening and didn't have to wait, but I imagine this place can get super packed because one visit just isn't enough!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J Bacon Burger with sweet potato tots. Special cheese-steak burger with onion rings in the back!

6RfaEEryfGJqJnqkJZV08g.text: Let me just say that if I was ever in a burger rehab therapy clinic these would be the burgers I'd want for my meds. I bookmarked this place on Yelp a long time ago but since we live in Maricopa and work in Chandler we rarely ever venture to Scottsdale. But the other day we were like "F-it, let's do it!"  There were no wait times when we arrived, which is nice. They have patio seating but the decor was so fun we opted to sit inside. This place was completely decked out in beach decor. We truly felt like we were sitting in one of our favorite food shacks in San Diego off mission beach. We ordered some chips and salsa to start since we had our Check-In coupon from Yelp. If you've read my other reviews you know how super picky I am about chips AND salsa. To my surprise both were great!! Usually there is always one I'm a little "eh" about but at Rehab both were really good! For the burgers I ordered the Hawaiian Burger and added guacamole and my boyfriend got the Ghost Burger and we both decided to try their sweet poTOToes. (Yes that's how it's spelt!) Holy beefy amazingness batman! These burgers were delicious! They were perfectly cooked to order and I love the traditional buns they use. The tots came with this chipotle aioli sauce that was a "I'm-ganna-just-drink-this-sh*t" kind of good. My only regret is not being able to finish all my food! You know where you're eating and you know you're too full but you keep saying to yourself "just one more bite..." Yeah...that was me. It was so good but it was so much food. We all know burgers and fries/tater tots don't reheat well at all so I knew even though I was taking leftovers it wouldn't get eaten. So sad... At least my boyfriend ate all of his. Service was great too! Drinks always stayed filled, food came out at a normal time frame and the staff was very friendly. Overall this was fantastic experience and we'll definitely be making our back here soon with some friends. So should you go here? Yes. Should you come hungry? Yes. Should you expect to feel like an overstuffed thanksgiving turkey ready to bust? Yes. Will you love it? Absolutely.

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Rehab Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Yummy chips and salsa to start. So good!

srQmkNIuX7rLB8HD0j_oSQ.text: After making the move to the Scottsdale area from Indiana just a couple days ago, me and my dad were looking for a spot to grab a great burger and beer. Once I began my search the name Rehab Burger Therapy caught my eye. I read the reviews from fellow Yelpers and couldn't help but make the trip to try it out.  Most every review I read had something great to say about the PBJ & Bacon burger, which is what I went with. Now let me remind you that I had already had the best peanut butter burger on earth, the Duane Purvis from the famous Triple XXX in West Lafayette, IN. Don't believe me, just ask any other Purdue alum & they will tell you the same. Although it's hard for me to say it is better than the Duane Purvis, it was damn good. I was a little skeptical about the jelly & bacon part of the equation, but it was a great compliment. An unusual burst of flavor that most any would enjoy, especially if you're the adventurous type.   As far as beer goes, I just had a simple Bud Light. I would like to see them incorporate more beers into their selections. Perhaps some beers from local micro-breweries, since that is all the craze at the moment. But it was nice a cold, just the way I like it.  Safe to say I'll be back soon to try out one of their other numerous burger options!

6ducVxMKV0AlwYMPE_jk0A.text: If your looking for a good or unique burger this would be the place to go. This was my first time there and I played it safe and got the mushroom swiss burger, which was very good and tasted like a good burger you can get most places. The people I was  with though really went all out and got some of the crazy unique burgers on the menu. Like getting a friend egg on the burger. If I ever return I will def be trying something more unique. I am not usually a sweet potato fan, but the sweet potato tots were actually extremely good and the sauces paired with them really gave them a unique but awesome flavor.

Elia8aMrQf9MkxlxUoLVBQ.text: Always amazing.  Never disappoints. The bartenders are always super friendly, helpful, and give great recommendations. The PB & J burger is one of the best I've ever had. I've been here about 10 times and have always been impressed. Thanks Rehab, keep up the good work!

XlCNE5wKuaUJcpbYiDMVtg.text: My favorite burger place in town.  All of the burgers are great and even their wings are amazing.

2cixuejockyqjkimmiqujQ.text: WATCH YOUR CREDIT CARD. After lunch, the server came by to collect my credit card. She had one other wallet folder (bill) in her hand and walks out of the gate of the business (seated outside) and around the corner of the building an meets a waiting blue van. She has both bills (my card), up in the window of the van with a female driver. Went back in and asked for a manager and a lady came up and said she could help. I said are you the manager, she said no but she has worked here a while and could help. I said I wanted a manager and she said it would be 20 minutes. Then a guy appeared who said he owned the place (Wiley), and said he could take care of the issue, but didn't have a card. I told him the story and he would speak with her. Then he told me that someone maybe forgot their credit card and she was running it out (NO WAY).  No by the owner to take my phone number or for me to get his. Thought it was a poor response from the restaurant owner.

VUrG5Os3v9KH4YkCj6-QRA.text: Disappointing.  Medium rare burgers requested were Cooked VERY well done.  I even considered returning it (which I've never done before) but it took 25 minutes for us to get it in the first place (no wonder it was so dry!) and my stomach was already  grumbling.   The service overall was okay but one weird thing was the waitress ran up to us when our mouths were full and said "how's the first bites? Delicious? Okay!" And then walked away before we could say anything.  Maybe we came on an off day but it seems like they are just hiding poorly cooked burgers with a lot of fancy toppings.  I want to add a pro so I'm not just being negative because the staff was nice:  very dog friendly patio, we had 3 different servers bring us water bowls for the pup.

V2u9IkXHk8J6qbANypejtA.text: I went again yesterday, and had a totally different expierence. Everyone was awesome, instead of making my one I just ordered the huge rehab sized Mac Gnarly Burger with fries and had an infinitely better time/meal.

fXjRGRYXrP5A5GPT4nzXwQ.text: Food is amazing!  My boyfriend had the PB&J siracha burger which I turned me nose up to until I tried it, it was GREAT..  Portions are huge so show up with a big appetite or plan on taking a to go box.

rqZKtZ_34QnjeYMXAs6Dag.text: This place is awesome! Great service and the food was excellent!!  Couldn't decide what to have and our server Cheryl was very helpful with recommendations. Highly recommend this place and super laid back environment!!

xF2U-xnPfM8eSqadyddH_A.text: Wow, had the PB&J Bacon Burger...and I would have never ordered it had it not been for what I saw in the other YELP reviews....it was amazing.   The combination of PB&J with Sriracha and bacon is out of this world.   Very messy but worth it (not first date food.)    My husband had the Porkster Burger and he also gave it a thumbs up.  Do not miss Rehab if you are in downtown!

Jcs_aMm1F8KXp3cGlc_E7Q.text: AMAZING FOOD!!!    I got the PB&J Bacon burger...heavenly!!  My husband had the Porkster Burger...also great!!!  The Sweet PoTOToes were amazing as well.  The dessert just topped everything off!!  The servers were busy, but very attentive and friendly!!   We will be coming back here again for sure!!

oJfABnbMtuqfNfyX5c7RYw.text: Just visited today for lunch. I can't remember the last time I saw a place with every single table full. Food was really good. My pretzel bun was my only complaint. The bottom half was a bit soggy. I highly recommend the sweet potato tots. Service was great even so far the whole place works off of team service. My husband thought that something was missing on his burger. The manager immediately noticed and came over to see if everything was okay. We were in and out within a reasonable amount of time. We went here based off of the thousand plus Yelp reviews. Glad we went :)

_AR1coyWfKByKhXknRwq0w.text: Great food very juicy burgers everyone just loved them and can't wait to come back for more

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Great salads
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon rehab very filling

WlmMaIfGzbZpnAxp2xZ_6w.text: Great place and great food! Loved it! Burgers are amazing! The service is good. Just be aware the place is small. So if someone has a party reservation of at least 15, it can take up the whole restaurant. We had a party of 6 but Rehab was waiting on a bday party so we had to sit at the bar. I think they shouldn't offer huge party reservations on Saturday evenings but  it happens.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

X8Z6xB1HBARq-7kk6LjwUw.text: The peanut butter jelly burger is so gooooood!!! The salads are huge and yummy! The service was a bit slow but the food made it worth it. Who thought jelly and peanut butter would go good with a burger

Oz6-Wb91Ud2tOpi9d2jhyA.text: This place is great! Decided to go here on a whim when family was in town and was not disappointed. I had the "Hangover Burger" (the one with the fried egg) and it was delicious. Had the sweet potato tater tots as well and couldn't stop eating them! Great atmosphere and fun environment for all ages. Even if you don't like burgers, there's something for everyone. The kids got quesadillas and enjoyed them as well. The Long Island iced teas were spot on, and our waitress Kaye was super attentive and friendly. Her hair flip wasn't too bad either.  I will definitely be coming back here and can only hope they expand to chandler and tempe as well. My one recommendation would be to put the Long Island iced teas in the bigger water glasses. Ha ha. But seriously, check this place out!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Here is the hangover burger, with a side of their awesome onion rings

UBlEQSNkWExiyYqObeQ22A.text: I love this place!! Awesome beach vibe and chill little spot for drinks and tasty food. Service has been great every time. The PB&J Burger is seriously out of this world! TRY IT! Get it with the pretzel bun...You'll be hooked!

_f4HiFRYuyxDB0LfecdxEg.text: It was a rainy Sunday and you can say we were craving some good old burgers and fries. What we discovered was the good, the burgers, and not so old food. Let me explain! We had some NEW...creative style burgers...the Hawaiian and the Hatch burger (Relapse). Both were delicious. Robin, our waitress, is awesome. She brought us extra sauces so we can try them as it was our first time there. Although her recommendation to get the mix strawberry/chocolate milkshake didn't quite turn out as well (can't blame her...we were imagining a chocolate covered strawberry mix), she was a good sport. Robin offered to get us a new one or to try their Pot Brownie without us even asking. She definitely went above and beyond.   Go!! Great service...good food...prepare to have a food baby o.O!!! AWK

5WWcVuH0U5LMM6aVvBI3oA.text: Scottsdale location messed up our take out order for the 3rd time--I'm over this restaurant.

2eXortCe2XLNVzjDAjcL9A.text: Burger was delicious , add pretzel bun ! Well worth it! Although it was a Saturday night at 7:00 pm and  the kid working the front told us it would be an hour plus wait and it wasn't . Either people left or he underestimated . But we were seated pretty quick.

z1JZ2nZMZRCgDQlaI6FBDA.text: Awesome experience here! A little unsure about the PB and J Bacon burger when I saw it on the menu but it turned out to be an excellent decision when I was licking my fingers at the end. You got to try this one!

zpbaiYpkzBQkHKdGtXZorg.text: Oh my Goodness, absolutely excellent food and service! Our waitress Nicole really knew her stuff!

7_mWQ1yL3A8EHBV4K8Ku0w.text: Haven't been here in about six months and am wondering why. We ordered the Hawaiian and Jalapeno burgers and they were on point! Burgers came out quick, hot and prepared exactly as we ordered. Frankie, the manager, was excellent as was our server. We will be back, and it won't take 6 months!!

9qxKOIUZkKTEBj_oBD-O5g.text: Had the jalapeno popper burger and the Jamaican corn ! Delicious ! Will definitely be returning , service was great and good amazing !

DPAvxVam75zn5UgSaUmcNQ.text: I've had a couple different burgers from this place always cooked to perfection. Was a big fan of the Mac and cheese they have as well. I would literally eat a bowl on mac and cheese with there burger patties right in top. It was pretty busy both times I went, but that always a good sign because it means GOOD FOOD! The waitresses were knowledgeable of the menu when I asked for suggestions the first time I went as well. Good place for just chilling and good eats. Kind of has a lounge feel to it. No so much a sports bar. Would recommend as a great spot to bring fam and friends who enjoy a great burger.

B90BDzbswAJEwz3CMcMbhA.text: Best burger  & great sides !!!!  Huge and crazy selection like peanut butter & jelly burger.  Nummm!

UwTaVJNgeL4cMSJKU-8oSg.text: Awesome burgers! Definitely recommend the jalapeno popper burger on a pretzel bun. Fun environment & nice staff. The dessert that had hot brownies, ice cream, marshmallow fluff and peanut butter was AMAZING. We split it amongst 3 people and we all enjoyed it!

YiAtdY-DGGXHL_mOyoEWoQ.text: Tons of choices and lots of unique hamburger variations to choose from.  Awesome service from our amazing waitress.  Management is superb as well.   Looking forward to our next visit!

CvPt0m5-yLVI68dLRGtVxw.text: There are so many burger joints all over the place and this one does not disappoint at all.  Super laid back and easy going. Not quite fast food, but not high end.    The sweet poTOToes are excellent, but warning: you get a pound of tots and they aren't the greatest warmed up if you take them with you so I advise sharing.  The burgers are enormous and they offer a wide variety of options including different types of meats, buns, condiments, etc.    Happy Hour deals are mediocre, but if you want a good burger and you are in the area, this is a decent spot.

_yFfwlC1l72dQPzBhZIbgA.text: What can be said that hasn't already been said? Great food, fun environment, good service - there really wasn't anything bad about it. We had a hot dog, a plain ol' cheeseburger and a hatch burger  - all if which were delish. The fries have a unique salty/spicy flavoring that drew me in and I couldn't stop eating them. Also tried the sweet potato tots and the chips and salsa. The chips and salsa was some of the best we've had in Scottsdale, hands down! The tots were a fav with our kiddos. Our daughter told the waiter she was giving this place "21 stars" -- We will definitely be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Big screen TVs that line the walls
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Interior of restaurant

Ii2nrZGVdR7vLTzG7PAwqQ.text: Lively atmosphere....great burgers....I enjoyed tacoders...cod tacos. Sit inside or outside.. Happy hour all day....will come back soon.

NucsNKXZLSc0mxM9MYIy6w.text: Rehab Burger Therapy?   I may Need to go to rehab soon because this place could get Addicting.   Sitting there among the hanging cruiser bikes and surfboards, it feels like you've left Scottsdale and entered a beach bar somewhere. The atmosphere is laid back without sacrificing service. The staff is quick and friendly. Their efficiency was impressive.  I ordered the 5 oz. Backyard BBQ burger. It's stacked with two big, delicious onion rings, Colby jack cheese and loaded with bbq sauce (almost too much sauce, if there is such a thing).   The fries were fresh, and crispy. The pickle spear that comes with the burger is no slouch either. It's not a limpy, weak pickle spear. It's stout and crunchy. Yup... I just complimented a pickle.   If I knew therapy could be this good, I'd have gone years ago.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Backyard BBQ burger

HXclBf1GQdas8jplsEZGow.text: This is our current favorite burger place and has held that title for us these past few years.  That's saying a lot, since we eat burgers in Nashville, Dallas, California and wherever else we may end up.  I could classify my husband as a burger connoisseur.  Burgers are one of his four food groups.  This Reggae playing, Island Beach themed establishment is one busy place.  Get there early if you have a preference for inside or patio seating.  The wait for the food is always worth it!  Rehab has a large selection to choose from and they don't only offer Burgers, which they serve just about anyway one could dream up, (i.e. PBJ Burger, the Farmer, the Porker), they have salads, sandwiches and awesome service by an excellent, humorous, and attentive wait staff.    I usually build my own burger, choosing the Brioche Bun, which is always fresh and not in any way a bland old white burger bun.  One may also opt for a Wheat or Pretzel Bun, which I want to try every time, but I can't seem to refuse the yummy Brioche.  My husband ordered an 'un-hinge your jaw' humongo burger which he thoroughly enjoyed.  To name a couple of their quite delightful sides:  sweet potato tots and deep fried Cajan and Butter seasoned fresh Corn on the Cob.  This isn't an ordinary nor a boring burger place.   It's a good thing Rehab is 4 states away from us!  This is the kind of restaurant where most everyone leaves wishing they hadn't eaten SO much.  Good is not the proper adjective to describe this 5 Star Burger Bar.

qyeCgL6s4LhKwa-wFRvqpQ.text: Had the Spicy Mac n Cheese burger.  I was not prepared for the mound of mac n cheese that accompanied my burger.  It was just the right amount of spicy and absolutely delicious.  Went with onion rings on the side--equally delicious, and everything was served with ranch and ketchup.  Trivial to some but a great touch to me:  the ranch was fantastic.  Our server was wonderful and was really knowledgeable about the menu, answered all our questions, and was generally awesome.  I'm only in the area for a few months, but I will definitely be hitting this place up again before I leave.

pAM_KZTgTwiOtpMiSuIjTA.text: Wow.... Wow... Wow.... this place is gooooood!!!! Had a bacon and blu burger with pretzel bun. The burger was delicious. Far exceeded my expectations. Let a friend has a bit of my burger, and I almost didn't get it back from them. Just Amazing... have to come back here again.

RPAIv_hmZPy0aKz-GmGABg.text: I really liked this place, especially liked the name of the place, very clever. A friend of mine and I stopped in for happy hour and enjoyed a couple of drinks that were both good and reasonably priced. We came on a Monday at 1pm and left around 2:30ish. There was quite a crowd there during that time, many of whom were enjoying some really nice looking burgers. What I liked most was that the patrons were made up of people of all ages, young to old. The ambiance is inviting and easy to enjoy, they have indoor and outdoor seating with shade. The waiter we had was great, no complaints. The only potential problem I can see here is parking. We parked directly north of the restaurant in a dirt patch. Other than that, it didn't look like much parking was available.

BC2OJuRbrR2li-dE-G23OQ.text: You know when you have to wait 30 minutes on a Tuesday at 3 PM there must be something good going on. It's True. The food here was fantastic. The PBJ Bacon burger was my favorite, although I also enjoyed everything else we tried: calamari, chips and salsa, and the jalapeno popper burger.   The service was a bit slow, but that's my only complaint.

YKppldRqZ-uPxS2qqdADjQ.text: Such a cool spot in old town, and one of the best burger experiences I have had! We waited about 40 minutes during prime time on a Saturday night. We ended up sitting on the patio (table of 7) during an awesome AZ Winter night. It is not a huge place, so I am guessing a wait is pretty common. I like the semi-tiki theme and am kicking myself for not trying a mai tai or one of their cocktails. I went with a bottle of red stripe from there decent beer menu. My 5 star rating is all about the food. There were at least 8-10 burgers I considered ordering. I went with the spicy mac and cheese burger. Mac, bacon, jalepenos- whats not to love? It was everything I thought it could be and more. Everyone at the table had a burger, many varieties, and they were all a hit. Big flavor, quality toppings, and solid fries on the side as well. When I get that burger craving, the hangover burger is the next one I am crossing off the list. Thanks for the rehab!

fgwYTb_eBxaGEEVZZhprMA.text: Always such good food and their mixed drinks are to die for! Plus super friendly staff and the restaurant is always clean!

C_CRiRuxeQOa5JDyo7-Iuw.text: I consider myself a burger connoisseur and this place definitely ranks up there. Great selection and great quality of burgers. Unless you are a huge football player, the 5oz will suffice. Brioche bun has good integrity. Patty came as ordered (medium) - not overdone as found at many places. Onion rings are epic as are the chicken wings. Will definitely be back!

ZHat-EVwZppMNyq6waHTtQ.text: Yummmmmmm. I ordered the backyard BBQ burger, it taste like what its named lol. So good, I'm so lucky to live right down the street!

ePiT7Zjm4bq6-KIwQEAGqA.text: If you're into a huge variety of burgers (with ability to substitute red meat for a Turkey Burger, Grilled Chicken Breast, Beef Chorizo Patty or Veggie Burger) and BONUS, it doesn't cost extra, then you'll love Rehab Burger! I know if I come here hungry I'm going to leave with some leftovers; they do not skimp on the portions. My husband got the Ghost Burger and he absolutely devoured it as he loves spicy things and has gotten it twice in a row now; I got the Hawaiian burger and that with the pineapple teriyaki just bring all of the flavors together so well.  They have a huge variety of sauces, their french fries are out of this world, and their drinks are delish!  The place itself has such a cool ambiance. The way it's decorated-it's like you stepped into a restaurant off the beach somewhere, and the staff have such a laid-back vibe and are so helpful with menu suggestions, they definitely have our business and we will keep coming back for a long time to come!

xcD7jfezIruAEB3fUacUQw.text: The service was mediocre and unfortunately the burger wasn't much better. It was my first visit and I tried the 'ghost' burger. The patty was nothing special and it had no spice whatsoever. I was meeting friends and the waitress just let us sit there with nothing to drink because we had already received our checks. I will not be back. So not impressed.

ak1X2p-Ob17Z9yJQb4fvoQ.text: Last time I was here I took my daughter and I made a big mistake. I should have shared my burger with her, we had a lot of wasted food because we don't eat a ton of food. What we did have was really great, the burgers were cooked great, the fries were really great...it's hard to mess up fries but it happens...  It was the middle of the day and it was slow which is the way I like it. We were in and out quickly, the service was friendly and the place has a great eclectic atmosphere. Check it out.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

N32CU1fSlpfIFuzx9eIxZQ.text: This place is awesome! I had the cheeseburger on a pretzel bun and it was sooo good! Can't wait to try it again

qi-UkaYJvygLSRZdYff_dg.text: Brought my friend here earlier tonight and she loved it! My burger was so delicious as always! And I'm obsessed with the sweet potato tater tots, they are my fav! The vibe here is so awesome and I love everything about this place. Oh and it's always busy so just plan on there being a wait

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Obsessed with their sweet potato tater tots! And the burgers are always amazing!

6Vz7DwsptBQQ6jT43reQJw.text: Loved the mushroom & Swiss as well as poblano if you want something spicy... Very hip atmosphere, feels like on vacation.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Poblano burger

MgiuVSuEmri5YA_5YyJ39Q.text: Going to keep it simple. The BEST burger I've had. I mean that as in a fancy burger, not one I made at home. I ordered the Sunday Special "Mac n Cheese" burger. AMAZING! Also, sweet potato tater tots. YUM. The service was great and friendly too. Only 4 stars because I wasn't able to order any adult beverages since I was going to work... But it was a nice place, cheerful folks and GREAT food. I'm totally coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac n Cheese burger

8adb_dYrfcd8mdZfnJGatg.text: Peanut butter and jelly burger with bacon and sriracha? Yes please! The burger was awesome but if I have one knock it would be the fries not being hot. Warmish is not good for fries, it was pretty busy so we didn't make a stink.  Great place with a lot of character and attentive servers.

EF1uAfzc2SCiJSOecRjCcQ.text: Burger joint in the heart of Old Town with a surfing theme.  I don't eat red meat or pork so I'm always search of a good turkey burger and Rehab did not disappoint.  The menu is pretty extensive and offers everything from your basic fries and sweet potato tots to clams to wings to beef burgers to fish and chicken burgers.  When I'm starving, my eyes are often bigger than my stomach so I opted for a side salad, half order of buffalo wings, and turkey burger with cheddar on a wheat bun.   The salad was made with mixed greens and tasted really good.    I had the wings cooked extra crispy and they came out perfectly.  They were cooked in a buffalo sauce that had really good flavor.  It had little pieces of garlic mixed in the sauce.  So far, these are definitely the best wings I've tasted in Scottsdale.    The turkey burger consisted of a really good size patty that was super juicy (uncharacteristic for turkey burgers).  It was definitely the best turkey burger I've had in Scottsdale.  If you are search of a nice, tasty burger joint with a beachy, hipster vibe, then look no further.  Definitely check out this place!

hMBw9Rn3YgOtMDqRXoFiMg.text: Well...it doesn't happen often but when it does its AWESOME! 5 stars easy! Killer burger, huge portions, sauces were amazing, and the entire staff was so fricken friendly dang! Arow you made my day 4sho! I had the Ghost Burger and it was phenomenal, with super delicious guacamole and just spicy enough to taste good!!! Will be back if I'm in town!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ghost Burger!! Yum!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Sitting at my table facing the bar. Not a big place but sooooo good

7oVJyjcCM8Y39wekanBedw.text: Yummy. My son's first burger and he's 14.  He ordered the mac and cheese burger and we split it. The mac and cheese was so good.   It had a kick to it.  My younger ones had a grilled cheese and bbq wings.   Both were so tasty.   The wings also had a kick. It was sweet, tangy and spicy.  Just the way we line it. The outside had a crunch yet moist inside.   The grilled cheese was in thick pieces of bread, like Texas toast.  Great crunch. Cheesy. Your choice of any cheeses. We also had a side of sweet potato tots.  Those were also very good.   Very good customer service. It was busy and our waiter kept up very well.  No errors at all and friendly.

dxG63jQrtAY0VUZQk_3nyg.text: Their wings are the bomb!! Good pricing Their burgers keep you sooo full cause they're so big Oh and ps bring back the loco Moco burger pls It was gone before I could taste it Rehab is my fav for burgers thou!  And I love that they play rebelution and iration. They play my California reggae music Makes me feel home !

sqh0FV5tLJ5zDyRUHnFTbg.text: Super fun place and OMG the burgers are fun, creative and memorable. Definitely a great place to step out of your comfort zone.  Hubs had the PB&J with a side house salad. It was messy in a wonderful way. I dared the McNarly (see photo). It was huge! Totally doable if you pass on the buns. I'd probably do salad instead of fries, or maybe tater tots.   It was Sunday brunch and the brunch bevy's were also great. We will be back soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

zoFCVtR74uEZbVfoBKoBLA.text: Hangover & Porker burger so good !! perfect sweet tater tots Awesome Burgers !!!  Burgers are around $10 a plates ....fries included  :)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Porkster burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover Burger n Sweet tots

BZKeVlOKq4yfkLTOf77trg.text: This place was great.  They went above and beyond to make sure we have a great experience and made sure our drinks were always full.  Burgers were great as well as the drinks and service.  Love the drinks.  Drinks were great.  Have to get more drinks.  And burgers more burgers.  They should make a burger drink shake.  That would be a drink I would get.  Love the drinks here.

QZ7idQocfgWjZLwoDzTirA.text: Cool burger place - fun ambiance, lots of burgers (and other stuff) to choose from. Shelby is great - super friendly, very attentive and just plain nice. Good crowd even late in the afternoon. If you're into burgers definitely check it out!

HsZmS4FvQKcxY6FXr6a_CQ.text: Rehab Burger Therapy is a really good burger place in Scottsdale.  A bite expensive, but well worth it.   We ordered the Mac and Cheese Burger and a Philly Cheese steak Burger.  Both are excellent.  Mac and Cheese has just enough spices to make the burger sit up and take notice.  And the sweet potato tots are to die for.  The Philly Cheese Steak burger is very tasty.  It's a lot of meat.  It comes with a burger patty and Philly Cheese steak on top of it.   I will definitely come back here.  The Onion ring is not as good.  It has too much batter for my taste.

9tSrPL9Wc8pxSD7nFmfc4Q.text: First of all, service was awesome! I was so pleased with our waitress, she knew it was our first time here and gave us suggestions and was patient with us. She gave us different sauces to try with our super yummy sweet potato tots, and even though I don't like ketchup...the spicy ketchup was really good.  I got the Backyard BBQ burger, relapse (5 oz) size and my boyfriend got the PB+J 10 oz size because our waitress told us it was the most popular and he wanted to be bold.  Well anyways, the PB+J burger was actually good. What?! Life is full of surprises. The menu says there's sriracha in it but he couldn't taste it at all.  I substituted my onion rings w/ pineapple instead and it was very hawaiian tasting.   The menu is very creative. The burgers were good but wasn't amazing. The sweet potato tots were verrry delicious. I love anything sweet potato. And the sauces made it better.

IHm_dtOQuSX40i8MoWxp2w.text: Nah. This place was seriously disappointing. Nothing special at all. The burgers were edible but the burnt taste was overwhelming. Onion rings were tough and oily. The wings were ok but the carrots they came with were old. I can think of several burger places that serve better quality food.

gV8LY3Ti3q6oI92I1YBjMA.text: I was in Scottsdale with my Wife for a few errands and we decided we'd like to grab a bite.  When we entered ol town Scottsdale we saw Rehab and decided to give it a shot.  To be fair we'd heard of their other locations and had vowed to try them sometime lil did we know Sunday was the day. Craft Burger joints are all the rage these days and we like going to them because they often have Gluten Free Buns, and other GF options.  When we walked in we were greeted by every staffer that walked by even though they were not the Hostess.  This was a nice touch and an indicator of how they roll here.  After a brief wait Kate the manager seated us and within mere seconds Josey our server came by.  We told Josey we were new and had some questions...Josey pulled up a chair and sat down to speak with us as if we were the only people in the place!  Again nice personal touch!  We explained our need to be Gluten Free and she explained the menu in detail and answered each question confidently.  We placed the order and our food came out quickly and correctly.  I must say the food was brought out by a different server which was equally nice seeing the teamwork here.  Josey stopped by regularly to check on us and to be sure our cocktails were topped off, she never missed a beat!   It is worth noting they were dealing with a packed house .  After a great lunch with great service we are hooked!  Whatever they are doing at Rehab good job!  Josey is the real deal, Kate manages a great team and I dig this place and the food!  I wish I could be there more but Scottsdale is a long way from Tucson!  We will definitely be back thanks Rehab for the great food and service!

Q0k0SQh2h5WnFxArt80OhA.text: Wow!!!! Their food is amazing. I went with the Mac and Cheese Burger and was not disappointed.

pXSP2_KIIyzXOZb7dnzyCw.text: Go hungry is my best advice! Because, after you've eaten, they'll have to wheel you out of there!! First trip, on the advice of a friend and what a pleasant surprise! Monstrous portions, helpful staff, and the flavors are out-of-this-world-delicious. The wings were plump and juicy, the onion rings crisp, and the sweet potato fries (actually more like tater tots) were wonderful. I had the Bigger Beefstro Burger and it was cooked to perfection. The burger was piled high with shaved rib eye and havarti cheese, on a pretzel bun - my mouth is watering, just writing about it. We also had the bacon blue and Hangover burgers, which I sampled, and they were just as tasty! I'll be going back!

RoWHYwoc-uvXgjdSFaUsbw.text: My family recently stopped in this joint after a day at the Desert Botanical Gardens. Needless to say, we were pretty ravenous and Rehab Burger did not disappoint! We ordered a chicken sandwich, the bacon and blue cheese burger and the spicy beef salad. The portions were HUGE, but more importantly, the food was really tasty. I am already salivating thinking about the French fries that were dusted with lime Tajin. There was a little bit of wait, which is to be expected on a Saturday afternoon, but it was worth it! We will be back.

r_wpnikTf3N_0PYHKrRyAg.text: The pictures say enough. Must try! It's an experience. It's so much food I couldn't eat even half. It's crowded but there is a reason for that. Really chill atmosphere plus dogs are allowed.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac and cheese burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

aF3VW760fvuq7nmJ0_98HA.text: My husband and I went to this place last night after living in the area ;for 4 years, we just never saw it as it's kind of hidden and looks like a tiny place. It's not, it's a decent size place actually which was cool. Hats off to the chef who makes the meat patties for the burgers because the burgers are phenomenal. Perfectly cooked and tasty!! You can taste the quality. So the food was great. We also had wings, again, very good.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because of he service. We were sat from the hostess and we didn't have a server come see us for about 12 min. And she finally came, took a drink order and then we didn't see her again to give her the order for another 10 min.  She finally came and said she was sorry and that she was overwhelmed bc she had so many tables. I think the manager that was standing chatting with the hostess the whole time or the other waiters could have jumped in to help but there was no team effort in there. We felt sorry for her. We will go back, but not on a busy night for sure.

tNGnqtgOP2iPOdUyrg-7tw.text: Never thought I would eat PB&J on a burger!  The fries are amazing! Excellent service and because it's a busy place....it's worth the WAIT!

XLn5UbX84Ue4tivJVMGTDg.text: Delicious as always !!! Lunch date with my husband which was nice. $34 for two!!! No alcohol, just one soda and a water. I got the turkey club but the middle bread makes it too much. I took that out right away and got a box for the other half of my sandwich. Much to large to eat. Husband got the McNarley and the bartender suggested he omit the middle piece of bread which helped. I will get that club again but on smaller bread. She said they have a marble rye which is smaller. I will go for that. Waitress was super helpful and friendly!!! We got there at 11:45 and ended up sitting at the bar to eat because it was going to be a 25 minute wait!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

ZbVjT_rdq_vl43MjsB-hJw.text: Stopped here for lunch on St Patty's day. The wait was about 30 minutes but we were lucky to even get a table because they were really busy. The service and food were both AMAZING! Our server was so sweet and attentive even though she had a lot going on. Happy hour from 12-6 every day?! Hell yeah. We ordered the backyard bbq and the hatch chile burger and both of them were dynamite. They give you the option for "relapse" or "rehab" size burgers, the relapse was the perfect size for us. The fries and sweet potato tots were delicious too!   It's right next door to some other cool restaurants and bars and had a cool atmosphere. We were in town for spring training and super glad we stopped in here.

18C-qxc2DcZD75lkMZtmmw.text: Great little spot in old town Scottsdale!  We went there midday and the wait was quite long (~30 minutes).  It's so tiny that we had to wait outside...thankfully, the Arizona heat had not hit its high since it was only about 100 degrees.  At any rate, we finally got it and was worth the wait.  The service was great, the loud atmosphere fun, and the food was yummy.  Our waiter was very attentive and quick the get ice cold waters and even colder beers.  He made his recommendations and we did not oblige.  We ordered our style of burgers...in True LA fashion :/  They made us our burgers as requested and we were happy.  Will definitely stop again on a future visit!

BU-qqxXMMS4IXSh6A7Jzow.text: Awesome place first time here and staff was great and very friendly. The burgers was very good and cooked to my liking thumbs up.

nF0b2-v3X5PXg9l_KYVlSw.text: Went for lunch today and everyone was pleased with their orders! We all shared the homemade nacho chips and salsa! Very crunchy and tasty. The salsa had a little bite to it but good! I hid the piglet Wings and they were delicious! They are actually riblets and the pineapple salsa is baked into them. They are more than enough for a meal! My husband had the chili hamburger and he enjoyed it very much! The chili was coming out the sides and he couldn't finish the whole sandwich! Onion rings huge! Service was attentive and friendly!

6MrgHzw5dqBYjrVHfSNHfw.text: Lives up to the hype! It's also located in the perfect place if you want to canoodle around town for the rest of the day to burn off those delicious calories.

7wejfpklv4p-RA_apiOFtA.text: After reading such rave reviews on yelp I thought I'd check it for a quick bite .I arrived at 3:30 which was perfect for happy hour . Got the sweet potatoes ( fried to perfection!) basket with the pineapple teriyaki sauce ( just the right amount of sweetness) along with their spicy mango  skinny ( mango habanero vodka , diet ginger ale , lemon and fresh cilantro) all delish. The service was polite and prompt. My only regret was I didn't have a second stomach to eat more

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

POlMInR4NJt7QHMQWarYpw.text: First off , the service . Fantastic. Everyone was so accommodating . Drink were refilled without EVER asking . Straight up, Lo rocks ! She was our server and she's on point ! She was on top of EVERYTHING . When we ordered she helped with the choices .Kudos to her..so laid back and in the cut , even though the place was busy we felt like the ONLY table.    That's just the beginning. The food , wow ! I get it - it's bar food ,but wayyyyyyyy better ! The Pig Wings , dear lord - fantastic ! I'm a complete wing snob admittedly and these were unbelievable. The crispness ,the flavor ,the size ,the sauce(sweet with a little heat) ...absolutely great ! Next time I'll try the regular wings .   The main meal was Pescado Borracho and Poblano burger. Both were fantastic ! The choice of condiments, pickle and sides were plentiful . The food was ALL at perfect temperature. you can smell and taste the beer with the fish dish . The tartar sauce was a perfect compliment . Also , the portions...hell yeah !! BIG portions , no filler -all killer . $40 and a little change was the bill . COMPLETELY worth it .

5Gkism9mEdguQbhBTxs9Sw.text: Verdict: Yes to this kind of therapy. Just stick with the single or you might actually need some rehab.  Okay, so I got the the PB&J burger with the pretzel bun. It's a crazy combination of peanut butter, jelly, bacon, and burger. Right about now, you're probably saying ewww but don't knock it 'till you've tried it. That burger was great and the pretzel bun was sturdy enough to keep it together.  They have a lot of creative options if what I got isn't appealing. For any burger, get the single or split a double with someone. It's a lot of food. My friend got the fish and that was huge too. You won't leave hungry.  The sweet potato tots were underwhelming for flavor but the burger made up for it. Maybe try the regular fries. Either way, I'd totally go back here. Too bad I don't live anywhere remotely nearby.

ftnnwW2S_oHscvjgYeKYLQ.text: Great food, friendly service and an awesome atmosphere. One of my favorites, well worth the drive.

dqxEoFYYLcrQCH1UawvwhA.text: We just returned from a 17 day cruise, with no shortage of food. Nowhere on the ship could we find a great burger. As soon as we arrived home we headed to Rehab Burger Therapy in Scottsdale to satisfy our craving. We were not disappointed. The burger was generous. The meat very tasty and great options to add on. The atmosphere is very relaxed and the service was excellent.

QRVr9NB6F0ux58oQbebt6A.text: Oh my goodness, this place is amazing! This was the first time we had been here but we'll definitely be back. First of all, the service was great. Brian, our waiter, was so good at what he does. His personality was upbeat, excited, friendly, and he really knew the menu even though he said he had only been there for a couple months. When asked for recommendations he gave our table ones that everyone liked and then, since I'm super indecisive and enjoy trying new things, I told him to surprise me with any burger on the menu my only specifications were it couldn't have pork and it couldn't be super spicy. It was as if he knew my exact personality because he literally picked the PERFECT burger for me. It was covered in mac and cheese and was on a pretzel bun with sweet poTOToes and pesto aioli on the side. It was seriously so great and I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great burger! I also hope Brian keeps up his great attitude and smile and gets recognized for that! Thank you, Rehab, for a 5 star experience!

hJRt1xcNj1mPBfV-nq7zZg.text: If you are gonna be closed for some nonsense football game, how about a message on your voice mail? Rookie  mistake my friends...

7Ctfbm7oJ7QxQqff2P4xrQ.text: I'm very shocked at all these nice reviews because mine is not so nice. Came here for first time expecting a great experience and great food and my trip was not even close to great. Out waitress basically forgot about us and even took care of the table next to us and never checked in. We had to ask another worker for the check. The waitress came to cash us out and never once apologized for disappearing on us.   She wrote my order wrong and therefore gave the the bigger burger and charged me for it too- even though I ordered the smaller one. I can't believe I actually paid the check, I wanted to leave so quickly since the food and the service was so horrible. I will not be back! :(

J0lSMMlESTNcsTnPU-L3gw.text: This place made me feel like I was in a surf shack joint in Hawaii. It was a really fun laid-back, casual restaurant.  My burger was great and those sweet potato tots with the sweet pineapple sauce were the best!

doZenK_Nb2CHS5DZp0NM4Q.text: Looks like a surfer joint.  Great decor.  Fantastic staff.  Delicious burgers!  Each come with a side and a pickle.  Whatever you order, put it on a pretzel bun.  Yum!!!

J0hQ735gKdxEv8H57fjLAA.text: Great burgers. Ordered the frito app and ate the entire thing before I could take a photo!  Well worth it!

F_CMBuJq6-jPErPOzwbD1A.text: i don't ask much in my search for the perfect burger. Yes, it's nice to dine in a well kept restaurant. It's also enjoyable when the staff is interactive and friendly. A buzzing atmosphere is always a nice touch.   But when it comes down to it, when I'm looking for the Taj Mahal of burgers, it all balances on what is served. And let me tell you, RBT knows how to serve a burger that will satisfy your deepest bovine desires.   The menu is full of unique and staple burger offerings. The one that caught my attention, however, was the PBJ and Bacon burger. Upon reading the burger's description,  I felt more conflicted than a Southern Baptist at a Castro District drag show.   "Wait a minute, PBJ does not belong on a burger!"  "What?! The patty is drenched in sriracha?!"  "I can get it with a pretzel bun as well?!"  The universe, as I saw it, was collapsing everywhere I looked. None of this made any sense to my respectable burger palate, and I yearned to taste this forbidden concoction of beef, bacon, thai hot sauce, and pb&j. Not to be outdone by the unique burger, I forewent the pedestrian side of fries and ordered the Jamaican corn to accompany my otherworldly dish.  What happened when dinner was served is somewhat of a blur. No, I was not intoxicated (in the traditional sense) - I can only compare it to the moment when you first meet your soulmate. That moment you will never forget, but cannot remember to the fullest detail. With my very first bite, my synapses were firing at a rate that a M134 Minigun couldn't match. My eyes bulged with intense fulfillment, my skin emitted a cool sweat of indulgence, and I could have sworn I heard the faithful tune "Take my Breath Away" ringing in my subconscious state of euphoria. I had found it, the perfect burger was in my grasp and I felt unworthy.   The burger, like most fleeting romances, was gone before I could sincerely take in the magnitude of this event. Fortunately, the Jamaican corn was still at my disposal, and may God turn me into a horny toad if that side wasn't an outstanding compliment to the burger. Now the Jamaican corn wasn't from the same metaphysical realm from which the PBJ and Bacon burger originated, but it was more like a swan song for my recently departed dish, an ultimate tribute for the tantric experience of RBT.  RBT delivered when it counted most, and I'm not talking about a swift thrill, I'm talking about the kind of satisfaction that is almost melancholy, as if my burger pilgrimage was finally complete. Time will only tell if this is True, but until then, RBT is the home of my favorite burger.

hm73iRZNsl-oAMO-iQlRIQ.text: Tried after reading reviews on yelp for burger places.  It was good, not amazing, but good.  The Mac Narly burger is a spin on a Big Mac, I give it a 3 out of 5. It's got nothing on Culinary drop outs Mac burger.  The onion rings were to heavily battered as I tasted the flour.  The chicken, dip,cheese , soup was ok, like soup with tortilla chips, mah.

0gXBMaA3jgJLbpCg2_jhjQ.text: Place was great - communal table was fun - service good.  Food tasted just fine - THEN 1a.m. both of us were sick sick sick sick.  Not fun anywhere especially in a motel, while traveling, and needing to hit the road by 7a.m.

mlKOdUAcWV2tQQtqDWh1LA.text: PB and J Bacon Burger... "Shut the Front Door" Hands down best burger! Did I mention I travel and eat out 150+ days a year. Can't beat this place. Must stop every time I'm in Phoenix/Scottsdale areas. Club sandwich is good and massive. About to devour a spicy mac'n chz burger:)

tgz9DKoWlBCATl403jopbQ.text: Service is absolutely terrible. My husband and I frequent restaurants and lounges and cafes pretty often and have had our share of unpleasant experiences. We were excited to have burgers after a spring training game, but our waiter didn't look like he cared whatsoever. He did not bring the correct order, misguided us about the happy hour drinks and my burger was not well done as I requested it to be. When i tried to tell him about it, he WALKED AWAY.  Manager came and started making excuses for the waiter. In the end he took our bill and gave us a 10% discount, which would not even start to make up for a terrible experince that we ended up having. Honestly, i would consider this to be one of the worst restaurant experiences of my life. We won't be coming back and i would not recommend anyone to visit rehab burger.

RSCG_cN_sA5-Kva8Z2lakQ.text: Best burgers in Scottsdale. Love that pretzel bun easily handles my chili cheeseburger. Burger is flawless, sides are great, service is exceptional

xRPJFoJ0rPuGYfWeZDs_Pg.text: Great food, great service, cool atmosphere!   Came for an early lunch right when the place opened and all the staff seemed pretty cool. Built our own burgers and tried out all the sauces. Really good! Def recommend this place for a cool restaurant with a great burger!

6xQvj_Ex4Rgt_PxQb0_Ang.text: Holy crap, this place is re-DONK.  We came by here starving and damaged after Tough Mudder the other weekend. Our waitress (bless her heart) was the sweetest lady, and even went out of her way to cut an aloe vera branch from the plant outside for my friend to tend to his wounds. Seriously, is that excellent service or what??  I tried the know poblano burger (grilled spicy onions, manchego, and roasted poblanos) which was absolutely mindblowing. The burger was cooked perfectly, the flavors were unique and punchy, and I finished the whole damn thing despite being full 1/3 of the way in.  And on that note, if you're debating if you're hungry enough to get the 10oz vs the 5oz....seriously, don't be a pansy, get the 10oz.

2Jey0XGFRFjdisCySJ-Asw.text: Really good burgers in Old Town Scottsdale. We went on a Wednesday night so it was full but not long wait times. My Backyard BBQ burger was great. My wife's salad was enormous. Don't need appetizers, and you will leave most of potatoes.

ibgCYFJPMwfDkev_S5r2LA.text: This is the only gourmet burger place I'll go to. Not only is the food outstanding - but you get a crazy portion for the price. I love all the creative burger recipes, and I think I am addicted to the sweet potato tots. Great atmosphere as well. It can often be extremely crowded but I've never had a bad experience. The servers and bartenders are always friendly, working hard and are a fun group of people! This is a must do if you are visiting old town Scottsdale!

0_YVl4cIk8cK3Bv_6gqE_Q.text: Great atmosphere, lots of locals frequent here. I had the cobb salad and hubby had the blue burger and food was delicous! Look forward to coming back when we are back in town.

2gyZiuWr-Vgrr5ysV-ef9A.text: been great everytime weve gone, good wings too! just like organoes wings

GTyZwuhSKkRR-iN4p1NTFQ.text: I must have ordered the wrong thing.  I love heat so when I saw they had a ghost burger with ghost pepper cheese I was in! I was asked if I would like a white or wheat bun, I opted for wheat.  I was asked if I would like fries or sweet potato fries, I said fries.  Let's start with the burger.  The bun was oversized and oblong shaped, not round so there was that issue.  The bun was also not toasted at all as you can tell by the lack of color.  This cold bun could have been warmed up a little before putting more cold guacamole up against it.  The burger itself was overcooked and not juicy at all.  The "ghost pepper cheese" barely had any heat.  I feel like a slice of jalapeno would have delivered more of a punch.  The "crispy onions" were so overcooked that they were black and there was no "crispy" at all.  When I hear crispy onions I'm thinking shaved onions that are tossed in tapioca or rice flower then tossed in the deep fryer for 30 seconds to develop a nice crunch like an onion ring would have, not onions sauteed on a flat top.  Overall the burger was quite possibly one of the worst burgers I've ever had.  It reminded me of going to your friends house for a bbq who thinks he can cook and gives you a burger you have to douse in ketchup just to get it down.    The fries although crispy had some weird seasoning on it that gave it a citrus taste almost like a yuzu powder.  Whatever it was was not expected and not welcome. At least I had a delicious chipotle ranch to dip the fries in.    The only reason I'm giving Rehab Burger Therapy 2 stars and not 1 is because the bartender was by far the most attentive bartender I had on my trip to Scottsdale where apparently customer service does not exist.  I wish I would have gotten her name because I never had an empty drink in front of me.  I'm sure I could have complained about the burger but I didn't want to be the guy that asks for the place to cook a whole new burger for me and throw this one away.    I'm thinking either the kitchen didn't care because it was an hour til closing when I ordered and there were only 3 other people in there, or I really ordered the wrong thing since all of the other burger pictures looks amazing and way better than mine.  Either way I'm giving it 2 stars and I won't be coming back with all the other amazing food options in Scottsdale.

quF2riw1WGaLubNEAJ-9jA.text: Ordered the PB&J with bacon burger. Note to all those tender palates out there.... maybe get the hot sauce on the side, it overwhelms the bacon/peanut butter and grape jelly.... and 'tastes like burning'......

MgAVwi_2s_GYHNx-0LEreg.text: I hate going to hamburger places because I am a vegetarian and never find options. Rehab had a vegetarian patty and I could sub it in any hamburger.  Service was also great. Our server was quick, attentive and overall made the experience better with her enthusiasm. Tater Tots were delicious too!

IfsnZ20ozsh4Ej2zKrod6g.text: So I am not a burger fan. I know I am weird, but something about me and a ground beef patty does not work. However, it never stops me from going to a burger joint especially this one here. Your probably thinking why does this chic eat at a burger joint then. Well, they have more than burgers. You can choose your meat from Grilled Chicken, Turkey Burger, and Vegetarian Burger at no additional cost. All to pile on top of their mounds of fresh ingredients and toppings. Oh yes! I must tell you that you can choose your bun. I suggest trying the pretzel bun. YUM! You can even choose to build your own burger. My favorite choice, though they have a creative pre-fixed menu with many different tasty items.   The sides are hard to choose from. I love the fries, sweet potato tater tots, onion rings and much more. They offer a variety of sauces to choose from. Many that are unique.   The service is not always the best. The ladies are not very welcoming at times and don't have the friendliest personalities. I can say they have never messed up on my order and bring my food out in a reasonable time.   I have to say "Just what the doctor ordered." I was in food coma. lol!

1kfJftj36burOBo81fpjaw.text: This was a GOOD burger place buy not a GREAT burger place. First, it was very hot inside. I know we are in Arizona but it was uncomfortable. Second, our server was dreadful. He checked on us once throughout our meal and he failed to bring us silverware -- which is such a simple thing to do! Considering I needed a fork to eat my side salad, this bothered me immensely. After the servers (not our waiter) dropped off our burgers, there was no contact from our waiter. What made the situation worse was that it was hard to flag down someone to bring us our silverware and some ketchup because it was a busy night (and we had two babies we were trying to keep entertained while we waited). We almost didn't tip our waiter, that's how uninvolved he was with us.   The food, which was good, was cold and seemed like it had been sitting out for a while. The sweet potato tater-tots were so tasty but could have been warmer, the mac and cheese on my burger was barely warm and my sister-in-law's burger bun was soggy from the sauce. I was really let down by my experience because Rehab Burger Therapy had come highly recommended.   They had an interesting menu and I'd give it a redemtion run if I lived in the area but I probably won't be recommending this place to anyone.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac-n-Cheese Burger

y__0_jYr_qvme6joc7Fz_w.text: Very impressive burgers. The buns are fresh, the meat is seasoned, and the toppings are uniquely satisfying. Not your normal/basic burger with cheese & lettuce. They go over the top to give you a new experience with burgers.

xXi13v77YRzPlB78Dy8XVw.text: Amazing burgers, one for just about any burger person! Great place to splurge and get what you want to satisfy your taste buds!  I got the PBnJ burger, and holy cow. One of the best burgers I have ever had, and I honestly don't love burgers all that much.  Overall, great burger place, definitely check it out if you're in the mood

i-OjKZYJAtHzqTRmztBRhQ.text: Rehab was awesome.  I really have no complaints about this place.  The burgers were good and cooked to my liking.  I love the variety of burgers they have as I am always looking to try something "different". The problem with many places is that when they do different, the flavor of the actual burger gets lost.  That's not the case here however. Give it a go!

lsI-Cjhig3Ib_g0qDGoVgw.text: We both enjoyed our food. I ordered the fish sandwich without a bun or cheese. Delicious!!! My husband ordered the peanut butter and jelly burger! He loved it, it also made him sweaty. I know it sound odd but he swears it's really tasty. I could taste tue beer in the batter on the fish. I couldn't even imagine the size of the sandwich. I asked our server if the portion was bigger because I ordered without a bun and she said no! She said the fish sandwich is HUGE and it comes with three pieces of fish.  The service was excellent as always.
