Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Backyard BBQ burger

gmK4j6vVh8HskXxESTq9ww.text: Came to AZ for spring training and it was our last night in town. The reviews looked great so we tried it out. Home run!! The place had a lively atmosphere and was busy on a Monday night. I ordered the spicy mac and cheese burger and it was out of this world! From the pretzel bun to the tasty patty along with the spicy mac and cheese with bacon it was perfection. As I side I got the sweet potato tots which were the best I ever had. The drinks were great too. I don't normally order margaritas but they had this spicy mango jalepeno thing on the menu and damn was it good. The food and drinks were a hit and the service was excellent as well. Connor was our server and this guy was awesome. He made great recommendations and hustled. He swears by the PB&J burger which maybe I'll try next time. If you are in Scottsdale try this place out!

J-dny8PLwpm0vZYtBSww4w.text: I mean wow!  This place really knows how to step their burger game up.  I had some cowboy burger (can't remember the exact name right now).  It had onion rings as well as pepper jack and bbq.  Was super tasty though extremely messy.  I had to bring out a ton of napkins to keep it off my clothes.  I will def be back next time I'm in old town Scottsdale or maybe the Tempe location.

geC_o2M8fJJd-vLtmOYiBg.text: Rehab is one of the best places to find a unique burger in old town Scottsdale. The owners are amazing and everyone working is fabulous. They have such great customer service. Shoutout to Kaye behind the bar and the rest of the staff.

qKzPH4KEIZFxmPdiqU78oQ.text: Ok so this joint is pretty good. The atmosphere is more of a Cali scene. With Sublime playing and surf boards all around.. it's a small space but they do have outdoor seating available.  Side note: I found out they do not take reservations for a party of 2 for indoor seating. But I'm assuming for large groups there is reservations available.  Now on to the burgers. I got the Philly Cheeseburger 5oz, and Hubs got the Ghost Pepper 10oz. We loved the burgers. Nice and juicy cooked the way we liked/wanted The Philly is amazing basically what it sounds like. I definitely paid more attention to my burger than my fries. But they were good too.  Surprisingly the ghost pepper had a kick to it for the hubs. Which is very rare. This is the guy who likes triple jalapenos on his sandwich and burgers with them being stuffed jalapenos and pepper jack cheese. So he gave it a thumbs up!  Now I know where to go, to get some good burgers!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Philly cheeseburger!!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ghostpepper

FDtJ-AXOLeixcb3XzVileA.text: Couldn't decide between this place & the one next door but decided to try here first. it was SOOO good & jess was an awesome server. PBJ burger was bomb & the bloodys are amazing

14rpdUZwDlNl6_Qfk3VCQw.text: Was out in Phoenix for some training. Had a burger craving. Stumbled upon this place and it was delish. Their bar me u looked quite extensive. I couldn't partake because of having to drive and fly within an hour, but the PBJ burger I had was awesome!!! The sweet potato tots were a perfect pairing. The vibe is cool and laid back. Prices are reasonable and the bar tender was friendly. Over all I thoroughly enjoyed this place and it will definitely hit that burger craving.

kybbrhHouxqfpN5LhpyMxg.text: I've always wanted to try this burger joint and my kids wanted to too. So we came here on a Saturday night. I figured it's a burger joint and Yelp says no reservations which makes sense. It's just a burger. My son got here a little earlier than us and tried to get a table inside but found out you have to make a reservation to sit inside. So he got us a table outside.   Outside is not that big with about five tables and chairs on the railing too. Almost all is high top tables. They had the misters and small fans for the heat in the afternoon. I think they turn those off around 6pm. All I know is the outside cause I never made it inside. First time this has ever happened to me.   I ordered the Spicy Mac n Cheese rehab burger. There are so many options. Rehab 10oz. Relapse 5oz. How it's cooked, bun, and potatoes you want. So I got a pretzel bun with sweet potatoes tots. Man was this good but really filling. Thick and juicy 10oz burger cooked perfectly with huge serving of Mac and cheese falling off the burger. Mac n cheese had bacon bits and it really wasn't that spicy at all. I was barely able to finish it all. Tots were good and love the different selections of dipping sauces they have. Really good. Really filling.   My wife and mom got the Hawaiian burger. Had pineapple and ham between the burger. My daughter got the Hatch. Everyone enjoyed the burger but no one could finish their burger but me and my son. Oh well.   The service was great. She brought out our water cups and drinks right away. Kept tabs on us and our food came out pretty quickly. Can't complain about that.   It was pretty fun eating outside. Nice breeze to keep it cool and watching the traffic go by was pretty interesting especially those traveling bars where you have to pedal while drinking.   So great burgers. Filling. Fresh and don't forget lots of options to make your burger special. Service was great and if you like the outdoors it's great. Otherwise I suggest you make a reservation to get inside. Oh yea there is free public parking just steps from the place so you don't have to worry about where to park especially in Old Town Scottsdale.   Enjoyed it a lot and will most definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hatch Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac &amp; Cheese Burger

BrxEVytLGY5ZpZdd9q0_bw.text: Such a cute casual place to have a drink and good food. Service was great and our food was delicious. Menu was a little overwhelming, but it's categorized to make it easy to navigate. The waiter gave some good suggestions. I had the veggie freak sandwich and it was delicious!!

7Ws-YRmK9oajWCN9So4LoA.text: Best burger in my 55 years of living!  This is a fun place offering excellent fast service and food that is superior to any other burger house.   We had the P &J burger, Mushroom burger, pulled pork, shake and Mac and cheese.  We all shared and the Mac and cheese was Amazing!  The P & B burger flavors burst and spread into a blissful Bite.  Mmmmm mmmmm   Worth the wait and money.    Only bad news is I live in Lakewood, Wa and this place is in Scottsdale.  LOL  Thank you Rehab Burger!

SF_6uPLhvXg8QG4hve6Wsg.text: Absolutely loved this place. It is all the hype. I got the philly cheeseburger (5oz) which came with either fries or sweet potato tots. Those toys were just amazing! Especially the dipping sauces for the tots. Burger was huge and I only finished half but it was sooo good. They had a wide variety of burger options too. Definitely gonna come back to try other burgers and appetizers, despite the long wait (30min or so).  And service was great. Our waiter Sam was really nice and accommodating and funny.

Y1Y3QCrm5rLKpR25I13UrA.text: Mid Sunday afternoon, good timing, got really busy before we were finished. Started with the dirty fries, served with several sauces. Amazing. Ordered the Spicy Mac-n-cheeseburger and the Hawaiian burger. Both cooked up to perfection. Very friendly waitress, took advantage of the outdoor seating. Recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

UiWM92qOBLnHEjSJToVflQ.text: Was in town for a night and was recommended Rehab for a stellar burger. It did not disappoint. Snagged a seat at the bar, thankfully. Around 7:30pm it was a solid 30 minute wait for a table. The bartender gave us a few tastes of some local AZ beer on tap. There are numerous burgers to choose from in a 5 or 10oz size. Plus a variety of other dishes if burgers aren't your thing. A tip for out-of-towners, parking is plentiful and free downtown. I was nervous we wouldn't get a spot but there is plenty and all is easily walkable.

A-6lyCx_NmiiQSfHRe1msw.text: It's was just okay ya know. A lot of bread and toppings, not a lot of patty. But I like the creativity and the service was great. Won't be returning, better things are down the street.

mz2xwyXcpnT7LJ5I6LbaKw.text: Love the burgers at this great local Scottsdale joint. I'm a pretty simple girl and so whenever I come here I have just a real simple cheeseburger and some fresh French fries with an ice cold beer to wash it all down. The service is always been awesome and the people are always really super friendly and nice and I've never ever had a negative experience.   These guys do a great job and they have awesome burgers.

KBredZO4MFRxzpi8ixSINw.text: The burger was decent but the beer selection was a little lacking and the servers had no idea how to pour the 4 beers they had on draft.   Overall the service was just okay. They also charge a "convenience fee" for paying with a credit card which is honestly just annoying. The server tried to tell us it was "pretty standard everywhere"  I might return but honestly there are better burgers out there.

H3brxGG8iHUWeyJYUvcLpg.text: If you want weird combination burgers this is the place to go to! The service was really great and friendly. The waitress explained about their menu since it was our first time there.  So we got the two famous burgers she said, which are the pbj burger and the spicy Mac and cheese burger! The pbj burger was amazing! The meat was very moist and the flavors were really unique! The spicy Mac and cheese was amazing! The meat was moist as well and it was very cheesy!  I highly recommend coming here and checking their burgers out! And next time I wanna try out their desserts as well because they sound very interesting..!
