Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pbj burger

KRbUd-qW8OVpgYBZYX9ZvA.text: Great burgers great atmosphere and great service. The way you can pick how the burgers are made for you is amazing. So far I've tried three of them and have now been disappointed yet.  The flavors and amount they give you are perfect. If you're hungry order the rehab if not order the small one you can't go wrong.   The only downside is you feel crammed in but whatever is what it is and you will still have a great time

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

MBNf5JXef_TuSjlYOiMK5A.text: My friend and I came by on a Sunday evening (after happy hour unfortunately), but had some extremely tasty burgers that came in huge portions! There's street parking as well as some garage parking (which was free on Sunday).  I got the Backyard BBQ burger (mainly for the onion ring inside), rehab size (10oz) with sweet potato tots. The burger was huge and perfectly cooked, and the brioche bun it was on was so soft and buttery. Sadly, my onion ring got very soggy halfway through the burger, and the toppings inside were slipping out, but nothing a fork (or fingers) can't recover. Next time, I'd probably get the onion ring and bbq sauce on the side. My friend enjoyed her jalapeno popper burger and the HUGE mound of guac it came with - they definitely don't skip with toppings. Her fries were decent, but she def stole a few tots off my plate ;)  Doubling the weight of your burger for just a couple dollars is sooo worth, and we were big fans of the sweet potato tots. I hope to be back soon!!

604oq9AHu9747HTNVwAKBw.text: This is a solid burger joint with a ton of options. Nothing is too fancy about it. You can get a 5 oz or 10 oz burger with your choice of bun and tots or fries.   The tots are great and I haven't gotten them both times I've been in. The pb&j burger was good but I'm not too committed to it and will get something else next time I stop in. You can taste the beer in the onion rings batter which I actually appreciated.   This is more of a specialty burger place for me and if you want just a standard burger there are other options in the valley. However, we all enjoyed our burgers and were practically scraping the last bits off our plates.   Reasons it isn't 5 star:  Menus are hard to read with the bubbly/boxy fonts and small writing. I would suggest getting new menus that are much clearer. The other thing that bothered me was how warm it was. They had fans in there and I assume AC but it was just uncomfortably warm.

eO5PPQToucC7eJmMqyYwVw.text: This place is the best!! Visited from California and was recommended by a vendor close by. Did not disappoint!!!! I had the Tony Montana sandwich and my fiancee had the grilled chicken sandwich. We also ordered the wings. Best of all the server Tina was awesome. Best Cuban style sandwich I've ever  Had.

-wktu7zNKCz4nF0EvZc9IA.text: First timer and found this spot on Yelp!  I was impressed by how many reviews (2,220) and 4.5 stars (4/29/19).  I love burgers and I had to check it out! I order the Chicken Breast Burger with Avocado and it was delicious. The French Fries were cooked perfectly and tasted amazing.  The portion was a good size and definitely filled me up!  The ambiance is very laid back and the decor has the beach lifestyle.  The staff were very attentive (Conner did a great job), and they work as a team to take care of the guest.  The prices are reasonable and I will definitely be coming back, next time I am in the Scottsdale area!    Sammy (Inland Empire, CA)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Front Entrance
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Outside Sitting
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Wall Decor

Z2G7iDF_cxx4MLze9zUtXw.text: Unpopular opinion: but this place just isn't that great. Maybe it's because I'm not the biggest burger person or because the reviews were so good that I expected better. The French fries are seasoned with thing tangy stuff that kind of takes away from any dip or taste of French fry. The burger was meh. The lettuce was too much and the burger had a somewhat interesting taste. The hostess was super unhappy to be there which kind of was weird too because the place has a nice vibe. Our server was sweet and the place was packed with a cool vibe so I understand why people like it, it just wasn't all that I expected or hoped for.

RWewebxsrFwrfZGtSm9_BA.text: I love burgers. They are my favorite guilty pleasure. So when I see a place has over 2k reviews, I know I need to try it.  I got the spicy mac and cheese burger on a pretzel bun and sweet potato tots. The burger was good, but given the Mac and cheese, it was messy. I didn't mind but just warning others thinking about getting it. The tots were amazing though! Loved them. I thought they wouldn't be that good because sweet potato isn't my favorite, but these really surprised me. The pineapple sauce is the real MVP though. I wish they bottled it, so I could take it home.   I took one star off because the service wasn't very nice. The hostess seemed annoyed when I asked to be seated. Also, the waitress rarely came to us. And when she did, she only refilled my boyfriend's water but not mine even though it was completely empty.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

SHU5EpzlkM-EEaYQygOYHg.text: I don't give out five star ratings often, but when a place is on...it's on. Orgasmic is an understatement. After eating here I felt like I had eaten food prepared by angels. The atmosphere was very laid back and beachy vibes with great music. The outdoor seating area was great and the inside was nice as well.   Nelson's verde con pollo: 4/5, the chips were fantastic with a nice salt/lime seasoning on them. The dip itself was very good with a nice spicy kick.  Bacon & Blue Burger: 4/5, personally I like crumbled blue cheese and bacon on the actual burger, this one has them infused into the patty. Still a very very good burger just wouldn't be my first choice.   The Porkster Burger: 10/5, this burger was absolutely banging. The pulled pork was so flavorful and tender, the bbq sauce was so good I almost used asked for a separate straw to finish the job, and the burger itself was amazing. I highly recommend this to anyone that wants to climax from eating food.   Fries: 5/5, the fries were great and the dipping sauces were all amazing as well (Chipotle Aioli, & Garlic Sriracha Aioli)   Overall I was completely blown away by the food here. The fact that you can sub different types of burgers, buns, & dipping sauces at no additional cost is also mind blowing. HIGHLY recommend this spot. The staff were all also super friendly as well. 10/10

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Burger Menu

hOKUPkiykrCp4NcaeMABBw.text: Really good burgers and choices at this place. If you are a burger fan, you have to try this place.   My wife and friend were a bit disappointed because they thought stuffed meant stuffed, but the burger was more infused than stuffed. On our trip the medium was more like medium well, these burgers were cooked "well" but I understand why they do that. It does hurt the overall quality though. At 11:30 there was already a line out the door so we were working under a busy kitchen.  I love the ambience in this place, the sports videos are oh so cool, and the service we received was just amazing.   Great spot to fill your gut.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hatch relapse with tempura battered onion rings
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

csSj--GZ_9TOYLhqX2tC8g.text: Love this place. Burgers are so good. Pig wings are great,  flavor is awesome.  Eryn our server was super . Fast, friendly.  The atmosphere is so chill. The food is great

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pig wings,  so good

5SW1iPki2OsN6QBf8PuuLA.text: We came by on an uncrowded evening this time (our previous attempt was a failure since the wait was too long... the place is popular, so be prepared to be patient and wait or come back some other time).   Service here was great -- the server was identified as "Bear" and he did a great job. Everyone had a different burger and the only complaint I heard from the table was that the doneness was on the "less" side, so, maybe order med-well if you like it medium?  I had never put Mac and Cheese on a burger... it was good but definitely hard to eat. I think it may be better served open-faced like a chili burger...   The sweet potato tots were different and tasty, and I got a pile to accompany my burger. I couldn't finish all of them. The tea was fresh and there were plenty of other burger toppings to try. Next time, I may do the PB&J ...

qlHEV5hBtU1VytXL1Lr5uw.text: We waited about 25 minutes to get a table for lunch and it looked like the wait was longer when we left.  Plan accordingly!     Food:  Extensive menu.   Burgers with a variety of bun options (nice!), and various proteins or veggie patty.  The Mushroom and Swiss Burger with a chicken breast was just 'ok'.   The sweet potato tots were  excellent!     My husband's salad was swimming in dressing.  He likes a lot of dressing but in this case it made the salad mostly inedible.  Our friend had the Bigger Beefstro Burger which he declared to be one of the best burgers he ever ate.  Service: Efficient   Ambiance: Casual, high energy, crowded tables, indoor/outdoor seating.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Sweet potato tots - the best!

vfB81SzhfnaXJc0Z28X2gA.text: 5 star for Alisha tonight!! I had a horrible day at work, she got me my drink with in the blink of an eye. She got our order in an out ASAP. She is my favorite server here!

ad2dVoAG3xwzts9kM5zJ_g.text: I guess I don't really get the hype this place has. None of the food was bad, I just didn't care for the execution. I was looking forward to the pretzel bun my burger was on, but while it looked pretzel-y, it didn't have that pretzel flavor I love. I asked for my burger to be cooked medium well, but it arrived looking more like medium rare. I hate to send food back unless it's really messed up because I know it gets wasted, so I just ate it as it came. The fries would have been good except for their strange flavor- maybe lime? Some might like that, but I wasn't a fan. With their glowing reviews I just felt like my experience was a let-down.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Quirky decor
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Generous portion, and this was the 5 oz burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Looks nice, but the burger was way undercooked.

nSM8nv2GhsB6BcrSIYn1aw.text: I really enjoyed this place! The chili cheese fries were so amazing. Good burgers too.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mushroom and swiss burger

Mf-xbwz8WZWbrjZR0yikGw.text: I love Burgers! BUT the cheese is so cold the bacon is hiding under it to stay warm. Im no Chef Ramsay, but DO BETTER! I ordered the burger well done, so its not hard to melt cheese over a hot burger. I waited patiently for hot food. I shouldnt wait 10+ to order my drink. I'd recommend this place for casual eating, but I came on a date and paid the price. My waitress couldnt properly set my table, or bring out hot burgers & fries, but was sure to remind me that there aren't free refills. Mcdonald's burgers are hotter.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Excited to try the burgers!!!!!!!

CEdMDNyuOEN-bhatc2VENA.text: Yep, I can honestly say it deserves its 5 star status. The food is great, the atmosphere is fun. The outdoor seating was good, loved the corn on the Cobb side. My bar tender wasn't the friendliest while waiting for a table, but the hostess and waiter outside were both top notch. Can't wait to come back some time and try other burgers! This area of Scottsdale is fantastic, worth the visit!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Main Emtramce
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Burger, Pretzel Bun
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Corn on the Cobb side (instead of fries). Fantastic!!

9ywVBWXWJFvbaUt7L8VyIw.text: The burger was outstanding. I had the pb n j burger. I would of never thought in a million years that I would order that kinda of burger. But it was awesome. It also had bacon and sirracha on it. It was just a little heat to go with the sweet. This place was awesome the wait was a little long for 5 of us, but well worth it.

aQabQo_uM7ZrRkdIwZiLZw.text: Yep...this was yummy stuff folks.  We had supper here before heading to The Sugar Bowl for youngest son's first birthday celebration.  Our crew started with the Pig Wings. Mine is a family of carnivores and they were all super happy with these little pork nuggets. I tasted them and they were so good! Very tender and the sauce was amazing.  We all had burgers or some sort. We had the smaller sized burgers since we were headed for ice cream next and they were more than enough (for me they were at least!)  My favorite at Rehab was the sweet potato tots. Pure genius. Served with a little pineapple sort of dip. My baby boy and I loved them!   The decor was relaxed and the service was EXCELLENT!  If you are in Old Town Scottsdale don't miss it!

0i6F5ysnSwGxsCZh5Gdg6A.text: Great lunch joint - huge helpings and the burgers are ridiculous! Come hungry, for sure.

l996lzxlueviBEcMhW1rLQ.text: The burgers are all original ideas and you must order the pretzel bun!  The beer and cocktail selection is excellent.   What a great locally owned restaurant.  We return often.  Highly recommended!

iUGBiVqCCl2o_JqhgTnpYQ.text: Top 10 best burger joint in town. The place is a bit small thus waiting is more likely to happen. Good location and good customer service. The burgers are awesome and the tater tots are out of this world. I took away a star because of the heavy smell that was in the restaurant last 2 visits...(sorry). Still a big fan

EquQsoaAWiUCveUu0OC9Zw.text: At 9:30 pm on a Saturday night, good dinner options were slim. My boyfriend and I decided to try this place out on a whim. We arrived about 30 minutes before they were to close. We were greeted by the friendliest bartender who was super cool with us taking our time to order. I love the laid back atmosphere! They had Four Peaks Arizona Peach on tap, which I decided to try.   I went with the Port-a-Burger and my boyfriend got the Porkster. I've had a portabella sandwich at a few places, but it's usually nothing to write home about. This was the best portabella sandwich I have had in ages. Smothered in havarti cheese with lettuce, tomatoes and sprouts-all served on a delicious pretzel bun. The sweet potato tots were also quite tasty. My boyfriend enjoyed his sandwich as well, which was massive and covered with BBQ sauce.   The decor is very Hawaiian/stoner-ish. The bartender kept us entertained with stories about traveling to different cities and the owner even asked us what we wanted to listen to! It was a pretty cool experience. Food was great, atmosphere awesome and we were there past closing time. No one ever rushed us. Overall a very good experience and I look forward to coming back and having another Port-a-Burger!

TpXagNPQEf7O6pjlqSlH0A.text: One of my fave places to come get a burger, tots and enjoy happy hour.    I waited quite a while to write a review though.  As an Old Town local, I've seen many restaurants come and go.  Way too many actually.    But I waited because the same thing always happens.  When I find a great place, I need to keep it a secret because when I come back, it's bombarded with patrons and I can't get the same experience I had before everyone else found out.    Honestly, I don't like crowded places.  I like to enjoy the experience and relax.    Only 4 starts because I really like the food & the atmosphere, but the place gets too crowded.  The patrons are squeezed in so tightly that I feel like we're all dining together.  Not cool when other customers can breathe on the food you're eating.

KDRZi3VmEB--g3nbX-FcRA.text: We found this place due to such high ratings on multiple reviews. Not sure what everyone is smoking. The decor, menu, and service are akin to an Applebee's. Guess what? The food is about the same caliber. Shared the pork wings which were average. I had the hangover burger with fries. The fries were a dingy, brown color and mediocre. The burger on a pretzel bun was uninspiring. If you're looking for a good burger... Keep looking

1gZhLjx7r7mmEk3k8TEnfA.text: Ok so I maybe a little bit biased because when I came here it was for my post figure competition cheat meal and I was literally starving!! I was craving nothing but a really good burger and heard that the PB&J burger here was the BOMB.COM so I had to have it. I arrived with a large party and was told the wait would be 2 hours!!!! I was so mad but set on eating that burger! After the horrible wait (which was more than 2 hours btw) I got to sink my teeth into my meal!!! I also had the sweet potato tots! My husband ordered the Poblano Burger with onion rings and subbed the regular patty for a chorizo patty!!! The food seriously doesn't get any better than this! Although it really isn't for health nuts, the food tastes fresh/in house made/not crap that has been sitting in a freezer! My new fav burger stop!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

nXx4hQ3bfhYJbM93brIneg.text: This place rocks. Great food. Great owners. Great prices. No bullshit.      I have been here a few times.  It looks like San Diego or a place you would come in on right off the beach.    The owners are always there and they seem to love what they have created.  They have clams on the menu which I have yet to get to, but so far I have had variations of their Turkey Burger and have yet to be disappointed.  The staff is real friendly, love to talk and have a good time.  They also care about making sure you are being taken care of.  I wish more places in Olde Town had the quality of people, food, and service this place does.

UhsG6JgaSDMJYzl8PavMzQ.text: Oh so good. HUGE burgers with any twist you'd like. I often do the grilled chicken sandwich which is on amazing bread, or the grilled portobello (Veggie Noogie). If you get a salad instead of fries, you might as well call it two salads, as the sandwiches have loads of veggies too! Fantastic stuff. Biggest drawback is the place is always packed. Tip...Ask to sit along the rail on the outside patio. That's up for grabs and you can sit immediately! Works fine for 2-3 people. Patio heaters make it very comfortable during the colder months. Love it.

81LLUx1fqGom-G79EIqm0w.text: Ok, for anyone that has given a bad review to this place ... you either came on a very very off day or you are just too damn picky (or prefer to be paid for your good reviews).  This place has an amazing atmosphere and staff.   Hands down the best burger place in town.  You can literally make up something and they will make it, the ultimate have it your way place.  It's nice to know that you can come to a place that actually cares about its customers.  If you find yourself there while I am there, say hello.

8mUO6is2uUMua5KBemB2pg.text: This place is great!!! Food is awesome and the service is super good everyone was happy.  I had the "No Poblano" burger on a pretzel bun.  It rocked.. great paddy, manchego cheese, spicy grilled onions and a Poblano pepper.  If you check in you get a "Pot Brownie" sundae for $3.99.  Chocolate brownie stuffed with marshmallow cooked in a pan and topped with ice-cream!!!  Very friendly and helpful staff.  P.S.  Gotta try the sweet potato tots with the Pineapple aioli!

r0wsiaBIBzBKvHgB5Yrp7Q.text: I've been here three times. The food is just alright.  Burgers aren't bad by any means - they are good burgers but they just seem sort of average.  I am a fan of the chopped salad which I was not expecting from this place.  It's a good location with a colorful atmosphere.

d_dxYAMNPfHnZuillHcX-Q.text: This place was pretty good, kind of strange servers and my tots were burned, so it doesn't quite make the five star cut.  I had the bacon cheeseburger, with the pretzel bun and cheddar cheese-- it was super delicious and really a big burger so I saved half for an after-drinking snack.  My boyfriend had the MacGnarly burger or whatever it is called, which is a double decker burger smothered in thousand island dressing, and he had it on a brioche bun, which was really good.  The fries were good.  The sweet potato tots would have been better if they weren't burned, and if they gave me some garlic aioli on the side instead of ketchup (sweet potatoes and ketchup? Ummmm no)  I also had a spicy bloody mary and that thing was DELICIOUS!  Parking can be gnarly around there, but if you park in the structure and take the super short hike to Rehab Burger, then you'll be fine.  Enjoy!

pQn09N-VStovdWKYyZyr0A.text: I cannot believe we paid close to $40 for two burgers here. The burgers were tasteless and extremely undercooked. My "medium" burger was still bloody. There was no seasoning on the burger itself and the toppings couldn't help it. The bun was extremely soggy and fell apart. So gross. I will never eat here again! So dissatisfied.

hYFli8ifuWUnmvtXPO7tTA.text: We had a wonderful dinner here during spring training. The burgers were great and the service was amazing. We sat at the bar to have a drink and wait for our table, but the bartender was so good, we decided to stay put and eat there. Kay was hands down the best bartender I have ever watched work. She is super friendly, and VERY competent. The atmosphere is very casual. There are several tv's at the bar, which his pretty big. Even though it was crowded, I never felt smushed eating at the bar. We had a great time.

vd6UyglHOt7l3QSQXeIhFw.text: I'll go ahead and add my 5 stars and spare you the 2 cents - other than to say the food here is fantastic, the place is clean, the staff is nice, the decor is cool, the location is awesome, and they had jawbreakers in the candy basket on the way out.   Definitely go here and eat.

cYqSphWYn6c5iIb0lf_0SA.text: The burgers were phenomenal as were the sweet potato tots. The beer selection was lacking a little, hence the lack of a fifth star. I can go to a ton of burger joints anywhere, the beer and atmosphere need to earn my fifth star.

oin5beePGldQoLnpNMp-ew.text: One of scottsdale's many hidden gems. Burgers are amazing! We had a classic cheese burger and their chili cheese burger. Needless to stay, we left with our taste buds bursting and bellies full! Highly recommended!

xeYzVvMK5VeWmHRu0NJB3w.text: Excellent burger and service. Sweet potato fries with special dipping sauce were awesome. Denise, the owner, was very welcoming and intimately involved in the business which unfortunately is very atypical these days and seeing this was refreshing.

8N6Tur1H4l6HgwFPib9E4Q.text: So before my favorite burgers where from delux on camelback. Then my friends took me to this place. This is now my number one place in az. Amazing atmosphere, service is a little slow, but food is the best.

9yzeXrWwiaxbzVG8XUUdpQ.text: The worst service of my life! If I could give them less than one star I would. It took thirty minutes to get a waitress and forty five minutes to get water. Tons of waiters and waitresses but nobody seems to know what is going on. I am never coming back and would never recommend this place to anyone.

6e9nyfbpPBkaxIqMvkjMwA.text: The sweet potato tots are to die for!! And my boyfriend got the mac n cheese burger which was amazing. Next time I want to try the PBJ and bacon burger!

YEYkQr7lneqOhK5TqAxs5g.text: We bought a groupon a few years ago and loved it and went back this past weekend and it is exactly the same as I remember...delicious! The buns on the burger are amazing. We brought our three year old and the server was so sweet with her. Will go back over and over again! They have a great happy hour time frame :)

mY8lc4O6XihzCTDeh9pkuA.text: My friends and me decided to hit this Old town burger joint this past weekend night. The wait to seat 4 people took over 30 minutes which was understandable seeing the large crowd and limited seating available. We still decided to wait and explore the food options. After a long wait we got seated, offered drinks and our hostess Lauren was very friendly, suggestive from the menu list to choose our food. We started of with the chicken wings in medium and gold sauces and some onion rings. Both appetizers were really good, wings being made to perfection.  The real attraction were the big list of burgers on the menu. I went with the Hawaiian Burger (medium) on pretzel bun. The burger was just perfect with little pink inside and it was a huge burger. Along with the sweet potato tater tots (best tots ever. Hands down) this burger has to be among the best I ever had. Altogether this joint made me a big fan and I will be visiting here often from now.  Thank you for the wonderful experience.

M4xE-pFxbCucihtVEfvGPg.text: The PBJ and bacon burger is by far the best burger I have ever had. Sounds weird but worth the try for sure. Great prices and great service too.

IUTo2GKcTyXWELvRWh8GAw.text: Tried this little place out, on the advice of a friend......TOTALLY AMAZING!! I do believe its my new favorite place for a terrific burger! Sweet potatots are addicting and a delicious change from fries! Service was outstanding, everyone smiling and truly looking like the were enjoying themselves! We will be back!!!!! Soon!!!!

q6g3Hbwr9ncEnFEMGixoMw.text: The atmosphere is fun and the service is as well.  I had the calamari which is very different but great!.. I also love the wedge salad.  This place is a winner, I will be back.

gwN_55agFPRdpsnNFCrnfQ.text: I was in the mood for a burger and thought I would give this place a try based on reviews and being in close proximity. The atmosphere is good, but the hostess that seated me looked more like a customer and was busy talking to a friend.  I ordered the 5 oz Relapse Know Poblano Burger cooked medium wrapped in lettuce with the Sweet poToToes.  I was surprised how quick it came out and after my first bite, it was obviously undercooked.  Basically it was lightly browned on the outside and cold and raw in the middle.  I sent it back and it was replaced with no problem, but still more on the medium rare side than medium.  The sweet potato Tots were ok, but I think they could offer something of better quality. I was not impressed enough to go back and prefer the burgers and fries at Red Robin over the Rehab Burger Therapy.

bnFEVrn75B-7ms566XLzlg.text: Rehab is awesome. What can I say that hasn't been said? It's all True. I love pretzel buns and the PBnJ burger will surprise you, it's actually damn good!

2Dwpqnx9wkq0nwEhFQUsiw.text: Came here the other day around 5 pm. The inside area was completely sat (maybe because it was 110 out) so we decided to sit on the patio. I had the Mac and cheese and a burger, the food definitely made up for the scorching heat. Great place to grab a burger if you feel like having a cheat day.

gz3wJRR2W9P-8CEspcfhJQ.text: Got to try the pb&j bacon burger , so good.. I was impressed and have to give them the #1 ranking now and did tuckered goes to #2

vgtq2teQay0wAB7jO8MxrA.text: Great food - we tried a few apps. Loved the chili cheese fries and the spicy mac and cheese. Onion rings were just okay - a bit too much breading. Great burgers - mostly cooked to specifications (maybe a little closer to medium than medium rare).  The menu is large and difficult to choose which burger you want. I like the multiple bun options. Service was attentive.

nDflYwxA6iYINjgTZeO4HQ.text: Props for the menu ideas but the burger flavor itself seemed average. The sweet potato tots moved this place from 3 stars to 4 stars in our books.

-k0RPCY4_wr2cHkL35H8rg.text: The wait was worth it!  Great food and Drinks.  Great wait staff.  This is one of the best restaurants I've been to in a while.  Met some nice people here.

by76n8-PNuqeHaIMTx0MlA.text: PB&J burger all day.  Peanut butter, Sriracha & grape jelly.  It tastes like a spicy sweet bbq burger.  You will not regret it.  We moved to Scottsdale 3 months ago and have already visited multiple times and will continue to do so!

Lid2K6yEzoN7qTResYJqsw.text: Most flavorful burgers. If you like sweet potatoes, try the tots and ask to try all the sauces. I'm a Chipotle aioli kind of guy.

hK_w6gqkaq73kGobxcNHoA.text: Great experience! Food and service was great. We had the pig wings, sauce was amazing! Jalapeno popper burger with the pretzel bun and the sweet potato tots were great! Highly recommend!

Dqaal9ae_bPNI2weVoAY8w.text: Sooooo damn good!!!! One of the best burgers I have ever had! Wings were superb too!! Great laid back atmosphere.

hx4pf3-XUsQWeCtXpQSr2A.text: If you want a burger where the patty itself is the star of the show, you do not want a rehab burger. Here, the patties are overcooked, under-charred, and under-flavored. The menu offers a wonderful variety of fixins to add to your burger, including at least three different types of buns (brioche, pretzel, and gluten free) and lots of package deals like the Hawaiian burger I had last night (ham, pineapple, jack cheese [I think], and a mostly tasteless liquid claiming to be a teriyaki wasabi aioli) but the beefy taste, if it's there at all, is almost entirely buried beneath the rest. And I say this even though neither the ham nor the pineapple were very tasty. My wife had this problem last time with the PB&J burger, which tasted pretty much like a PB&J sandwich without the burger. I'm not telling folks to stay away, but I think they'll find the sandwich descriptions on the menu more pleasing than what they find on their plates.

drxUkSmrN81KBpaLReqBfA.text: I came here after RnR was too busy and i ordered the quesadilla and portabello burger and both were delicious. The server we had was awesome and a riot. The happy hour is great and def choose this over RnR.

ru3A1EU0N44sJBENdrM_Xg.text: I arrived and was the third person in at opening. I was greeted very warmly. I looked around at all the cool tvs playing all types of everything except news. The decor was great. Surfer, bicycle, RC Planes and snowboarding props all around. The music was beach themed and fun. I decided to sit at bar to look at some basketball. The bartender was very friendly and knowledgeable. She let me sample a beer that I havent had before. She was very helpful in helping me decide which burger to choose. I went simple and got the huge burger with 1000 island, The MacSomething.  She upsold me to the onion rings which looked great. I also ordered the pig wings which I knew were going to be too much, but I wanted something to munch on later that night. The food arrived and looked fantastic.  I jumped in on the onion rings first, they had a nice golden brown to them. I got 5 with my order.  I picked one up and it was cold. That put a disappointed frown on my face. They were ice cold. I waved down the bartender and explained to her my problem and she said she would take care of it and get me some more. I said no problem. I decided to go to the burger next. I cut it in half and it was perfectly cooked to med-rare. Happy happy. It taste great too. You could taste the smokeyness of the fire on the meat. Darn good. I tried the pig wing, it was alright. Alittle overcooked in my opinion, but good enough. I received my onion rings and "Viola", they were the same ones I had originally except they were re-dropped into the fryer and came back dark and burnt, black on edges. Very un-cool. To the owners, is it really going to kill your food cost to re-cook 5 slices of onions? That wrecked and really affected your scoring.  I was the second person to get my food, it wasnt even busy yet. If you are having staff upsell something, make sure the product is delicious. Sounds like kitchen staff made onion rings before burger, and they sat in window along time. I made sure the bartender and, I think she was the manager or owner, see that I was not pleased with onion rings and left them in clear view. They never said anything. Kinda disappointing considering it was a upsell. By the time I was ready to leave, the place was packed. Understanding the business, I know it takes time to get check. I even stood up to get their attention and the bartender finally came over after 10 minutes and asked if I needed anything else. Place needs 2 bartenders. The woman working cant take drink orders and food orders and then run food. She is not Superwoman, and Superwoman couldnt handle that rush either. You get bad customer service. Which I received.  Damn good burger though. If onion ring problem didnt occur, probably would have given a 4 or 5.

4S9xXe_SCteYdNSyAwYQdg.text: Wow. Excellent service, friendly, easy to talk to, and make you feel extremely welcome at their place! Food is wonderful, be sure to get the sweet poTOToes!! Don't expect to get in and out in a reasonable time though, this place is about relaxing and enjoying your time. This is my kind of therapy!

gAI0X3FuzVdY8YG4bGJsgw.text: Great place for a meal.  Service wasn't bad, but not the best.  Food however is worth the trip!  Their burgers are very impressive! Order any of them and you won't be disappointed.  Fun atmosphere and lively.  Bring your appetite and be ready for something deliciously different!

pCwXl1_ynwqDIgoSmqzlGg.text: We ate here during our vacation in Arizona. It was better than I expected. Good food and good atmosphere. The food came pretty quickly but we arrived around 2pm and there was plenty to watch on the flat screens while waiting.

xMP--8X0dbBLoB4Yw84OWA.text: Love this bar!! Me and my boyfriend come here all the time and it's so close we just ride our bikes and come for a great burger and the pig wings!! The staff is great and it's such a great place to just have a drink and chill

F8nY7yEE4xO2G-EWTEVDuw.text: I have only been here once but I am always trying to get my girlfriend to go back.The burgers are great, as are the sweet potato tots. The margarita was also delicious. I recommend the pretzel bun!

UavH-x-S1TX0mBTFEwkQuQ.text: Outstanding burgers, I had the backyard BBQ, the others in my group had the Swiss & mushroom, bacon cheeseburger, and hatch chili burger. We all agreed best burgers we've ever had. Fries were fresh, the sweet potato  tater tots are good, the onion rings were excellent. The staff was attentive and friendly, the owner popped over to check on us. Overall a very we'll run burger joint with excellent food. I will definitely visit again.

e06BenOuejvmb6YP_1A-cw.text: Possibly the best bacon cheeseburger I have had this decade! Nice cool Blue Moon beer on draft to wash it down.  Restaurant was clean.  Wait staff effecient and courteous.

h3ernty7xyYL2q8YXLVjWg.text: One of the best burger joint in town , the quality of the patties is top notch . Get the poblano burger !

oUmqoZiPEz0ikPhkS6LaLA.text: Seriously,anything on this menu will leave your mouth watering BUT my personal fave is the hangover on a pretzel bun!! Yuuuummmmyyyyy! :)

I5wEY07aDdzWFbFDQh4Oug.text: A good time was had by all. We had everything and split it and passed it around. Mushroom burger, pig wings? (Pig wings?) Great!  Tator tots really! Where else can you get tator tots. Mac & cheese, a blue cheese wedge, and a chili burger. E erything was good and hot. We gave the server a run for her money - unintentionally but my group was needy.... so sorry for the trouble.

eOrfZ0rz-AB0dpNwVUhM1g.text: THIS PLACE ROCKS. Eat there about once a week now. The Hangover Burger on a pretzel bun with deep fried corn on the cob and $1.50 PBR's cannot be beat. I travel a lot, I always come here the night I get home. The staff is the best. The food is the best. The atmosphere is the best. Instead of a bowl of mints at the door, there is a bucket of jawbreakers. Classic!

MkWP9owE5SBozduWcDzKXQ.text: Delicious!!!! I had the hangover burger which was so good and I could only eat half. The sweet potato tots were my fave with whatever yellow sauce they serve on the side. I topped it off with a chocolate lava milk shake... Yes please! This place gives a relaxed vibe, good food, decent prices for the sometimes over priced Scottsdale area & I will def be back to try the pb&j burger :)

hxYeHv_-9E3seASYDbrl_A.text: First I must say the food was excellent. Definitely a must try if you are a burger fan. However, service was lacking energy and familiarity with menu, hope to go back and possibly just sit at the bar!

3tXq1xuLEKMtzCKvKk60Ow.text: Had a delicious PB & J burger!  Sounds crazy...crazy good!  The atmosphere was fun and the service was great!  I'll be back next time we are in town!

R2owA1LWvu3lCRIla78tJQ.text: Love the food here! Some odd burgers like the PB&J with Sriracha burger....but it was amazing!! The desserts are simply delicious! I really enjoyed the pot brownie.... not what it sounds like lol

I5PJPfm0Zd2SR9QqsDCFJQ.text: I've only gone here for lunch, but I can assume it's just as great for dinner or an evening drink. I've taken co-workers here for lunch and thought the atmosphere was fine for a super casual lunch. The wait staff and bartenders always seen friendly and accommodating.

Z-k8LFZgQxUim38joPUMzg.text: Love, love, love this place! We were on vacation in Scottsdale and saw this place on yelp so we had to try it. We ate there everyday for lunch! Yes, it's that good. We tried several of the menu items and everything was excellent, but our favorite was the Rodrigo Da Vinci salad.  The service was great, everyone was helpful and friendly. The atmosphere was inviting, very trendy and comfortable. Wish I lived in Scottsdale just so I could eat there everyday.

pKbMqPFAhJTdjEshy7-Q-A.text: I've went to Rehab Burger twice and both times had absolutely AMAZING food!!  The first time we went the bartender was so nice he made the experience really fun while we sat there and ate.  The second time I went was last Wednesday for lunch and the young girl waitress with the long brown hair had the worst attitude, she was very snyde & not very helpful at all... which is too bad because I brought my friend who had never been before and he got a bad impression of the atmosphere.  Hangover Burger - My favorite!!  Love a fried egg on a juicy burger.  Chili Burger - Also delicious but not as good as the Hangover in my opinion.  Definitely check it out but don't sit in the snotty girl's section if you want to enjoy your experience!!

1Y3fUkmg6Dc0vO-P5oGdqg.text: Vettes and Rods Car Club has a GREAT time at  Rehab Burger Therapy this last Sunday! Awesome food and AWESOME service! We had at least 35 members there and we could not have had a better time! MOST COOL! And - I heard a few friends say "I think we have found our new favorite place" :-) Thanks again for a great time!

fYWtl3ntLY4yfhD6zFwdQQ.text: Great food. Try everything! Our server, Andrea, was super accommodating & sweet. Our burger wasn't cooked to order and she was quick to fix it and keep us happy while waiting. The misters were a nice touch, great music and just a nice first time experience.

M0sOay-Xrd7gkDoAx52yWA.text: I really hate to do this. I know that writing this will only bring more people to this gem that my wife took me to. Simply put, this place is awesome! Its a little place on the South End of Old Town in Scottsdale. My wife had the Blue Cheese Bacon Burger and I had the Hawaiian Burger. My wife is not a burger person per say, but really like her's which she ordered on a pretzel bun. I on the other hand love my beef, and the sweetness of the pineapple was perfect. The Pineapple Teriyaki Aioli sauce brought it together nicely. The sweet potato tater-tots where the best!  The restaurant is done in a "surfer" theme with one TV showing surfing competitions and the rest showing a range of sporting events. Sitting in the bar you expect to walk out onto the beach.  If you are ever in Old Town and want a large choice of beer and a great burger, this is the spot. But shhhhhhh, don't tell anybody.

ZPg7-gEd4kD7M0-p2dv5Kw.text: I have been here a few times now, and every time, had a wonderful experience. So far, some of the best burgers in town in my opinion. I love the atmosphere, and the service has always been good. Great destination for a bike ride!

0LA00n5HwaxRiRfATmQRoA.text: We decided to try Rehab because it smelled good.  I can not ever remember having a burger that was this good.  Service was fantastic.  We will be back

wG0cc1sD48Nb56x63YZ45Q.text: Excellent Burgers, friendly wait staff. Quality is there...will go back again! Thank you Rehab...

-VMpSgva5U0RjM6baBEedA.text: Awesome!!!!! I ordered the pbj burger and it tasted heavenly! Service here is great, as well.

N271s3k_1id9jBO88iJ2yA.text: Just when you think you've had just about any kind of burger, you stumble across Rehab Burger Therapy. The burgers were great, and the service was amazing!

coYqyEAJYRjHS7o4pm5UGg.text: Little disappointed in service and food. Sat at the bar and was told by bartender she would be right back. She was and I ordered a beer. She came back five minutes later and took the guys order next to me and then took my order. Guy next to me got his fish tacos within five minutes. I waited fifteen to twenty for my burger. I understand a burger takes longer than a fish taco but it was obvious they forgot to grab my order when it was done because when I got it, although it tasted good, the burger was luke warm as were the fries. The real kicker is the entire time I waited for my burger I was never checked on. That in itself will cause me to think twice before eating here again.

DX1uM6cB0EzaFmcsl1abhQ.text: Place was so awesome. You felt like you were dining by the beach. Staff was super nice and friendly. Peanut butter/jelly bacon burger was delicious.

xV3YqsUMYDaYa29aCNw3pw.text: Every time I have eaten here it has been great. From the staff to the food. This is one of my favorite places in oldtown to go unwind with friends

Mu5m4WKjFFg4NVUMxNxiSA.text: Great food and great service.  We parked next door and as we walked up, there was a bright and happy hostess to greet us. Everyone in the restaurant was smiling and said high to us. I felt like I was Norm walking into Cheers.  Our waitress was excited and knowledgeable, bright and fast. We had some really good burgers, but I would pass on the sweet potato tots next time.  I love sweet potato fries but I've tried SP tots at a few places now and they always seem to be bland.  But the burgers and the service make this place.  I wish we had one of these in the west valley.

aOtroAdeg7ClB7p9ReffrA.text: Rehab has the best burgers in town period. I  have tried almost every burger and I have yet to be disappointed. The burgers are always fresh and delicious. I love their bar and happy hour. The staff is also super friendly. If you want to have the best burgers in town, you need to come to rehab! You won't be disappointed!

dLpqxkRaWHw4Eat5jPJJhg.text: Headed there for lunch today with mouth watering thinking how good it was last time we were in town!

vI-x08JwxJ_mpv_y2OFrpw.text: A wide variety of burger options and we're not talking about the run of the mill options here.  Large servings, great flavors and a friendly staff.  Would recommend.

oEXEh0QOjMcipBaE4weEAw.text: Pretty good..but not amazing?  Then again in NY we are spoiled with tons of great burger options so maybe I'm biased?  Though I will say that I am a fan of the ghost pepper burger and it is not spicy!  Definitely a good use of the pepper in this burger so bravo for that!

ERkk4ZgFbMZXqSxK7guvZw.text: I have visited Rehab Burger Therapy several times.  Every time I have been there, I have been greeted promptly and with a smile.  The atmosphere is so relaxing! The music is so laid back with Bob Marley, Sublime, etc.  The service spot on and friendly!  The servers have always been great with their recommendations  The burgers are innovative and oh so tasty and juicy.  The onion rings are to die for and the sweet potato tots are a must!  I took my brother and his two year old daughter today and the server couldn't be more attentive and super sweet.  My only recommendation would be to offer a couple of options for kids meals, but other than that...  Try the Hangover Burger or the Peanut Butter and Bacon Cheese Burger on Pretzel Buns!  Yes, I said it!  Delicious!!! Top Notch

kFgveXlcGeIheSmOE04YcQ.text: Have the bbq sauce I've ever tasted.. It should be bottled and sold.. Definitely will be back

X1_AJvvJpUSWY5ctfwJvLg.text: Everything was amazing. Food incredible, service great, and good beer selection. If your in town, you MUST go here.

sTbCRw_QY1_D78K44Dw94w.text: This restaurant was tasty for lunch. My husband had a burger and beer, and I enjoyed a delicious salad. The salad was large and each topping was fresh. It's not always easy to find a place that makes a sizable and yummy salad. I would happily dine here again. The weather was so pleasant when we visited that we enjoyed lunch on the patio, another highlight.

dRLoOSfrdx-H5dcRUzlXIA.text: Love love love this place! Have to go on a regular basis to get my fix! Staff is friendly and helpful. Food is incredible. Cool little joint! Highly recommend!

oZ9mbvotSovCzu8tPfcLVQ.text: I was so excited to come try this place with all the great reviews while on vacation . This place is nice also great music but with that said the mushroom Swiss burger wasn't very good , was dried out and not hot. Server was chatting away with other employees and wasn't doing his job/ bad service. One the good side the sweet potato tots were great !!! Maybe it was just the server and the mushroom and Swiss burger but I would not recommend this place !

ZMXAf5DTbQM_PdJEVOtwPQ.text: Every time we have tried to eat here there is at least a 45 min. wait, so we usually just go somewhere else as the location in old town permits just walking 5 mins in any direction to find 10 other places to eat. Finally decided to wait it out on Sunday and had a 45 minute wait, which is awkward as there isn't actually anywhere to wait....people just kinda stand around in the parking lot between cars. Anyways we get seated at the end of a community table and the food was good. Not amazing, but good. The last third of my burger ended up being too underdone for me so I didn't finish all of it. Service was okay. I'd eat here again, but I wouldn't wait for it again.

zT4ANwjoufTFk4pvjzifFg.text: We have been back several times and every time the service and food are great. but, tonight they totally knocked it out of the park. Fantastic friendly service, great food, and the wings were as good or better than any wings you can get in a dive bar back in Western New York.   Great job!

70WKrHJMmMAYbzfzvQM6zA.text: Poor service.  Star is mostly due to immediate lack of greeting. I think need to take some lessons from their Canadian neighbors chain cactus club and get a better business model than actual hire enough staff and those that want to work rather than chat.  We waited to be acknowledged at door and then took another time to get us seated. Then once seated we were on our own for a good 15 minutes before any welcome.  Crazy.  Our server was super friendly once he spoke to us.  I expect to be greeted at door pretty much immediately.  There were three servers standing at register at back of restaurant chatting.  Do they know who is sustaining their job.  Obviously not.   Food cam fairly quickly with good recommendations. Server was very helpful and attentive.  Good food. Had calamari and poblano burger with onion rings.  We are pretty spoiled in Vancouver so can't say it was outstanding. Corona Rita was ok as I thought it was usually served with full size corona. At least it is in Vancouver.  So in a nutshell first impression was poor but overall I give it a 3 star.

NvPHEp5Ot0E_7lycFD7Svw.text: They kill it, best burgers in old town. Great menu, great staff. Pb&j is a must for first timers or people out of town

EiLqZhAFI1OARKgkLVzn2g.text: I've never been much of a quitter but I'm thinking I may need a longer stint in Rehab.   This place is great.   These people made one of my other fav's so why not start anew.    We started with the Pig Wings (the sauce will be my new favorite on everything), YUM.   We proceeded to have the burgers (Hatch Chili Burgers and Mush/Swiss).  The hub ordered a 1/2 Shelby Spinach Shalad (he wasn't sharing).   We enjoyed the Fries (I did not see a Mermaid) and Tots (oh so good).   I recommend the sauces in this order  Peach Habanero, Spicy Ketchup, Chipotle Aioli, Stellar Mustard, Teriyaki Pineapple Aioli.    Like we really needed more so we had the Key lime pie.     The team at Rehab are great!   Everyone is helpful and engaging.     Whatever your addiction, they have the Therapy!   See you soon.

njQdXTe961FFzJh-PsnGGQ.text: I love this place! If I lived closer I would be there all the time! Doesn't matter if you get a salad or a burger, you never leave hungry. Very relaxing with a wonderful staff. Even the regulars go out of their way to talk and say hi.  This is one if my favorite spots if Im with my son or just having a beer at the bar.  Thanx Rehab! :)

KX7eLS4Re9NKHE5wMYui-Q.text: Best burger i have ever eaten!!  PBnJ burger...sounds bizarre but holy canoli...DELICIOUS!  And our server Tearin was great!  Very friendly and knowledgeable.  The sweet potato tater tots r really good too!

Rd7PW2EdDrvyVKJ2J0FRiw.text: One of the best burgers I have ever had. My fav burger is in Pittsburgh. But most def the best burger in phoenix. I love the sweet potato tots. They give you so much food. I love the breakfast burger.

B4Eu3-2D7IqhHXOUhRM15Q.text: Great food and drinks!  The service was a bit slow but our waitress was extremely nice and the place was packed.  My burger was well prepared and delicious.  The fries are tasty and the sweet potato tater tots are interesting (eat 'em with the spicy ketchup).  It's quite loud but it's a great atmosphere.

KIzn2qZQ7rPJWqdK1Y6-7Q.text: After reading all of the reviews, I had high expectations of the food and what a disappointment. First, the good. The ambience is fun, good vibe. The food was disappointing. We had chicken wings with sauces on the side, as recommended by the waitress. The sauces were good. The BBQ hamburger on brioche bun was supposed to come with onion rings, cheese and BBQ sauce. There was one huge onion ring (too big for the burger and not flavorful),  the cheese was a little sprinkle of grated cheese (next to none), sweet potato tater tots which were flavorless.  All the food lacked seasoning. Too many good restaurants in Scottsdale to go back.

Bpu9Gljl1uPW7hG_tFGQcg.text: I will never forget the first time I ate the "porkster" burger here, mostly because never before had I had impure thoughts about a hamburger.   the decor is fine, though i do wonder why there are so many damn bikes strapped to the walls/ceiling. the servers have been friendly and attentive every time i've been there.

Y3lOLDH25ESwknNYu_K9Qw.text: What a Great Clean suprise in Scottsdale , with all the over done facades, this place KNOWS HOW TO PLEASE the customer right from first contact !   This burger place is awesome and the great selection for a burger is the best hands down !  Hatch Green chili , out of this world , Thanks for the recommdation from the best wait staff in this Scottsdale !   The tabel side visits were frequent , and a visit from Willy , (owener ) Top of the class in Customer service !    Thank you for bringing  a True fresh burger place ALIVE in Scottsdale , and stay strong , Love to keep YOU and the Rehab Burger Therapy around for a long run in the valley .   WE WILL be back to treat ourseoves to the rest of the menu after WE REHAB from the monster buger we just ate !

76ZxnMM4JuFNAwA7dTYe1w.text: Dear sweet baby Jesus this place is amazing! We make the trek up to Scottsdale from Gilbert at least once every two months for these burgers. The peanut butter & jelly sriracha burger is to die for! We usually try to switch it up every time we come and the specials are delicious but we always go back to ye olde favorites....pb&j or hangover. Try the sweet potato tots with the Chipotle aioli.... SO GOOD. Decent beer selection too. Sometimes you run into your douchey Scottsdale bar goer pre-gaming on a Saturday but the burgers make it worth it.

c27nrBxvIccMWj92st0t3Q.text: We decided to give Rehab Burger a try when my sister told me that this place has the best burgers we would find in the Phoenix area. We luckily got the last table, and didn't have to wait on a Monday night. I couldn't imagine how busy this place gets on the weekends. I enjoyed the atmosphere. It felt like it was a little burger shack in California. I liked how diverse the burgers were. I decided to get the PBJ bacon burger. I'm a huge fan of sriracha, so I was sold when I found out that it came on it. I got the sweet potato tots for the side. To be honest I was a little disappointed. Don't get me wrong it was a very unique, and good burger. Unfortunately, it was just that.. a good burger. The sweet potato tots were fantastic though. But for how well known they are I expected a little more bang for my buck.

UtXfEheJ_JoEWgrQESeZgA.text: Tried the Hangover Burger on a pretzel bun. It held up to the hype. Excellent burger. My wife had their Hatch Burger? I didn't pay attention to what it was called.  Anyway, she loved it so much that she  considered  ordering another one to go. Lol. Great atmosphere, great service and excellent Burgers.

KmMoNwxFeCg71KBCCATk_A.text: So it's superbowl weekend at 11:15pm Saturday and we walk into this place that's about 75% full and sit at the bar ready to grab a burger.  We hope to just relax at the bar and grab some tasty grub after a long night but instead we are greeted with a bellowing and extremely unfriendly "sorry guys, we're closed for the night!" from behind the bar.  Really?? At 1115 on a Saturday night, the Saturday night before the Superbowl in Scottsdale? ????  I am neither a Seahawk nor a Patriots fan and didn't travel far for this treatment, rather,  this place is in my very own neighborhood and I have left an amazing review here once before.  I will tell everyone I know to steer clear of this place.  No excuses.  Nobody deserves this  treatment.

ZGtrWwWEVpEoW_yHh-5hLA.text: Really good burger! Some can be very big so don't waste your money if you don't think you can handle it. Try the sweet potato tots.

UvZ8MaWOg60e4xmzLbzxLQ.text: This place has an awesome burger selection. Waitress suggested either the PB&J burger or spicy Mac and cheese burger. I tried the Mac and cheese burger. Meat was high quality and cooked as ordered. Burger had a full serving of Mac and cheese. Mac and cheese was so good I'd have ate it alone. I had a pretzel bun, overall, awesome burger. My father ordered the PB&J burger which he really liked, peanut butter was more of a peanut sauce. Service was pretty good. Place was packed for lunch. Would come back to try some of the other burgers.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and cheese burger. Big serving of Mac and cheese including a layer on burger.

J34P2_68ayYNARB6fVQXeA.text: Burgers, Babes, Booze & Beer. The 4B's. What else will give you that warm and fuzzy feeling inside.  The house decor is straight off the boardwalk. The guys and gals are laid back with that beach cruzer, surfer feeling.  The founders of Rehab Burger Therapy are Wiley Arnett, Ken Likewise and Denise Nelson, who had been with Oregano's Pizza Bistro for the past 18 years and decided to do their own thing.  The menu is small but the burgers are large.  The meat was fresh ground and not over worked with seasonings. The burger patty was formed perfectly, thick and very moist. The cheese was also perfectly melted. There was a double portion of fries.  To wash down this tasty burger, I ordered a Four Peaks 8th Street Ale. Poured into a clean thick glass, it has a clear amber color with a medium head that laced nicely. Aroma is mild, with some hops as well as a slight malt finish.  I believe the trio knows how to get good food to the table.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

2FUHw86GNgB054nL9IHweA.text: Made it out to Rehab.  It was Friday night and it was busy.  We waited about 30 minutes and were seated inside.  Our waitress looked super high but was very nice.  She took our drink order and came back with them promptly.  Then she took our order.    Then we waited, and waited, and waited...and... waited.   I dont know exactly how long we waited but it had to be close to an hour.  I understand you are busy but Im talking wings, fries, and burgers.  Did the blazed waitress forget our order?  Finally our food comes out.  She forgot a couple of our requests but we were so hungry we were just happy to eat something.  I had the hangover on a pretzel bun sweet potato tots and some wings.  The bun was awesome.  The burger was a good size and above average.  The hatch chile was almost flavorless.  The tots were not good.  The wings were hot, crisp, and excellent.  My wife had the hatch burger and fries.  She was not happy with her meal and couldnt even finish half of it even though we were starving.  We both agreed the food is drastically overrated and the service is poor.  So then we wait for our bill, and waited, and waited...and wait...theres our stoned waitress doing some kind of charades with another table laughing and hugging them.  We watched her for at least 15 minutes chat and visit with them.  I finally waived her over and paid and left.  I have been wanting to come here for a long time and have heard great things about it.  Maybe it was a bad night.  Maybe a bad waitress?  Maybe I ordered wrong?  I'm not sure but the food was very average.  Actually reminded me of Islands Burgers.  Both the decor and the taste but with a terrible wait time.    If I was in the area and wanting a burger I'd consider giving it another try but its not at the level of recommendation or top burger joint at this point in my life.

L97rxwZRdqy45_Wnpc5yVA.text: Service and food were excellent. Our waitress Robin did an amazing job with us and our 3 kids. Port-a-Burger burger and sweet potato tator tots is a great choice. We also tried the PB&J burger, which ranks very high on my personal burger chart.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Port-a-Burger

Kw-KCdYbbPlU1m8_b4oQBg.text: Very good. Excellent service. The PB&J bacon cheeseburger was delicious! Had a very nice experience.

dy9PjrSjcE0eCDESOsAI8g.text: YES. This place was great. Big juicy burger with a bunch of great fixings. I had the BBQ burger and their sauce was excellent. Service was great and this place was packed. If I'm ever out here again, I'll be back!

bwdgDn-WZVEk5XEnLRft-Q.text: We chose the B.Y.O.B burger, always a fan of keeping it real! The B.Y.O.B. burger stands for build your own burger, and our only addition was the cheese. They have plenty to choose from so you can find one to suit your taste. All burgers, and sandwiches , come with your choice of Skin-On-Fries or Sweet PoTOToes, which are sweet potato tater tots. Definitely go with the tots and ask for a side of the teriyaki pineapple aioli. They make it in house and it is to die for. Perfect for the tots. You can thank us later. If you do choose the fries, get the spicy ketchup to accompany them, its' also made in house. Read our review here... schmoozeaz.com/blog/?p=8...

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Bm4ZCjQI97dZGlm6nhhw5w.text: Excellent burger place! I was stopping by after a baseball game on my own and sat at the bar. The bar staff was very friendly and gave great food recommendations. I had the PB&J and Sriracha burger and it was delicious. The PB acts like a cheese and the texture was really good. As a bonus, fries dipped in the jelly is a great combo. I will be back here again soon!

NyY_WZIriH8ANo5cOlVcQA.text: Not impressed at all. Burger had a funny taste to me, and just didn't have the wow factor. Just not that great of a burger, for the hour wait to be seated. I had to ask for fresh hot fries because the first attempt were cold and burnt. Sad after waiting so long as well for the food. Nice environment and friendly staff, but that's it. Not worth it and Won't be back.

0HuAbf3H-RzFCasr43TRNg.text: Outstanding service, excellent food, great atmosphere and over all one of the best ever.   For those in town visiting, you will not be dissatisfied, you will walk away full, happy and wanting to go back.   Enjoy, outstanding!!!!!!!!!

Su25LlN_09l7r2zPOQKd0A.text: Sorry, this is a tad late!  I met up with a good friend recently to hang outside and have a burger...since I only have 3-4 a year, it's kind of a big deal.  This place is tiny with a great patio and horrible parking but that is a minor hassle that ended up being worth it.  We got seated and began looking at the menu.  My friend is cutting a lot of things from her diet and was able to get a GF bun.  She was happy that the staff was able to recommend some things she COULD get.  Our waiter was fabulous that way!  I love 1000-Island burgers but Rehab doesn't have that sauce so I opted for fish tacos instead, with a side of sweet-potato tots.  OMG, they were heavenly!  The order was huge so I took them home and had leftovers for a week.  The tacos were great but messy.    We had a lovely time visiting with our neighbors at the next table and I noticed a lot of first-timers and was able to compare notes with them and even share some tots.  All seemed happy with the ambience and food, which says a lot about Rehab's menu selections.  The prices were very reasonable, which is always a reason to go back.  I could make a meal out of the tots alone and will become a regular when I can get a cheeseburger with 1000-Island.  Remember, it's a big deal!

Ep-qi6R6VSe-fx-0nV7qyw.text: Worst customer service experience. The hostess needs to be trained or replaced. Walked in and there was no hostess, waited 5 minutes and an employee came over took our name for first available seating. 20 minutes later and several groups seated (some that arrived after us) were seated. The hostess came out and asked who wrote our name down and I described the employee and she told me since she didn't write the name we had to go to the bottom of the list. That's poor customer service.

p_E6uNlwzfSPijC1W83P6A.text: 1) service was mediocre.  2) I did not receive my meal, the owner, not the waiter, had to come and tell me that they didn't have what I ordered after an hour of waiting.  3) the owner didn't actually make up for anything and said that he was "sorry"  4) I left hungry and the original waiter never came back to the table after the food was brought because he knew that he had screwed our table over.

2SKr3GhsOVh2bSF0TSqoyA.text: Amazing burgers and sweet potato tater tots. They are big, too. My husband said his turkey burger was the best he has ever had. We will be back the next time we get to Phoenix!

cJpOpDmXojWqSFb32ysY_w.text: Simply amazing the pbj burger is by far the best I have ever had. Parking is simple. Service is good. The place is pretty busy with a small wait but the burgers do not disappoint.

kP8b5oZVhSaARYa_tzK4PA.text: Sat at the bar on Friday night on the far left side closest to where the employees punch in on the computer. My friends and I overheard them gossiping the entire night and talking crap about everything and everyone. It was kind of annoying. Our bartender was really nice but service was kind of slow. I got the turkey burger and it was extremely underwhelming. I tried a few wings that my friends ordered and those were delicious. I would be reluctant to come back here, definitely no experience to write home about.

nl23jzpyn7qdTPaK8zm5_Q.text: Great place for burgers. Sometimes can be a pretty long wait, but between bar/outdoor patio its no prob!

zCvjPvxomUQp2twOHqKk6A.text: This was pretty good. The calamari was pretty good. . . a bit heavy handed on the batter, but over good. I got the Pablano Burger which was excellent! The chicken wings. . . eh, ok. The view and seating is very nice.

-vBDdv7QU_Ya0Ptjj1y2VQ.text: P-Nut Butter Jelly Burger w/ Pretzel Bun . Don't forget to get the sweet potato tater tots .

TNDHoXJGu1_MdiH4a6LkCw.text: I don't really understand the hype for this place... I had the Mushroom Swiss burger here and it was literally the worst burger I've ever had in my life. No, that wasn't an exaggeration.  It's too bad. A lot of the pictures Yelpers post here made this place's food look pretty good. Unfortunately, my burger was pretty disgusting with a grease-covered bottom bun floating in a pool of even more grease. Everything was made fresh, sure, but nothing was really outstanding here. Flavorless greasy burgers, mushy sweet potato tots, flavorless onion rings, all paired up with questionable sauces "recommended by the chef".  Oh, and our server was horrible too. Apparently we weren't interesting enough for her to give decent service to, as she let our food sit in the kitchen for five minutes while she chatted up with people at the bar... Then went right back to ignoring us after she had finally served us. Not all service was bad here, the table right next to us had a server that went back to them about 8 times compared to the 2 times our server wanted to grace us with her presence.  In summary: I'm not sure why this place seems to get the most love out of the 100 other burger joints you could hit up off of Scottsdale road, but to people who want something better than below average bar food, pass on this place.

qLTuS9y9DdJJWVCIQGcuJg.text: This was my first time here and it was pretty good. The service was pretty slow but the food made it worth it. I used to work in the restaurant industry so service is a big deal for me. I understand if it's busy the server may be doing several tables but tonight wasn't that busy. It took over ten minutes for us to be greeted... that's pretty ridic- if you're busy at least stop by and say hey I'll be with ya in a few. Took another five min for our waters to come, then five more for drinks from bar. Once I had my ketel one I was alright tho since our burgers were ordered too. For how slow the service was I thought the food would've been slow too, but it was the opposite. It came really fast so I was happy. I had the hangover burger and man was it good. Slap any burger with a fried egg on it and I'll be sure to try it at least one time.

MXaSvYtvX9AD_KppcWrH-w.text: So you go there with hopes and expirations of getting a hamburger to maybe even for for the Super Bowl. To find out they're closed. Closes on the Super Bowl specially a hamburger joint? These guys

jb7VJouOjK09_hIvUrc1Pw.text: The Burger was pretty awesome! For $16 I thought it was a little pricey but that's just my personal opinion. I would definitely go back, and I do recommend though!

KVZwZM5BmjpcPXlQNQhCnQ.text: I had lithe ghost burger but substituted chicken for beef. It was Amazing! Highly recommend and will be back again.

fTW0mDmfZkKZ4b0GzOBSSA.text: We got take out from here, called it in and they said it would be ready in 20 minutes, got there in 15 and had to wait a couple. Drove home 5 minutes away and fries were cold and burger was over cooked ... It was OK

ejwMyB4gBS0SjGZEZgV5eA.text: Great burgers! When you ask for Medium Rare, you actually get a medium rare burger!! Not overcooked! Great price for such big burgers. Great onions rings and fries too! One of the best burgers I have had in a very long long time!

-nAL82IBaYoxkCK2HuYADQ.text: This place is the real deal. Had the spicy Mac n cheese burger with their fries. The burger is HUGE and absolutely delicious. The fries are seasoned very well and the portion is generous. Their sauce game is ridiculously on point. Definitely recommend the wasabi mayo, their medium wing sauce, and their honey mustard wing sauce. Service was top notch. We brought a puppy and all of the staff came out to meet him and bring him water. Servers were so nice and incredibly attentive. This place is a must visit. Can't recommend enough!

-UecPlfrC_x3VGNYC13MJQ.text: A friend and I decided to try this place out since the staff at Scottsdale HonorHealth highly recommended it.   We were staying at the hospital for training, and it was great that this place was just around the corner from us. The interior decoration is like a beach hang-out theme, which I totally digged, but I felt like this would appeal more to party-goers and college students... ANYWAY, we were totally blown away with the amount of choices this place has to offer. I couldn't decided between three items until I finally settled for the turkey burger. (There's actually a PBJ and bacon burger on their menu ) IT IS HUGE! And it was very good for a turkey burger. I really liked the sweet potato tots they gave me, I was totally hooked.  I wouldn't mind coming out to this restaurant again in the future and would say this is definitely a place to check out at least once when you're in Scottsdale.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The turkey burger and sweet potato tots

_S13PTRGHdbyJ6eOeWSv5A.text: Wow!  Sweet potato tater tots are the bomb!  Wow!  Sweet potato tater tots are the bomb!  Wow!  Sweet potato tater tots are the bomb!  Yes, they deserve three call outs!  Bacon and blue burger was big, juicy, tasty and enough to make me want to return again to try more!  There are lots of great restaurants within walking distance of this place.  Don't discount it because you think it is just another burger joint.  They offer a whole lot more!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Blue and bacon burger with kick ass sweet potatoe tots.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

RG3BZscQjzNCN39tFPhm7g.text: 5* Customer Service is Exemplary/Awesome here!!  Stopped by on a rush lunch near an appointment only 45 minutes out. When we asked whether we would be able to complete our lunch in the allotted amount of time, we were informed that, after ordering, it would only take 15 minutes to receive our food. So, we went for it. After a table was cleared and care taken to properly clean it (very nice touch) we ordered drinks and looked through the menu. I ordered a Hatch chili relapse (single) cheeseburger (which comes with a choice of sides like onion rings, salad, etc.) and hubby ordered the fish tacos. His was the better dish. While my cheeseburger was really tasty (the beef is incredibly good) the chipotle sauce got lost on the pretzel bun (sauce was only found on the top bun) and I could only taste it in one bite. Overall, I would say that the burger was nothing special. However, the fish tacos (the byline under this menu item states, "We don't need no stinkin' badges!") were excellent!! We went over our allotted time by only 2 minutes; everyone who served us went out of their way to get us in/out the door in a reasonable amount of time, and we enjoyed our meal. The only cautionary note is that the noise level is `quite loud' and one toddler who came in with her parents seemed not to be able to tolerate it well and added her crying to the general noise level.

hTt-n8R1TlpkIDlbjNsZNA.text: Spicy mac and cheese burger. Nuff said.  Seriously though, this place is delicious. They have a lot of great options, from salads big ass burgers and turkey sandwiches. I've tried the Japaleno Popper burger, Spicy Mac and Cheese burger, and the Veggie burger. All were very good, but I'd recommend getting some spicy sauce to go with the veggie burger, it's a little plain if you have a zesty palate.

PACllr8VkiYGlFHLZGvhJA.text: With a daily HH from 11a-6p... this place is def appropriately named. With hippie, beach vibes, Rehab provides a great escape for guests looking for a quick drink or a hearty meal.   Drinks: Personally, I like a beer with my burger, but their HH feature a number of alternatives if that's what your heart desires.   Food: **disclaimer** Great burgers are one of two things holding me back from being a pescatarian so I'm slightly biased.  I asked the bartender and the waitress about their faves & worked my way down the list...  The PBJ & Bacon Burger:  A- amazing! B- better try one ASAP!  I traditionally loved peanut butter on a burger, but was def hesitant about the jelly - I hate grape jelly & adding the J felt like overkill, but it worked marvelously! Plus, the pretzel bun sealed the deal for me. Show your kindergarten self some love & try it!   The Spicy Mac-N-Cheese Burger:  Another combo of things everyone loves. Things to note with this one: A- the mac'N'cheese is fab! It made my super Southern, super picky heart smile. B- the burger is ginormous! I think it took me three sittings to finish it. Come hungry, leave happy!  C- about the spiciness... As a NOLA native, I know spicy. I love spicy. I live spicy. There's def a kick to it, but it's more like a tiny toddler throwing a tantrum kick than a black belt karate kick. Expectation management is everything.   Most burgers come in relapse (10oz) and relapse (5oz) sizes to fit your hunger level.  They offer an assortment of accompanying sauces for pairing.  Fries were standard. You can go halfsies on fries/ sweet potato tots if you like.  One of my friends loved the Know Poblano and my vegetarian friends raved about the veggie burgers. The food is def the highlight at this spot.  Service: Expect goldilocks service at this place- not too great, but yet not terrible. They'll prob get your order right, but don't expect much as it relates to attentiveness.   Ambience: Vibrant. Youthful. Neighborhood bar vibes. Great for solo sipping at the bar, table for two, or group outings!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Blue Moon is always apropos
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PBJ &amp;a Bacon Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac-N-Cheese Burger

o5Xr_z34-zlT_LJeRjp1QA.text: I've been here twice now. Both times were good!  I ordered the turkey burger with a side salad. My boyfriend ordered the mac n cheese burger with sweet potato tots.  All the food was good....but the sweet potato tots were AMAZING!!!  Wait was only about 15 minutes for 2 of us. We got there right before the dinner rush on a Friday.  This place gets packed and has a long wait. The restaurant itself is pretty small so plan accordingly!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac &amp; cheese burger with sweet potato tots!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Turkey burger on a pretzel bun &amp; salad

x1LFNpRku_vHzz3QZand3g.text: Stopped into this place a few ago.   Had to be one of the best burgers in Scottsdale.  I order a regular bacon cheeseburger, until the waiter the waiter mention a burger with peanut butter and jelly?   I tried it something new experience. You would think, how would that make a good combination? But it worked! Majorly best burger I had .   A bit pricey , but for the quality very well worth it ..

Fmu4VdftRb17uknWJUwFsw.text: Have heard a lot of good things about this place and it did not disappoint.   Was very busy for a Sunday afternoon and was told it would be 20 minutes but ended up around 10 minutes. We were seated in a community table, a long table that could sit maybe 20 people. Was not my first choice and then when a group of 12 came and sat by us it became more uncomfortable.    I ordered the Hangover Burger which has egg and bacon on a Pretzel bun and sweet potato tots. The burger was huge and delish,  the tots looked to good to pass up even though I am not a sweet potato person.  The service was back and forth,  you would get swarmed one moment and then would not see anyone for a while.   Nice patio area but wanted to sit inside, the decor was fun and one that you would see next to the beach. Reminded me a little of Hodads in Ocean Beach,  San Diego.   Great place to eat with great burgers.  Will be back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover Burger with Sweet Potato Tots

ydUIQuo_Yp7g_HMb38nZbA.text: An above average high end burger place.  The burgers here run to the thick style. I personally like thinner burgers with more charred flavor so these were not in my sweet spot.  That being said, they are done well and interestingly topped.  I had the Jalapeno Popper Burger which was tasty but surprisingly un-spicey.  The Backyard BBQ burger had a tasty pineapple based sauce and a huge onion ring on top.  The last burger we tried was simple with bacon and tomato and onion.  We had the regular fries (pretty decent), sweet tots (sweet potato tater tots that were a little sweet for my liking). Fun atmosphere that can get loud.  Overall I like the place but due to the price ($50 for 3 with one beer) I expected more.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Sweet Tots
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Jalapeño Popper burger

aC8DWgFUoeAzbWX60IuIrQ.text: PBJ burger is the main attraction here. And sweet potato tater tots.  Not sure if they invented it first, Slater's 50/50 chain in LA, or whoever, but they do their PBJ burger right and it's only $11 for a small or so (plenty big with a side of fries/tots) or $13 for a big on avg for all their burgers.  Lots of TV's, outdoor seating, good drinks at the bar. If you're in Old Town definitely a burger and drinks spot to watch sports too. Service also excellent.
