Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

BQodvSqz1ARair7u9bnwwg.text: The Mac and cheese burger was amazing. Next time I will try the peanut butter and jelly burger, only heard good things about it! Sweet potato tots were an unbelievable side!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Had the Mac and cheese burger, it was amazing. Sweet potato tots were to die for.

eDj-DSqqKpvJlsOqEKi6Bw.text: Wanna start by saying this was a slightly better then decent burger. They're pretty large for the price and better then many places I've been in Phoenix but not all that amazing overall.  I had the Hangover Burger. It was a 10oz patty with cheese, bacon, a fried egg and green chiles with a pretzel bun.   The burger looked fantastic however it seemed a bit light on flavor, slightly bland. Usually when I order a burger with a fried egg I don't need any type of sauce however I found myself dipping it in the ketchup they brought for the fries. The bottom bun became soggy pretty quick and it got annoyingly messy.   The service was good and the ambiance was typical for a place like this however the beer selection was kind of mediocre.   I'd probably come here again if other people wanted to try it but otherwise it was worth trying once I guess. Judging from the reviews maybe I just didn't order the right one or they were having an "off" day. It happens.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover Burger on a pretzel bun w fries.

6zrowqM9NZbUuw1n1T14Dw.text: This place came highly recommended and definitely didn't disappoint. We survived the 20 min wait out in the corral as this place was packed. But mercifully our food was quick to arrive. Bring a healthy appetite, these burgers are freakin good - and huge. One of the best we've ever had. The blue cheese burger has the blue cheese cooked inside the patty and I honestly had a hard time finding it, but it was still delicious. Verdict -our party agreed it was worth it to find this place.

vMhN5OZPatNa0HN71z275g.text: Best burger joint around.  Ever been to Slater's 50/50 for the PB&J Bacon Burger?  Thought that was good?  Wait until you try it at Rehab!  Oh yeah, they added Sriracha to the mix...what a great idea!   What else - how about the spicy mac and cheese burger?  Wow!  You could make a meal just with the spicy mac and cheese that comes with the burger, and you would say, 'That was great!', but add it to a burger, and a side of sweet potato tater tots with dipping sauce pairings?  Amazing.  Cool vibe in Old Town Scottsdale - park in the big lot east of the restaurant.  This is one rehab where you want to check in - not check out!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy mac n cheese burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bringing Norwegian family to Rehab!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac &#39;n&#39; Cheese burger - I ate a bunch of the mac before I took the photo  Couldn&#39;t help myself ;-)

dLcaOMFydYXoPRqAoS5nmw.text: Holy Smokes!!!!! These are some BIG burgers!!!!   We came into rehab burger excited to try these CRAZY looking burgers based off the pictures we keep seeing on yelp and Facebook, and we were not disappointed!   The Scottsdale location gives an island vibe to the restaurant and was packed even when it was on a Sunday night. We waited for around 30 minutes but this place was definitely worth the wait.   I came in hungry and I ordered a bbq pulled pork burger win sweet potato tater tots!  I also ordered some spicy Mac n cheese! The burger was HUGE and it was also super tasty! Be ready to make a mess cause you will definitely NOT be able to fit the whole burger in your mouth when you bite into it.  The sweet potato tater tots are soooo good too! They are SOOO much better than getting regular fries that I need to get this every time I come here!   The spicy Mac n Cheese was also sooo delicious! I know you are probably gonna come in here craving a burger, but if you're with a lot of friends, order the Mac n cheese cause it's sooo good!   Overall this place is awesome for some big freakin burgers that taste great! I'm so excited to try the one in Tempe now!   Tips: Come hungry, cause these are are HUGE burgers Get sweet potato tater tots, they're the best side you can get with your burger If you have some friends with you, try the Spicy Mac n cheese, it's sooo good too!  Be expected to wait if you come for dinner, it's pretty packed in there

hnCc1_s-yL1YUm0IxgizQg.text: Delicious burgers and dogs! Atmosphere is cool! Been there several times. The mac & cheese burger is amazing!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Lots and lots of mac n cheese on the mac n cheese burger.  The spicyness really kicks it up a notch. Great job!

tog33YgjGsUwcGsS59Jtrw.text: The only reason this gets 2 stars is because of our server, Sarah. She made the whole experience not suck! We went for my husbands 30th birthday, only the two of us, and after we ordered appetizers and dinner as soon as we sat down, waited an hour for the wings to come out. People say after us were served their meals before the wings came out... Thank god he liked them. Another 50 minutes later dinner came out and it was cold, not even warm. They offered to remake things, Sarah was lovely, but sitting for 2.5 hours to get food is ridiculous. We agreed to have it remade, and paid for the meal. By that time neither of us were even hungry...it was our first time in, not sure if we will be back. So bummed!

157SvbOjmAdYvLM16uSsPA.text: Deliciousness - 4/5 Happiness - 5/5  Wow! Talk about blowing you away.   Right off the bat, this has to be one of the most ideal Happy Hour possibly. 11:00-6:00 most days, and one all-day happy hour on Thursday.   That wouldn't matter if this place weren't SO good. The food is high quality and lots of fun burger combos. Plus it has bucked the trend of high-end burger joints by refraining from shoestring fries (a bane of my existence) and instead, offers nice medium-cut fries that look like they came from a potato. The burger was out of control - a hamburger topped with prime rib and horseradish sauce. Obviously not designed for a healthy lunch, but a real plus for total satisfaction.   Best yet, they have multiple sauces. I love sauces, particularly aioli. I was able to taste 3 (horseradish, chipotle and pesto) and all were wonderful and summarily devoured.  But what really puts this place over is the wait staff. They were all very friendly and attentive. But most of all, constantly busy. I was so surprised to watch the bartender cleaning the shelf they have their display bottles on. In all my years of bar-sitting, I don't know I've seen anyone do that. Seeing how hard working and nice the staff is shows that they are being treated well by the ownership and love what they do. I will never turn down a chance to eat at a place like that.  Two small minuses. I really want to try a shake or dessert, but the burgers are ridiculously filling. And then, the beer selection was underwhelming. But neither remotely earns this place anything less  than 5 stars.

2wn_dZZSujIS1QD2M30dcQ.text: The picture says it all really good food, great service too. Will come back whenever im in town

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

2YmWhDjfNfwzrws-sw96Fw.text: Headline: Mac N Cheese is a push up bra for burgers...if you have to use it, you're probably flat.  I have come to believe that if a burger joint needs to add things like Mac N Cheese and Jalapeno Poppers to their burgers, it probably means their burgers just aren't that great. This holds True for Rehab. I went with my parents and we got the Bigger Beefstro, Black & Blue and the Grilled Cheese (odd choice by mom, but I still love her). The bigger Beefstro came oozing out with havarti cheese and shaved rib eye. It was a beautiful site. But once I dug in, I realized that it just was flat. I could barely taste the burger itself and the pablano peppers were no where to be found. The Black & Blue was the same...I would simply describe it as bland. Overall, definitely not worth the hype or the wait. Even though there are cool shops around to help the wait go by pretty quick.  On a positive note, we were all happy with the chili verde appetizer. It came with great chips and was a delicious creamy mix of green chiles and chicken.   True Rating: 3.4 (Ambience-4, Taste-3, Price-3, Uniqueness-4, Chub Meter-3)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Looks so much better than it tastes. Not terrible. But not great.

McIo8ojBKpvIr09MTxqAKw.text: Huge, and I mean huge portions.  Kids love the sides, especially the onion rings.  The "basic" burgers I tried were great.  However, not a fan of the PB&J Burger, no matter what the waiter said.  My only real complaint is that the place seems a bit needlessly loud (Yep, I'm getting old!) and it was a bit pricey.  Still, I echo the other, generally positive reviews.

j57DsVAchpBXDafjeOr9Lw.text: I was going to go with 2 stars but since in the past I have been here several times as this used to be one of our favorite burger places.   I am so disappointed in our entire order of food.  I took my family from out of town bragging about how good their burgers are. Boy I was shocked at how downhill the food has gone.  The burgers were dry and unflavored.  I had to add salt which I hate doing.  I ordered the chili burger, super bland.  The fries were not fresh. My niece ordered a turkey burger and they brought a vege burger. My nephew ordered no tomato and they brought him tomato. They didn't bring his onion for a very long time, service slow and it wasn't busy at that point. Plus he told them he has a tomato allergy.  Brownie is super hard and dried out and the pineapple dessert tastes awful.  I'm super disappointed.

52Lyu_XD4GUlyXpecA4dYw.text: Possibly the best burger I've ever had. The peanut butter and jelly burger is a game changer. They have a great selection of beer as well. The aides are a little lack luster but the amazing burger makes up for it. Service is friendly and attentive. Definitely worth a try.

yrJmFuZCfaA3RK57KIxbGA.text: Service at the bar was great.  I ordered the spicy mac and cheese burger substituted a veggie patty and forgot to tell them to hold the bacon but the kitchen caught it and asked me before the order was done which was great teamwork because I didn't want the bacon.  I definitely recommend the pretzel bun and the side salad was clean and fresh.  I love that they will do any of the burgers vegetarian.  All and all if you are looking for a delicious gut bomb with great service look no further. :)

Ik6VHipV4vI8-AG4bbPVfQ.text: I've been here a handful of times. I LOVE the sweet potato tots. I always get a burger with swiss cheese and blue cheese with some sauce. I've never been disappointed, they are so delicious and I TOTALLY recommend. This is my favorite place to get a burger in the valley

iqA_gEdb-nr-_dRUrFwScA.text: Second time visiting this location, I am always intrigued by their extraordinary menu and love that they have a variety of options. My meal today just felt like it was done before my partners because nothing on my plate was fresh, however, I still ate it. On the bright side the corona-Rita made up for the burger's shortcomings. Hopefully if I visit again this won't be an issue.

YSZ4qKCv311Ok84OyZd40Q.text: The PB&J burger has flavor unbounded!!! It has been by far the best inventive burger I ever tasted. If you love peanut butter you will be in love with the combo of peanut butter bacon and jelly! Definitely try it!

zf3KmZ-myUGiBRz1EYw-cA.text: Horrible. As an out-of-towner, very surprised that this place was PACKED. Sat outside, comfy. Then the server scratches HIS BALLS with NO SHAME in front of us. Not just a quick scratch, but a lengthy one so that we can actually notice him doing this IN OUR FACE. I don't know why we stayed to eat, probably because someone else brought our food. It was greasy and unflavored. Just horrible. Especially since I went off of the reviews on Yelp to pick this place. Would NEVER recommend!!!

dn1XX8EyU-YTSIDnArC6qA.text: Our waitress helped this group of first timers navigate the menu, select three burgers that were somewhat shareable, and then helped us coordinate our sides so we could try as many as possible! We tried the macaroni and cheese burger, the bacon peanut butter, and the pulled pork. All were stellar!! Will definitely be back when I'm craving a nice, big, flavorful burger! Plus our out-of-town guests were pleased!

ze1xnrK20TgcxiP2DfALSw.text: That burger was the bomb (black and blue).  Would have been a great environment for a date.  Beer was good.  Staff was on it and very polite.  The sweet potato tots would have been better had I been stoned.  I'd go back for sure.

UQqRR05FIulyyzbKvDjbaA.text: Always a great burger and fries. Sunday afternoon Modelo for 1.50 is a must as well. Great way to end the weekend. Good service !!!

MUzneeevyTJqmkLLmFLz9A.text: Food was defiantly different. I have never ever tried burgers like they offered before. Honestly it was an awesome experience.  I will for sure go back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

u3s7-i4VzNGzwqGGNxANvg.text: We took our kids and sat on the patio. Very fun and the food was great! High quality burgers and fries. The sweet potato tots were yummy!!

1lWPVlm5PE_XY7ibciaiEg.text: Great burgers, good music and genuine people. It's really all one could really ask for.   Support a local AZ eatery that's bomb as hell.

Pm-mFqTZzXEtAS2mowFRcQ.text: What a great burger I had at rehab Burger therapy. Down-home place with absolutely spectacular burgers and sweet potato fries. I highly recommend it. If you ask for your meat medium rare you get it that way. If you asked for your bacon crisp it shows up like that.

wf5ZSVA_BtUoKoj0ukDVAQ.text: The atmosphere is hip and fun. As a native of San Diego, I felt like I was home by the beach! The service was fantastic and the food good. My burger felt a little dry and flavorless but others at my table didn't have that problem so maybe I need to go medium well next time :) Oh, and their fries and ranch dressing are amazing.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

RPk4TiTIR-JZCCfmOPCE0A.text: Rehab Burger Therapy is a nice little restaurant ran by locals. All staff are very nice and food was excellent! This is definitely going on my list of quick, good food!

nA9W1puwoiQhsY4M7Lrbjw.text: Really good.  My wife has the fish tacos, I had the bacon cheeseburger.  Quality was excellent, portions huge, price reasonable.

KHByoH8tlCMpc0ND-I4RZg.text: Did not disappoint! Delicious burger and unique sweet potato tater tots. Cold can of Modelo for only  $1.75. Cool place, great vibe, great food and cold beer! I'm sold!

s_7qI5IKyw7hZI8UBvovqw.text: Great food, awesome service and place was very cute. We sat in the patio and they had water sprays that maintained the area very cool. I ordered the Hawaiian burger with the sweet potato tots and they were amazing! Would definitely come back next time I'm in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mojitos
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Outside patio
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Burger with sweet potato tots

zUwaiGfDgDWB1KnVeuTJ6g.text: Yum!!! Best burger in Scottsdale. They have amazing pretzel buns and chili fries, I don't even like chili. The blue cheese burger is to notch! If you like burgers out of the box try this place

hvHOtuCQyu75mr-LJnM6Kw.text: Loved the bacon and blue cheeseburger, but would have liked it more if the burger had bacon on top of the patty and not just in it. The bacon flavor got a 'lil lost. Overall great atmosphere and service. Be careful not to go at high-customer times though, or you might be stuck with a long wait or a seat outside.

707BNQ9liwFjgY9ny9K6OQ.text: So love this place. Took co-workers, while we were in town working, and we all had the PBJ Burger, Awesome. You have to try it to understand how yummy it is.  Have it on the pretzel bun with sweet potato fries. You won't be sorry.

BDUg96KHb6Ph13MURfITtQ.text: Just so freaking good. The peanut butter jelly burger absolutely took me by surprise but holy cow (haha, get it?) it was phenomenal.

JALEM_7s2jxmKVPOCW3uUQ.text: One of the Best tasting Burgers I have ever had. Service is excellent, recommend this place to Burger lovers!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Nice Bar
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Nice Deco
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Nose size TV&#39;s

CAmcSCVjqZ4LcwEWlS85ag.text: Just about the best place to get a burger in Scottsdale!  Fun environment with friendly bar staff. Can be tough to get a table but you can't blame them for being awesome!  Everyone should go!

HzmHuNP9WKjvLwejKCq4Iw.text: This place is amazing. The peanut butter and jelly burger seriously might be my favorite burger of all time. The sweet potato tots on the side are to die for. Their dipping sauces are all awesome as well. Such a great place and friendly staff.

U0VCqd5CSX2SZEC4yOGlKQ.text: Fantastic experience in Old Scottsdale.  I had the mac n cheese burger and it was incredible.  You can't eat like this too often if you're over 30 or you'll be 400 lbs.  But for that once in a  while throw-caution-out-the-window decadent burger experience, it's awesome.  Also the management and staff are unsurpassed in service and hospitality.  It's worth the wait.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac n Cheese burger

ZXf72MYdQmFnzeluw7nc-A.text: Came here with my girlfriend's mom who came from out of town. This was the second time I have tried this place. The first time I had the mac n cheese burger and it was amazing. The second time, not so amazing. The macaroni and cheese was cold and the sauce was bland. My girlfriend got the MAC burger and thought the thousand island sauce tasted like Kraft. When I asked for bacon (from who I think was a manager) he came back with BURNT bacon. Not just in a couple of places, but totally black and hard. If he really was a manager, why would he serve a guest something terrible and inedible? We let the server know we were not impressed by anything very clearly and let her know about the burnt bacon, yet no manager came around or anything was fixed on the bill. Don't know if I'll give this place another

ryB2L2JtiVmBT8DyApfQCQ.text: Greasy.   Really enjoyed the patio. Would have preferred salad or coleslaw as tater tots were hard. Cool pawnshop next door.

yA6kJjR8USjLeSE-k5pTRQ.text: BURGERS BURGERS EVERYWHERE! This is a burger lover's heaven. They have pretty much any type of Burger you can imagine. Mac n Cheese on top of a burger- CHECK, Peanut Butter & Jelly Burger (it is amazing) CHECK! If you like sweet potatoes TRY THE SWEET POTATO TOTS- They will blow your mind! It is worth the workout that you'll have to do after! The staff there are all wonderful and nice!

dJhsL2lPNHgti6_kqYqTzw.text: Yummmm yummy yummy yum yum Mac and cheese burger to die for. Split the burger  still stuffed tots tots tots we'll worth any wait time.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Kaye is great!!!

3Ba6mhnFeYHTscdomAY9_Q.text: Beachy feel to this place!  Just off of Scottsdale ave, without that Scottsdale feel...thankfully.    Anywhoooo...great beer selection and...they have corona-ritas! HOLLER!  Ok...for the burger.  I got the Hangover Burger.  Green chile (could have been hotter), Bacon (OH THE BACON!), EGG..yeah...an egg!  This thing was delicious!  Onion rings...kinda felt like I needed a crane..these things were HUGE!  The burger had a great flavor and cooked perfectly medium.  Just how I like it.  My bff got the PBJ burger.  Peanut butter, jelly, sriracha...yeah I know right? But damn that thing was good.  Very much like that one dog at Short Leash!  Try it...you'll see!

z34mLopytQxWubbTC8_xIA.text: This place is the absolute best! One of my favorite restaurants in Old Town. The food is so darn good whether your eating healthy or splurging. The vibe is chill, music is great, and the service has been fantastic. Bartender Kaye is awesome.

ez5o1VHsa051Y6tv1c_xgw.text: Holy mother of God... when I die, please spread my ashes (secretly) in Rehab Burger. I don't even.... where to begi.....how do I..... Down boy! Burgers: Bada$$, tasty, creative. Fried stuff: unique, delicious, rings are kings. Apps: Pig wings..?.... shut the front door! gimmie a plate of pig wings, a beer and leave me alone until I'm done, then bring more of everything.   It's a classy joint

tZxGmy2NidJ10GdZYgD8ng.text: When we got there the line wasn't too bad and we only had to wait about 20min. Ambiance is really chill and fun, good bar selection with decent service.  I got the jalapeno popper burger it was ok, too much cream cheese to burger ratio but the fried jalapeno were amazing.

yRyhdL3YvkBjDOukyXzJtQ.text: Amazing burgers, atmosphere! One of my favorite spots in Phoenix hands down!

GdiKU-8_Gcr8X6X2SfP9uA.text: Best burgers around!  We went there for the first time today, recommended by a friend, my wife and I both looooved it. 2 thumbs up!  Staff was super friendly, attentive, atmosphere was fun like at the beach, and the Backyard BBQ Burger was amazing! Thank you Rehab for the great experience, we live way down in Gilbert, but we're definitely heading back up there again :)

aFhtHAV6L-oGIdQFynSfTw.text: Excellent service! Food was great! Nice laid back atmosphere. Don't have anything negative to say! I had the hangover burger with half fries and half sweet potato tots. They came with a few sauces that were good.

f1cyXFsCHWDRjVFjyNIXTA.text: I choose this place because I wanted sweet potato fries. Hubby ordered a chili burger on a gluten free bun with a side of corn, my daughter ordered a Jalapeno popper burger on brioche bun and I ordered a basket of sweet pototoes .  And all of this was to be delivered buy Door Dash.  Door Dash sends a text to say they are out of gluten free buns and brioche buns. So we changed to wheat and pretzel.  The buns came wrapped in the side, burgers and corn was tough and I ended up with chili Fritos instead of sweet potatoes fries. Disappointed!

b9hhDK7id0Dh5697poqVHw.text: I'm so sorry that I'm just having Rehab two days before I'm leaving to go back to Los Angeles. I got the pbj and bacon burger, I was feeling adventurous and I'm glad I was, my burger was amazing. The peanut butter, jelly, sriracha and bacon are an epic combination.  The sweet potato tots were so tasty, I could have eaten an entire plate of them especially with the pineapple teryaki aioli.  I might just have to eat there for lunch tomorrow before I leave.

SD1erHJ2wqk2AYI42dcbpQ.text: Our waitress was awesome... The burgers are awesome and huge.  Definitely get the burger on the pretzel bun.  French fries and sweet potato tots are both good, hard to choose between the two.  Adventurous burger combinations, someone let me know when they try the one with PB&J.    One plus to their beer selection they have a tasty Maui coconut porter, which isn't as gross as you may think.  Nice and stout with a hint of the coconut, add a shot of Vanilla Stoli to give it a bit of a flavor and alcohol boost.

BBeiQtULGcGuQtCdK45NVA.text: The burgers are large.  I could literally eat only half of it. I tried the green Chile burger. It was awesome. The only negative comment I have is that they always have a long wait. It's definitely worth the wait.

Tk7XFjv03yTIU4prskAC2A.text: This place is AMAZING!  My favorite burger spot by far.  I've actually tried a lot of the menu items and have never had a bad thing.  The PBnJ Burger will not disappoint.  Also, staff and service are always on point.  I go here at every opportunity.

A_1D47JQQ7Ymm9Nhb8vWYg.text: A solid four stars for this Old Town Scottsdale burger joint.    I went with the Porkster Burger which was basically a pulled pork sandwich with a cheeseburger inside.  5oz of pulled pork piled on top of a hamburger with cheddar cheese and bbq sauce.    Yup.  Damn good.  I've eaten at the best bbq joints all over the country and, honestly, the pulled pork sandwich would have been great even without being included as ingredients in a novelty burger.    The sweet potato tots were also pretty tasty.  I'll be back.  There were several other burgers I've got my eye on.

lXdJX3JnC8QSlfbVg2mkwQ.text: Bartenders = just annoying as can be - the type of people who you intentionally avoid eye contact with in hopes they don't speak to you - kind of like you would with a crackhead that is on a muttering, ranting binge attacking anyone who comes too close to them.  Boynerds on a self-manifested coolguy pedestal  dancing to their own tune (read: Rebecca Black's "Friday"). If you do sit at the bar, please make sur eto take note of the tool pool (read servers) that feed off every move the tenders make - like groupies at a One Direction concert. Except it's all guys. all guys.  Wings = Quite good actually, though the menu says they were supposed to come with celery, which for some unknown reason really upset my girlfriend when the celery didn't show up.   PB & J Burger = 2 words (food poisoning) - yep, thank you Rehab for allowing me to enjoy my first bought of this wonderful gem. The idea is controversial, but from the common opinion from staff and patrons alike, we went for it. Maybe they are good when cooked properly - but that's not what I got. I got a hot pile of slop in the shape of a burger. All I could taste was mushy,warm peanut butter and the juices of meat that I suppose was the burger. My gf and I split 1 burger. I ate 3/4 of my half, she ate 2 bites. I already had a lump in my stomach. We paid and got to safety.

npBPMliGJF2osp22dg5Ccg.text: The service was awesome. Our waitress Tina was friendly, and so great with recommendations. I had the Rehab Burger. I split it with my daughter and still couldn't finish my half. We have so much extra to take with us. The brownie dessert was worth saving room for. Warm chocolate and peanut sauce with two warm brownies topped with ice cream. Great vibe and music makes this a feel good place to come to. We sat outside with the mister keeping us cool. If I'm in the area next time will definitely come back.

Lgzu9QM2TYpsCaCKMuTCyg.text: Awesome environment. Slow service sometimes but I like to hang out there so it doesn't bother me. Best chicken sandwiches around

9kQMWOseNdap8njCLkZVgQ.text: Went with a group of friends from lunch.  Nobody tried the PBJ burger but we all left happy and would definitely go back.  Meat was very flavorful, rehab was a pretty big 10oz portion but cooked perfectly to order, and service and atmosphere were great.

-dmaNKJ5w6T0RIFpLGy4Ng.text: This was One of our favorite places to take friends and family. The burgers are great. We took my daughter and her husband and 2 small sons at Christmas time and received horrible service. We basically had to get up and get our own water, ketchup, and silverware. They wait for service and food was miserable and not pleasant with children. I hope they have improved service because I'm scared to go back. They gave all their attention to a table that was drinking continuously. Wow...how about us over here? Very obvious we were bugged but the more we asked for necessary things the worse our service got. I was embarrassed as I had raved about this place and they didn't deliver.

FWhPFjJ7NKArtNnIjR4v_A.text: Not your traditional burger. Great selection excellent atmosphere and fun environment!! Great for the adventurous eater!! Try the macaroni and cheese burger!! Would recommend for the entire family!!

PDbqiNGWUPkOlEFVXFX9cg.text: Go here, you won't regret it. The burgers were SO creative and delicious on top of it all. I got the Mac and cheese burger and my boyfriend got the jalapeno popper burger, both were to die for. The sweet potato tots are fantastic too. Don't have anything bad to say, great atmosphere too!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Blurry but still DELICIOUS

5av2JL_jSw_Tm88JyWIaGg.text: Excellent food and service!  We had 3 different burgers, fish tacos, fries, Tater tots, and a pot brownie, all were awesome!  This is a definate We will be back ASAP!

UkCfc4ErAvA3OeVEeqpn4w.text: We saw the restaurant reviewed on "Check Please" a local program on places to dine and looked interesting.  The place is fun, indoor and outdoor seating with a large inside bar,  and right on the edge of Old Town in Scottsdale so easy to walk.  There was parking across the street as only two cars can park in front of the restaurant.  The food was outstanding!  The PBJ hamburger was my husband's favorite of all he's tried, a friend had the Philly burger, salads were fresh and every bite was eaten.  The sweet potato nuggets are baked and exceptional!  We saw the mac n' cheese burger on the TV review and it was being ordered by several people - if you like mac n' cheese, one to try.  Lots to choose, wings, salads, etc.  Add to your list of "must try!"

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Philly Burger on Pretzel Bun - sweet potato tots are exceptional!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PBJ Burger on Pretzel Bun - sweet potato tots are exceptional!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Cool inside decor and large bar

u8oT-CetGqCe1oLsD92yGw.text: Ordered 2 medium burgers and got 2 dry well done burgers. Ingredients on top of the burger were cold but had good flavor. Confused how you can be a burger place and overcook your burgers.  Really good service, sweet potato tots and cool vibes in the building.

Mpmsw5HuOzVA5K8wckmATQ.text: The Yelp rating doesn't lie. This place is great! Small and comfortable. Island theme. The staff was friendly and informative. They explained that all the menu items are customizable which is great for a picky eater. Everyone in my party of 4 was extremely pleased with what they ordered. We'll definitely return and recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac n cheese burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac N Cheese Burger with seasoned fries and various side sauces
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Grilled Cheese on thick cut Beach Bread

SRxoXguv_1JjYBhuf3FIfQ.text: Fantastic food! Amazing service! Quick tea refills! The chicken was the best I've had. Rich flavor! Mac and cheese was very flavorful and spicy. This was our first visit! We would recommend it to anyone or guests for a delicious burger! Tons of options on the menu to choose from and an extensive wine list!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and cheese
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Shelby&#39;s Spinach salad w/chicken
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac and Cheese! A bit spicy!

VXT3o3B1uw81mbUOmLmqDg.text: Service is TERRIBLE!! Never had an experience like this before and also never post reviews, but was compelled after tonight. Sat at the bar to have a drink waiting for a table. Ordered a beer and asked the bartender to change the channel to the playoff NBA game. She said there was a group behind me that was watching the baseball game. I asked them if they were still watching and they said they did not care. I let the bartender know and she responded "to calm down." I waited for 5 minutes as she took another customers order and then proceeded to ignore my request. I then asked again if she could change to the game and she became even more agitated and said she was busy, but would check. Almost 10 minutes later after nothing changed, the so called "manager" came over to let us know our table was ready. We asked her why they were unwilling to change to the playoff game and she responded that "she was too busy and didn't have time for that." We then said we would take the check and leave since they were clearly too busy to deal with another customer. I will never be back and don't know why anyone would waste there time here since you can find a good burger at so many places in Scottsdale/Phoenix.

xfZNtyy6jFNwUoAzgmmpAA.text: This place sets the bar of what a burger should look like and taste like. This place is great fries are good. The burger is the star here.

es3w7QYfXjqC17LzxfI2pw.text: After months of waiting to try this famous pb and j burger....I was in the area and gave it a go.  I was working, so I ordered pickup. I got sweet potato fries instead of regular...and they were the ish! Customer service was excellent as well. High energetic place which it seemed, the little time I was inside of course.   I told them that it was my first time, so they put all of their sauces in my bag to try as well. They were all great. Scottsdale was a little out the way for me, but I will definitely be making my way up their again for this burger. They won me over, easily.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Warm ass heaters if you wanna sit outside on the winter:)

9svcqpcHNNkqeQzvmW_FDQ.text: The reason they must have called this the "Rehab Burger" was because our waitress must have been heavily medicated.  The bar and the atmosphere were very unique and interesting, but you know you're in trouble when your server doesn't write down your orders.  For our party of 3, to have all of the burgers come out every which way, but correct literally 3 times over is inexcusable! It was obvious after the 3rd attempt, I would need to join a rehab.  The starters which were ordered with our burgers, and recommended specifically by the waitress didn't come out until after the burgers because she said "you ordered the burgers first".  What made matters worse, the waitress was too busy to come back to our table after we asked to speak with her. The starters were eventually comped, but we were never offered an apology or an explanation.  For a place with 4.5 stars and this many reviews, for me to give a 1 star review, we must have gotten the 1 waitress not in rehab.  All this talk of rehab, makes we want a drink (but definitely not here).

-O2gicbuaV-r3j8M03RIMg.text: I absolutely loved the PB&J Bacon Burger.  I would return to Scottsdale just for this burger, no lie.  As odd as this mixture sounds, it was amazing.  The staff was wonderful, prompt, and extremely efficient.   If you, however are not a big fan of very sweet meals, I wouldn't choose this burger.  (There are plenty of others to choose from).  Rehab also offers a variety of drinks, plus a happy hour!  I'm not sure about the parking as I took an uber here.

kDvelK3i7i-t2C9Sjnnnyw.text: It really is a delicious burger. The prices are good for the amount of food. No kids menu so my 2 and 6 yr old split a 5oz build your own burger and fries which was perfect for them. Atmosphere is loud and tables are close together. It's a bar atmosphere. We'll definitely be back, but not for a real long time because that is quite the indulgent meal!

TrYy0eqDQeDlcTYoavmTTQ.text: Unique flavors that wow the taste buds.  Peanut butter and jelly burger?  Sounds weird but it works so well.  Every burger I have tried is amazing.    Meat and ingredients are top notch.  Ambiance is casual, service is friendly and efficient.   During busy spring season line is out the door for good reason.  I'm a local so I get to go when it's not so busy.  I almost always recommend this place to friends coming to visit.

Kg3fJVqgUNjPb16YrrD31g.text: I got the spicy mac and cheese burger and it was AMAZING. you really get a ton of food. good service and we will definitely be back.

ckwCKoAi9iNH3u8M4h8x7g.text: I love this place! We were lucky to find two open seats at the bar upon arrival and skipped a longer wait on a busy Saturday night. It's a small place so be prepared to wait if you visit during peak time. A highlight for me was the ability to sub out any one of the awesome burgers for a chicken breast. Tue Mac n cheese burger subbed with chicken was one of the best things I've ever eaten. We will definitely come back if we travel through Scottsdale again.

uKJswrJ7XAyHEV4mEcHrrA.text: Both of our orders were incorrect.  The bun was stale, the burger was bland and the fries were about as good as freezer section fries. The lettuce on the burger was old and yellow looking.  While we waited 30 minutes for our table, we saw two other tables with incorrect orders. That should have been a sign to leave.

-3YYQtE7OPyMtXNGicICTQ.text: I don't understand it! I have been hesitating to write this review for a while, but I think people should know. The burgers aren't that good. Based on the fact that this restaurant specializes in burgers... they might want to rethink that. Not worth the price unless you just want a lot of burger for your buck. Yes, they have a lot of stuff on the burgers, but it doesn't make them better. The service was friendly. The atmosphere was comfortable and relaxed. I enjoyed hanging out but I just didn't love the food. I might go again and maybe try their most notable pbj burger since it's won some awards but other than that, I can find same or better burgers everywhere else. I would recommend for a decent place to hang out and have a beer but don't expect the best burger of your life or even close to it.

9Z5ch86Z3onoVi8-0n8vQw.text: The patty melt was delicious, one of the best burgers I've ever had. The fries were great and the sweet potatoes tots were soooo good. This was my first time at a Rehab Burger.

K0VwTQL3Bun-z81dlPcm3w.text: Intricate burgers with a LOT of flavor! Their sauces are amazing. Restaurant is small and can get quite loud especially on nights/weekends. There are a lot of tables packed inside, but it doesn't keep this restaurant from being awesome. Definitely a place you should at least try once in Scottsdale.

NnT055fzG1J6WDKdIS-CKA.text: Great relaxed place to grab lunch. No shortage on portion size - the plates are huge. Highly recommend for a burger and beer.

-QbHigbRnV79TXscOeZV0Q.text: This was probably the best place in town. We've spend in Arizona a week , and the best burger that I've had in a while. The servers were great , the food came out quickly and the place was very nice.

leeQHWT4Nd3WY-KwZZ6oTw.text: Maybe the best burger places I've ever been, and I can't wait to go back. Inexpensive drinks full of flavor, solid staff who went the extra mile, and outdoor seating right in the middle of it all. Had to wait 45min to seat 3, but it was worth it!

6ui_CC10QNwOa0BsB3zN_Q.text: Rehab Burger has the best burgers in town in my book! From your simple cheeseburger to the most outrageous combinations possible. I love the selection of different buns and made in house sauces too. Can't beat the flavor of a fresh flame grilled burger. I knocked off one star only because once we ordered the clams as an appetizer (who orders clams in a burger place,i know :/ ). The white wine base wasn't reduced well enough, so instead of a subtle sweet hint of white wine was nowhere to be found, only the taste of acidic alcohol. Just remember to stick to their killer burgers and salads too!

pKsGfiRVG3unGNmj5z5NQA.text: We came to Rehab Burger because of the great Yelp reviews and maybe our expectations were a little high as a result. It wasn't a bad experience but not quite as fantastic as we expected. The food was good and our server was good. The atmosphere was interesting with lots of stuff to look at and admire on the walls and ceiling. There are more than a few televisions that also act as a distraction. The menu has an interesting (I use that term loosely) collection of burgers, including a Peanut Butter and Jelly Burger. I was quite curious as to what that was like but not curious enough to risk ordering it and I couldn't convince anyone in my party to order it either - so I guess I'll continue to be curious. The food we did get was all good except for the sweet potato gator tots...our server said they wouldn't be mushy and alas, they were mushy. Bleh!

ZU4zIhH0KCXKdojjZTnwkQ.text: Excellent burgers and great service. Would have liked my medium rare to be on the rarer side that's all.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Build your own burger...with poblano pepper and Manchego cheese.

iJM5sMz8WGziAJ8LBY3npQ.text: Well, the reviews dont lie! This place is the shit. I had to go all out and get 2 meat patties. The burger was as big as my head. Not only that but ooooh so good! The fries were on point as well as the ranch! I admire this place. The staff are extremely friendly and so nice. The burger comes with shredded letuce which ive always loved on a burger and the cheese is soo good it looks like it would belong on those grilled cheese commercials where they pull it apart and you can see the cheese just pull but not break. Ughh this place has my heart. This is soo not a good thing for me.  The chips and salsa were good too! Ill be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

fcS-NHXuNE_NhB4NhCSzhg.text: Came here alone for a super late lunch. I waited up front for a few minutes before someone finally recognized that I needed to be seated. The place was not busy as I came during a weird time (3:45pm). My server, Kristin, was really attentive. She was informative about the menu and paid attention to when I wanted her to come by. Loved her. I ordered the spicy Mac n cheese burger with a pretzel bun and sweet potato tots with the spicy ketchup. The options for burger toppings are pretty superb.  My biggest disappointment was that the food came out at different temperatures. My burger with the Mac and cheese spirals was warm, but my sweet potato tots were cold. How are deep fried sides cold? I ate the burger as is but told my waitress about the tots. I got new tots, and these were hot almost burnt. The spicy burger was not spicy at all. There were a couple of small chunks of chile, maybe, in the Mac n cheese. Overall, this might have been better had I come at a different time maybe? It was tasty, but kinda disappointing as I keep hearing that it's the best place in Phoenix.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac n cheeseburger. Upgraded to pretzel bun with sweet potato tots and spicy ketchup.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Second set of tater tots. Are these new or warmed up old ones?

1ZuZzROAvB5XiZa44vuEuQ.text: If you want a quiet place to eat, with minimalist  decor, and inexpensive burgers, go to McDonald's. If you want a hoppin' joint, funky and eclectic atmosphere, fun crowd, great service, with ginormous burgers that earn the title Best Of AZ, go to Rehab. Great flavor to the burgers and condiments, heck even the fries were delicious! Decent selection of beer. Not as much as some other local places, but you came here for the burger anyway. They also have non beef and vegetarian options for their burgers. It's not a super cheap place, but it's not outrageous, and you get MORE than your money's worth.  Added bonus, there were two Pokestops within range of our table, so the kids were extra happy!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Q37JurHZAQ2JtWnBtxC9dQ.text: Excellent burger, ambiance and service. Laid back place to hang out. Not a date night place  Had the hangover burger 10 oz. w white bun rare. Very good - done perfectly. My wife had the ghost burger. Spicy w the perfect amount of heat.. Not overwhelming. 10oz is big not huge. Will come back next time I am in AZ.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hangover 10oz burger. Great burger on the patio. Love the laid back ambiance.

53bV2ZQ2A2QkU6MtNYd-5w.text: This place is awesome!  Went last night with a group of 9. Fun atmosphere, great, quick service and everyone loved their meals. Only minor complaint was the bbq burger was hard for a friend to eat (he said he would have ordered the sauce on the side next time bc the flavor was spot on, just super smothered). I had the Mac n cheese burger-- to die for! My husband had the ghost burger and our kids had plain burgers. We all loved everything and the staff was all on point and very nice.  Sweet potato tots were so good too!  The bill was only $112 for a group of 9, and we were convinced there was a mistake-- nope, just super reasonable prices!! We are on vacation but will be back next time we are in Scottsdale!

cOhk-gcPUL_DiCRaFGDg9g.text: If you're craving a burger while in Scottsdale I recommend this place. We started with an order of chili cheese fries; the plate was piled high with fries smothered in cheese & chili. The fries are skin on fries, the appetizer was delicious. He had the backyard bbq burger, I had the jalapeno popper burger. The backyard bbq burger was like one you would get at a family gathering, it was full of flavor. The jalapeno popper burger was good, the cream cheese under the cheddar tasted so good; we both had sweet potato tots, make sure you order a side or 2 of their sauces for dipping. A server at a table next to us took time to go over the menu & told the table about their most popular burgers which our server did not & I wish he would have because I probably would have ordered the pbj burger.

ePks7P1QA7sQwJZz_0Q98Q.text: We came in on a Tuesday night a group of about 30. Our server was training a new server both girls were very attentive. Service was fast, helpful, and friendly. Food came out fast and all cooked correctly. I tried the Hawaiian Burger this time. Meat was cooked perfectly, the Pineapple Teriyaki Aioli and grilled pineapple made the burger both sweet and savory. Fries cooked nice and came out hot. Great job on everything.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Jalapeño Poppers Burger Relapse.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Burger Relapse.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. B.Y.O.B relapse.

0JMb6pxX5scsDmxwaUv5oQ.text: Besides having a waiter high as a kite and our orders being wrong and cold, the burgers were okay. We tried the Mac n cheese burger and the poblano, both were cold whenever they came out and I'm sure that's because our waiter forgot our food. Once we had it, he asked us how we were doing every few minutes when he didn't speak to us very much in the beginning. Probably not going to visit this location again but we might try somewhere else.

2vwXojc6ZzoL_x141n-BsQ.text: What a cool hamburger joint. We found Rehab Burger when we were leaving dinner at nearby restaurant. We could smell the food coming from Rehab and knew we had to check it out. We were not disappointed. They have so many way to make a great burger, greater...  I had the Porkster Burger. Very tasty pulled pork and a great hamburger, it was awesome. We shared the Rehab size, 10 oz patty, with Sweet potato Tots and side of fries. All were really good. Beer selection is, ok. Would have liked to see more micro brews on tap. We'll be back on a game day.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Porkster Burger and sweet potato fries. AWESOME.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Inside of restaurant. A lot of TVs with cool stuff.

4JIOF5aWhxKBaXmuAmXfVw.text: We had a reservation and sat down for 10 minutes and then the waitress came over and said you have to move to the bar, we have a party of 10 coming in and we were a party of 7. We moved to a smaller table, it was very hot inside, then five other people came in and sat at that table we were moved from, i went up to pay for my drink and asked if that was their party of 10? She said that they tried to call the party of 10 and the party of 10 and could not reach them. They could have moved us back. We left, they will never get our business again. Bad business practice on them.

KvXFyVv68lG4yo8Av_em_Q.text: Favorite place of our entire family! We love all their burgers and my personal favorite is the PB&J.  It is excellent!

LL3zF_srtmtY7zYrF6xWFQ.text: This has become one of our fam favorites! We love the peanut butter burger and the sweet potato tots. YUM!!! It's a fun laid back atmosphere. There's usually a wait, but it definitely worth it!

agLM5_txORLktUzhPNINeQ.text: Best burger of my life. My coworker and I came here on Tuesday for dinner. This time I had to bring my crew of six. I asked the server what she recommended and she suggested the PB&J bacon burger with scirracha (spelling?)  sauce and a pretzel bun.  Best burger of my life!! Sweet, savory, spicy, salty. I wanted to try something different for this trip but I couldn't. I knew I would regret it. So I tried to convince my partner to order the jalapeno popper burger, but lo.  I also love the sweet potato tots. Again, I wanted the Jamaican corn, but lo.  Will be here again the next time I find myself in Arizona. Perhaps they have a room to rent I the back.....

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J burger with Mac and cheese burger in the back

LE5pYEK3EVfOtiQXiOuJ4g.text: Delicious!! Great service!! The bar was fun and the hamburgers are HUGE.  They have way more than burgers.

2m05LgtH5gakaeWiIFC2og.text: Holy moly!!! If you get a cheat meal, this is the place. Every calorie is so worth it. We had the BYOB with peppers, an egg and the sweet potato tots. And a ghost burger... Again with the sweet potato tots, even though the fries looked good too. The burger wasn't even that spicy, but had a great flavor with a generous portion of avocado.  Order the spicy ketchup too!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Burger Had me flexing!!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

AS9dhkTD3PAl61MJHwu_4Q.text: Want a fun burger that you can't get anywhere else? Here we are.   PB&J on deck with an extra patty to boot. Sweet potato Fries on deck. The look on your face when they bring this monster to you - and it actually tastes amazing?   Ya. I came back.

laIR9URF_EGpJF_Rsm6OcA.text: Friendly staff, great service, phenomenal food! The decor and music gave a mellow vibe. If I didn't live so far away I'd be back on the regular!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

c73V5xN7vdX7_EYN2kL4HQ.text: I've become a regular at this place, and for good reason. If you want a new take on burgers, rehab is the place to check out. All of the staff keep a laid back and chill mood. Very nice and they deliver great service. You can't go wrong with anything on the menu. Plus, they have a great happy hour and bar selection.

55jHTxJa7IJ-yZPaC3oaOQ.text: We ate here and loved it, I actually had the grilled chicken sandwich and it was awesome, everything fresh and yummy, my brother had an appetizer which was also very good , the server was on point which made everything perfect!!

lghyAZ1nN2pI3pjwM7dBFw.text: The Manpanion and I are BIG on burgers. In the week that the Manpanion was here, we visited this awesome burger joint TWICE! Of course, I'm definitely making my way back. The atmosphere is extremely friendly. They really treat you like you're part of the family and as a newbie to the area, this really means a lot.   During our first visit, there was a glitch in the kitchen, which delayed our order. Our waitress explained what happened and said that we'd get a slice of key lime pie on the house. We thought this as a really nice gesture... until we realized how LONG this wait was going to be. (Note: The Manpanion and I came in HUNGRY, so to have our meal delayed made us really CRANKY.) Since we finally received our burgers near closing time, we took the key lime pie to go.  The burgers (both times we went) were absolutely delicious! Yes. They were SO good that we were able to forgive the long wait during that first visit. The regular sized burgers are pretty hefty and consistently tasty. So far, my fave is the Hawaiian burger. It's meaty, so next time I'll opt for the smaller size. The Manpanion is all about the Hangover. You MUST have the tots or the fries. A major plus is they give you different sauces! Tip: The pineapple sauce goes perfect with the tots!  This is a yummy place and I give the folks major kudos for winning me over, despite a not-so-stellar first visit.

Ozg69_gNt0tA4PDRDVTisw.text: This is a great place.  Seems you always have a wait to be seated, but it's worth it! The variety of burgers and fixin's is great.  I've tried several and never been disappointed.  Because of it's uniqueness, it's a great place to take folks from out of town.

vQVeZ1bnn-S8_trg4Aptew.text: Great Friendly staff, Food portions and quality Great. Jamaican Corn is a MUST Try. Best Bloody Mary I've ever had (it was the spicey one) Not too hot just right ;)

FAYihrrX0PJ9DwgKjLMqlg.text: Found this place by accident....and what a nice surprise!!  It was beachy...which I love, it was clean, the staff was all VERY friendly....and the Cobb salad......the best I've ever had!!  Note to management: great job on the staff training! I travel for a living and NEVER find staff members do much more than collect your money! Your folks engaged the customers in conversation, checked back on us...just the right amount....and made the visit very warm and enjoyable!!  Great job!!

LJ4DXUK1nyJdmwRnP59lTw.text: Went for lunch on a Friday in a small group during the workday.  Got calamari for an appetizer round.  Breading was great, good flavor, and dip wasn't half bad especially when combined with their special hot sauce (I guess they also sell it at $5 a bottle - spicy / sweet).  Each of us got a small burger (they're all available in large / small which is great), but unfortunately each of our medium ordered burgers came back well done.  I imagine such a smaller burger would be tough to cook appropriately, but I would hope that a place that specializes in burgers could figure out proper times on these things.  I had the same issue at another burger joint (not to be named in this review).  That sort of thing just blows my mind.  In the end, we'd prefer burgers cooked to order, but we're not terribly picky.  Everything else about the burgers was top notch.  Our server was very friendly, outgoing and helpful - when she overheard a comment about the burgers (seriously, we weren't ones to complain) she offered to comp the meals which we didn't want - ended up hooking us up with milkshakes (also quite good).  Oh, I can't believe I'm leaving this for the last item on my review - but the sweet potato tots.  Oh, the sweet potato tots!  I'll come back here often for those alone.  The texture and the taste, and the dipping sauces...  Amazing!

AF6ckBZUotkoIwKGhATB6A.text: Rehab burger needs to go to rehab.... All these great reviews but I don't know, are these people to drunk to notice that there's a lot of things going wrong because of it being close to old town maybe it's the liquor and they just don't care about anything. Well I was fully sober coming into this place. The girl upfront is clueless let's just say that I really don't want to be mean but they really hired a girl who doesn't know anything about a simple job of "Hi welcome to Rehab burger! How many do you have with you?? Would you like to be seated outside or inside???" I walk in and she was busy so she tells me she will be right there to help me when she's done so instead of blocking the door because the desk is right in front of the door and it being such a tight place I walked outside thinking she will help me. Two other people walk in and the girls at her desk just waiting.. So I'm like okay I guess she's don't doing what she's doing so after the people in front of are done I walk and she doesn't even take me before them which one makes no sense and she tells me 25 minutes of wait.... I perfectly see 3 tables open.. She also had a low voice so she mumbles and you have to ask her a couple times to repeat herself. She just shouldn't be doing that job I guess it's so hard to do (Sarcasm) so she said 25 minutes my friends getting mad because he sees the tables himself but I say I bet it won't take 25 minutes and he agrees. So we wait outside and she calls the other group in 5 minutes and us in 10 minutes and those tables still being empty she asks me if we wanted to sit at the community table.. I think that should of been a question before us waiting because there were multiple open spots so we took them we didn't even care. We sat and our waitress was very nice and was quick I give her props she should maybe switch positions with the other girl but I think that would make it worse i would probably order a cheese burger and get no cheese and she would probably ask me if I wanted cheese after getting the cheeseburger I ordered... Sorry for the joke let's put all jokes aside. I ask the girl what's the most popular and what's your favorite and to both of those was the Peanut butter jelly Sriracha sandwich. So hey why not let's try it.. One, way to much peanut butter that you can't taste the burger meat.. So what's the point of the meat?? And I didn't even taste Sriracha either it had no spice to it at all.. Maybe less peanut butter so we can enjoy the meat because if not just serve it with just toast. My fries were also cold with it being busy should I have fresh fries?? I was really confused. The prices are good the waitress was cool but the burger I got recommended was kinda disappointing..  And the girl in front just needs to find something else to do maybe make sense.. Next time I come here I'll make sure I'm drunk.

AKNw38-TClkXE7yYB_wUZA.text: Great food and great atmosphere. One of the best places to get a burger in the Valley.

3X53-n3OK9AH3PypPxVyyQ.text: It's been three hours since I finished eating at Rehab Burger Therapy and I'm still stuffed.  I had their Backyard BBQ Burger and when it came out with a huge knife through the middle of a soft Brioche bun and with two HUGE onion rings I thought I was in heaven (with a little indigestion).  The burger was cooked perfect and the Spicy Ketchup rocked.  The fries that came with were just ordinary (under seasoned) but the dipping sauces made it worth the calories.  My mother had the hatch Chili Burger which was equally great mainly because of the chili's, chipotle aioli and the incredible Pretzel Bun.  I don't think I would order another sandwich from here without the Pretzel Bun.  She also had the Sweet Potato tots which which were a great twist on regular fries.  We had a very small amount of room left in our tummy so we decided to split an Orange Milkshake. Great decision!  It tasted like the old Orangecicle from my youth.  It was nice and smooth and not so thick that it gave you a shake ache.  Place was fun, service was friendly and food was outstanding.  Will go back again soon!

J2Wc4VfprKXtz3ef_1mE7A.text: Our first real meal post 202 miles with my team. We were a table of 11. We got there towards the end of 9p and they were closed at 11. We waited an hour for our food because they had printer problems. As you can imagine 11 starving people wouldn't be too happy, but they tried to keep us busy. Which was nice of them.  I feel like if any restaurant I go to offers Hawaiian anything I have to try it. I love pineapple in my food. Period. My Hawaiian burger came with a turkey patty, ham, and a FRESH pineapple. You can tell that wasn't a can pineapple. They also gave you a teriyaki aioli of some sort. It was yummy. My fries are a bit cold and stale, but I'm forgiving.  I don't plan on ever coming back to Arizona, but I would recommend this burger place.

Vl09vtyPn6SB9KPdO_ww7w.text: Let me begin this review by asking you this: you remember that kid in "Daddy Day Care" that would throw fits and would immediately become docile and mesmerized when someone handed him a dollar? If you don't know what I'm talking about then I'm sorry that you don't have the same love and appreciation for great cinema that I do ;)  If you do remember that kid then this is exactly what happened to me during my first visit. We came here on a whim. Sunday night trying to figure out what to eat, looked up burgers on Yelp. The pictures by Yelpers looked great and this place was offering a Yelp deal.   When we got there parking was easy, and the place looked neat and clean inside.  We got in with about 40 minutes 'till closing time. The staff was really welcoming and friendly. Ordering was made easier with great suggestions from our server (I took the Hangover with fries while my gf took the Poblano and sweet poToToes  We were set, then waited for our food. About 10 minutes into our wait (maybe less) our server informed us of an issue in the kitchen that would delay our order. She also told us we'd get some key lime pie to compensate for the extra wait. That's good service folks! Our food ended up taking quite a bit. But when it finally arrived we were NOT disappointed.   The burgers are BIG. Each burger comes in two versions rehab and relapse (10oz vs. 5oz). While I was able to handle the rehab I think I could have been satisfied with the relapse version of this monster. The flavors of the egg, bacon, cheese and chile complemented the savory beef well. The patty was juicy, despite my penchant for well done meat. I also had a taste of the Poblano and thought it was very tasty. The cheese used on this burger stood out for me as I like a sharp cheese.  If you are in the area consider giving this place a try. I know for certain, future rehab sessions are in my immediate future.

aWhuwFeV1Qh3sjjAX4GppQ.text: Local, authentic, getting it done right. Friendly staff, great burger, great atmosphere.

YV9az0uEmfpx3lqB26Y2-w.text: Best burger I have had in a really long time. They come in two sizes, the largest one was the perfect amount of meat, filling me up without me wanting more. Hawaiian burger used real pineapple, not the canned kind. Swish and mushroom was also very tasty. Good quality beef, cooked to perfection. A nice array of dipping sauces that the waitress brought out without us even asking. Variety is the spice of life

Y6gKMJPXvqMHuqkhxt18Qg.text: This place is delicious! My boyfriend had a Hawaiian burger and onion rings and I got s side of fries and the spinach salad with chicken. His burger was cooked perfect, nice and juicy. The French fries were well seasoned and a lot. I like how they already have you a side of ranch. It was perfect. My salad was fresh and delicious. The only tip I would suggest would be to order the dressing on the side. We had this tall waiter and he was on top of us, gave us to go drinks. Just great.

DPUOLg23Xy_wwF5iGs4OGA.text: Great food, awesome workers! Loved the environment! The best wings I've every had! :)

m973HVy7XqPOukKzpZcwPw.text: The turkey burger with bacon jam was out of this world!  And they make a mean pricky pear margarita!

UgA_4sapCzPvnz4BbuO_SA.text: I had the Hawaiian Burger today:  Black Forest Ham, Swiss Cheese, Fresh Cut Pineapple and a side of Teriyaki Pineapple Aioli. I chose the pretzel bun.    The place was clean, the staff friendly and attentive, and the food was really good and cooked as ordered (medium had pink in the center and was juicy).   I would return, and bring friends.

4tZ17qPWoWjtUdkrqk_LDg.text: Best burgers in the valley, best frozen margarita in the valley, with a fun and relaxed vibe. This is one of my new favorite spots.

uES2BzvsM6FNCQcADPplWQ.text: I dream about this place in my sleep. Yes the wait was long but it is WELL WORTH IT. Food is delicious! Best wings and tots i'v ever had!  Robin (i think that was her name) is the most helpful and caring waitress alive. She recommended small alterations to fit our taste and she knew what she was talking about. Although she was very busy that night, she still sat with us while taking our order and helped us find the right mix to satisfy our hunger. GO SEE ROBIN.

LpW2rqgxONvNXb3Ce439cA.text: One of the better burgers I've had. The unique burgers they create keep the basic burger relevant. I had the pb&j burger and enjoyed every bit. I will definitely be back to try another interesting combination!

taQDSaZCD8iSaqk-KQa3OQ.text: If you need a sloppy hangover cure this is the place to go.   Their burgers fill your stomachs with happiness.

oxKus5ZdQAkL7UOtjfm9OQ.text: I happened to be in Scottsdale around lunch and discovered rehab burger therapy. I have never been before but I will definitely be back.  I ordered a chicken,  mushroom and Swiss sandwich and the first thing I noticed was that it smelled amazing.  That doesn't happen everywhere.  When I took my first bite I was so happy!  The flavor was amazing and the serving size was generous.  I will definitely be back.  I want my husband to experience this too! 5 stars for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chicken mushroom and Swiss from rehab burger therapy! Yummy!

f0I0VmcEvmNg9l_YGAn8Kg.text: Cool staff.  Tasty food.  Fair prices.  Check it out.  Nice atmosphere.  Cute servers!!  I like the sliders.

Yj7ComDwfGQwxst6ppTtEQ.text: Very friendly and informative staff here, got right in and seated... Prompt service and drinks always full!! Good job guys I enjoyed the food, burgers cooked great!! Great selection of buns and they have gluten free buns, which my wife really loved with the turkey burger cooked to perfection!! I cant wait for the Mill ave location to open COMING SOON!! I actually bike with the partial owner Wiley who let us know about their new burger concoction also COMING SOON!! See ya soon!!!

-Q9xKNMQVip1V6D-CjITVg.text: Just stopped by for chips and salsa and a coke while waiting for hubby at surgery center. Food looks amazing and smells good too. I will definitely come back and try a burger!! Never mind customer service stinks!!!! Chips and salsa is good thou! OK so I had to go ask for my check...I told the manager of the bad service I experienced...She apologized and offered to cover my bill. I told her I was happy to pay for my order as the food was good. But she politely asked that I let her take care of it and that poor customer service is not the normal there. I thanked her....So I'm upping to 3 stars until I go back as see how the normal really is!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chips and salsa with a coke

x1-HAHZmtS42AL229_cynA.text: I really like this place. So many good burgers to choose from. The PB &J burger is something everyone should try. You won't be disappointed! For a burger place I really have to recommend the pasta too. Amazing. The mac and cheese is so yummy. Their appetizers are good as well. I haven't had anything I didn't like. As a side try the Jamaican corn, wow. When in Scottsdale this is a must.  Their brownies are amazing. Such a fun laid back atmosphere that everyone can enjoy. Great food, great drinks, great service! Wish we had one in Tucson!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Jalapeno popper burger with Jamaican corn!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy mac n cheese omg! It was amazing.

KHfsdRmNN4QVJqez0Uj8YQ.text: Great burgers with many different options for toppings. I was torn between the chili burger and the PBJ & bacon burger. I went with the chili burger (10oz) and was not disappointed!  My wife, a vegetarian, had the pesto pasta and she said it was terrific. We will definitely be back to try the other imaginatively constructed burgers.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Pesto spaccini. Small order.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chili burger 10 oz.

UPhlxpw1yf_JcYBN_fugjA.text: I went here twice on my visit to Scottsdale! The first time with a group of gals and the second time with my husband. The outdoor patio is cute. The hamburger menu is creative and the 2 different choices I had were both really good. The fries and beers (maybe a few more draft choices?) were good too! Good burger spot!

XBbELIUen2RBwSCXfRYC9w.text: The staff is amazing!  The food is to die for!  The ambiance is so fun!  Best Burgers in town, best service around!!!!

TuexRi3vKDfDUAOxzBAFeQ.text: Great burgers and great service. I got the mac and cheese burger and boy was it a monster! I loved it and even though I got the relapse, there was no way I was finishing it. My friend got a regular cheese burger and it was very simple (lettuce, tomato, cheese, etc) and she couldn't finish her's either. . And we're big eaters. We visited on a Tuesday night and the place was packed. Definitely coming back soon!

lBi8BzowuBNcj8Y4kW9l8g.text: One of the best burgers ever. Great place great staff. Got the Chili Cheese Burger. Fantastic. Friends got the PBJ  and Ghost Burger.  Everyone loved it.

PjALzvlew8FGJgKHQHQ7Mw.text: Love this place! Burgers are outrageously great. Fish sandwich rocks too.  Service could be better but well worth the drive we make from QC on a regular basis.

APaa2RRU0S2hyHZHL04ZwA.text: My family and I liked this place. The whole restaurant is very small and cramped, but I do like the decor and theme. Our waitress was extremely nice and helpful and funny as well. I love how extensive the menu is. Our food came out pretty quickly and the favorite among my family was the spicy Mac n cheese burger! Very tasty and I would definitely come back for that burger! Also very well priced and even the build your own burger was pretty good. I wouldn't recommend this place for families with small kids, but I would definitely recommend to everyone else! The only really I'm not giving it 5 stars is because of how cramped and tight the restaurant was.

_IO5pD9uWK-rfA6wKVRtCQ.text: Love finding different places that offer something more than the norm. We got there 20 after they opened on a Monday and it was packed!!! Was really tempted to get the pb&j burger but couldn't bring myself to do it. Went with the safe Mac & cheese burger! It was good but not amazing. I will definitely go back & try the other stuff at some point but it's just not a must have for me based on the first trip.

HA9gtMTEIU6s4M73DzrBlw.text: Was really looking forward to trying this place after reading the reviews from previous patrons.  Similar to a previous review, upon arrival we were informed of a 20-25 minute wait.  No big deal. However after ~ 45 minutes and seeing 4 parties be seated who arrived after us, we decided to ask how many people were ahead of us on the list.  The employee informed us there were still 4 groups ahead of us on the list somehow.  Unfortunately due to this individual's lack of any idea what is going on in the world, we decided to leave.  The food did just look like an overpriced cheeseburger anyway.

j75k2wamKIBaPiMNhAp9DA.text: Super friendly staff and I loved the laid back atmosphere.   Right when I walked in it was packed but I was offered a drink and it ended up only being a 5 minute wait.  I got the bacon burger which was pretty satisfying and not overcooked. My girlfriend got the PB&J burger with bacon. She said it was definitely different but she did enjoy the burger. Just be careful because it is VERY messy. Also I got the normal side of fries which were excellent.   Andrea was our waitress and she was SUPER friendly and helpful as this has been our first time there. I am a big burger guy and I wasn't disappointed.   Also reminded me of being at San Diego which I had just came from which was awesome. Beachish atmosphere with super relaxed music. Honestly no complaints here!

Cba-cNM3X17X8B5_DfvtLg.text: Dinner.   Great burger.  Had the P.B.and J Bacon on pretzel bun with the sweet potato tots.  Weird combination, but was surprisingly tasty. The combo of P.B., Jelly and bacon together was a unexpected flavorfull surprise.  Tots were great.  Great bar service.  Will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. P.B.and J Burger on pretzel bun.  Sweet potato tots.

iztZ4ejAyA3c60grPCTAuw.text: This burger place is one of the under meat and eateries of Valley.   Rehab ranks higher in my over The Grind. Portion Con-trol or Outta-control are some the nice perks of rehab. Their pretzel bun game is hella strong.   For only being here for the second time ever, this place needs to stay on the rotation of yum.

TxdUZKCrAEIhf6WsVHVUKQ.text: I'd heard a lot of people recommend Rehab Burger over the last year and finally got to try it yesterday. It exceeded my lofty expectations. The burgers were huge, delicious, and a great price (especially considering the price of ground beef). Sweet Potato Tots are an amazing thing and I don't know why this is the first time I have heard of them or had them. Beer selection is standard, nothing too exciting, but our wonderful waitress Megan added some shots (with our permission) to our orders that made each drink order unique. Speaking of Megan, she is the most fun and outgoing waitress I have had in a long time.  If you haven't already, go try Rehab.

PorOo-3Zz-O-OF415TUtLg.text: I really like the beach atmosphere and our server was nice, but my food was mediocre. My fries tasted like they were reheated (blah) and the burger was ok, but didn't wow me. I had a bacon cheeseburger and I would choose 5 guys bacon cheeseburger over this places any day. They have lots of specialty burgers there, those may be better then the "average" one I got but I don't think I will go back to try it. Also, no kids menu which I didn't like because I have a family.

CD8nZa0IQyZXc2X7WRMpoQ.text: This is my favorite burger place...ever! I have tried multiple burger bars and counters and nothing outshines rehab. The food is great and the atmosphere is really cool. The pricing is very fair as well. I always get the Mac gnarly burger, and I just love this place.

B3niOiamp9kggmoHoWD2kQ.text: Burgers are great, better than Cold Beer & Cheeseburgers. However, our server Jen was short and curt, at one point asking us if we were OK with our beers, then three minutes later asking us if we wanted our check. When I said, "No, we're probably gonna have another beer," she told me "OK, no rush." Really? Because now I feel like I'm being rushed. No personality, whatsoever. I'll come back, just not with her as our server.

bVQ3gEWdInCJqsXBOwQUQw.text: This place is AWESOME!! First time here, atmosphere is great, lively m7sic and great staff. I got the Hatch Chili Cheeseburger, with onion rings and the Maui Coconut Porter. The burger came out perfect, well seasoned and the hatch chili very tasty. The onion rings were to die for. The wife got the Mac Narley on the pretzel bun with sweet potato tots..... all awesome. All in all, we just found a new joint when we come to Phoenix.

wXqIPks9mONC2gJHPJ4q7g.text: I'm new to Phoenix, coming from Southern Cal. I was looking for good places in Scottsdale. Went here yesterday, it was great! My husband and I shared a burger and it was huge! We did the build your own burger, we did a hamburger with portabella mushroom and avocado, it was delish. The cook added more mushrooms cooked in a wine sauce I believe. It was very good! Next time I'm in Scottsdale I'm going here. Oh and the staff is great and so is the atmosphere

PuUW5_CzLClAp6lartwp5A.text: The food is delicious! We ordered bacon cheeseburgers and I got a chocolate shake that was so good! The young hostess seemed a little aloof at first as she didn't make eye contact, but she was nice when we asked her a question and a hard worker as we saw her multi-tasking between clearing tables and greeting patrons. Our server was super friendly and down-to-earth and a woman who appeared to be the owner or manager also stopped by to check on our experience, which was nice. There is a mix of a young hip crowd as well as plenty of people over 40 (thank goodness!) and there is a cool, fun vibe here. Not a major deal, but the women's restroom was the tiniest one I've ever seen with barely room for someone to wait without being hit by the door. It's located in Old Town Scottsdale so it's fun to walk around and sightsee in the area as well.

ptVVYd22p8IGQT4g-Zavog.text: Amazing!!! Burgers were awesome! Tater tots were awesome! Blood Mary was spicy. Love this place!

qGffXYGa6WOQ8zZBy5n3ag.text: Really disappointed after reading all the wonderful recommendations on YELP.   This hamburger place is overrated.  The burger was ok, the onion rings and french fries were not fully cooked and small size.  We struggled to find our waiter to get our drinks re-filled.  The atmosphere is nice but the seating is not super comfortable.  We would not go back there are too many other great burger places.

9M5pOBYHNpXtdslb1L86aQ.text: This place is the BEST ... The food is amazing the atmosphere is wonderful i highly recommend this place it is the best burgers i have ever had and my daughter loves the fish tacos ... Keep up the good work

Icpug0TPOLBbfLCxTigd5A.text: I am cringing as I write this; My husband and I have a 1 year old so date nights are at a minimum for us. This being said, we try to sneak in a 'date lunch' here and there. After reading some stellar positive reviews, we decided to try Rehab Burger Therapy out. Parking was fine, we got into a good spot right away, but as soon as we walked through the door, we were disappointed. We stood in the doorway for a few minutes before anyone noticed us, were sat and ignored for at least 10 minutes. We finally ordered and the server returned 5 minutes later because she 'forgot to take drink orders'. 25 minutes later we were served our food... this is the only reason I gave this joint 2 stars-- the food. The Hawaiian burger and sweet potato tots were so delish, but still didn't make up for the super disappointing service-- after all we didn't lunch until 1pm so it wasn't swamped. We will try again, on an occasion where we have more time bc the food truly was yummy!

Du-9vQGxN9lh7hXRSQhXcg.text: every time i come here i order the clams... the mushroom burger's yum as well as the sweet tater tots - surprisingly the PB&J burger is quite tasty

GnLyidtC1ZI3LhZ_F1gqEw.text: Looks like we had the same experience as a few otherS. Seriously fun food choices! Everyone liked their food, some of the flavor combos were a bit too weird for me- but I appreciated the creativity! Our only negative was the service, she seemed overwhelmed or under-trained??? Long wait for drinks, the check and especially returning the redit cards aftr we paid.

Q311WVTGVhlvdg6omoTe4w.text: The burgers here are absolutely outstanding. Definitely give the Sweet Potato Tots a try. The tap is a bit small for my taste (I'm a beer guy), but there's enough available that you can find what you're looking for. We'll be coming back.
