fg9tef3-rflcrG5nfj5ALw.text: Not what we thought: My fiance and I were really excited to have a burger here since it was the #1 Yelp rated burger place in Scottsdale, but we were disappointed with our burgers. He ordered the Swiss Mushroom Burger and after I took a bite out of it it was really bland. The patty seemed to barely be seasoned and hardly had any savory flavors or high notes. I ordered the Backyard BBQ Burger, and the pineapple BBQ sauce was good as were the 2 giant onion rings, however, the patty was also quite bland and seemed to be seasoned the same way as the Swiss Burger. The Sweet Potato Tater Tots that Yelp users seemed to be raving about was just missing something. They were far too sweet. Maybe it was the batter? Perhaps we just caught them on a bad night. However, the SERVICE was EXCELLENT. Very pleasant and cheerful staff who checked on us frequently and we were also seated very quickly. Our food  arrived without much waiting. The ambiance is fun and inviting with a relaxing, casual beach vibe. All in all, it was ok, but not the type of burger place we anticipated.

xFWRIsEpIV45gLknDmmYZw.text: Just visited again and had the burger with the peanut butter and jelly!  WTH,  it was unlike any burger I've ever had and is now my newest favorite!  Freaken amazing!

UM_yZG-Mwyyim3dYyqtPSA.text: In a nutshell...Friendly & inviting ambiance, outstanding customer service, owners work along side staff to give you a great dining experience, peanut & tree nut allergy considerate, a menu that satisfies everyone from the meat-lover to the health conscience to the vegan to the youngest member of your group, reasonable prices & PHENOMONAL FOOD!!!  Try Rehab Burger Therapy & you'll become a regular!    For the reasons behind these comments click on "Filtered Reviews" at the bottom of the review list.

sGMLjL9q3_4CtSabE0iZMw.text: My husband wanted a good burger and we decided to branch off from our usual favorite, ZinBurger. Rehab is quite a drive for us but well worth it!  Fun atmosphere, although a bit warm inside for us. The hostess and waiter seemed to really enjoy working there. The hamburgers and chicken burgers were fantastic! How great that there are bun choices, the pretzel bun being a unanimous favorite. Three of our group liked the fries, but I didn't particularly care for some spice on them (chili powder?), which is a slight bummer since I'm the fry-person in the family. But I was very happy with the onion rings and will try the sweet potato tater tots next time. The waiter even said he'd let me try a tater first to see if I liked it... what great service! Too bad I was way too stuffed to shovel in another bite. We will definitely be back; only wish it were closer to home.

5nGVZxecSbhJwXWL908dSQ.text: Came here based on reviews and it was worth it! If I could give this place 4.5, I would. The only thing that kept it from a 5 was the onion rings because the onions were too wide...not enough flavor. Love their sauces and tater tots! This place may be known for their burgers but the pork was fantastic....it'll get me back here for sure! Would most definitely recommend this place.

YDQTSfJsL3TrkDFqr9YiEg.text: Beer was cold. Staff was attentive. Burger was a MAJOR disappointment.  The burger was Thin and dry as was the bun. Given the reviews.....Was I at the wrong burger joint?

1RAeLTkEUgVA-Rn3jPXiXg.text: I have never written a review in my life, but the service here was so bad enough that I got compelled to write a review to warn others. Our party of two arrived around 2 p.m. hoping to get a quick lunch, but what we received was quite the opposite, it took about 15 minutes after sitting to even get a server for drinks. We had been waiting so long that we went ahead and ordered our food as soon as we were able to flag down a server, 45 minutes later not the nearest sight of our food coming, to cut it short we didn't receive our food after more than 50 minutes of waiting, we had no choice but to leave at that point. Will not be returning here ever, or at least until they drastically improve their service.

husaVhhe7iSUJMvs65qEDg.text: Just wonderful! Can't say enough about the menu and overall vibe of this place!! Excellent service!! I recommend the Tuma Sammy! :)

jjP8s7yvUN9ZU01n_ate7g.text: Yummy and hot  - good margaritas. Never had a bad experience. Love to sit outside. Calamari is better than you expect at a burger joint

Fp_x2yrT6GceEAW-k42snA.text: We had a wonderful dinner! The Cobb salad was fantastic. My youngest and her friend had the pbj with fries. My oldest had the alfredo. A friend of my oldest had the bacon cheeseburger. All 4 kids had chocolate shakes. We were all very impressed with the food, service, and ambience.

WyqvdsIwttkmSBBrsik2cg.text: This place is AMAAAAZING. Every time I go I am more and more impressed with their food. Even beyond that the atmosphere is awesome and the staff is always the best. One server in particular stands out above the rest....if you have the opportunity you need to sit in Nick's section. If you can't find him ask for Pickle! He'll make you feel like family and his happy mood is contagious! After eating here and seeing how this place runs, I don't think I can ever go to another burger joint again. If you're looking for a great time and some tasty grub this is definitely the place :-)  -Missy

EE7gUK7seSFODL1e5tBGsA.text: Stunningly good burger! I'm from out-of-town, it was my first time there, so I "bellied up to the bar". I had the "Relapse" (small) "Know Pablano" burger on a pretzel bun with their standard fries. I slathered about half of the Chipotle Aioli on the bun and left the rest for dipping the fries (Belgian Style...). I savored *every bite*. I drank some Four Peak 8th Street Pale Ale to complement the meal, and afterward had a pleasant talk with a local couple who frequent the restaurant. Friendly atmosphere, good music, clean establishment, and a nice surrounding area. I plan to come back and try their other burgers on future business trips!

tLivsVcm8g1mtlq2Hiyu2g.text: My husband and I stopped in while in the area and were very pleased with our experience. Our surver Devin was on his game, friendly, quick and responsive. My husband had the PB&J Bacon burger, super messy, loads of peanut butter and delicious! Worth the mess, the Sriracha gives a little heat with the sweet. I had the Hawaiian burger and modified to my preference with a turkey patty.  Great atmosphere, friendly staff. They were busy however our wait was super short. We'll definitely recommend Rehab Burgers to our friends.

Ucq-Gy9XvIBnGlk5QU3_VA.text: Stopped in here after reading a few reviews.  When out of town I always want to pick a place for a good damn  burger.   This place did not disappoint.   I had the pulled pork over a burger on a bagel bun.   The thing was off the hook.   I enjoyed  every bit of it.   Sweet potato  tots were lightly fried and very tasty.   Bartender was a cool dood and his recommendations were right on point.

TinEClaWIrtpYT1jlAnYiw.text: I feel awful that it took me this long to update my review, I'm sorry Wiley! Rehab Burger is now one of my favorite spots to grab a great burger, and a cold beer! The staff is always nice and funny, the music makes you feel like you're on the beach in Cali, and the food.... Well the food is awesome! I love the Mac Gnarly burger as well as the PB&J burger! Check it out, you won't be disappointed! Oh, be sure to start out with the Pig Wings!!

oNVBpplpLv5rlFkyI023Ng.text: Fun and hip.  Great atmosphere.  Great service.  Loved the old bicycles hanging from the ceiling.  The burgers and fries were delish.  We also ordered the Mac & Cheese.  HUGE portion.  Ended up bringing half of it home which was fine by me because it was also delicious.  Spicy and flavorful.  Not your ordinary Mac & Cheese.  The drink menu is rather basic; nothing exceptional.  But you don't go for the drinks; you definitely go 'cause you're craving a burger.  We went on a Friday night.  Very loud and busy and fun.  Plenty of little crying kids in the restaurant too, which can be a good (or annoying) thing, if that's your thing.  Our first time.  We will definitely return.

qncSlvU-FmhtZqXypoGA2w.text: The food is good. We has a nice waiter, however... The hostess' were beyond  rude... Smh

taBdd2uP3Nple7BXG0aFpQ.text: Found this gem of a place when we were out in Scottsdale in January.  Great food and atmosphere.

HuCy1sPvSkVD6jqhcLCe3g.text: Really surprised by the appearance to find good quality food and gluten-free options! Most of the sauces and dressings and the fries are gluten-free and they offer gluten-free buns!

Hy-pP9IjQqgkejNBFLMSAw.text: Found this place off a living social deal months ago and absolutely fell in love with this place!! I'm surprised it has taken me this long to review.  I am addicted (no pun intended) to Rehab; think I've literally been there 3 times in a two week period. I have never had a bad experience or have had anyone I brought complain about their experience. The customer service is phenomenal. The servers and bartenders are awesome and give great recommendations. The regulars at the bar there are super friendly with great advice on what to order.  The food, phenomenal!! The burgers are huge and you get great portion sizes. You can substitute anything with no hassles! Their sweet tots, out of this world! And their sauces, absolutely amazing (pineapple aioli is my fave).   Definitely a must try for anyone living here or just passing through!!

_boKfwVMSW0kvovuf2G4HQ.text: This is a bar type atmosphere like Cheers but the food is out of this world. Within 15 minutes I had met the owner and head chef and they were really great people. Then I got the Calimari which is meatier and better flavored than any I have ever had. I thought that was great but then the pulled pork sandwich with fries showed up along with my wife's bacon cheese burger. My mouth was druling over the Bar-B-Q sauce on the fries when my wife made me try her hamburger. WOW! Finally I dug into my pulled pork. In order to understand how good this is you need to know that I am a True redneck that smokes pork, beef and poltry weekly at home. This Bar-B-Q  sauce was so smokey and delightfully spicy that I told the owner he should get it bottled. He then brought me a 20 Oz cup of it to take home for free. Seriously I just went into this place due to the name and I wanted a beer. I will make the 60 mile round trip here regularly because this makes my Bar-B-Q suck in comparison.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. What bar doesn&#39;t serve Tequila but this bar thrives on it
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. A little Christmas humor.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. It really is a Bar atmosphere with great food.

LfWOFK1yE5YjNs_oRPBDTA.text: Wow! I've never had a better burger.  Cooked exactly to my request and phenomenal taste.  Cheryl was an awesome waitress,  tentive,  friendly and fun.  If you're wanting a burger,  RBT is the place to go.

QJebqwgT1n5meDuUVDXzWg.text: I have to admit this is a fantastic place!  Ambience, burgers, fries, service. It was all good. I came here with a client and wished I was here hanging with friends having a beer. Very comfortable!

68znbPjEK7iMZRBinpl7iQ.text: Wow, this place is awesome. The burgers were incredible and the waitstaff was funny and engaging. A definite must stop if you are in Scottsdale!

osU4jQfdMV1p8e1CSbWzkA.text: Delicious burgers and fries and onion rings with attentive service. You can order (and then actually receive) a rare burger, which is much appreciated! I would be happy to go again.

hh_GrYnI2O_MmHMgWqHnsA.text: We were celebrating a friends birthday tonight so I thought I would honor his aging with a little child like ordering of my own. I had the PB&J Bacon Burger. It is exactly what it sounds like: creamy peanut butter and grape jelly melting over a juicy beef patty with hearty bacon slices. There is also a little sirano chili in the mix to further confuse your taste buds. It was served with sweet potato tots and a pineapple dipping sauce. I washed it down with a Corona Rita. I probably won't do this one again, because there are so many other great burgers on the menu I want to try next but if you are a little brave and very hungry, give this one a go. It will make you feel like a kid again.

8xb2X4RGi4qXoSilt40oYA.text: Delicious, fun and unbelievably perfect margaritas. Our waitress made every detail great. We had four kids with us, and some of the food was a little spicy for them -helped figure out a solution on the fly so they were filled up and we didn't buy four additional meals. Quick tip...call ahead for large parties. We had our table waiting for us upon arrival.

PZutYcwdeiDraGDLy3Vq5g.text: One of the best burgers I've had the pleasure of eating.  Service is prompt, friendly and more than willing to offer suggestions for neophytes.  Pricing is about what you would see at the other "gourmet burger" chain, but this place is a better bang for the buck.  Had the chili cheeseburger with onion rings - a True fork and knife burger, but everything was great, down to the brioche bun.  The onion rings are about 1" thick and beer battered, and well worth the upcharge.  Other options include sweet potato tater tots as well as conventional skin-on French fries.  Most definitely will be back for more.

lylHjLDS3g6nFMUEaIhSEQ.text: Not sure what all the hype is about.  The toppings for their burgers are interesting for sure (pbj, or Mac and cheese, etc)-- but the burger itself?  Not so great.  Best part of the meal was the fries.

_ytaSVbrX6RRB9PcuzOcDw.text: Normally I don't go to eat in downtown Scottsdale because my experience has been overpriced, overhyped food -- served with a side of attitude. It's as if they assume because of their location or the head-twitching house beat in the background, the food and service don't matter all that much.   No so with "RBT". I loved this place. We've already been there twice and we will definitely be back. The menu is creative (I recommend the "pig wings") and the burgers are high quality for the price. I especially like the "pretzel" burger rolls, although I wish they were offered on both the small and large burgers, not just the large.  The ambiance is casual beach-boardwalk with a touch of Maui, complete with fishtank HD screens and tropical slide-show picture frames. It's well done but not over-done. The wait staff is friendly and easy on the eyes to say the least. The beer is extra cold and crisp (no "old tap" taste like some other Scottsdale establishments - yuk) and they are good at keeping an eye on the level in your glass. I also appreciated that one of the owners came to our table to chat.  I am somwhat stingy with my five-star ratings, but this place earned one easily. Overall, it fits everything I'm looking for in a casual dining experience.

kAFsln98D3rmo1cdSukK-g.text: This place is really cool. Definitely a fun coastal vibe about it. My love of burgers brought me here. Initially we had about a 15-20 minute wait. The hostess seemed very distracted or overwhelmed with something so probably could have been seated within minutes of getting here. I had the PBJ burger with sweet potato tots and it was pretty amazing. Definitely saving this as one of my go back to places.

FBWasMxYCF738YwjQBvESA.text: We had fabulous sandwiches the service is great the Joe Montana was huge and the patty melt tasty. Will be back and send friends.

qHJNnkK7x97T1XFpw6HDmA.text: The food was quite good. I loved the burgers and the sweet taters, and the dishes were well crafted. The Spicy Mac-N-Cheese was not all that spicy by my standards. The service was the biggest issue-it was a busy night, but it took an hour to get our entrees and a good 15 minutes to get the condiments and 15 for the check. I wish they would hire more staff.

YcqIYpH-vhcHWhCr2A3Omg.text: Heard a lot about Rehab burger Therapy and was dying to try it out. Maybe my expectation was too high, but I was not very impressed with this place. Had to wait for a long time, which is acceptable taking into consideration that it was a weekend. Ambience was nice, beachy type. Definitely a fun place to hang out - 4 star for that. Staff was polite and friendly - 4 star. Very few servers, and I found that our server was attending to almost all the tables, which made the service super slow (the forks/knives took about 15 mins to come to the table, the napkins took another 15 mins, the check took around 20-30 mins) - 2 star. Menu had quite a lot of options including vegan - 3.5 star for that. But the vegan patty comes only in 10 oz size, which is HUGE - 2 star for that. Food was ok, nothing extraordinary (I was bummed because I have heard so much about how great their burger was). I have had much better burgers - 2 star for that.

DeirrYxqaVVu34BfDBfFpQ.text: Great burgers,good service and friendly staff.  Went with coworkers. I  had the jalapeno burger minus the cream cheese,it came with cheddar and cream cheese cheddar was enough. Delicious! .  My coworker asked for a recommendation between the PBJ and bacon buyer and the Pineapple burger.  Hands down the recommendation was the PBJ and  bacon. Both of my coworkers had the PB&J and bacon. Both said it was amazing. In fact one was going to make it that weekend with family at home. I highly recommend Burger rehab if you're looking for a great burger

ufnVjoXA1_jXVP2eFJhqhA.text: Jon the bar tender gives amazing service!! The food here is off the hook! Highly recommend this place!

8fHyXs8fDj_60yvDCdK4iQ.text: LOVED it!!! Had the medium gold medal wings and they were perfect! Our BBQ burgers AMAZING!!! Can't wait to go back loved it

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. BBQ burger YUM!!!!

qxmSNU-YezyQV4FCYlrqYA.text: Super fantastic food. A must stop in Scottsdale.  Love the turkey burger and sweet potato tots!!!

Cs38WivNvq0FfLH_gzaj1A.text: Burgers are delish... try one with a fried egg!  Tried the claims as well.  Good portions and fresh!  Service was outstanding!   Will return

DbB4tUw04KschZKpyjFeZg.text: Just a nice neighborhood burger bar!  Very low key, not the typical Old Town noise pounding restaurant.  The burgers were very tasty (mushroom burger, cheese burger and turkey burger) each were filled with flavors and perfectly cooked.  When we arrived there was a little bit of a wait and had to sit at a high top with two younger children; in the future I probably wouldn't come here with the kids as it felt more like a bar with really good food versus a restaurant with a bar.

GZtllfTtdD7JFNR1EZorSA.text: Rehab was the first place I discovered the art of putting fried egg on your burger. The hangover burger (Fried egg, bacon, colby jack cheese and hatch green chili) is on point--whether or not you were overserved the night prior. Great staff and comfortable (albeit island inspired) setting. Extra credit for it being a local business!

G0P3mRvNOsb151RCzeMkcw.text: I LOVED Rehab. Came here after an Angel game during Spring Training and it wasn't busy at all. Our server was on point and friendly, and the food came out fast. I had the PBJ & Bacon burger (no sriracha for me) and loved every single bite. I got the sweet potato tots too, and they were amazing. This is the perfect place to watch a game, get a drink, and eat a big juicy burger. I will definitely be back next time I'm in AZ.

F6J7c-ImM-GGXWTS45uhqw.text: PBJ and Bacon Burger was soooo good. Amazing. I'm usually blah on burgers but I'm coming back to have this again. And the sweet potato tots were equally as good. The server was awesome. Totally personable and attentive and cool. Great atmosphere. Highly recommend!

uHxIvoc1mvx9CdoatHCLUg.text: Some of the best service I have had in a while! Have had the same waitress on both visits -she is a rock star. Plus a great burger. Awesome sauce selections, secret menu / ghost burger & corn on the cob side.

4ujEm68qF1BFE2wYxASpAQ.text: I went with some friends and they wouldn't even let me order for myself. The PB&J Burger was what they wanted me to eat and that's what I got. I did get to order my side, sweet potato tots, great choice! The place was very busy and I can see why. I've heard a lot about the PB&J burger and to be honest, I was underwhelmed. Don't get me wrong, it was good, just didn't live up to the hype that I've heard. The burger itself was very tasty, the bun was great, I just think I'd pick one of their other many choices the next time I go, and I will go again.

0UCz1I_alFmX7QkGuaRWDw.text: Awesome burger joint. Fresh, super tasty, bread is fresh and moist.  Try the pretzel bread!!  I has the PB&J (no sriracha, please) and it was deliciously unexpected. Although my hubby had to go with the Blue Cheese and Bacon with ingredients on top (vs the 10oz original which has all embedded in the beef), it was definitely rehab worthy. The sweet potato tots are a bit greasy but great. Thanks to the reviews we chose this place and it was well worth it.  Note, it was packed at 11:45am...it is a popular place and the wait could be long. The tables outside were open yet the heat was unbereable (this coming from an islander).

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bacon and Blue Cheese. Delish
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB&amp;J...no sriracha...yet really good.

qu3ZZEbgYJzmLTuVcBxKjA.text: Place is very busy on weekends, plenty of burger selections and very good GF selection.

05Y0tW2gr_WmqSIY1vyucQ.text: Where do I begin? The terrible service began waiting 5 minutes for a server to bring me water, the Arnold Palmer was weak and watered down. Now let's move onto the "burger" which is what their known for. Issued for American cheese but the server "corrected" me and said "that's not cheese", I said cheddar and he said yes. My burger came with no "cheddar"! It went back to the kitchen and they just threw on a piece of cheddar that wasn't even melted. On top of that the burger was "dry", no juices at all. Maybe I just had a bad experience nonetheless it was my experience. Worst $7.50 burger I ever had. Hard working people deserve better than this as are money should not be wasted on bad food and a bad experience.

8PX_4X1xmbbLlrjpAnYVYw.text: For awhile the name scared me but wow, great burgers and fries. The onion rings looked good too, next time...

GqhmZAW5P5qZM4G6cTv4jw.text: Had a late lunch here today (2:30). Place was pretty busy, but were seated right away. Service was friendly. Don't understand what the big deal is, though. Food was average at best. Had a bacon cheeseburger, couldn't taste the cheese, although I did see it. Burger itself had very little beef flavor. Sweet potots were ok, would rather have actual potatoes. Also, they were cold when arrived at the table. It was no problem sending them back for a hot batch, though. Onion rings were cold also. Ghost burger is HOT! Women's restroom is odd, and poorly arranged. All things considered, not worth the drive for me to go back. There are plenty of good burger spots nearby.

-I25qT3LlCbeE-XHNJNp2w.text: Amazing place!!! Highly recommend! Amazing manger Phil, and great service!!! Everyone is super nice!!!

TyZKNmg0UmjTTduQQIsQOg.text: Never had a bad meal here. Every burger is an art. 2 people can be full from a burger. So watch your potion size. Mac cheese burger is to die for :)

3p5j1J_ejEKdwKu82Y3PJQ.text: Absolutely AMAZING!! We had Kens Bbq burger rehab size and we split it... Perfect portion fort splitting!!! And sweet potato fries... YUMMO!! Wonderful service by Jeff!!!

Av-fI-gYoM60UXi4B69xtw.text: Excellent burgers. Quality beef makes a difference! We split the 10 oz for lunch and it was PLENTY!  Sweet potato tater tots wierd and not very tasty. Cannot recommend those.  Nice selection of beers. Liked special offerings to dress burgers. Great location right before a game at Scottsdale Stadium. EZ walk.   Service good. Young crowd. Burgers took a little while, but worth the wait.

KlkANzc3dhqfqhU-WMQyfA.text: Peanut Butter Burger.... Yep, Amazing!!!  All of the Food here is great...

_UcZaAsvi_0OnV0AT0NMqA.text: This place is very good.  The burgers are fat and juicy with unbelievable brioche or pretzel buns!  The bar is kinda small but has great craft beer.  I love the decor which has funky old radios and TVs with a DVD playing of a fish tank!

Y1bnmvv_qpWELQnhARvjvw.text: Had the PBJ and bacon burger with a touch of sriracha. It was amazing. Messy and tasty! A local place by me has a similar burger (I'm from out of town), but they don't add jelly or sriracha so when I go home, I'll suggest it for my burger. Also had the tots and they were savory and tasty. Sat outside which for us Michiganders is always a treat. It was busy and we were there for lunch. To be expected! Drinks were always filled.

plzuk7UVzn-AKU3rsrqZow.text: Delicious. I love that you can get the different sizes, and the different fries/tots options.  I had the Relapse Hangover Burger - and it was plenty. Couldn't have finished a Rehab if I wanted to.  Husband had the Rehab either Hatch Chili or Poblano burger. Either way, it was delicious. We both ordered our burgers med rare, but his was more on the medium side.   Would definitely come back; parking is the only drawback.

189eIEBKsP0NLH6KG9YdJQ.text: Yummmmm! The peanut butter jelly bacon sriracha burger is not to be missed! It is absolutely indulgent. And go for the sweet potato tots! It gets rather warm inside with the door opening up and letting all the A/C out. And the bathrooms were like a sauna! However, I will brave the warm environment for that burger.   The guys in our group ordered the bigger burger the first time and then realized quickly that the smaller size is just fine. With the side, you definitely won't leave hungry.  I tasted my fellow diner's pork and, although tasty, would definitely order the burger.

gXHHe0X8lYVbtF0BL-uDXQ.text: the bartender was awesome, it was so crowded but he was very accommodating to our large party. From what i remember the burger was huge and i couldn't finish it. All servers were great. Burgers and Beer, eat here if your in the area!

ZMmogk_wS0VTlvMd77mU9Q.text: Wouldn't have known about this place without Yelp. Thanks guys!  Interesting restaurant, with a sort of Island/surfer attitude. The burgers were great, although my Hangover had a bit too much Hatch chile--it dominated the flavor of the burger, so it would've been nice to cut it up into slices rather than a huge layer. The fries were awesome (especially the dipping sauces). Best burger I've had in Arizona.

w31qcagZJ0s64tkyJVQ-ng.text: discovered this place while waiting to pick up a friend from Scottsdale Healthcare!  Amazing place!  We only had a short time sort we ordered appetizers.  We had the quesadilla with chicken which was HUGE and cheesy, and the calamari.  Calamari is for me sort of a barometer of how good everything else on the menu might be, and usually I'm disappointed, but not here.  It was a little different than your normal calamari in the breading, but it was perfect!  Cooked perfectly, not too chewy and had a really nicely flavored marinara sauce to go with it, and two lemons, which is nice.  I saw some of the burgers go by our table and they looked amazing, big and juicy.  I wish we had more time so I could have had one.  Will definitely go back.

uM-BiRansny6-hKxFEh2GQ.text: The food here is AMAZING and the service is fantastic.  Huge portions, one burger was enough for two people to share. We ordered the PB&J bacon burger, and the Porkster burger. Both were delicious! Try the Quesadillio it's a meal in itself, kinda spicy and super tasty.

hq2ivWJxApZ6K0KRoZ_2QA.text: Best burger I have ever eaten!  Wasn't brave enough to try the pb&j, but the Hawaiian was excellent. Perfectly cooked, soft pretzel bun, good fries and great staff. Loved it!  Will definitely come back next time I'm in the area.

KCRmEc_Hnt0cr6SwD-qzWg.text: Some of the best burgers I've ever had! The jalapeno popper burger is my favorite, but the mac and cheese is a close second!

hV-eJBOYa5NxhvWZUTBD2w.text: The food was so good! I went with the reviews and at the PB&J burger. It blew my mind! I'd highly recommend this place. Also the tots were amazing!

GvsehPdTP9oxFhuKi22OUQ.text: Where to begin... This place put me in the deepest food coma my consciousness has ever been (that is a good thing). I ordered the bacon cheeseburger with avocado (rehab size) with a side of sweet potato tots and French fries. While this is a pretty standard order in the food industry, there was something indescribably different about this place. Maybe it was the seasoning, maybe the vibes or music; regardless my experience here was great and I will be returning in the near future.

RQ2wSkY5WKNUnPPqo3KqkQ.text: Situation: - Dinner with friends (October 2017) - One of my friends ordered a burger, I ordered the Grill Chicken Sandwich - We are at the bar  Pros - The service is fantastic - Large portions of food area nice - Not a bad beer selection - My friend really enjoyed his Burger  Cons - The grilled Chicken Sandwich was just okay, which makes sense at a burger place (the bread that was used was really nice, the chicken was a bit overly cooked)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

rjUdWo6WFgnRoAavOn3PYg.text: This was the best burger I have ever eaten EVER!  I got the jalapeno peppers Burger it was so good we went there three days in a row.   Yummy trust the stars on this one 5 stars in my book it was 10?!!! I have to also compliment all of the girls that work here except one I believe her name is Liz who shouldn't be a waitress ever!! I am mentioning the girls that work here because rarely can you go into a place and all the girls are amazing, cool, friendly and good at their jobs that's a very rare thing in a restaurant especially for girls. To bad this one person had to ruin my amazing opinion so much that I felt the need to adjust my post that's how bad of a waitress she was!! Liz find another line of work girl this isn't for you!!

fCeVBczaEBj7aprnKThQDQ.text: I took the entire family to Rehab. There were ten of us. All of us were thrilled. Mac n cheese burger?! Not healthy but unique and delicious. The server was great and attentive. Loved this place!

bavomZlvQI4r7LDHR4QnhA.text: Wow, okay. I got the burger that's half pulled pork half burger, and it's amazing! I wanted dessert but holy cow this burger filled me up. The environment is very laid back and chill, with friendly service. I am definitely coming back!

dk3qJuL7P9eZf-Kdw6uzCg.text: My second visit and I would highly recommend!!!  Burgers to die for!  Staff was very friendly and helpful. Will be back, even if it is a bit of a drive!!

JLczvpNgFwRDJ-ux5Cfaug.text: Been to this awesome burger joint in Old Town a number of times now. Never a bad time here. Food, service and atmosphere is always awesome.   There is a wait to get a table from time to time, it's worth it. The bar topically has open seating. Both fries and tots are awesome, put wings are great and as always, the burgers rock.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mushroom &amp; Swiss 10oz burger.

-HyI-AWOpDptRfJ192tUTQ.text: A great option for a burger lover.  They also have gluten free options.

SeY32LpTuqFTM_1mkfKg1Q.text: We decided to try this place while visiting Scottsdale after reading the reviews and seeing the pictures on Yelp, which all looked delicious. We were seated quickly and got the cheesy green chile chicken dip (not the official name) for our appetizer. It was very flavorful and had nice chunks of chicken in it. Our meals came relatively quickly for how busy it was and as ordered. We were satisfied with the taste of our burgers, but disappointed that our french fries were flavored with lime. That might be the restaurant's 'thing', but we were not fans. And I usually love lime on my chips, tacos, etc. but not my french fries. It wasn't labeled anywhere on the menu either.   But overall, the burgers and service were good. I would definitely give this place a shot if you're in the mood for delicious and/or giant burgers.

Mcm8N2lkfC1B3F_A9rCFwA.text: The decor was super cool! It was a fun place to go for a casual dinner. The veggie burger was delicious and I ate every bite! The burger menu is a mile long with everything from peanut butter and jelly burger to macaroni and cheese burger. We showed up around 8 and it was super busy had to wait for 20 minutes, but it was worth it. Service was kind of slow just because of how busy it was. Overall, a great experience.

iXf3rrYRAHvWktUrYSIqsg.text: Uh...yum! Our server was great, wish I remembered her name, cute sweet blonde girl who was excited to have our party of 10. Food amazing! Pleasantly surprised as we planned to go to Cold Beers and Cheeseburgers but would've taken an hour to get seated with 10. Only reason I didn't give the 5 stars is I called and said we've got 10 people can u hold a spot and she said, come right in, we have space. We arrived 5 min later and no space, but she made it up to us by asking the people at the community table to move down!

T14q8NWWTvoEsnlROZWEVg.text: Burgers were good.... they can withstand waiting to be picked up without sacrificing too much. Unfortunately, the fries & tater tots couldn't. I was so excited and really disappointed when we got the sides and they were cold and almost soggy like from waiting to be served. That was truly not cool! I understand being busy but there are ways to manage this without compromising the quality of food & service .. runners or attentive servers. Simply put ... nobody likes cold fries & especially not tots.

iYb5luXfuiDWl8kfiyucmQ.text: Where should I start?!?  I am in town from New Jersey, for work and decided to pick this place, because of the catchy name. After entering the building, I was positively surprise by the environment, and the almost full dinning room. Staff was courteous, and helpful when it come to help picking the food. Started with a half order of chili cheese fries, which was big enough for 2 persons. The taste of it was perfect, definitely the best chili cheese fries I EVER ate... hands down... For entree I ordered a backyard BBQ burger, with a wheat bun, and fries. It came out medium, and just right to be considered the best burger I ever ate. There was no other place in this world where I have ate such a great burger. Price of the food is very cheap, considering the quality.  To the management of Rehab Burger... CONGRATULATIONS, you guys rock.  Will be back.

MCMaBeM8qt_8QycoOWRmMw.text: Delicious burgers in a chill setting. I had the Ghost Burger and my fiance had the PBJ & Bacon Burger. Both with the sweet potato tots. We walked away full and happy.

ZifE0k3MXW9W-ArCgoRwZw.text: Excellent for out of towner. I give it a five for the food and portions.  No way could I eat the entire burger at one sitting. The atmosphere is more relaxed casual pub which is why it only got 4 stars. Service for water was fast and as soon as we got low it was refilled. The food did take a while to come out though.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

I3xdqEoiteIOGtDDMKwh_Q.text: Great place!  Not a beef eater, but you can get any burger with a grilled chicken breast. I got the bar b que with an onion ring and my daughter got the Pb burger. We were both extremely happy and can't wait to go back. Staff was awesome as well.

ZhD9Tj6qfgsKLAVfBH0wug.text: This place is fantastic. The burger was delicious to the point I didn't even eat any of the sides until I finished it. The spicy Mac and Cheese is BOMB. Their sweet potato tots are also great. If you are even considering eating here go because it's 100% worth it!

_5wE23t_74fCHZ4ksC94EA.text: The burgers were BOMB and at a very reasonable price. There was ample parking located next to the location which was very convenient.  The only downsides were that it was warm inside the restaurant and the restrooms get backed up really fast if it's a busy night.  Other than that everything else is AMAZING! Would definitely go back and recommend friends and family!

ebx3sMZCW4XoKkwNP_0YEQ.text: One of the best burgers I've had perfect cooked to my taste and I had the ghost pepper burger with ghost pepper cheese. The burger was spicy of course lol but it wasn't too bad I enjoyed it. My lady had a lettuce wrapped jalapeno popper burger and that was too. The food was really good the place was a nice cali surfer beach style spot and I loved it. The margaritas were good as well. The only reason i don't five it more stars is because of the long wait to get served. We sat at the bar to avoid a long wait and still at the bar it took a really long time to get a menu then to get our drinks and even longer to get our order taken. It was Friday afternoon there was a good size friend but the wait was kinda crazy even for old town. Definitely a place I'll go to earlier or during the week to beat the crowd and get better service.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ghost pepper burger the cheese is fireeee
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Lettuce wrapped jalapeno popper burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bar cool vibe

hu3OPkZ6kGhTW30v6Y7rVg.text: I would have given 3.5 stars mainly because I Love the burgers here. However, service is slow - really, really slow. And it's that way every time I come. Weekdays or weekends - doesn't matter. Also, this particular visit I made reservations because it was my birthday. Kudos for allowing reservations. But the table they reserved for us - a party of 4 - was right near the door. And in August, it's awful to sit anywhere near a door that opens & closes as frequently as this one does on a Sunday afternoon. I was so hot I was sweating & could hardly eat. That's seriously disappointing - especially because I was so looking forward to the meal & time with my friends.   So.... long & short is this:  Food is exceptional  Service is super duper pooper slow Seating by the door in summer SUCKS!

IcNR5zyewri52E7kDft8Fg.text: Visited AZ and found Rehab on Yelp and wasn't disappointed. Had the Mac n cheese burger, holy cow it was good. Would definitely go back on next trip.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

OTjf8WR4PTmHpbGKD459VQ.text: We read the reviews so wanted to try it out.  We got there at about 11:30 and we're glad we did by 11:40 it was packed.  We had the jalapeno burger and tots, it was very good.  The servers were really friendly.

nY7mjzN73mGhnHSwlMAPNA.text: Great food and amazing service, had the Philly cheese burger; it was really good. Great atmosphere, definitely a must try!

TmRytYj-C2alsIxnMwYVew.text: This is a hidden gem. We live out of town and found this on yelp. We ordered too much food. I don't even remember what we got. Something with a pineapple bbq sauce and something with macaroni and cheese. Excellent food. The service by our waiter could have been a bit more friendly, but the food was great.

SKRdxmRfZmPl_hreCtTeiQ.text: After months of hearing about this place, we finally got tinted it this past weekend with some friends. The wait was quite long, on a Saturday night in March, during spring training, we waiting an hour.  After getting anxious, hungry, and a little hangry, we finally got seated. Obviously a burger is what we ordered.  Our table ordered the PBJ burger, which had a nice blend of peanut butter, grape jelly, and siracha...and bacon.   We also ordered jalapeno popper burger and a build you own breakfast burger. The burger itself is a quality piece of meat that hasn't been frozen.  This is one of the best burgers in Arizona, and trust me when I say that I have tried a lot of burgers. I was a little hesitant, but orders the sweet potato tots...they were nothing short of amazing! I'm already planning our next trip here...I can't wait!!

nG-RTqJIKN0EWlaHAaNokA.text: I have loved this place for years and the fact that part of the ownership is from CORONADO helps. LOL!  Denise and Wiley are phenomenal people and know what the public wants or needs.  I love their vegan choices and my family loves the non-vegan choices. LOL  LOVE the atmosphere, wish it was bigger to accommodate everyone as there is usually a wait to get in. There is a reason for that.. they are GREAT!

DtL4Hw5FMCG2dQVlzYOu3g.text: Yes! Love the scenery and the burgers were amazing! I have to get gluten free options which they had. Gluten free bun was good, it doesn't just fall apart like at other places. Burger was huge and it seems priced well. The French fries were really good as well. Our sever, Hanna was very nice and accommodating. 5 stars, we will be back to enjoy drinks and burgers!!! Come here if you are hungry and want to be full/satisfied.

e3PEIwev3mNAbqLhKA-l6A.text: Started off with the $3.99 yelp check in chips and salsa. The salsa and the chips are very fresh, but in reality the burgers were so big, I probably didn't need the chips! So full!   I ordered the backyard BBQ burger, one of my favorites with the sweet potato tots. They come with this yummy sweet sauce. The BBQ sauce is nice and tangy and its topped with a giant onion ring!! My friend ordered the Mac and cheese burger, I've had this before. It's pretty amazing. Spiced with Sriracha, poblano peppers and green chiles. The Mac and cheese taste homemade! And the pretzel bun is a win combo with all those flavors!   My third trusty favorite is the hangover burger. You can't go wrong with bacon, egg and beef!   Be sure to grab a jaw breaker on the way out!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger on a Pretzel bun! Delicious!

Oqm0t9aCIcv-NPcdPs8PLQ.text: Ended with really bad food poisoning from it. The reviews were great and the food was tasty but not worth it with such bad food poisoning.

jhZHdHuKXdnceLypfiFjug.text: Sat outside because it was a cool day, not sunny, unfortunately the misters completely wet my pants and toes, so I don't recommend sitting outside.   The waitress was very nice and attentive, so good job on the customer service for that visit.   Fries and sweet potato tots were the best of anything else we ate. I was not raving about the burgers, and I wanted to try this place out because it was considered to be best burgers, unfortunately I asked for my burger medium and I got well done, it was so dry and I could taste the burnt spots throughout my burger. That alone ruined the taste of my basic bacon cheese burger, because there was no flavor at all or juiciness to it.  The ghost burger was decent but also could've been made a bit juicier and less cooked. But atleast the flavoring of the cheese and guacamole overcame the dryness.   Just wouldn't recommend going if looking for a good flavorful burger because they are overlooked and have no flavor to the patty.

jgClqOo0Xaj_-TojOmmm1g.text: Definitely lived up to the crazy burger photos that they post to Facebook. My burger was great and the sweet potato side was great. Certainly an unnecessary quantity of food for lunch but who cares.

nlm4RtNwXyHuX6dF043P3g.text: This is the best place to get a good burger the fries are amazing and the suave selection is great, our server was very friendly and gave my girlfriend and I very good service. I left with my stomach full and didn't break the bank. I strongly recommend this place for any occasion. The setting is very creative and you can outside or inside. Will be coming back soon.

HgSx76B6jjobZivwWwwy7w.text: Listen, if you're in a rush.. Maybe order carry out. You are supposed to enjoy the experience here. We came in on Saturday afternoon. We all want to sit outside, but let's get real, we are HUNGRY. We sat at the bar and had some drinks and the chips and salsa. It didn't blow my mind but it is what it is.. What kind of chips and salsa is really to die for? None.  We eventually were both able to sit at the bar so we decided to dine there. The bartender working was a hilarious brunette who kept us laughing and of course happy.   I got the hangover burger, my fiance got the PBJ. The siriracha scared me a bit on the PBJ.  Look at me right now.. (virtually)... GET THE PBJ. It was the most amazing thing I've eaten when it comes to burgers. You won't regret it.  Overall good was amazing, service was great, and we left happy. 10/10 would come back.

MO3b7p6yt7oMXrah5W9KrQ.text: Excellent service and the burgers are some of the best in the valley, outdoor patio with the party vibe makes rehab the perfect place to go for food or fun with friends

2c_FChe2r4cH5RIF6sPaOA.text: Considering Ive driven past this place a billion times and i love burgers...I was anxious and starving once we decided on lunch here. To start with the hostess threw off a vibe like she was annoyed with everyone. She didnt even try to mask her aggravation. We werent even sure if we were suppose to be following her when she seated us, Im still not sure. Because after we chose our little corner on the patio she didnt leave menus and walked away and sat another group (with menus). The food took quite a long time. And was just ok. I can say I tried it, and thats done with

vZ1AfE0pDNZrAdtcoIypBQ.text: Very good burgers - big selection. Went with family & friends and didn'thave to wait too long on a Friday evening.  Had the Spicy Mac and Cheese Burger - tasty. Everyone in the party was pleased.  I'll be back!

Dj4BgJJd3scXS0NseLXIWg.text: Best Burger this side of anywhere!  Love, love, love this place except of course for the wait.  This time we went late, they were near closing yet staff did not seem worn out as one might expect after a busy Saturday night.  The food is consistently good and menu is so diverse, definitely not a boring, lackluster burger joint, just the opposite! We live a bit far from establishment which is a bit of a blessing in disguise due potential waistline damage from temptation of too frequent visits!

gxi_utE2Y5-9aipoL79hmw.text: This place is really hard to get into at lunch & dinner time, which is to be expected from anything in Old Town. The prices are on par with Old Town as well $$. My burger, fries, & drink were $14 (closer to around $20 depending on how you tip). They try to make the place feel like your in Key West or San Diego. The burger was OK, the service was average. I feel like, with this place, your paying more just because it's in Old Town, which is totally fine. I think there are better, cheaper alternatives nearby so I wouldn't make a special trip for the food. That being said, if your in Old Town & are looking for a burger joint, Rehab is a solid option.

vnp8p7pWJO8tfvAqwHOBdw.text: This place is magic!! Try the pb&j hamburger!! I was very scared at first but it was really good. I wanted to order 10 more!! The service was great and the pawn shop next door was fun too!

PjfOpEzKxD97s1cHlMY7dw.text: Wanted to try something new, this place didn't dissapoint. Tried the spicy mac-n-cheese burger and the PB&J burger! Not a fan of the Hawaiian burger though. Topped it off with an orange creamsicle shake. That is a must have!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Bu27slCJUHay511mEtFZgg.text: Man, is this place good. We found them because of a Living Social or Groupon coupon (I don't remember which) and we've been back at least a dozen times. We've tried most of their burgers, and they are to die for. We've never had a bad experience!

KgrqOUXRw7JinVbggp-4-g.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I ordered the spicy Mac and cheese burger, which I've had in the past, tonight it was so spicy there was no flavor so I asked to sub it out for a different burger. I took one bite of the Mac and cheese not even the burger. The manager came over after already putting in my replacement burger and actually shouted in my face that I ordered wrong and he would charge me for both burgers but would not take the first burger off. When I asked to cancel the new one he said they were already making it and I would have to take both. He continued to yell I did not know how to order and this was not his fault in front of every. I cried and I will never go back.

12o-d89Qsuoth08c-A3zXg.text: What an eclectic environment...I love the decor, it's fun and whimsical, which usually means this place is going to be fun.  Well, I was right, medium size dining room and additional seating on patio available.  Good size menu with all kinds of signature burgers to choose from.  This was my first time visiting, and I ordered the Spicy Mac N' Cheese Relapse size (5 oz).  All of their signature burgers offer 2 sizes (Rehab 10 oz-basically 2 patties, I believe).  You can tell their mac is made from scratch and it was tasty with chunks of fresh jalapenos and bacon.  As the waiter says, "don't be afraid to get messy," but flavorful and delicious.  The fries are good as well, thick cut and seasoned to perfection and crispy.  My waiter (Ben) was nice and attentive.  And, I watched other servers interact with their tables and it appears all of the wait staff is that way, which makes for a good place and nice environment.  I will definitely be back to try other things and bring others...

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. General dining area/Bar.-Fun place...
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Spicy Mac N&#39; Cheese

XFemcC6aG-EtLtdliGYPbg.text: OMG! What a find this fun, yummy place! Fantastic food and our waitress Nicole was awesome too !

wIwVgp_qzwBj7j83ak2qhw.text: Let's just say nearly 24 hours after eating the ghost pepper burger my insides are still on fire. The burger and tots were delicious and made for a very satisfying lunch. Also, the service was unparalleled in friendliness and speed. However, things went awry as I was performing oral sex on my partner and my insides could simply no longer tolerate the heat. The untimely projectile vomit incident inflicted terrible spicy heated pain on my face and lips and of course on my partners genital area. I'll certainly be returning to this location but I'm sure I'll go for the mac n cheese burger next time.

ET5KLkxbd-LRcXJpNCKY7g.text: While wandering around Old Town Scottsdale we decided to yelp what was nearby for something to eat. We found Rehab and decided to wander over there.  The place had a laid back hippy vibe (our waiter had an amazing mustache that the wife would never allow me to grow!) and a great happy hour special. The burger was to die for. The pretzel bun was one of the best I've ever had the burger and bacon were crispy and cooked exactly the way I like it.

T6JXHGoJMV4BkJZvHgHXZg.text: Best and biggest burgers in Tempe, a must do when in downtown Tempe.  Build one in Ahwatukee!

ZFWAaFA41sC97mAkVhekdQ.text: My husband and I ordered two different burgers to share. The PB&J burger was delicious! I held the siracha on the side because I'm not a fan but once I tried a little on my burger I wish I would have left it on, it intensified the flavors. We also got the Hawaiian burger but it was really dry.  If they add some sort of Hawaiian BBQ or other sauce it would help the flavor and dryness! Overall, pleased with service and experience.

eoTDjeOqWkwctdqNJEtTGg.text: Besides the burgers I really like the wings in rehab burger. They also have a good customer service, and the restaurant's atmosphere is very warm and friendly.

ERWRCXLYFDB11AKWndjc3w.text: Would highly recommend this place. Cool environment inside the restaurant, our waitress was nice and the service was great. One of the best burgers I've had, their happy hour today (Thursday) lasts all day so drink prices were very good. Overall, great service, great food, good prices, I would recommend this place and come here again for sure.

EXrRL4-Copug30ADBtUthw.text: Delicious! Had a backyard burger. It was on a pretzel bun (yum!) a fried onion, cheese, and bbq sauce. Burger was done perfectly. Had sweet potato tots, and those were great too!

MkbI7whJn1fDnEQcq1gLuA.text: We were in the area so stopped in for dinner.  It was very busy but we were lucky to find a table.  The beer was frosty cold and the burgers delicious.  Our only complaint was the sweet potato tots.  They are mushy and not very good.  I should have ordered the onion rings.  The service was very attentive and we left happy.  We will return.

r_juw20-m8NVTbqwKf_s4A.text: I'm addicted to their burgers and sweet potato tots!  Their medium wings are delicious! David is our favorite server!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ranger IPA on tap

2lvKaI89ojr7MhxW4vHaAg.text: I really liked my burger.  Good quality.  My husband got the larger "rehab" size patty while I got the smaller "relapse" burger.  His burger seemed a little bit too large and was extremely messy.   Since my burger was also a good size + a lot easer to eat I was glad I went with the smaller option.  Call me a stickler, but I was really bothered by the fact that some of the employees were wearing flip-flops and other open toed shoes in the kitchen.  I know that laid-back beach style is sort of a thing here....but really?  What other gross health code violations are going on back there?  All in all I liked the place, I like the food, but I can't make myself go back in light of that one little thing (inappropriate footwear) especially when I can find many other burger places to get a good burger.

SqIyCBjUGlOXahNx67r_aA.text: Came again on a weekend (Saturday) and I will not be coming back. The service was horrible. The hostess could not estimate a wait time to save her life and didn't say more than 3 words to us. The server couldn't remember our order although he was writing it down and then didn't bring us our appetizer or drinks. We pointed this out when he brought our burgers, he seemed annoyed at us and didn't apologize. He brought us our check mid-way through the meal (I kinda wanted dessert) and disappeared. Also, is it a rule that none of the people that work here are allowed to smile? The burgers are good, but not good enough for me deal with the poor service. :-(

xudV1B2B31J1r6xGE38lsQ.text: I had a wonderful experience here ! The staff was friendly and welcoming. For food I got the Mac n cheese hamburger and boy was there a lot of Mac n cheese on it, but it was delicious!

JEhX_nHZrJGRGmZdhhtUaQ.text: Very disappointed this visit. We drove an hour to get here today and they supposedly ran out of the father's day special  burger at 11am.. on father's day. Also out of gluten free buns as well. Been coming here for years but this was a disappointing visit. Ironic cause they open at 11am on Sundays and our server said they ran out of this burger at 11am... then she laughed and said "great father's day marketing on our part". The greasewood burger.. how can you "run out"? Has all the same ingredients as the other burgers you offer. Poor planning. One of us in our party is gluten tolerant and when a place who specializes in burgers with buns runs out of gluten free buns and only was open for 4 hours..? Management is going down hill here. I counted 3 parties of 2 walk in and leave cause the wait was "25-30" minutes yet there were open table tops. Time to find a new burger place.   Edit: went once more, same terrible service. Went from a 2 star to a 1 star.

9MtFihHP-rNHcJe5mvCZ3w.text: I went here for a solo lunch, sat at the bar and had a great time. I ordered the Cobb salad (my typical favorite) and it was huge and awesome. It's one of those salads that gets piled so high you have to really be careful when you first start eating it or it will end up over your table--and that's a good thing if you ask me.  I also ordered the mac & cheese, and if you like mac & cheese with a kick I would highly recommend ordering it. Even the smaller size is pretty large so it's good for sharing. I ended up taking at least half of my meal home which was great for lunch the next day.  When I'm back in town this is definitely on my must visit list!

CKOMegbQNb--GNNH1HAhqQ.text: I'm visiting family in Arizona, I have very strict dietary needs for health reasons. I was pleased to learn that this restaurant offered a gluten free hamburger and sweet potato tater-tots that are not cooked in corn or soy oil. I got my order to go, and called ahead to place it so when I arrived it would be ready. I show'd up 15-20 mins later and my food was ready in the time they quoted me. The staff was helpful although it did take longer than I anticipated to pay.   The burger itself was nothing special, it was bland and had absolutely no flavor, they just grilled a meat patty and put it on a gluten free bun, which also wasn't that great. It's hard to find good food that tastes great when you have special dietary needs. All in all I would have been better off making the burger at home. This is a place hyped up by the locals and over all is OK for the price. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone that wants a really good hamburger. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for bland mediocre food that will fill their bellies but put their taste buds to sleep. Also if you have special dietary needs, you should be ok to eat here, just don't expect anything spectacular.

GQ_Qvi6NbQtz3PjZvp0lVQ.text: Been here a few times and enjoyed myself. Both times I had a great bartender named Courtesy who is friendly and helpful. The happy hour is great and both food items I've had have been very good. First visit I had a burger which was awesome and a lot of food. Courtney gave me a few different of their house sauces to try and they were all tasty. Second visit I had a wedge salad that was great on a hot day. Maybe just a tad too much dressing but that's my only complaint. I'll be back when I'm in Scottsdale

KglVzfl4UL9fQBgNn_3LvA.text: Rehab burger is a great place for a burger and wings in Old Town Scottsdale. The patio is small but on a beautiful day is a great place to enjoy a drink. We typically order the Gold Medal Wings and the BYOB. This is the perfect place to eat prior to a spring training game. Enjoy!

yzvFOj-I3PKIyuVAoqm2bg.text: The service is good. Onion rings came out fast and are thick, juicy, and beer battered to perfection. They don't have kilt lifter anymore, but plenty of other beer. The hangover burger is really great. Just messy. The egg will pop when you bite in the first time. I will certainly visit again next time I am in town. Our waitress Melanie was fantastic.

ao3kXMbTj39SGsrBtEq2Iw.text: Awesome!  Professional.  Great food.  Great service.  So glad to have finally got a chance to dine here.

coNWjHYmk0uqTZCIwaByqA.text: Everyone needs Rehab now and again.  Check in to Rehab Burger and Check out any burger on a pretzel bun.  Their pretzel bun is probably the best I've tasted.  It has that full, salty, pretzelly taste!!!     The sweet potato tots on the side were good too.  Good drink selection and awesome wait staff.

QO8t5lMw_MV43NGI1nUBGQ.text: I had the Backyard BBQ burger. It was worth the wait. My dinning partner had the porkster, subbing chicken breast (at no charge) for the beef patty. It was d'lish.  I had the 10oz rehab this time but going forward I'll take the 5oz relapse from here on out. Bottom line Rehab Burger Therapy deserves its rating.

ESK7-APfj2s6uMeZQL9rzA.text: I had the BBQ burger with pretzel bun and  tater-tots sides with spicy ketchup. Good food, kid friendly environment. Lol like the beach atmosphere. Staffs are awesome.

-U5epuRGdY2F4cPOURT7Wg.text: Just ate here for the first time and it was amazing. Great ambience and very very friendly staff. The service was great and the food was even better. I had the bacon cheeseburger in a pretzel bun with sweet potato tots. I've had my fair share of the sweet potato tots but these are by far the best I've ever had. They come with two dipping sauces, spicy ketchup and garlic aoli. I found myself alternating between the two sauces every other tot. Delcious. I heard about this place thru word of mouth and will definitely be spreading the good word about this establishment.

im_xKMcCpi0g0GdqBegFkQ.text: I was really excited to try this place. The burger was "OK" but definitely not worth the hype. The sweet potato "fries" are basically mushy tator tots.

UhHAUFsWtdSb_8JAupVVxQ.text: Thought the burgers were pretty good! Usually not a fan of old town crowd, but this felt more low key and relaxed.  Also had good service, even though it was kind of hard to hear our waiter with the loud music. Dessert was yummy and drinks were good too.  I would return for sure!

trlw2GLyqyFtBoEudBSoMg.text: Stopped by with a friend since we were walking the downtown area. The decor is very much a beach setting with the bike cruisers and surf boards. Love the story on the menu of how the place was created. The menu is very hilarious to read. It was not too busy when we got there, so we were given choices of regular table, high top, or outdoor seating. The place is not too loud to have great conversations.   The food was super yummy. The burger was cooked to order. The sweet potato tater tots were a smaller side but they cooked up really nice.   By the time we left the bar was packed. Note this was a Sunday afternoon, before a holiday so they must be bringing in business.  The waitress we had was very funny, her personality was great. I think the service team here helps to make the place outstanding on top of everything else it provided.

06YB6OoWh6T9KWs5cD8_GA.text: Been to Rehab several times this year, I go to Scottsdale about once a month to play and I think this will be my new go-to spot! The first time in I sat on the patio....waited 15 minutes for a waitress, then went and found her and asked for a beer....never saw her again. But I am very glad I went inside and tried again. The bartender helped me, apologized for the poor service outside and proceeded to make me a convert! I have been back several times since and the staff and owners are great. John and Reno the bartenders, as well as Denise, one of the owners and a very pretty addition to the place, have all been very friendly and made me feel at home every time. The food is great, the atmosphere is relaxed and welcoming. Absolutely going back!

Xzx8cHZJ5P_6flQvIie_QQ.text: I love this place. Great food. I strongly recommend giving the pig wings a try. The burgers are huge and and the sweet potato tater tots are addicting. Huge portions reasonable prices for the location and great service. Would like to see some better beer selections on tap but all in all this place is definitely worth going to when in old town.

BbNKAMtz4DVnjajhdjlL5A.text: Great food, killer music, good indoor or outdoor seating.  Service was friendly!  Try the chicken and cheese appetizer dip with the fresh chips!  Its amazing!  I will be back next time I visit Scottsdale!

wSur6crJjRYe2NkDD_-low.text: I really love the service at this local spot. I pop in for lunch and they are fast and friendly. The burgers are amazing. I suggest trying the hangover burger with the fried egg and the poblano pepper. Even the smaller burger is huge. I love the assortment of buns and the spicy ketchup. They have a nice relaxed atmosphere where you will want to stay a while and relax. The decor looks like it belongs on a beach and the people are fantastic. It is always clean and food arrives quickly.

EzbVqK0IfzxeEYLNREo0GA.text: Love, Love, Love this place! Its the day after my dinner at Rehab and Im still thinking about it...maybe I am addicted, cant wait for my next fix! The service was on point, our waitress had lots of recommendations and suggestions on what to order. The inside was decorated with a really fun vibe. The food was bomb! I substituted my burger for turkey burger and it was still awesome. My favorite part was all the dipping sauces the waitress brought over, around six to choose from. I cant wait to go back and recommend this place with 5 stars!

8FBDh42wkKEmikBDkxG1Nw.text: Amazing burgers, good atmosphere, super super friendly staff, large drinks. It's a recipe for a good night.  try the brownie!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. BLT on pretzel bun with sweet potato tatter tots.

x1Vi7aQ0kvipRJtx5EGNYg.text: First place we ate lunch the day we moved to town. Hot day but the place was cool and Hiphawaiian.  Cold Beers hit the spot while trying to decide on a burger as there are so many interesting and temping things on the menu..  We got the smaller size each and skinny fries and Tots.  The small burgers are really big and quite a mouth stretcher but oh boy are they tasty and cooked to perfection.  Exactly Medium!  Good Skinny Fries which are great with the many dipping sauces offered.  The Tots are popular but a little too sweet for us. Love that they use local beef and Fresh never frozen.   Overall a great experience and my fav local burger.  Got to try the PB&J one at some point.

UIHoGU3-LqM1lf-oGODMEA.text: THE BEST BURGER IN TOWN, in the state, in the country, IN THE WORLD!!!! The staff are awesome too! Great place to come. Cant wait to return :-)

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

SkQpFb1sLSUKxSJIdIoVWA.text: Great fun, great atmosphere and fantastic burgers. Just like the story goes, this is a great place to unwind and enjoy friends and ridiculously amazing food after a tough week at work. We will be back!

i4v6Oa7eZQazHi5KTSZO1g.text: Ordered Hatch Burger mid rare with sweet tots. After about 20 mins it comes out minus the aioli, and overcooked to the point it needs the extra lube, and tots are ice cold..I tell the server the Burger is overcooked, and missing the sauce. Here's the important part, all I wanted at that point was the sauce. Not the management attention, not the rolling eyes of the judging server, not compensation, free food, sympathy, or a hug, just the aioli that was promised on the description. They took it very personally, like their elderly grandpa was back their flipping those grisly hockey pucks..long story short I got the sauce, the burger was comped. The tots remained frozen to the plate. I left, never to return.

jmCObXtU6qdULBqQzzBzDg.text: The best burger I've had. They buy there meat daily from a local butcher which means it's never frozen. I had the blue cheese and bacon burger on a pretzel bun cooked rare. Also the customer service was great. They were fast and very friendly. I will definitely be back!

P8mwbZSYjKujcgek_bY1rw.text: They give a LOT of food and their service is great! I think I got the bigger version of the burger and basically was in a food coma half-way through. I chose the sweet po-tot-oes and they were soo good, but again, WAY too much! Their burger was delicious and I will be going back. :)

hLxvw0OWkIuPJxo3xzeqzA.text: I had the PBJ burger like 7 months ago and it is still in my dreams. I want one so bad haha!

tS961gWdGmAWWho3IKfkpQ.text: The food was delicious and was presented well. Servers was efficient and nice. The atmosphere is a lot of fun, a great beach vibe!

KEysSCzX1XeC6WKDq1_BXQ.text: We ate a couple great burgers and the chili cheese fries all amazing.  Happy hour is almost all day on Thursdays.  When we come back to AZ we will find ourselves back here.

WkWkjXu0bVePqWp1WteXsg.text: Amazing food and great service! Everything tasted fresh and the sweet potato tots were a pleasant surprise of deliciousness- definitely recommend them! Our waiter forgot to give us the yelp discount on the brownies but no biggie because they were soooo worth every penny!

vIoXTSbB1Qp3XKhRa_jK0A.text: My teenage son found this place when we were in Scottsdale & it was a great find!  I'm not a big burger fan, but even I thought it was great!  Both of my boys loved their food & were filled up by the portions (amazing with their seemingly bottomless stomachs!).  The service was good, the place was clean & had a fun vibe.  A great find that I would go back to again!

Z70s0SqnsxGc0svxbrqgFQ.text: A little island feel in Phoenix.  Enjoyed the background music mix of Sublime, Bob Marley, etc.  If you want quantity in a burger, then this is the place.  I had a mushroom and swiss with an added fried egg.  It was pretty tasty.  We also ordered the peanut and butter and jelly burger.  Different and unique with a crazy burst of sweet and savory in each bite.  The sweet potato tater tots were pretty amazing though.  The service was excellent.  I just with they had more variety in their draft beer.  I feel in this type of place should have an extensive list of beers on tap.

qceQ8MsZGaXInL_gLnioFA.text: Amazing food, service, atmosphere!!! Sit at the bar!!!! Reno will take good care of you! Ask him to do toothpick trick!

NJ9pRa9_t7JfPRhDuCIMzg.text: This place was so good. I had the pbj bacon burger and it was mind blowing hands down the best burger I have ever tasted. There located in the heart of downtown Scottsdale but there prices for the amount and quality of food you get for under$10 I feel like I was ripping them off. I know it sounds weird but if you want to step outside the box and try there most popular burger you have to try the pbj burger.

b7R0nhDpk68jZrveyM_22A.text: Burgers and portions were delicious. I had the bbq backyard burger in the small size and it was more than enough. Corona Rita's were also a favourite. Only let down was paying at the end. We wanted to split bills and in doing so they spilt the bills entirely wrong. Mild inconvenience, not enough to overwhelm how good the burgers are.

AKj5y7rTHdDO7PXfEjgwBw.text: This place is always packed but somehow we always get a table.  The service is terrific and the food is really good.  Too bad the patio is so small!

zEIvK9iWPSHquvnp5gkbTg.text: One of the best burgers in the Phoenix area. I had never eaten a pretzel bun burger unitl I ate here - loved it!

cKmDY35ZjXAiIyYnvckfIg.text: Wow! The food was amazing! Peanut butter and jelly burger with bacon (sounds gross) was amazing! The salad we had was even better.... Wish I remembered the name of it. But it had tortilla strips and chicken and a whole lotta goodness! Can't wait to go back!

NOIk_PqrxDjMSVAXJtg9PA.text: Since there isn't any Hodads in AZ this place will have to take the reigns for best creative menu and Pb&j Burger..........sounds disgusting but WOW, if your not living on the edge you are taking up to much space...JJ

BfEsKG0Of4-jYE2ruPz5CA.text: Grabbed dinner here and was not disappointed. Our server was very pleasant and personable with just the right amount of check-ins with us. He seemed to really enjoy his job which was something nice to see in the service industry. I was torn between trying the PB&J Burger, the Poblano or the hatch chili burger.  PB&J was out because that only came in rehab size & I wasn't that hungry. (The rehab is a pretty large burger, so either come hungry, share with others in your party or plan on bringing leftovers home.) Our server recommended the poblano and I was NOT disappointed...it was done perfectly and very flavorful. The sweet potato tots were tasty and came with a selection of dipping sauces. This place is worth return visits. FWIW, we went on a Friday night and when we stepped inside to check in the ambient noise was pretty high. We ended up getting a table outside which seemed to have a much lower noise level.

KbifCYadeqkOeVSozOArSg.text: happy hour 3-7p weekdays. drafts $2 domestic, $3 premium. four peaks brews including peach. some other decent drink deals.   at the time of this post hh is all day on thursday!  sunday is 11 til 4p. 2 bucks off frozen margarita which is just so damn tasty.  the food and burgers ive tried are all excellent.   the pot brownies are ridiculous. add ice cream.  whatever you get you probably wont go home hungry.

CqsSXSy67P0xTWWu7Ed4Aw.text: Seriously some of the best burgers I have tasted.  Lots of variety and options to suit everyones fancy.  I love the laid back decor.  If you haven't tried it you need to, and if you haven't been in a while you need to go back soon.  I am getting hungry just thinking about it.

M285ab5dC76DZlTZ4qFweA.text: So delicious! I had the poblano burger, it was spicy but really tasty. My boyfriend had the pulled pork burger combo, also super yummy. And we had the warm brownie, marshmallow, reece's, ice cream dessert, it was amazing! Super affordable too, a glass of wine, 2 meals and dessert for under $40!

42qjTCDWb06odB4PKVSEhA.text: This being my first time in Scottsdale, I read the reviews and looked at the pictures and it was a must try. I get there about 10pm on a Saturday night and was attended to right away. The service was awesome and the food was also awesome. The time I got my food from the time I ordered was impressive. Highly recommended to anyone who has never been to this awesome area know as Old Town Scottsdale.

i9T3INOfhBKpV1cHBf2WPA.text: My husband, 6 year old son, and I came here last Sunday and am so happy we tried it out! Large portions are served here, so make sure you come with a vengeful appetite! We arrived at around 3PM and the place was packed. We waited for about 20 minutes. No benches to sit and wait indoors. Not so bad to wait outside around this time of year in AZ. But waiting outside in the summer heat for that long... Yikes! Yeah.. No, thanks! Anyway, we ordered my son a hot dog and fries. The hot dog was massive for the little guy but he put up a good fight. They charge extra for fixings. Luckily, he's a plain old ketchup and mustard kind of kid. I ordered the hangover with lettuce and tomato on a wheat bun and the husband ordered mushroom and Swiss with lettuce and tomato on a pretzel bun. Well... Boy was it tough to wrap my mouth around that giant burger! It's like I had to strategize on how to approach it. Should I take a bite from the top, then a bite from the bottom? It was massive! But so so yummy! Egg was perfectly fried. Runny yolk and all! Oh, yeah! Sweet potato tots were crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Delicious. In spite of the long wait to get in and get served... We all walked out 10lbs heavier and 10 times happier.

baJf7vwTuUp8ea0XaohPVg.text: Chili cheeseburger was great and prepared just the way I like it.  Good portion size, friendly service and a relaxed atmosphere.  I will go back next time I am in Scottsdale.

hkb1ikiUPfQzPnSDQqn4qg.text: This is our favorite place in Old Town for a great burger.  The happy hour is fantastic as well.  I really enjoy the staff as they are very hard working yet laid back that makes for a perfect mix.

zP0zvHQ5Zr7S3CbsZRTb7g.text: Well... I've been here a few times and have to write a review.  This place is amazing.  Somehow it seems to get better every time I go.  First couple times I just had like a Hang Over Burger and it was darn good and a little unique with the chilis.  Then I had a BBQ Burger.  Hard competition because ya know, everyone has one on their menu, but I was impressed with their own BBQ and of course, the pretzel bun.  Then I tried the PB&J Burger on a whim.  OMG.  Fricken Amazing.  I mean like amazing enough that I will crave it and have to go for it.  All their sides and tots are great and then I tried the Jamaican corn.  Also amazing and totally unique.  So good I went again last night and totally went PB&J w/ corn.  I had to go back though because I was in NYC and someone who travels to Scottsdale says, oh have you heard of Rehab...  YEAH I HAVE.  Tells me to try the Medium/Gold chicken wings.  So that happened.  Cooked perfectly, sauce was spicy and mustardy and delicious.  Off the charts.  Someone else got the pig wings where were also great.  I'm thinking they ought to put that medium/gold sauce on some pig wings or pulled pork too, it would be great.  At this point, it's going to be hard for me to be in the area and go somewhere else.  Also, I should add that every time I've been the crowd has been good and the service is always great and the people are very friendly.

2dZobmU6lhCYHUSjAGiFfg.text: This place rocks!  I had a bacon cheeseburger on a pretzel bun with half fries and half sweet potato taters. All were flavorful and super yummy. The burger was amazing with the right balance of cheese and crispy bacon. Try the chipotle spicy aioli. It's wonderful on the burger. Lauren was my server and she was attentive, provided great service and smiled the whole time. It was a great dining experience. It's now my fav burger joint in Scottsdale.

33-hBe7AXL6FNxLrppcT8w.text: Ate there last night, excellent burger and salad. Even better service and the beers were cold

qwbby0Rrh86qrDyRhanjYA.text: Not knowing what to expect, we entered this run-down looking joint after free parking in the Parking Corral next door.  What a surprise!  Thanks to the flat screen TVs giving us views of tropical aquarirums, surfing movies, bicycles suspended from the ceiling and surfboard memorabilia everywhere, we felt like we were at a beach hut!  The platters of delicious burgers coming out of the kitchen predicted a burger phenomenon!  Our server, David, was very laid back and made some excellent recommendations for us, so we split one of our favorites, wedge salad (dressing was especially tart and savory,) and each ordered a "Relapse" (single) burger.  My wife went for the poblano burger, cooked medium as David recommended, with a grilled poblano with provelone cheese and spicy mustard and spicy catsup, on brioche.  I went for the hangover relapse, which included a fried egg, provolone, bacon and spicy catsup to dress it, also on David's recommended brioche bun.  We drooled as we ate they were both so tasty!  For a side item we both selected the Jamaican corn on the cob, a full cob grilled with island spices and wonderful.  Top this off with two happy hour beers each, the local Four Peaks 8th Street draft pints, and this was a perfect meal and we were seated immediately (kitchen was a little slow,) but got our bill and got to the theatre two blocks away with time to spare.  Can't wait to go back and try another taste sensation!

gx3YPn8qtrI1txkFujo12g.text: Great service,  The waitstaff is always checking on how your food is and are you having a good time.The burger was great the french fries were great and the sweet potato tater tots or unique and really good.

BN0Dr_WiJiQue49fpaJAHA.text: I had a bacon cheeseburger from at this place the other day.  That was my first time eating here. I am huge burger aficionado and am always on the lookout for the best burger ever. Hodad's in San Diego is my #1 and has been for a long time. This place would probably make my #1 in Phoenix. I will definitely be going back. I would order the fries over the onion rings... you pay extra for rings and I only got 4. I did try the fries on my friend's plate... they were good.

jl5ITUvguAfBlUYS2hy1wg.text: We started with the Calamari which was very delicious and was enough that it could have been a meal in itself. My wife had a Veggie Noogie which is a Portobello mushroom/eggplant/sprouts on a bun and I had Backyard BBQ Burger. Both of our dinners were very good and we had enough leftover for dinner tomorrow night. The waitress was very nice and did a great job! We will be back!
