mo6bF9pOkT7UheyLWdHC_w.text: This restaurant is such a fun environment and the burgers were amazing. Our server Kaye was so helpful and knowledgeable. I can't wait to come  back again because there are many burgers I want to try.

sQFGj3RbAxriH0_1c-zhTQ.text: I have been to this restaurant 3 times, each time bringing friends that haven't tried it. The first experience was great! The second and third time have been very disappointing. The food has always been really good, but the last 2 times we have waited over 40 minutes for our food! Both times they have not said anything about the long wait. Both times, other tables that arrived after us have received their food first. I actually asked the server about it this last time and she just made excuses. No apology! I'm sorry but it shouldn't take 40 minutes to make 4 burgers! I won't be back! BTW, we were there at 3:00 on a Sunday afternoon so it wasn't like it was super busy.

lyYC-6GG1I-dPhx9L24khQ.text: Love this place! The food is amazing and the atmosphere is a blast. The staff are all friendly and outgoing, I don't think I have had a single bad experience with any of them. My boyfriend and I practically lived at this place during a particularly rough semester when we needed to treat ourselves to some good burgers and drinks on a more regular basis. The owners are extremely friendly and can always be seen walking around making sure everything is up to standard. The chef is an awesome guy, we had the pleasure of talking to him for a bit during on of their slow times. I love meeting people who are passionate about what they do and no one has more passion than a good chef. He was excited to hear what we had to say about to food and even gave us samples of some of the dishes we had not been able to try yet. If you go on a weekend or during lunch time, expect a little bit of a wait. But trust me it's worth it. And if you go on a Sunday, I would HIGHLY recommend their Benedict Burger! A thick slice of ham on a patty with a nice big egg on top, tucked into a pretzel bun and drowning in home-made hollandaise sauce!!! The next Sunday I have off will be spent devouring one of those bad boys.

u3j5nGevGU75HVCw5zO6sw.text: Rehab Burger wins on all measures.  Customer Service - Spectacular.   Food - delcious!!  We stopped by for lunch today and had a time crunch.  We let the hostess know and she actually checked with the kitchen to see if they could accomodate us!!  That's service above and beyond.  We decided to take our chances and stay and I'm so glad we did.  When we thought we weren't going to make it, the waitress offered to make our lunches to go.  We got our food - gulped it down and made it back to work.  They even brought to-go boxes with the food just in case.   Now, we would have gulped it down even if we weren't in a hurry because it was DELICIOUS!!  My medium burger was perfectly pink and I want more!!  My friend's medium well was also perfect.  The onion rings were beautiful and scrumptious.  Fries were great.  I'm sorry none of us orderred the "tots."  They looked great walking by.  I'll have to go back soon to try those out.  So, environment (tvs, sports, surf board, flip flops) - Thumbs up!  Food -Thumbs up!  Service - I'm out of thumbs so they just get a good tip!!  Thanks for a great lunch and great service.  I have a new favorite place to eat in Scottsdale.

SlnbCi6pYFopspdvWnO9Yg.text: Visited Scottsdale for the first time in late February. Went for an early dinner when we arrived after our flight. Waitress very helpful and accommodating. Place was very laid back and fun. Was not busy (we went early). Food and drinks very good, and very reasonable for burgers, especially for Scottsdale. Try the PB&J burger- sounds odd but delicious! The sweet potato tots and fries are both delicious too!

_c2qUgyWFL92ys8_ADUvxw.text: Awesome place. Feels like a Southern California beach bar. Super laid back and great food. The ghost pepper burger is a must try!!! Will be back soon

Rob1kw_1JPaRMziL64xEzg.text: very nice service, friendly people, fast delivery to the table and very good food; the only thing keeping it from a 5 star is the price...a little high for a burger place and very small so during busy nights it would be tough to get in.

rM5exoauuzNG65cGsUszAQ.text: Seriously the best burger I've ever had! The atmosphere here is so awesome too. Everyone is so chill. When our family was in town, this was the first place we took them to try! They loved it too! ;)

kumvnzrzP3ECiAsCk7U6SA.text: Awesome place! We classified it as a grand slam: 1st base - good location, 2nd base - quick, 3rd base - very good service, and great tasting food to send it out of the park. Should I say any more?

vjixRl6wU_dscg9bKqpNQQ.text: Amazing and unique menu with a great vibe. Sweet potato fries/tator tots were amazing! Busy area so parking is always annoying but thats not their fault.

8bARUUyMbqc1SF8AtO3yeQ.text: Sat at the bar and had a perfectly made swiss mushroom burger and sweet potato tots.  Just great.  Bartender was friendly and replaced a beer I wasn't thrilled with when he saw me slugging my way through it.  Nice.  Staff genuinely likes each other and is having fun.  Good management, great atmosphere, solid food.  Decent value too.  Can't beat it.

FaBcu9DFq-y7dQ4gVxnrjg.text: Been here once great service awesome vibe and the burgers OMG get in my mouth I definitely recommend but be prepared for a wait

xKgWJL-CVqcb92iQatlx_A.text: I was disappointed given the very strong Yelp reviews. My opinion is clearly in the minority since we arrived on a Tuesday night in July to a restaurant so a full of patrons that we had to sit outside. Perhaps the combination of the full house and the 4.5 stars on 792 Yelp reviews raised my expectations too high.  The service was a bit slow, which may have had to do with the big crowd in a weeknight, however I wouldn't say it was terrible. The food menu had a wide variety of choices but as a craft beer lover I was disappointed in the beer choices. There were mostly macro breweries with a sprinkling of craft beers, which left limited choices for my taste.  I ordered the pablano burger, which was good but I didn't see why the place was rated so high as I can think of several other places in town that make a better burger.   None the less I indicated to my girlfriend that I would go back and had already decided on a "3 star" Yelp rating as the food was good but didn't blow me away and the service was a tad slow but acceptable.  Then I went to the restroom and discovered that THERE IS NO MEN'S ROOM. They have a ladies room and a family restroom. So I had to wait a LONG time to use the restroom. I will not go back to a restaurant that expects me to spend my money there but will not provide me with a restroom.

htepWll2NVTZakz8H6R-CA.text: This place is a lot of fun and the service is exceptional. The portions are YUGE! I've never seen so much calamari on a single plate. I'm a big guy and a big eater, but couldn't finish the salad that I ordered. I would definitely seek this place out - it's fun, a good value, and yummy in a part of Scottsdale that tends more to the pretentious. If you have to wait for a table there's a pawn shop next door where you can pick out your next guitar, gun, or power tool.

2VQ_CWJRYASSk8BB4VwBiQ.text: Kay, is the best! I've never heard of this place and so me and my friend decided to try it out, absolutely one of the best hamburger joint ever, every bite into everything they have to offer is nothing short of amazing.

8fBmW3-JOlfE7mpNHG8TYQ.text: Might be the best hamburger we have ever had. Great selection. We had a poblano and a hatch burger and split them to taste both. The hatch burger was very good but the poblano won out. The sauces for each were very tasty. Atmosphere is more of a bar so it's probably not what I would call a family restaurant, nor is it meant to be. Prices are reasonable and service was top notch. This was our second time there and won't be our last. Was it worth the drive from Gilbert  just for a burger? Absolutely! Have to try the mac and cheese... looks yummy.

FXJGMa559kW0B1nK4-jBtQ.text: First time here and I do have to say that they hyped up this place way too much. I got the mushroom Swiss burger and the Mac and cheese with bacon. When the food came out, the burger tasted very plain and to be honest it did not have a fresh taste and it wasn't juicy like I expected it to be. Very dry and tasted microwaved. Our waitress was very distracted. She was taking our order and her focus was on other things. Our Mac and cheese that was supposed to be our appetizer, came out the same time as the burgers which irritated me a lot. The look of the Mac and cheese looked tasty but as soon as k tried it, it tasted very plain as well! Overall, I do not think I will come back to this place but it's always good to try new places.

gTUsUzYZJ2n_31EdNqa1RQ.text: Perfect spot before or after a spring training game seeing the Giants. The sweet potato fries are a perfect compliment to the pulled pork burger. Plus, the vibe is super laid back and is the perfect match for a toasty day in Scottsdale.

6BbOEvlUiDog9snGTB4UrA.text: I love Rehab Burger so much. It's my favorite all around restaurant in Old Town and it's also a great place to take guests and friends. The atmosphere is friendly and the service has always been on point for us.   The menu is amazing, the variety of burger options is so great. We always start with the calamari - it's exceptionally yummy for a burger spot (order a side of buffalo sauce with it if you love hot sauce, their buffalo sauce is delicious). I've tried at least four of their burgers if not more and they are all perfect. My roommate always orders the PB & J burger and won't have anything else. I usually just get a classic burger with bacon, yummy cheese and a pretzel bun. Always get the pretzel bun, people. I love everything about Rehab besides the nap I need to take when I leave ha. I'm not kidding, go to Rehab Burger! And try all of their sauces too :) -- forgot to mention that above.

TDRsNzAP1qO0REgZRX5Wug.text: 3.5 stars  It's still one of the best burgers in Arizona, but after going back to the East Coast, I've realized it's average in the burger world.  We tried the Bacon blue burger and Hawaiian burger. Our medium rare burgers were a little over cooked and not as juicy as we had remembered it. The toppings were pretty good but the meat lacks flavor.   Service was fast and friendly, and the wait wasn't as long as estimated.

Oeac55s11q95CMyMjQX4dw.text: 3.33  The laid back atmosphere was perfect for this flip flop wearing type of guy.   The service was amazing, not so much our server, but the rest of the staff were on point. The hostess (with too much eye makeup) was by far the best employee they have on today. She was running around and helping everyone, while doing her job perfectly.   I ordered the 10oz Hatch Chili Burger, medium rare, with fries and a Dr Pepper. The bill was $13 or so before tip. The burger was cooked perfectly, red and juicy. The burger was not seasoned or very little. I tried a bit of salt but it was still lacking. The chili and the cheese were good, the brioche bun was good. The whole thing as a burger was a bit bland. I used the Chipotle Aioli to season the flavor a bit.  The fries were forgettable and were on the colder side when we got them.   Overall, I did like the place, I would go again. I would just ask for salt and pepper on the burger and a salad indstead of fries.

khxGGa7LVLzd1dunA1C30Q.text: This place is delicious! I had got the PBJ and Bacon burger and my hubby had ordered the Hawaiian Burger. They both were big and delicious. They had outside and indoor seating. It seems to be consistently busy. I would recommend this place !

70DgFNkWLutsDacnBBuSrA.text: A friend from out of state and I went here last night for the first time. This is my first unsolicited Yelp! review. It was just THAT GOOD.  The service was excellent (Ryan)! We felt both very taken care of and not smothered at the same time, which is really remarkable and so so satisfying. The food was great - I had the turkey burger and fries.  I'm not a wordsmith and I don't think the review needs to go past: Excellent service, great food, amazing time! :)

HzVJPihC5UojUb59IH40Iw.text: They were able to get our large party of 13 in on a Saturday night; this is not an easy task for many places in Scottsdale. 80% of our party got burgers and not one complaint was heard... I got the spicy mac and cheese and wowza, was it spicy. You better like spice if you order this one - I really liked it a lot. The staff was very nice and they did a good job getting our food out to us all about the same time, this is important to me since it's nice to start eating together.

xN7mjKsi938guM46k0X9VA.text: If you are in Scottsdale this is a must... I'm gluten free and they have the BEST bun... The service amazing there are so many options... The pbj and hangover burgers are two of my favorites... And the sweet potato tots are on POINT

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. MacNarley and gluten free... It is a party in your mouth and all the best flavors were invited...

Lqf4IWczeLE2g1KgK1IZ6w.text: By far, favorite burger place in the valley. Burgers are always nice and juicy, and good size. Lots of great toppings, and their sweet potato tots are insanely good! (Don't forget to try one of they're many sauces, the pineapple BBQ is my favorite)  Friendly staff, nice decor. Always busy on weekends. I'd give it 4 1/2 stars, service is sometimes a little slow. Otherwise very solid burger place, worth the the money!

rp9YGB8O15h3DXNk_7RP1g.text: The food was amazing. The burger quality and size for the price is top-notch. I left completely full which rarely happens at restaurants. I wanted to try their dessert brownie but was so full after lunch that I went back the next day just to get the brownie and a beer. Great food, friendly staff. I highly recommend Rehab Burger.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chili cheeseburger

30hr4kADZu9L1CgyeRSOHA.text: Escaping the cold weather in the North East , my wife and I saw great reviews for Rehab Burger and decided we would stop there for some lunch. Who doesn't love a great burger? It is very cool looking almost to the point where it reminded me of a Senior Frogs. It seems they spent more money turning the place into a tourist trap and forgot they were supposed to be selling a top notch burger. But that's ok - after eating the dried out patty - I went back by the pool which was the real reason I was in Arizona.

D5OhxwUfp8XpghfrxP8j3Q.text: I expected a lot more from this place, but the burger was just mediocre.

5B8eEVvUnLxqu1x97bSJNg.text: Yummy BYOB, relaxing vibe, good music, friendly staff. Definitely perfect stop before our 5 hour drive back to Los Angeles

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

wpY1UJKk-xiImqYvmhmqfQ.text: The closest your gonna get to Kuma's Corner of Chicago. The burger was incredible. Not only is it 10oz. but it's affordable and perfectly cooked. I got the chili burger which is no joke. Pretzel bun all the way. Chili was real freaking good too. Rehab has the best burger in Arizona.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Chili Burger

LkTLiiT8RLL8WqZmn8NLYg.text: Good burgers and drinks at reasonable prices. The open atmosphere, almost cafeteria style, gets a bit loud making conversation a chore. I got the bacon and blue burger, which I enjoyed, but the mountain of sweet potato tots were lukewarm and a bit mushy.  They are probably great right out of the fryer. The 5 oz burger with toppings is about an inch higher than the average mouth opening and was plenty to eat. Service was good although our server was a bit fried on a busy Saturday night.  Overall I'm glad we ate here but not sure it was worth the 45 minute wait.

Hue4O1cQ_V-MXPp9MJrw1g.text: First time in Scottsdale and did some research on a great dinner spot. This was hands down one of the best burgers I've ever had if not THE best.  The wait was about 15 minutes which wasn't bad at all for a Friday I'm guessing. Had to share a long table with another group but it made the meal more intimate. Our waitress was so fabulous and friendly and very helpful.  Appetizer: You MUST order the PIG WINGS. Don't think twice about that. They are all meat (no fat at all!) and fell right off the bone.  Burgers: - Spicy mac n' cheese burger was AMAZING!  - The Porkster burger was even more amazing! Get this one if you can't decide between these two. - Get the 5oz relapse size (rehab is way too big)  - Order the sweet potato tots (SO DELICIOUS)   Great food, great service, and great atmosphere. Would definitely come back if I'm ever in town again!

aSM3FbDn8WqklAofyncB1A.text: If you go here, go hungry because the portions are huge.  Rehab has a fun vibe with a beachy atmosphere. We arrived early enough (11:30) to not have to wait for a table but there was a line when we left. Service was attentive with everyone working there chipping in to clear tables and get things moving. We had the soup- very hearty- the porkster and the veggie burger. I ordered the veggie burger thinking it would be a lighter alternative than the burgers but I only make it through half of it. It was very tasty. Our sides of onion rings and sweet potato tots were yummy and generous. We took half of our meals home and enjoyed the rest last night. They have indoor and outdoor seating.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. People waiting to get in.

MvalfFO1fA9awRGAsENRdQ.text: Short and sweet. Passing through and found this place on Yelp. Friendly service but don't look for fast. I had the rehab sized Know Poblano burger - 10oz on a brioche bun with sweet potato tots. The burger was huge! I was super hungry and barely finished the burger and only ate 1/3 of the tots! The manchego cheese paired nicely with the roasted poblano and beef. The 10 oz patty was lean and flavorful! It was a really good burger. The tots were average. They served it with a side of a chipotle aioli that was decent. I only used a tiny bit, in full disclosure!  I sat outside on a beautiful evening so all in all a good experience. I'd come back. Knocked off a star for attentiveness and the average sweet potato tots. Burger is a stand up 5 stars!

1_X2Vu8NwkCZ24eVbumnTw.text: Super yummy food and fantastic staff (we like Mike!) Their dipping sauces are bomb, especially the wasabi mayo. Outdoor dining has heaters, seemed to be a fun spot for a group although I was there on a date. Great prices on beers!

bJXVXss5NfSI2Nsx4o0rYw.text: This place is absolutely incredible. I'm seriously considering trying to find a week in Phoenix just so I can try more of their fantastic burgers. The fries are also amazing, and even the pickle here was good, something I almost never enjoy. It's a laid back and unapologetic vibe, serving up probably the best burgers I've ever tasted. Don't miss it!!

WCyLFWxyWRKXOg4xJULulQ.text: Oh, my g-d!! This is a major delicious burger! I had the Poblano Burger. Huge! Tasty! They have a big selection, if you can't find a good burger here you don't need one. Lol.

pLtjQCGEBi-zg0ywiUt89w.text: So good! Got the spicy Mac and cheese burger and I was beyond pleased. Wish I was from around there so I could go back and get that all the time.

ePrxQ0q2jXLsxDznTZjTJw.text: Nice burgers love the music and the wait isn't so bad try and get inside to the back porch and have a beer in the meantime it will be worth it

neGXkIlBpFOHUxqSgf7mUQ.text: I cant express enough how much i love this place!! Andy the bartender is phenomenal always suggesting new things to try and he never lets us down!! This is a great hang out spot great staff and the food is amazing! Ill be a customer for life!!

9hjId7cbfzTNnAKOjrVkBA.text: I have yet to find a better burger! They're delicious and you have to try the spicy mac and cheese!! I'm from out of state and every time I come into town I have to stop here. We were recommended it by some locals and were not disappointed! Definitely worth stopping by!

AEoAz-wDBSqtXvqIaFSHvQ.text: Definitely some very tasty food at this place! My old uncle is cautious about new places but after the experience, he has no problems coming back!   My brother and I ordered the Spicy Mac N Cheese Burger, Rehab size and the portions of the burger did not disappoint. Everything there that we tried was really well made, especially the onion rings that can be substituted in.   Our other family got BBQ pulled pork sandwiches and the pulled pork was amazing! Definitely a good choice and there was quite a large amount of pork justifying the price.   My main complaint is that the location is pretty small which would not be a problem but the time we went there, it was packed! Which in the end is a good thing since everybody knows how good it is. The service was also really timely and observant of our drinks and helped specify some items on the menu.   My major complaint is that the Spicy Mac N Cheese Burger was not spicy! It had only a little dollop of sriracha on a bit of it but they definitely could have done better with the spiciness level. Still tasty though!

e3nO_qr8qCDLf1aLAf1Wmg.text: My son and I came in for a burger based on the reviews and they didn't lie.  The burger was amazing.  The server, I wish I could remember his name was super funny and guided us through the house specials and best options.  They have banquet style seating for big parties and smaller 4 personal tables for smaller parties.  Out door patio if you want some fresh air Highly recommend!

tNOn0rAtOS0BAMBo_w4dOQ.text: Food is pretty good, but you made a poor choice with one of your servers. There's a guy who works there, best way to describe him is by what I believe is a half-sleeve tattoo.  He wasn't friendly, or at all accommodating.  It's frustrating to go out for dinner and have a server ruin your meal, when you're just trying to have a good time. Rarely do I ever comment on a server, as it takes a lot to really irritate me, but this guy needs some training and how to provide a basic good customer service experience.     Our group could not figure out why he would act like that, when clearly servers should know that friendliness pays, and the tip could be affected if they treat our group like crap.  Please see that he undersrands how to better treat your paying guests. Thanks

fBqRLqdSSSF9SxpjbuXTgw.text: This is the best burger I've EVER had!!!    Fair prices, fun atmosphere and a very polite staff.  Never had a burger here that I haven't liked, but the PB & J bacon burger is on another level!  ONE OF the best if not the best burger you will eve have.  This is my favorite spot in Scottsdale and they just opened another location in Tempe.  I've MADE at least 10 people try the PB & J bacon burger (a few of them against their will and everyone agreed that it is one of the best burgers they've ever had.  I know it sounds like it wouldn't work, but try it.  I can't stay away!!!!

KyIIzSEksGJ7OOGzM7V6wg.text: What an amazing find! The hubby and I were in the mood for burgers and brew and happened upon this little gem! If there were a way to give 10 stars, Rehab Burger Therapy would absolutely deserve it!   The burgers were inventive and delicious (we tried the Jalepeno Popper and PBJ and Bacon burgers- trust us the PBJ is WAY more delicious than it sounds), the brews were icy cold, the service was phenomenal, the restrooms immaculate......we seriously could find no flaw with this place. You have to come check it out for yourselves, and need some Rehab from your newfound addiction to Rehab Burger Therapy!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Super cute San Diego-esque decorations!

8oediRLW8KgCb6mv82Jt5Q.text: Biggest down-side is they need to admit they have outgrown their current location. Food was amazing!  Started with pig wings. The sauce was sublime. Had a margatini. Excellent cocktail. No watered-down margarita here.  The burgers exceeded our expectations. Husband had the porkster - a perfect blend between a cheeseburger a and a pulled pork sandwich. He loved the pineapple the waitress recommended to add. I had the jalapeno popper burger. Cool avocado and spicy poppers on a great cheeseburger. Sweet potato tots for both of us. Where have those been all our life?  Hubby was driving, so I enjoyed a second margatini - and then a nap when we got home. This place was super!  Service was great, and we will go back.

QUs48mqeJErRBdDylFK3nQ.text: Very cool burger joint, complete with a full bar and plenty of cold brew selections. The menu, however is the star of the show with a featured PBJ Burger that comes with Sriracha sauce...are you kidding me?  I joined some fellow Yelpers last night for a birthday shenanigan shindig, and we had to keep adding tables as our group of about 20 kept growing, and it seems like a popular party place, for an even larger group took up the center of this bicycle and surf board ceiling hanging therapeutic pub. Plenty of therapy was provided, too, as the servers were hustling, but also taking time to be a part of the crowd, friendly and personable...I like that.   I inhaled the Spicy Mac-N-Cheese Burger, medium well, with a side of their sweet po "TOT" oes...so yummy. It wasn't too spicy, either, with just enough poblano peppers to give it a kick. Not usually a big-burger fan (size-wize), so I got the 5oz'er, which is referred to as a Relapse. A larger version, the Rehab 10oz was available if you happen to need that type of therapy!  My Speech Therapy (great way to describe the effect alcohol may offer) was the first thing on the menu, a Kimmy Special...a grey goose and lemon refreshment that went down smooth like water. I could have had about a half dozen, but thought better of it, for I was reminded of our county's' famous TENT Therapy, which is offered to those who forget how to drive.  Great spot to bring visiting out-of-towners for an original, and fun burger hangout!

MhW6VDfAYChK6TSW9pguKw.text: Never been here and was the first time checking it out after hearing all the good word about it. I got the pb and j burger. Ahhh man what a good burger. I will have to definitely come back and try some of the others some time.

zgnKFZ4pPIn5x6kNKVGNWw.text: Unlike any other burger place you will ever find yourself in. The menu is full of unusual concoctions that simply please your taste buds! I've gone a couple times and ordered burgers I wouldn't normally try. A peanut butter and jelly burger? Sounds well..a little unappetizing. Let me tell you how absolutely delicious it was! It had a combination of flavors I never knew I always wanted, if that makes any sense. The way my server explained the details of this unusual burger left me begging to try it. It really was that good! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it was really crowded ( for the reasons I mentioned above I'm sure) and it is a smaller establishment. This made it a bit stuffy.  Other than that it was pure pleasure!

xHGIiPYOV_NiOqPMBWs9iA.text: We had a great visit here, even with an issue with one of our meals.  We visited on a Monday night and were seated right away. Service was great. We had the salsa and chips for an appetizer, while I ordered a frozen margarita and my husband had Kiltlifter.  The problem arose with our son's order. It turned out that they were out of the bread they usually use for a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. We were given a choice of sourdough--which our server said most kids aren't crazy about--and brioche. We were hesitant, but decided to go with the brioche. It ended up just being way too thick for the kid to handle. We let him pull it apart and scraped off a lot of the filling, but the thick bread with PB was just too much. He couldn't manage more than a few bites. We were very pleased that we were comped for that sandwich without even us requesting it. The restaurant handled the whole matter very well.  Meanwhile, the grown-ups were delighted with their food. My husband had the Hatch burger and was in complete bliss. I had the Shelby's spinach salad with added chicken, and loved the blend of flavors. The chicken breast was perfectly grilled and quite large.  We'd definitely come here again, and maybe our son could have the PB&J, too!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Shelby&#39;s spinach salad with added grilled chicken
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hatch burger

2IejNQ-4GIOo7SztgfefjQ.text: Truthfully, my rating lies somewhere between 3 and 4 stars. I came here recently on a business trip. My deep love of cheeseburgers and the high reviews here had me convinced that I just HAD to pay a visit.   We arrived around 7pm on a Wednesday night and the place was pretty packed. After a 10 minute wait we were seated. Our waitress was friendly and quickly available. We ordered a couple drinks and a burger each. I opted for a Corona-rita and the Hatch burger, my friend ordered a Mike Tai and the Hangover burger.  The drinks were alright, my friend felt that hers was sickeningly sweet and mine was good, but nothing to write home about. Our burgers arrived quickly, hot off the grill and each with a large serving of fries. The burgers were good, although the bun on mine was fairly burnt in a few areas. I was happy with the food, but I wouldn't consider it amazing.

pdvC6tkzCKGB8a34R3alMQ.text: Probably the best burgers we've had since we've moved to this area. The atmosphere is totally casual. It's comfortable, The staff was friendly. The burger options are plentiful, including (of course) a make your own. I should have done this review at the time, it was a VERY stressful day for us and I can't remember what we had. I know we each had burgers, we were each happy (and they were cooked PERFECTLY). He had the sweet potato tots (which he enjoyed) and I had their fries (also yummy). Unfortunately, that's all I remember. But trust me when I tell you that we liked our burgers. We commented on it a few times during the meal.

a9mw3CiDv-DaDndlpYRRww.text: We were not impressed with our first visit to rehab burger!  When we got there for an early lunch, they weren't busy at all, but the hostess tried to sit our table of 6 at a table for 4, just squeezing extra chairs in.  We had to complain to get moved to a bigger table.  Service was SLOW!! We waited forever to get our order taken, then after 30 minutes when the food finally came they hadn't even put my husbands order in to the kitchen, so he had to wait FOREVER to get his food, we were all done eating when it came out.  The food was ok... I wanted a lettuce wrapped burger but they were out of lettuce so that was kind of a bummer.  Also I ordered well done and my burger was really pink in the middle.  Overall not impressed, will not be back.  I'm not sure why so many people like this place!   *** also to those asking if this place is kid friendly I would say it depends on the kid.  They have no kids menu, and it is LOUD in here.  My almost 2 year old didn't like the loud music.  Also they tried to seat us as a bar height table and stack 2 high chairs for him to sit on, I don't see how that is safe.

l_fM3OqehJofdhMTT3Gtzw.text: Came in for my sons Birthday on April 19th. It was a Wednesday & this place was "packed" we had about a 40 minute wait.  Nevin was are server. Great customer service. It was our first time in and he explained the "run down " of how this place operates! Either you're gonna Relapse or Rehab!  Had the wings, offer a few different flavors and options, they were good!  Outstanding burgers, the best order in our party was the Hangover & BBQ burger. Suggest ordering your patty medium! I also suggest- getting the onion rings, a little more costly, but well worth it!  The atmosphere here is really cool, kinda a beach style scene!  Only downside: an extremely long wait after placing our burger order. However , do to the service we received & how often our server check in with us, we'll let that slide! Also, I wasn't to impressed with my Gnarly Burger. It was sorta plain, nothing special  & just average tasting. When we come again I'll try another burger they offer as they have many different options.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hatch Green Chili Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Hawaiian Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. BBQ Burger

sROaXH4-M2UAJY3wmJ5vMA.text: Best burgers! Best sweet potato tots! Great staff! Always super friendly and accommodating! You will never go wrong going to Rehab Burger and you will probably have left overs!

b4czzQtxfbAvPLqBOjmY9A.text: Friendly staff. The burger was kind of dry. We ordered the hangover rehab and asked for medium rare but got medium.   We also ordered the chips and salsa with the guac.  The quac was under seasoned.  I had to add more salt to it.  The salsa was spicy but was pretty good.    I give it a 3.5.

Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

awcGrXXFexSc6ns0UPJwXw.text: The burger was cold and the onion rings were cold and it tasted nasty! However, my daughter enjoyed her burger. I probably will never eat there again!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Bar
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Retail

KTi43eL255ceNSvsNodzOw.text: There are no words about Rehab... but let me attempt anyway. This is burger nirvana. And whatever they put in that pesto voodoo sauce/aoili they serve should be illegal.   Always a great atmosphere and the burgers are always on point! We love Rehab and always take out-of-town family to this crazy, hopping little joint where they care about their food, their customers, and their reputation. Bon vivant!

i0fsfZ7sBoEilK_6nqNhbg.text: I have been waiting to try out Rehab Burger! Food and service was fantastic. I came with some friends for happy hour before a spring training game and we had a fabulous time. Drinks were awesome!! And apps were great also. We split the fries, chips and salsa, as well as quesadilla. Can't wait to come back and try more!!

53RH1HZ_EcRO7Ao0e4bjhQ.text: What a fanatic fun place. Last night was the first time there. We had a party of 11 and got seated right away. Waitress was so nice and checked on us often. The food was so good. We ordered many different plates and we all where happy with the food, I  had the basic buger and it had so much flavor and the frys where great also. This place was in old town Scottsdale, love the feel of the place. Will come back again. They have table service.

oE-dxbFdjTIOht0vXXilOw.text: Stopped in to eat dinner at Rehab Burger while visiting my sisters fiance with my family. It was amazing! The atmosphere is very cool- causal and fun, and the outside seating would be prime if we came during the day.   The hostess was very friendly and our waitress was so nice. She was very knowledgeable about the menu and even helped with suggestions when we weren't sure what to try. She checked on us numerous times throughout our meal to make sure we were doing ok and to make sure we didn't need anything.   The unique variety they have for burgers is awesome. They have mac and cheese, PB&J... you name it they have it. The PB&J burger is amazing. You would think it would be a little strange but it's awesome and has a great taste to it.   We ordered chips and salsa to start and the chips were very fresh and crispy. The salsa was great but it had a little bite to it. I'm a plain jane so I ordered a cheese burger but it was absolutely delicious! My sister got the mac  and cheese burger and it was great.   Overall great restaurant, cool and causal atmosphere, friendly staff and great customer service. Would definitely recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

7aaVMsES0m_l8xFk9E7QCw.text: Amazing Burgers, first time here visiting from Idaho. Had the bacon blue burger it was delicious. Love the patio with misters.

GHKOguo1SXrmTDrJKuMsyA.text: Great burger!   We passed through Arizona on our road trip and this is one of the more popular place and I can see why. We got the 10 Oz. Burger and I barely finished it. You can get the 5 Oz if you want, but you might as well go big or go home! Well... Actually I can imagine the 5 Oz being just fine, since you do get a side with it.   I got the hangover burger and the pepper was grilled, the egg wasn't oozy, the meat was juicy (medium), it was a good burger. I would say it's more on the pricey side, but it's worth it!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. 10 Oz Hangover burger, with onion rings as the side

230B4ZshrfB8bsm89dNQMQ.text: The food was great but the server we had with the Detroit tattoo was a total dick. He rolled his eyes when we asked for water. Someone at our table was once an alcoholic, I feel it's completely inappropriate to whine because your bill won't be higher than what you want since alcohol isn't involved in the initial drink order.  Then once the other members of the party decided to have a celebratory drink, he asked how we wanted it and interrupted us to let us know it's one way or no way. I'm sorry, who's paying this bill?   Your food could be free and it excuse the awkwardness at our table from one of your employees. Not sure if he enjoys attempting this hard ass front but it's not cute.

__i67u8KtYdXStCJBJe7Mg.text: Great burgers, and I love their quesadillas! I like the location too! Just a really chill atmosphere.

iuZlpI0ZxppCa9Ltcwx-_w.text: Best burger to date... everything here is delish not to mention they have a salad thats is topped with some kind of pear vinegarette thats made in house ...  you will die its not too sweet but is so good on this salad. .. . .

6aS9bCAOVQFdGI1poss7Iw.text: With all the great reviews i thought this was going to be a killer burger. It was good, not amazing.  I had the hangover burger and I had to add salt. Salt!  The onion rings were great.

lNDqYzhzl2yYT2sm_4S0Og.text: Outstanding burgers AND pasta! Their SMALL Alfredo got me two meals! And I'm a big eater! Patio is fun and Kay the bartender is fun!

EqsvmDBGy4GPT-0CjeqHAA.text: Stopped here 2 nights ago last minute. Started with a 35 minute wait to get in but was worth it. Meals are huge - beers are cold and service is good. Forgot to take pics but had the PBJ & bacon burger - wow. Never thought PB&J would find its place on a burger, but this is definitely a surprise and a little unexpected.. The Hatch and Hangover burgers were quite similar and the sweet potatoes tots were scrumptious..

p252fgIpTKR1HZ7aZRMljw.text: This was a great, fun little place.  The whole family had great meals.  I had the Bacon & Blue.  I would highly recommend.

rfM6wqgB-2l3plOPczbZ4g.text: This was the first time I have ever been to Rebab, and as I sat there looking at the menu and saw other people's burgers coming out, I was super excited and impressed at the size of the burgers. However, when my Hack Burger came out, it was HALF the size of the others, dry, overcooked, the bacon I requested was missing (as well as the extra aioli sauce I requested) and the waitress brought me the wrong beer as well. She didn't earn a good tip that's for sure, since apparently refiling water was too hard as well.   Although I was not impressed with the service or the burger they brought me, I will say that I think I just had bad luck because my boyfriend's burger was amazing and much more what I had originally expected to get. If I had gotten his burger, I would have been leaving 4 or 5 stars. Give this place a chance, but don't be surprised if you have mediocre service or have to ask them to fix your order.

rCgp32PEUpJByhIMp30A_g.text: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  This is a fun place with great food. The owners are there and come over to say hi, the wait staff was friendly. A lot of people have gien bad reviews because it takes a little bit to get your food, this is a BUSY place, and the food is cooked fresh. So it will take a little bit of time, NO DRIVE THRU, this isn't a fast food place. Come in sit down, relax and enjoy the people you are with and have a GREAT meal!

EqkwGrOW9AeSWUrUlypUwg.text: WOW!!! I never desired nor tasted a peanut butter and jelly burger, but it was the most wonderful experience I've ever had. Was last there two weeks ago. Been craving it every since. Going back this Friday. A MUST HAVE.

4aEcLDVZ-yFGaylS1MjuJQ.text: When I want a big juicy burger, this is the place I go to! They have some tasty calamari to start off the meal and a fabulous selection of burgers to follow. My favorite is the hangover burger, and let me warn you, it gets messy! If you have no fear getting messy whilst eating, then that's the burger for you. Their fries are always crispy and delicious, not to mention they have a great dipping sauce (sriracha sauce!!).

tZBmngmhWIbCDPvw7rLfjw.text: We visited this place for the first time on our honeymoon and when you walk in, you instantly feel like you are at the beach. Once we were seated, it was hard trying to decide what to order. We ordered pineapple bbq wings, BYOB burger, Jalepeno Popper burger, and had sweet potato fries with all the dipping sauces. The food was amazing but our waitress was awful! 15 mins before we got our check once we finished eating and it was not that busy mid day. I had to ask for Coke twice, my burger was cooked wrong, and she rarely checked on us. Go for the food not the service

75IhXH01hAtXewx4f7y9rg.text: I've eaten here a bunch and they are consistent with great service. I'm super critical when it comes to burgers and I think the meat could be more flavorful. Atmosphere is great and everyone is always happy here. Nice place to hang out.

TtfoU0CchdFm2F_F7AOKVg.text: Damn good burger. Decided to try the pb&j burger. It was delicious. The service was good too. Definitely will be back.

E0k7YB_f7v4ly9oUtGN1vA.text: Only been here once but ambiance was good and staff was very friendly. I got the Mushroom burger with pretzel bread was delicious. Also, get the sweet potato tater tots!!!!!

QJvAdEm_rH_TASlb5ujrtw.text: This is by far the best burger place I have found in all of Arizona. Amazing!! Excellent food....excellent staff. I have nothing bad to say about Rehab Burger!!  If you are looking for a great burger in Arizona this is your place!

858JTleCAF7BgVUfJnUXeg.text: Huge fan or their burgers. Can't really go wrong with any of their options and definitely get the onion rings. I also enjoy how friendly their staff is.

44igb2AxQvBFMBgINjJuGA.text: Love this place for an amazing burger! Cool ambience, good service, good prices and close to home-what more could you ask for?!

TkUYtBSVQFs7pGYhQ31dDg.text: Correction, they now have hot wings that will burn your face off (if that's your intent).  Thanks for hearing me guys.  Love them!

Sd3M2uNGE0jDYudirg2Isg.text: Great burgers and tots! Cool atmosphere which can fill up quickly. But the employees are great and helpful and generally cheerful. Cant wait to go back!

dEGNwtP_yKGIp40Mx1RReQ.text: Most of the time I rave about this place, but my last visit was dissapointing. The patty melt we ordered was over cooked and under seasoned. Their milkshake also tasted like McDonald's soft serve.  If this was my first visit, I'd never come back.

kyPtqGrUYsHU8Jt5lcUamQ.text: I had the PB & J with bacon and Sriracha burger and much to my surprise it worked pretty well. No lack of flavor there or on any of their other options from what I could tell. You would have to go in with a serious appetite to finish the rehab size burger but the relapse size was about right - hearty but not so big that you feel sick when you are done. Another thing they did well was the aioli sauces. Creative but not overboard.

KKxsN3n038QVHiM4cAd-YA.text: The sweet potato tater tots are heaven and the siracha pb and j burger is my fave, soo good :)

TDCyhKF0xfkjWVFU1Lu1Pw.text: Nice environment, good location, decent service.  Food is quite overpriced for what you receive.  I recently paid $12 for a burger, plus upcharges for pretzel bun and sub sides...  And it was certainly not worth the money.  The meat was dense and somewhat bland.  It tasted like it was prepared well ahead of time.  There are better options out there for burgers at those price points!

iJdPGBvfMevChifqL7zxKA.text: GREAT food!  Had the bacon cheeseburger, sweet potato tots, and pork.  Killer awesome food!!!  I will definitely be going back to this place!  got it to go and the food was still super yummy, bacon not soggy, etc.  can't go wrong here!!!

6Y4FBXM6Cb_xri3kHywYhQ.text: Great burgers and great atmosphere...even better service. Nick our server was amazing and made our dinning  experience extraordinary...try the pig wings (on recommendation from Nick) the burger was huge and tasty especially with the pretzel bun...overall great experience. It sucked that we had to leave the next day back home to El Paso, Texas...

dV0EbSx5tWyIMGKBxPvAZg.text: Great food. Very busy so get there early. We ordered the pig wings which were so good I had to go back the next day for more. We also had PBJ burger which was pretty good too. The last thing we had was the pot brownie. The pot brownie I got to go and it was amazing. I can't imagine how good it would have been if I had it there.

7xD3fdmO62wt61WbIbNQ2w.text: It's like a Jimmy Buffet themed restaurant, the only difference being that these cheeseburgers really are paradise.    Relax, enjoy the casual vibe, and don't think about the requests for therapy that you will receive from your dietician when you inform them that you are a regular.

0DxH1Q3L0EsERod6wWv5UA.text: Aside being out of the pretzel buns, everything was really good. We purposely went for the pretzel buns, and was disappointed to find out they were all out by 7:00 pm.
