kbbZE-yS-s16p-89ORlAZA.text: Swung through here for lunch while visiting AZ.  Super chill spot.  Service was good and food was on point.  Would go back for sure.

GGQWKyugDwMqizeoiwz-uw.text: Best place for service. My daughter has many food allergies and the staff accommodated everyone of them. Our server Andrea was a STAR. I recommend this place without hesitation. Food was fresh, hot and absolutely delicious.

rgqayUmVYUSLFd8Dug3h4A.text: Been here 3 times. First two were ok, but never going again after my last visit! In a nutshell - horrible service, cold burgers, no AC! This place has gone downhill ... Don't be fooled by the old reviews and ratings!

FyYlDTPHStOv_T4LSltpsw.text: not worth the wait to get in here. Service was slow,host unfriendly and food taste like everyone else's hamburger.  Giant tourist spot! I guess they don't have McDonald at home!

2LE2Dw0VhforiGaY5TtCfA.text: Pretty great spot for a burger. I had a chicken burger with sweet potato tots and I went to watch the game which was filled with big screens. Such a laid back atmosphere.

RjOP2BAtx-pOyzTXZoWkuw.text: Awesome find. Loved all the choices, loved that you could get large and small portions. Great service, great atmosphere, great prices, great food. Oh we didn't mention the awesome draft beer choices and prices! We'd be regulars if we lived here. This is what yelp is all about... thank you Yelpers for helping us find this place!

Gotzz4K1BbkYFQNCbvRriA.text: Over-rated burger joint. How much can they put on a burger..or the real question is how much can they take out of your wallet and let you think that a hamburger was worth it. I had to eat outside and spent all my time shewing flies and the service was poor.

DknkPmoIT2Aa5X19NaQsVw.text: We got seated, near the front door, the other side of which had people smoking, and each time the door opened, we were hit by smoke.  Waiter seats us, gets our drink order, we receive it, and he vanishes, never to be seen again.  Waitress walks by, spills a plate of food, I get hit with some sauce all over my pants, and waitress vows to come back with something to clean my clothing with.  Evidently she vanished with our waiter because she never returns.  So..after all that smoke, wet clothes, no service, we walk to the cashier, explain what happens, pay our bill, and get nothing even resembling an apology.  So, we vanished too, not coming back, if we see the waiter and waitress out in the other dimension, we will tell them to go back to work.

Z9JSK8AkseTmgti4d0o1KA.text: The service out of the kitchen is horrible.  We waited 20 minutes for appetizers, and 1 hour for 3 hamburgers.  Really, it's just a burger.  There's no excuse for an hour wait.  The waitress took 20 minutes bringing our drink orders over to the table, and by the time they arrived, the ice was melted, the beers were warm. When someone commented on the wait for the drinks, she made them feel as if it was our fault.  Rude, unprofessional, burgers poorly cooked.  Far too long a wait, and the price too high.  McDonalds would have been a better choice than this poseur of a "hip" restaurant.  If you want to pay too much for a burger, have shitty service, and a lackluster kitchen, by all means, waste your money here.

PKv1DcZyIjaIYu2lHIjneA.text: Rehab is one of my favorite burger joints in the valley. The variety of burgers is great, can opt for a pretzel, white or wheat, get to choose if you want a "relapse" or "rehab" size and then the lovely choice of sweet potato tots or fries. For the price, you can't really ask for a better burger or portion. Cheaper than Zinburger and also superior.

NvjTg52RMpShm5PmY8dKag.text: Just got into town and had the hangover burger. Delicious. Get the sweet potato tater tots with it. Pretty awesome. Great service, fun atmosphere. Will be back.

ZQhbrhMavS8N7HKlsvXaQw.text: Do yourself a favor and get the PB&J bacon buger. Absolutely delicious and they don't skimp on the PB&J (there is plenty for dipping). Happy Hour prices were pretty good too. Definitely a good place to kick back with friends and some drinks and enjoy Rehab's fun food and atmosphere.

eAhWYSZen0MJpSr6Oyp7nw.text: I had the best burgers here.  So good I went back the next day.  Very nice place.  I have been there twice and ordered the same burger because it was so good.  It was the bacon and blue cheese burger.  The second time I was there I also ordered the sweet potato bites.  So good.  I know I will go again and promise myself to order a different burger.  The atmosphere is amazing.  The music is also great.  Service was good.  It is a very nice place to have great food and a great time with your friends.

9QLXuPwrnf_E0idr19CbtA.text: Absolutely love this place. I just wish I could go more often!!! There is a lot of fancy burger joints popping up, all over Phoenix and Scottsdale. Place is hip, clean and the burgers are down right delicious. I always order my burgers medium rare, only hoping that it will at least come out medium. But as always it will come out just perfect. I love bacon & blue cheese, but I need to expand my horizons!!! Can't wait to make this a regular spot, especially with my hot wife.

NpjR5qmCRrHHzHzfJerAvQ.text: If you are in the Phoenix/Scottsdale area this place is a must! It was hands down the best burger I've ever had. We ordered the Chili Cheeseburger and the PBJ & Bacon Burger and both were delicious. For the sides we got the fries and the sweet potato tots, which I highly recommend.   We went on a Wednesday night and the wait was only about 10 minutes. Regardless of how long you have to wait, this place shouldn't be passed up. The atmosphere is fun and casual and was a good time with great food.

CFv2aQYt0xNul7UuFLMZyg.text: This place is freaking legit! I had the porkster burger on a pretzel bun with sweet potato tater tots and spicy pineapple bbq dip and my partner in crime had the pb&j and bacon burger and both were out of world. Now  I see what the hype is about. Also, the service was great. I would highly recommend it to anyone eating out in old town.

kuzsjfM0ZDkZGyUqwVF0yQ.text: Great bar & fun atmosphere! We shared the porkster burger which was awesome. Good thing we shared it. I couldn't have eaten it by myself. So many more things we want to try. Can't wait to have friends come to town and take them here.

E0eOSRo0oqH1IEnDDrNVSQ.text: The pbj burger with the pretzel bun it is to die for and great atmosphere and owners are awesome as well stop in for great drinks great friends and good times

XsxnT3Q7z3JfoovAMM5FpA.text: I absolutely love this place, the food, the service.  Everyone is friendly.  Bartender remembered my drink upon my second visit without me asking.  I always meet friendly visitors and locals there and everyone is welcome.   Try the sweet potato tater tots and ask for all of the dipping sauces.  They also cook their burgers to order - not over like a lot of places here and the quality of the meat is very good.  It's my Sunday funday place.

SX0Wc8LSXikPS42LdMzVtg.text: Took the family while in Phoenix. Great atmosphere. Background music was perfect: reggae, kick back tunes. Food was great. Burgers huge and kids sizes were large. Nice local feel.  Wait staff was excellent.

ykShjZ2aHPx7l4HGfpQQZQ.text: Food is great! Service is mediocre at best. But again the food is great! Nice fun ambiance.

EzM0xlaWZUnrH3jKfS6lEA.text: Absolutely amazing burger. I tried the Hatch Chili Burger and it was perfectly cooked. The Sweet Potato Tater Tots were an excellent side.   I highly recommend any burger lover to try this place.

UPEgs8y_SSpmoidruIyeAg.text: We got the bacon cheeseburger and the "kid-friendly" mac and cheese, and would totally go back again! The mac and cheese was probably the best I've ever had. Service was prompt and friendly. Would recommend 100%!

JrSlrKHZEwati9IDcf4GXw.text: Good atmosphere good decoration BOMB.com Thats all I need to say ! GO! Ask for :Robin !

2LNKmolNJsIoKSnO_RTOMw.text: Great all around. The atmosphere, service and food is exceptional. If you're lucky enough, you'll get Kay or Jon as your bartender. They are very good at what they do and truly enjoy your company. Must visit!

Q4Cocr3jpZX_ZHhi-YtqXA.text: Service was a little slow but they got the orders spot on. The atmosphere was a little to Scottsdale stuck up for my taste. My actual taste buds were pleased though! Had the Hatch Chili burger with the pretzel bun = perfection! The fries had a chili lime seasoning for a great twist! I will certainly be going back to try the Chill Cheese burger.

I8sxaswfoZXQw63di_5GDw.text: I've heard about this place since I've been here so I finally got a chance to try it out for lunch yesterday.  First off you can't beat happy hour every day, $3.75 for a pint?  Dang, maybe that's just me coming from LA and expecting $9+ for a beer, but regardless, still happy to see that.  I got the Turkey Burger which was delightful and light enough where food coma was no that H(ard) Core.  It came with sprouts on top which was a first for me to have tasted on a burger and it was not poorly regarded.  I am also a big fan of TOTS!!!  I got the sweet potato tots in place of the fries which of course made me happy!  The plate also, much to my delight, came with 3 AWESOME dipping sauces, garlic aioli, chipotle mayo, & spicy ketchup.  Each sauce was just awesome!  I had to spread the sauce on my burger for each bite i took!  Man oh man!  It was definitely a very satisfying lunch.  I would recommend this spot to anyone, happy hour from 11a-6p :)  Cheers!

5PNBeo8JoIm7RQ_kpQ127A.text: This is one of my favorite places to not only eat, but to hang out. It has such a great atmosphere to hang out with friends. Their PBnJ burger is one of my favorites. The staff there is always friendly. Our last server was Kaye who is the depiction of a great server.

iW3GofkjFuXK7icLyaF-YA.text: By far one of the best burger places I've ever been to. It's not healthy by a long shot but it is amazing. Their sweet potato tots are too die for. The portion sizes are huge and it's very reasonably priced. I would definitely recommend this place to try at least once!

RV0x3lts2cbbkIMwagrUIQ.text: It looks better than it tastes.  No amazing combination that makes me say I have to go back there for that burger. The onion rings were good that was the only item that was good. Frozen burger patty. Nothing special. Costs as much as a burger at Hillstone but no where near the quality. The restaurant is also very dirty. It serves the hangover late night crowd who does not notice the dirt. Our thoughts.

btNYT25vajAdIVOnZ8-phQ.text: Just tried this place for the first time and it was awesome. We had Rocco as our server and he was great; he made a lot of great recommendations and he was on top of everything.   My buddy and I both had the BBQ burgers with sweet potato tots. Both of the burgers were cooked to perfection and with high quality beef.   We wrapped it up with the "pot brownie" with Reese's peanut butter cups and I was literally speechless. This blows oregano's pizzookie out of the water.   I definitely recommend this place!

66201FsYC1Xtbm3TT83dHA.text: Rehab burgers are the best in Phoenix,  period. Nice, casual atmosphere.  We love this place.

R39EjFuCEoZuFqhMbv59vA.text: Great environment, had the most friendly waitress, and the PBJ & Bacon burger tasted outstanding! I would recommend this place to anyone.

MQwCmye6kMPCcpVY_MNZeQ.text: After a full day of walking around Scottsdale, we were hungry for a great burger and discovered Rehab Burger on Yelp. We were not disappointed! Great variety of burgers and plenty of other options for those wanting something else. We were there on a Friday around 7, and it was fairly crowded and noisy, but the great vibe overcame all that.   Our waiter provided great service, and I really appreciated that he told me to best order my relapse-sized burger cooked medium. I prefer my hamburger not have pink in it but sometimes when I ask for medium-well, the meat is too dry. Medium was perfect. I had the poblano burger with sweet potato tots and it was all delicious. My husband really liked the hatch chili burger.  If we lived in this area, we would make this a frequent eating spot.

EhiB3klz45p-B8E6pcHHVQ.text: Awesome food and the best service I have ever had in any restaurant. Make sure you ask for Robin...she is the role model for anyone in the service business! We'll be back but only if Robin is here. Thank you Robin!

BAgNhhmLeuyKH6GPjyFRaQ.text: Fun, relaxing atmosphere, with great crazy tasting burger combinations!

Q8c3ap-jgIMHgfLPtdDYTA.text: I've taken my Toyota's here for service ever since I became a Toyota customer 21 years ago. Rich Taylor has been my service advisor since he started working there, perhaps 15 years or more. I've never gotten anything less than profession, courteous, and friendly service, which is why I continue to return, year after year..

70N0nZfQvwY4am4Onh7LGg.text: We eat here at least once a month. I have yet to have something I don't love and the wait staff is like family. Their Sunday surprise burgers are always amazing and fun.  Simply the best Burger and food you could ask for.

7aa4eQdM7pP4vq0rA1NL7w.text: One of the best burgers in downtown Scottsdale.  Hangover is a must. Enjoyed the music, misters and service. If you're not in the mood for a burger try the taco trio with fish, pork and chicken. The spices they use make you thirsty for a beer or two. Can't wait to go back.

8NzmJX93arHC1TnMq1_45g.text: Absolutely love this place.  Food is always consistently fabulous and service is great tool

p52oVjqV8DgoHbXu6oHrxQ.text: What a great place! Our server, Rocco, was spot on~6 adults and 3 kids are hard to please, especially someone that has been in the service industry for over 18 years! ;) We will be back the next time we are in Scottsdale!   Starters:  Chili Con Fritos Nelson's Verde Con Pollo  Burgers: Ghost Burger x 2  Know Poblano Burger  The Porkster Burger x 2  Pescado Borracho Hot Dog Therapy (5 year old who never wants to eat, almost finished it)  **The wait is little long, so be prepared. (That's usually a good sign)

ImgjnCHqC3161h94DToYfA.text: Wandering old town Scottsdale and felt like a burger. How lucky we stumbled upon rehab. Lots of great drink specials! Burgers were really yummy - I had a bbq burger and my hubby had the special, a jalapeno popper burger. Sweet potato tots were fun and the regular fries had great seasoning. Service was great, super friendly. Nice patio seating area.

kNES-XVggWaXwE1BGcUe5w.text: My friend would have given this a 5+.  I am sticking to a 4.  Whether you eat inside it out it has great ambience.  What a fun place to go with excellent staff and service.  The burgers were great.  I had the poblano burger and my friend had the blue cheese and bacon burger.  Both burgers were excellent. I am knocking it down one star for the wings. People raved about them.  Not me....mine must have come from a hen as they were what I would call skinny wings.  No meat and all bones.  I will definitely come back.  One other issue is that the head is a one staller.  Don't like to wait when duty calls.

C3ugmiFcqdM_u4qAuZHT9w.text: I'm usually not a fan of the island-bar atmosphere at restaurants like this, but their burgers and service are awesome enough to keep me coming back. The burgers are huge, served on soft brioche buns (the buns make the burger!) and super juicy. The pesto aioli is really good with both the fries and sweet potato tots, even though it sounds weird.

Q4zZsuRK5FKcwPxdPXff_g.text: One of the best burger joints I've ever been! With their specialty burgers every Sunday and their amazing staff, it's hard to stay away. It gets busy fast! And seats are limited. So I'd advise getting there early or expecting a little wait. To recommend, the Spicy Mac 'n Cheese burger is so good and gooey and the Jalapeno Popper burger is a favorite. Good fun place for singles, families, or couples. Always recommend when friends and fam are in town.

EBfRo6JyMF2lVovo5KHu5A.text: Love this place!!  I'm gluten free, so I love that they offer gluten free buns, and lettuce wraps for all burgers and sandwiches!   They're sweet potato tots are sooo good!! And all of their dipping sauces have been amazing so far! The pineapple aioli is to die for!!  I've yet to taste anything I didn't like!   The staff is very friendly, and you hear several "byes" and "have a great days" upon leaving - even when it's busy!! Awesome place!!

I9jUOf1EQVc8m83SopulPw.text: We moved here from a city known world-wide for its food (Go Saints). Without question, Rehab Burger makes the best hamburger I've ever eaten, and that includes the time before I was forced to eat gluten-free. Their gluten-free burgers are addictive. Get the bleu-cheese infused offering, and you'll need a 12 step program if you decide not to eat one again (but why would you? The thing is amazingly good).

QvmUg22PnlPKa1LQtxSJqQ.text: The best burger joint EVER. Wow I was so impressed! My boyfriend and I stumbled across this restaurant after our flight and we were starving. I wish I lived in Scottsdale or could ship it up to Seattle.    Has it been awhile since you had amazing service? Well it has been a long time for me. My streak ended here. This was hands down the best customer service I had ever recieved. We were greeted at the bar with a big smile and recomendations. We were served our drinks promptly and Bar tender was amazing. Our drinks were fantastic! Our Bar tender was very informative with her menu! She was nice and attentive and the same with the patrons around us. Thank you so much!  I had the Know Poblano Burger with a Lettuce wrap. The spicy grilled onions were delicious. I ate the whole burger it was so good. I'm so happy they have the lettuce wrap option. I'm a low carb type of gal and they made it so easy!  Drinks were also happy hour priced! Lucky us! Our lunch was somewhere around $30 for 2 meals and 4 Drinks! We left a hefty tip since we were so pleased!  You can't beat the taste, atmoshephere, service or price. If you want a great burger and a great experience, Come here!

hyQOIX5X2t7kGdZMJ-ib8Q.text: After years of hearing about this place, I finally was able to experience it. The ambience was perfect for our loud group, the drinks were strong and the burgers were great!

m2ySZCTTUKlTyHfSHhbd9g.text: I went to Rehab tonight to celebrate my last day of work for the school year! Also, we had a yelp deal...so that was cool too. The atmosphere is very casual, that I like. I got a frozen margarita and oh my goodness it was boozy. As I am writing this, I am still tipsy from that single beverage...wow. For dinner I had the hangover burger on a pretzel roll....it was delish! The burger was perfectly cooked and it had egg, cheese, and bacon on it...how could it be bad? It was super delicious. The sweet tots were just ok, but the BF's fries were really tasty. He also liked his turkey club. The service was prompt and friendly by our nice server Pickle. Anyway, I will most definitely be back and next time I will get a pot brownie :-D

r9Ced_GJe8lYD8Skqd_Mkw.text: This place is over the top great :) The staff was some of the friendliest in AZ, and the food was amazing. For sure the Relapse burger was more than enough, can't even imagine the size of the Rehab. Love the option of not only picking a size, but also sub out the burger for turkey or chicken at no extra cost (which I forgot to do). And just a side note, this is a place that butters and toasts the buns, so if you don't want it too greasy ask for a bun right out of the bag. Decor is super fun. Would be a great place to take someone new to AZ. Happy hour every day until 6pm, can't beat that!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Relapse Mac Gnarly on a pretzel bun, half and half fries and tots. Aweomse!

bG31XC7gjDA_PlCCingafw.text: Been going to Rehab Burger for months now and absolutely one of the best burgers joints in town and plus the owners come to table to table asking how is your food and feels great getting to know there customers, I will definitely be coming back!

u7pcC-vGWcmXEuBC6N9k_g.text: It was just ok. The staff was really friendly and the food came out timely. I've had better burgers, not my favorite but the atmosphere was cool, kind of like a beach side joint.

D4jvq2-iqRMtiH5S-G51KA.text: I gotta say, I was not expecting such great service!  The place was packed so we decided to sit at the bar.  Luckily the hostess followed us because we couldn't find 2 seats together like a fellow customer had thought she'd seen.  She put us in between a couple groups at the long table, one was about to leave anyway.  Service was prompt, food was prepared in a reasonable amount of time and served hot.  Is that too much to ask for?  In Scottsdale, so often it is.  It was refreshing.  The burgers are solid.  I had the chili burger with sweet potato tots.  Love the tots.  They were cooked perfectly.  Burgers were done to order.  I really liked their creative sauces - chipotle(?) aioli, pineapple aioli, spicy ketchup.  We also had the calamari which was great.  The prices are pretty solid too, but the portions make up for it I think.    We also did the Reese's pot brownie with ice cream.  Get a dollar off if you check in on Yelp btw!  Paid for the ice cream addition.  :)  Its a brownie on top of Reese's I think in a bed of marshmallow fluff topped with ice cream if you add it.  Very sweet, probably nice to share with like 2-3 other people to get a good portion without feeling sick.  All in all, its a worthy establishment that justify the pricing with great service and solid food.  Happy hour deals are mostly just drinks at this point.  A buck off appetizers too, but not great for food as far as happy hour goes.  Updating my review to add the backyard bbq burger - its awesome!  Burger with bbq sauce and a fried onion on top.  YUM!

zNwtNBOvXgmcN4_c8FnQww.text: Ordered the Know Pablano Burger, it was amazing. Cooked perfectly. I got the onions rings as well which were good, but probably just stick with fries next time. Their side sauces are very good, but the burger dint need them and I enjoyed it without.

OAnuXrZCU4LHZsk2bloRhQ.text: I've been here about 6 times in the last year or so. They have blown me away each time with their food, service, and cool vibe. Had the bacon cheeseburger last night with the pretzel bun. It was delicious, juicy, and huge!    A solid "go to" place every time I am in town. Thanks guys!

OCGE6P25ZkyUJNN_MTJVSg.text: If you want a burger and cold beer, mission accomplished. Awesome burgers. Best in Scottsdale likely. Some unique burgers and sides are awesome too. It's exactly what you want in a burger joint. Love it!

GIhvnJw8dLk_L2kILgCgbA.text: Service was great! The corn on the cob was delicious but the burgers were just a little too much! I got the Mac n cheese burger but it was literally overflowing and I was unable to pick it up. I think you could share a burger for sure!

budHy30g5dfi93Pz2o5gGw.text: Best burger place I have ever been to. This is my favorite place to eat I love the chill environment and the great service. I absolutely love coming here!!

Ce1h0xiIk5BkPXnWWEQemQ.text: So hot inside!!!!!!   The ac couldn't keep up with the amount of people in the restaurant which made the experience worse than anticipated.   The food was good, the waitress was great!  Be prepared to get messy!!   And the busser saw that my husband was sweating and brought over a cool towel which was awesome!

Gi6WBW6xReCi_cs6SwPESQ.text: We love this place! We usually go to the one in Tempe but they were closed on Mondays for "recovery"... lol. So we went to this one in Scottsdale since it isn't that far away. We were really craving one of their amazing burgers. I ordered the Philly cheesesteak burger which was so amazing! Let me say the cheese whiz was to die for in this burger! My boyfriend got the poblano burger, which is his favorite. It has the perfect heat and flavor! Totally awesome. There really isn't a burger that I had at this place that I didn't like. My only complaint is that I felt this location was a little bit more cramped in space on the inside and it felt a little dark. Otherwise it was pretty good.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Onion Rings
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Philly Cheesesteak burger with sweet potato tots

vYtQyyXiurMIDf7ypq7Q9Q.text: The workers could honestly use a little rehab in my opinion. Got to the restaurant with maybe 3 tables occupied.. sat down, ordered, place started to fill up with more and more people. 45 min goes by. All surrounding tables receive their food, and we are still here sitting around with no food. Food was whatever, wait sucked. Won't be back

wixj8ZQ9YhtqjKZqlFHhrA.text: Fun place with tasty burgers!  We were here two years ago and happy to stop again. Twenty minute wait went quickly people watching outside.  My husband's plain ole burger was cooked just how he likes it...rare. My poblano burger, medium well, had some kick to it!  Friend's Swiss and his wife's ghost were a bit off in how  done they were cooked. (Her medium well was pink.) Three giant onion rings were tasty as were the fries. Fries were a bit on the cool side.  Drinks were refreshing.  Mine had some coconut and pineapple juice in it...mmmm.  Great service and a friendly atmosphere made for a great place to stop. Free parking next door is a bonus in the public lot.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The double was huge!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Poblano had nice kick!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Ghost burger with Colby cheese subbed.

xjP3XdE4EprJohLYPJqpqQ.text: So glad we didn't go for the Rehab (10oz). Relapse (5 oz) was wayyyy more than enough for our two day worth of caloric needs. $2 more to double the size of beef patty sounded really appealing. But your arteries and waistline would thank you.   My husband and I almost made the mistake of not accounting the crazy amount of toppings and sides included in our burgers. The nacho taco burger had enough taco meats to make at least two tacos. My beefbistro had enough rib eye to make another hearty sandwich. Topped with ooey gooey cheese, oozing condiments/sauces - we struggled to even lift our burgers. And who could forget the sweet poTOToes - stuffed to my the brim from the burger alone, I couldn't leave these sinful, bites sized treats alone. "They are small, I'm sure my stomach has room for one more".   You honestly can't go wrong with any of the options. Very fun combinations, explosive flavors. Wished we have a Rehab back in LA for us to try more of the burgers!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Inside
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Nacho taco burger - special of the day $15.75 plus tax

sMz1RoGrqdg7Jnn2UEU_Ig.text: If it had 10 stars would give. This restaurant the best Arizona has. I had veggie burger.it was outstanding. Handmade and panko crusted. The service always great. The staff goes above and beyond.

AB4SS36UHA-JhIjrYu04ZA.text: Excellent burgers like seriously some of the best burgers you will ever have. Chill environment with super friendly staff.

ut98TFdMCNFPOWLh3sLNYA.text: Fantastic burgers and sweet potato tots! The meat blend is flavorful and fresh. Everything cooked to perfect temp!

RK13foKrES9fmYOqBUEbvg.text: The best Burger I've had in a long time! I got the mac and cheese burger and my taste buds were going crazy. I was in town for vacation and this place is amazing. Service was amazing as well.

fwRBHszc2KQVDvHpkRrcPA.text: Love love love it PRETZEL BUNS OMG SOOO DELICIOUS. Must go must eat yum yum yum. Wow that was delicious burger Mm mmm mmmm MAC AND CHEESE ON A BURGER OH WOW - mmmmmmm pretzel bun

zgmCY5XFozydzAR-zjL3Qg.text: There are unique flavors and the burgers are cooked really well. The sweet potato tots were a little too sweet, but otherwise everything else was delicious. Good service too.

myLECzsaBtYCensNVGrmmQ.text: We loved the turkey burgers and regular burgers at this place. Great flavor and choices. Definitely order the corn on the cob, you won't be disappointed. It's difficult to find a burger place that cares to make a good turkey burger, however Rehab Burger makes the best we have had in a long time. Loved the experience and wait staff.

5vG3x_Tn8uLQ-391eb19lA.text: My girlfriend and I had an overnight layover in Phoenix Arizona. All the restaurants were closing as we settled into our hotel. We decided to postmates and order Rehab Burger. And holy crap, (we're from California), the burgers are amazing! I ordered a PB&J burger just so I can be different and not a typical basic person and I'm glad I did! I was scared at first, PB & J in a burger?! But the moment I put that thing in my mouth, I felt like I was reborn/rejuvenated whatever you want to call it!  I now have a reason to come back to this dead city :P. Or is it not dead? Prove me wrong :X

ltNRqasbUxAkIq8xrualJw.text: I had high expectations for this place but unfortunately the service and food didn't live up to it. We were told there would be a 15 minute wait which is fine, but we were confused when groups of 2 came after us and all got sat at the bar immediately. We were never asked if we wanted to sit at the bar instead of waiting. Granted it was a busy day, but it was frustrating seeing empty tables but waiting to be seated because the table wasn't cleaned off yet. When we sat down, it took a while for someone to offer us water or even stop by our table (did I mention it was over 100 degrees outside?).   In terms of the food, I didn't love the wings (with the gold sauce) or the spicy pineapple bbq burger. They were both okay. My favorite food item was the sweet potato tots but I've had similar ones elsewhere. The menu is quite large so maybe we just ordered the wrong items but I don't think it was worth the wait. Overall my experience there was just okay.

nx3iXJF5sOUDjJELBi86uA.text: I LOVE burgers and this is one of the few restaurants that cook it to perfection EVERY time!!!  The onion rings are equally awesome, shakes delicious and the service is OUTSTANDING!!! My son fell in love with the GM... she's phenomenal!!! Love them!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. YES!!! Behold the rings!!!!
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

_cmY44fMme5_mYrgdcaroQ.text: Time for another review of my favorite burger joint.  Stopped going here for a bit because of the horrendous management change a few months back.  After the manager refused to take to go orders because they were "too busy".  This happened TWICE and I am a regular who spends a lot of money here.  Don't tell me you can't make a to go order for a regular.  Decided to go back because we missed Alicia!  She is amazing and always such a fun time.  If it wasn't for her, we would never have come back.  Glad we did too because Alicia was still there and made us decide to give it another try.  She is always on the ball and the best server.  Unfortunately the weekend and night manager whom I believe is called Cass is still there.  She has NO MANAGEMENT skills whatsoever.  She's been rude to customers and even rude to us.  She acts like she can't be bothered and the way she treats the servers in front of customers is appalling.  I even tried to ask her a question once and she couldn't be bothered.  Instead shouting,  I'll send your server over!  She's rude and unprofessional and has hurt this stellar location.  If only they would get rid of her it would be back to normal.  But for now I'm good because I know Alicia has me covered.  Oh and what's this $2 credit card fee???

So47_gzR_dm8UyDX45yJBQ.text: You can't go wrong with Rehab Burger Therapy, the food, the music, the ambiance!! Every time I go I feel like I belong, I love!! Adore!! Never would change the amazing PB&J burger!   This place has it all the people here are amazing, the price range is totally understandable!! Just don't miss the chance of having great food at this awesome place!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

wmSvTYMjA-L3Of_HaY0u2A.text: I ordered here tonight and I am leaving incredibly dissatisfied and still hungry, oh and with a swollen eye. I ordered a bleu cheese burger wrapped in lettuce WITHOUT bacon, which I made very clear while ordering. Then other servers came by and tried announcing what I had ordered and I tried to raise my hand and say that was mine as I asked "without bacon right?" And they said no there's bacon in this, it's on the inside. I let them serve it to my other friend who ordered the same thing. Then I was the last one without food and they brought my plate around to me and took off immediately. I assumed since I had stated twice that I didn't eat bacon, and I didn't see it on my meal, it was fine. Well my first complaint was that there wasn't a lettuce WRAP in front of me -- just a burger with lettuce on and below it. Messiest meal ever.... I got half way through the burger (with my knife since it wasn't easy to eat, I might add) and said, "hmm I feel like I DO taste bacon... that doesn't make any sense right?" And then my friend and I both checked our meals and sure enough -- I just consumed bacon for the FIRST TIME IN OVER 10 YEARS.   Not cool.  Then I was trying not to freak out, not knowing how I'd react to it right away, and I asked our server if I could just have another order because I wasn't going to eat mine. I literally ordered a pb&j sandwich like a child. It was good, but they made me pay for both my original meal that was misrepresented to me, AND the second meal of pb&j solely because I was still hungry.  And now I've woken up with puffy swollen eyes and spent money on a place where I left still hungry. By the end of the meal too, we all talked about our meals and I think only one person of the five of us were satisfied. Nobody had a to-go box because none of us wanted what we were eating because it was cold or not what was described to us.  It may be good for some happy hour beers, but I won't be returning to Rehab Burger and my friends seemed to be on the same page as me.

9ybmWLmAGeSpE09pjqSX8g.text: Dangerous amazing food!! Great service I wanted to stay healthy this vacation but not when I found this place  everything on the many is great  sweet potato fries is to die for!!  I asked for my mango majito and they made it! I had no idea but they are all over the place like Hawaii etc. must visit if you are in old town Scottsdale

rgCCsHmqNOtEg9xuJgbhFQ.text: Omg they have the MAC burger I can assure you it is absolutely delicious. I went 3 days in a row and I took my boyfriend and dad. We loved jf

Rb91r0Gek1zZAU4kmssl8Q.text: Fantastic patio to enjoy lunch/dinner on! Food was out of this world delish. I can't recommend the PB & J Burger! The sweet potato tater tots...OMG!! All day Happy Hour on Thursday-great drink selection! Servers were fantastic and had great recommendations if you needed it. Fun place!

Fr2Yzb06gN2Tm8qNOI3zJQ.text: Service was excellent, even for it being extremely busy. Our burgers (Jalapeno Popper, Porkster and kids cheeseburger) were amazing. Would definitely go again.

CQ4K03kVb3eVeDD-hqvijw.text: Came to Scottsdale for work.  Heard about the place from a few different people.  Great vibe, great drink prices, and the food is fantastic!    I recommend the porkster and onion rings.  Any of the 4 peaks beer goes great with it.    Bartenders are very friendly and keep your mugs full!

UfLvUcR7k9sFRoOv2cb3Dg.text: Amazing burgers. If you have a couple thousand to spend, you can't go wrong here. And by a couple thousand, I mean calories. Such amazing food.

gqbXpl6J0OcBzERZiq8fSw.text: Very solid burger here at Rehab, with one major flaw that kept it from being one of the top burgers in the area. See all the details in our full video burger review: youtu.be/xkEmHlDibic

C-K70PqIIOE0-05Sp3oYvA.text: We chose rehab burger therapy to celebrate Father's Day sadly we had Terrible service one of the burgers did not come out until dessert  and it was uncomfortably hot in the restaurant. This was our first and last time eating here

DGkt6WJcSVWL_1dYPtmVvw.text: I really enjoyed rehab burger. The quality of the meat is excellent and their burgers are HUGE.  Service is excellent! If you're ever in ritzy Scottsdale I recommend trying Rehab burger.

3IhumZA6lJB5NwWvN7pRaw.text: Easy going restaurant with few outside tables, Phoenix weather in October is perfect in the evening! Extensive menu. Chicken wings with BBQ sauce are some of the best we've had. The little stubby pork ribs are bbq-ed to perfection. As for the Burgers, they are incredible in taste, size, cheese, condiments, bread and dressings, the fries, side salad and sweet potatoes tats were great too.  Awesome service.  The lady was so nice.  The owner came and checked that we are happy with the food.  This is a feature of Phoenix and needs to be in all guide books and websites. A real Phoenix gem!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The bigger beefstro! Heavenly.
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

j_-rH8ek0U3HVHBqkD80Eg.text: Seriously creative burger menu! I mean, when have you ever seen a macaroni & cheese burger or a P B & J bacon burger? Well, they have it there and we ordered them! Well I didn't, but people at our table did...  And I think they were 10 OZ. burgers. You had your choice of 2 sizes; rehab or relapse. We're talking some big burgers here! They said the mac n cheese was very good and the pb&j was very interesting. Both plates left not a crumb, so that tells you something, right? I especially liked the choices of buns & sides and the sauces to accompany them were great.   We started with calamari which I thought was a wimpy thing to do since they serve it everywhere. However, they proved me wrong because it was really good! Breaded strips of calamari steak with a fantastic marinara style chunky sauce. Yum!  I opted for a lighter fare - or so I thought, and ordered a salad. Here's the lowdown on it:  Rodrigo Da Vinci -A spanish masterpiece created with a blend of iceberg and romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cilantro, scallions and corn tortilla strips tossed with chipotle ranch. Then topped with spicy grilled chicken sauteed in peppers and onions, more tortilla strips, shredded cotija, cheddar jack cheese, a dollop of sour cream and a sprinkle of cilantro. it's art for your hunger! it was really tasty. My only complaint was that it was way too overdressed.  I should have thought to say light on the dressing or order it on the side.  Next time...  All in all, a terrific place and the service was great too!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Rodrigo Da Vinci Spanish Salad
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. PB &amp; J Bacon Burger
Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Mac n Cheese Burger

G8YGCVbGCJlZ8cD-fxaaOA.text: A great burger place in Old Town Scottsdale. Rehab is a solid burger joint. Offering a full bar, cold beer, and creative burgers, this a good place to chill with friends. Burgers are offered in 5oz and 10oz patties. With all the choices some of the favorites include a PB&J burger, Hawaiian burger, and my favorite, the jalapeno popper burger. A pet friendly patio allows your dog to hang out, and who knows, fido just might make new friend.

ebnE1WOWJx_2196XVca2Pg.text: We had someone in our party that has a gluten allergy. We found Rehab that offered gluten free options.. the moment we walked up to the restaurant..we loved the place.. the staff was great..the music was perfect..and the Burgers.....soooo good. With a party of 6, we all shared our burgers to try a variety. I will be back!!

jtdaIqZCLhbe7pmbXsckfQ.text: We came here on Cinco de Mayo for dinner.  The place was packed but they were ready us since we made a reservation.  It was a noisy and loud evening with several sports events on the television screens.    Our group of five ordered several different burgers from their creative menu. My Hatch Burger was very good.  I got the 10oz Rehab not the 5oz Relapse version.  The burger consisted of 2 or 3 large pieces of grilled green chile peppers of the famous New Mexico Hatch variety, melted cheddar cheese and chipotle mayo.  I went with the whole wheat bun option.  Delicious!  The bun held together even with the juicy meat and mayo.  The fries that accompanied the burgers were also good  I tasted the Bacon and Blue which was a little dry.  The bacon and blue cheese are inside the meat.  I wished they had been on top.    I also sampled the Ghost Burger.  It is made with two 5oz patties.  I was sure it would be too hot. The chilies are actually in the cheese and added a great spicy flavor to the meat.  An order of the tater tot like sweet potatoes were a very nice addition.  The are well prepared and tasted much better than I imagined they would.   The place had good quick service even on a crazy evening like Cinco.

ZpkiYRuoQSXZQk1zlImzPw.text: Great food! I really liked the atmosphere. It's a cool place to eat and hang out. The only thing i didn't like would be the music was a little annoying, but besides that everything was fine. Also, there are some cool outside seating

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Great burger!

MMYsOQ3JiIHkp8XWhxm60g.text: I've been in here a few times and had a good experience. The staff is friendly but not annoying. Prices are great. They have a ton of burgers to choose from as well. I think a few local magazines also rated them the best burger in the Phoenix area. They have opened two new locations in a little over a year so that gives you some idea about their success

6--fCsIAHbUqwpvv_uRyYA.text: This place has such a fun atmosphere and great food! Their pig wings are amazing and I have never been disappointed with any burger that I've ever ordered. If you want to escape the desert for a little, come by and grab a burger at this little beach shack!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

PN0SqZ_lJCTwRYOGWD1New.text: I've eaten here enough times now that I am confident in my assessment... this is my favorite place for burgers on Planet Earth. I had to try many other burger joints before making such a bold statement, but the quality and variety of ground meat-between-the-buns is second to none.   I always make a point of going for the Rehab Burger (which features jack cheese, fire-roasted green chiles, bacon, and a fried egg), the Jalapeno Burger (with jack cheese, fried jalapenos, and onion straws), or the ghost pepper burger (with ghost pepper jack cheese, guacamole, and carmelized onions). They're all excellent.  The optional sides of sweet potato tots or "Jamaican" roasted whole ear of sweet corn are fantastic. The onion rings are huge and also delicious.  Finally, the availability of a full bar, piped-in reggae music, decor, and vibe make it great place to spend some quality time on a lazy afternoon or evening. I can't wait for my next trip to Scottsdale. In fact, maybe I'll start planning it now.

bK5UhTLT8rOIgkouu5Yo2g.text: I am definitely a burger snob as funny as that sounds. That being said, I know Arizona is not known for its food, it is very hard searching for an amazing place to eat out that is also consistent. I found some ok and above average burger places like delux and zin burger, both very good but Rehab Burger holds the crown hands down.   My only complaint ever is the wait times can be that of were ancient asian meditation techniques are required to contain the hunger wrath from the scent emanating from the kitchen, that place gets PACKED.   My absolute favorite is the McKnarley Burger with a side of onion rings - you must try this!  I can't wait to try the other locations, the location in Tempe now offers Yelp cash back at 5% to that place is locked and loaded in my crosshairs.  Excellent job from the service staff and chefs! 5 times over and not one let down. Keep it up!

4AMlZmI6sm1oIn3YciYbdg.text: Unique place any Burger that you can think of and want it is there open atmosphere great service enjoyable music food was very good if you can think of the burger that you have in mind from a mac and cheese with jalapenos on a pretzel roll to a bacon cheeseburger with blue cheese and gouda this is your place to go ahead and check out and explore very unique area in Arizona don't sleep on it.  I would recommend that you get there early school is back in session so the college kids do crowd this around seven or eight nice stroll down Mill Street love this place make sure you continue Explorer restaurants and bars are all over everywhere.

9uDEHBgH22Jgp8V65bTG0Q.text: My wife and I were on vacation in Scottsdale Az and stopped here for lunch If you like burgers this is the place the have  Many unique choices of burgers and the sides are great too Our server was friendly and prompt I believe this place was on tv on diners and dives Try it you will be pleased

2HyRPOvr7LUx0Cpe50J0lg.text: A+ service. A+ food. Excellent way to start off out Scottsdale vacation!   We came at a busy time with a 20 month old who was hungry,  tired,  and cranky from sitting in an airplane and then a car seat for hours.   Even know there was a wait, they seated as quickly and one of the ladies, who later I found out was Denise, one of the owners, brought out a plate with chopped turkey, ham, cheese, and strawberries for our little one to start munching while we decided what to order.  So kind!   I had the poblano burger on a pretzel bun with a side of Jamaican corn and my husband had p_b and see a burger on a brioche bun. He opted for sweet potato tots his side.   The place had several children, but no children's menu. They were so nice to tell us that they could do a variety of different things for the kids and we ended up getting a taco with chicken and cheese for our son. We asked him to please bring it out as soon as possible even if our food wasn't ready yet. They brought it out very quickly and when the bill came, the even said the taco was on the house because they knew how hungry he was and they didn't bring it out fast enough for their liking.   Such a wonderful place, a wonderful atmosphere, kind people, an excellent food! If this place was in my hometown, I would be there every week.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Menu

yGmBtIX4EyVgaMmvfvt8oA.text: This place is amazing! Walking by we weren't sure how great it would be but when we came inside at 1:45PM it was packed. We were immediately greeted by a silver fox of a gentleman who cleaned us a spot at the bar. Rian was very friendly and helpful with the menu! He provided great service and could tell he wanted us to have a wonderful experience.   I ordered the 5oz Mac n cheese burger with a pretzel bun and Mexican corn. OMG....I am so full and it was DELICIOUS!   We will be back!

AdbnWmrQSGABn-w-L27-vQ.text: Terrible take out experience - we did NOT get what we ordered the barbecue burger got home with a basic burger with cheese (take out order) and soggy beyond belief fries that I am trying to reconstitute in our toaster oven. Will not go back not worth it!

WUJyh4IqkURC5LZ3UHzGRA.text: Decided to finally visit the highly talked about restaurant and loved it! It was suggested that I try the mac-n-cheese burger. It was good, but it was a little too much for me. I still really wanted to taste the "meat" of the burger not just the mac-n-cheese.  But even with that comment, I would still definitely go back to try everything else on the menu! :)

eoUcx4GDnGZTtGvuFEzDQQ.text: Very good place for a burger. Laid back and friendly yet professional and quick even when they were busy.  Only reason not 5 stars is they plated burger wrong and my rare went to someone else at table and I got stuck with medium.  We were under a time crunch so left it as it was delivered. Still all four of us enjoyed everything we got.

vTb6oH-XToqv3Kyj7PNKXA.text: MMMMMooooo tasty sad cows. Very sorry mr cow but you're so tasty and this joint makes it so much more delicious ... :( Please do not go vegan for sake of the tastiness happening here.  Only issue is it's a bit dingy and the waitress seemed uninterested in the quality fo our experience, but actions comiserate said tip.

d0hIRA4ISYFn2rQmCVjDDQ.text: This place helped me get over my double cheeseburger addiction and after 2 weeks I was a vegan

DN1lQFWVTGgkRQxeU7GKqA.text: Had a Ghost Burger because the menu said limited time. This thing was wowza! The medium rare beef with spicy guacamole and caramelized onion is heavenly! My god it's good.

87me2yAVQKTbXSvmVnd9LQ.text: The peanut butter and jelly burger blew my mind and was cooked perfectly medium!  Happy hour prices were good too.  Super friendly bartenders.  Rehab is located a few steps off the main street and is pretty small so if you are going during prime hours, be prepared for a wait.

i7iiIKc5lu2z3mMoe8RqRQ.text: I thought the bacon burger was very standard, so the 4 stars aren't really for that... the 4 stars are for the amazing wings!!! Best wings I've ever had! The service was great as well. We will be back!

YgbtRQ3faj6XbWZK9QHdCw.text: We read reviews and had some people talk to us about it... It was exactly what we expected! We all loved it! I had the Rodrigo da Vinci said it was amazing, I had plenty of left overs for lunch. My boys had the Mac N cheese burger, it was good. If you do plan on going, go with time because this place is busy! But well worth it

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

6FXdAAYtrRWr2PzBPKvQrQ.text: Got two stars bc have been there in the past (4x past year) and loved it. Today was a BIG disappointment. Premises (inside and out) seemed uncared for. Sat on patio... and with this heat, would expect wait staff to be prompt with waters, instead we had a long wait. Once we ordered, staff neglected to ever bring table settings until we requested three times! And by the end we KNEW what to expect; got carry out boxes for ourselves.

xKPu8wd0kGYPDxzFOcrzkw.text: Poor customer service. Waited 45 minutes just to get a beer and water. Waited another 30 minutes to put in an order. During a slight rush, I still should not have waited that long.   Chill vibe, doubt I come back to visit.

OZ9uwVQ5LUmE929MwTccAQ.text: This is an outstanding burger place! I looked up best burgers in Scottsdale on Yelp & Trip adviser. They suggested Rehab Burger! Let me tell you this is an awesome hamburger restaurant! Waitress are awesome, service is outstanding! Loved everything! Wide choice of burgers! Casual dress, mix of people. My husband ordered the blue cheese burger, that is infused with blue cheese, ordered extra blue cheese on top, I ordered the hatch burger, yummy! Will definitely go back!

u5ODF-lEex4nZG_N0VrEBQ.text: If you're hungy this is the place to be. You get the choice of a few different buns (go pretzel) along with two different burger sizes and sweet potato tots, fries or both.  When you're not in the mood for a burger than the fish tacos are a must! Seriously so good.    Aside from this place being occasionally busy the service is top-notch.

ZFuce8HShB3vMv64ZsU-RQ.text: My first time at Rehab. A stranger that I met months boasted about this place having one of the best burgers in town. Specifically she told me to get the PBJ which I thought sounded gross. I tried it anyway (smaller version) and it was interesting and fairly tasty. Unfortunately, the burger that I requested to be cooked "medium-rare plus" was more medium-well (see pic) so I didn't enjoy it as much as I probably would have had it been cooked as ordered. Nonetheless, the onion rings were good and the service was cool so giving it 4-stars. Total bill (including $4 tip and almost $7 Stella that I ordered) was $24.24. I would take a 1/2 star away if I could since that's kinda a lot for a meal that I didn't fully enjoy or consume.

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States

Xx7hvffe-ZsWnItjiuZWlA.text: Peanuts and jelly were amazing combinations. It was very tasty. I want to eat this again. I will definitely come again.

0dAypcMIAh4CFJozATYPbQ.text: I grew up in Scottsdale and when I come to visit I have to come here 2 or 3 times. I love this burger place but don't let the name fool you. The pasta, appetizers and salads are phenomenal. They never disappoint. I highly suggest the calamari and pot brownie if you have room for dessert.

RjRohOHTkepkhxSLfooo0w.text: My 13 yr old son and I went here today for lunch.  He was craving a big burger.  I was craving a relaxing sit down meal w/vegetarian options.  We both got what we wanted (his, a burger w/double meat and mine a veggie burger w/no bun (sounds bad, but it was delicious!).  And, I also got one of the best bloody marys I have ever had!  When I walked into this place, I just got the feeling that they must make really great bloody marys and they do!  Yum!!!

5r-3neF-A6ZcPIwxEifJ1g.text: Oh my god I love this place! Fantastic Mac and cheese! PB&J BURGER TO DIE FOR! Great atmosphere!

d1Vqi8pnfZucijGcweSM5A.text: We waited 2 hours for burgers that we ordered. We finally asked how long it would be and were told we were still the third order in line. The rush for lunch was long over when we ordered. Maybe they were just too exhausted from the earlier rush. The bartender was very friendly! We ended up canceling our food order so we can't rate on it.

cldBOuI9k6U39ehjFn8EHQ.text: Tasty burger and the tots are amazing!  Service is good, they have turkey burger options that are quite tasty.

OcG00PVLltxS-ThgOzaFtw.text: Tried the spicy Mac and cheese relapse burger. It's like a side and sandwich in one! Very good, not too spicy. Skip the onion rings. Should have tried the sweet potato tots.

H6dMVDown_c5a8oCDyqrXw.text: PBJ and Bacon burger is  heaven sent!!!!  No Joke!  Don't be afraid because it sounds funky... it is DELISH!!!!!

d0TKWE43OmwkRPbxPSSsRw.text: Small place with a relaxed beach feel to it.    Not the best burger I have had, but it is definitely up there towards the top.  They have a lot of different burgers on their menu.  I have only tried two of them, but they were both great.  Not a good place to watch sports though, I think I counted 2 TVs in the whole place (including the bar)

olKQwzUMMnNeRXuol-l8kQ.text: Great food, great server.. Couldn't believe she's a Grandma.  We were a party of 9, and she steered us in the right direction.   Apps and Food were great.  Would come back again.

VeKOkYU0lf_r031Hm6zbNQ.text: This place is a must.....we ordered the McNarly Rehab burger both of us with sweet potatoe tots..yummm & we shared an order of onion rings which were huge, crispy & delish. Wow....the McNarly was a double patty so juicy..piled high with lettuce, tomato, onion & cheese....with just the right amount of thousand island. I could only eat half b/c this is a BIG...Definately this is a burger you could share!!  We ordered take outsince my friend had her pup with her but we will try again & next time we plan on eating in on the patio.  I do wish this place had a bigger patio. It's a little pricey but worth every penny. This is the best buger that I've had & you will be very satisfied...Can't wait to go back & try some of the other burgers & some wings baby!!   Happy Munching

WvnLYmSNkwYhPppr_Q-lxQ.text: A must-go anytime you're swinging through Phoenix. Funky and fun burger combinations and bartenders that will shoot the shit with you all day long.  No matter what burger you order, make sure to get the sweet potato tots with chipotle aoli and pot brownies (brownie/peanut butter cups made in a cash iron pot with peanut butter and marshmallow). KILLER.

3UO6CbDutN1RA23_k8Q7TQ.text: This place has great burgers and our server was very chill and overall a rad experience! Seriously the food was unequally prepared, with fresh, high quality ingredients. Our glasses were always refilled and the atmosphere is very casual! Not cheap, but well worth the price! I had the Mac and cheese burger (5oz) which was perfectly cooked! I totally recommend this place, and the downtown Scottsdale location is cool!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. What an awesome group!

pkCKxb_0GyLwyx16xEWm5A.text: I ended up here because the place my group wanted to go was closed, but it turned out to be amazing. I'm vegan so I wasn't thinking a burger place would be my scene, but the veggie burger is delicious. The waitress was very helpful about what was vegan on menu and even gave me a heads up that the buns have an egg wash on them. She put my veggie burger in a lettuce wrap instead and it was so good! My meat-eating friends were happy with their meals as well. Definitely recommend.

inFY9ZYiZvcztSoPIXlV4A.text: I LOVE REHAB BURGER! I'm in once a week for a regular order, and Courtney behind the bar always knows what I'm in for! Love the food, love the vibe. My only request is a dedicated to go service during spring break....I like to call my order in and pick up instead of mingling with the out of towners and that option isn't always available.

Ag2CgmmaWdmOb3Ffx2Qecw.text: I have been to 48 of 50 states.  I'm a foodie and love trying the local restaurants.  Hands down this is one of the, if not THE, best burger I have ever had.  Staff was great as well.  I went in at 8:30 not realizing they close at 9 but they were still happy to serve.  It was so late and they were so busy earlier that they had run out of french fries but they were happy to sub some delicious onion rings.  If I'm ever back in Scottsdale I'll be back at Rehab Burger Therapy!

eD0wddHZ68W9o8HqBdIJwg.text: 1 star is what they deserved. No spinach, no steak, food came out cold and bland. Not impressed, at all. Brought some of our friends who are out of state and they were also very displeased with the food and service. Bad, bad.

eymp_q9WPVAahMvlaVI95A.text: Amazing food! Great music! Even better service! Ryan was awesome! Poblano burger was the bomb.com!

_eKAC1CEmKOV0GfCBbyqBw.text: Gluten-Free Veggie Noogie with Sweet poTOToes - Yes Please!!!  It was amazing and Ill be taking my foodie sister and brother in law here pronto!!!   Make sure to sit in Nic's section....superb service!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Good thing I took the picture before I really got down..,cuz it&#39;s  GONE!!

8oOhLXnlgFq697Sxx_wRRQ.text: so bomb! fries are solid too!  really cool environment and in a sea of burger places that all feel and taste the same Rehab is crushing it!!!!

JDRlsrTSz9TklLc88xK5bw.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE the food, the vibe and the crowd this joint reels in! Out of 7 visit, this is the only time I dealt with impatience, mostly because of how short staffed they were for Friday around 3:30ish. My server forgot a couple of requests I put on my order, and it took a good 15 minutes to get his attention because he was so occupied with every other party in the room. There was one server taking care of the entire floor, literally (besides the bar). It was unfortunate for the server cause he was bustin his balls, and for my tummy because I waited for my extra add on before eating! My only suggestion would be extra staff on Fridays. Cause I know this place gets packed every Friday, better to be prepared with more staff than having one guy run the show!

1E8_BebjHWoQTpHOjYOToQ.text: Rehab Burger Therapy makes an excellent burger stop! We have visited twice and were pleased with the food and environment on both visits. The staff is friendly and the food is always up to standards. My new favorite is the PB&J Sirracha burger; sounds unusual, but the sweet and the heat really work well together! My only reservation is that seating can be a bit tight when the restaurant is busy, but otherwise highly recommended!!

HVUhwt9qqrEiX8mUA7CcTg.text: There were four of us who went here before a Giants game for our "pre game" meal. The highlight of this experience where the mac and cheese burger and the pb & j burger that I had. The pb & j was recommended by our waiter Ryan and it was unbelievably delicious. Our friend who had the mac and cheese burger said it was the best burger he had ever had. Ryan said we had to come back the next day for the Saturday special.   We came back the next day and 3 people in our party of 7 had the special. It consisted of a 10 oz patty with cheese, bacon, ham, maple syrup, a fired egg and all of the fixing on a bun that was a glazed donut for the top and 1/2 glazed donut for the bottom. They loved it!  For me it was the jalapeno popper burger, it was fantastic. Our waiter, Devin, was a lot of fun, as was Ryan.   The onion rings and sweet potato tots are the best.   With 10 days left in our trip we plan on going back for more of this "health food".

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. The Saturday special.

2Q7qMiYpK6LV_9IS_MFZIg.text: Being raised within New Mexico and in contact with hatch chili, the Hatch Burger was surprisingly spicy! It was good but it would have been much better with some lettuce tomato and onion, which is offered in the menu.   I did notice a woman order a mac and cheese burger, which is why I will be going back to try such an intriguing burger. Do not order your burger with water. A root beer or a beer would definitely leave you feeling full and satisfied.

WlA5jEahBKPCRaxO7GRwig.text: Awesome burger joint! Cool, relaxing atmosphere which goes with the theme so well. Always have had super friendly servers.  Ask for lettuce, tomato, onion and pickle if you're used to your burgers coming with them, will not be assumed that you want it. They got creative with the dipping sauces and are always happy to recommend which goes best with your order. Love the sweet potato tots with the pineapple sauce! My only negative is that when I've taken burgers to go they have always been overlooked. But then again when is take out ever as good as being served a hot dish you can dig into right away?! Definitely give them a try if you're in a burger mood...very accommodating burger options. The poblano and hang over burger are two thumbs up!

bEPTqmJwDXm8c2adp4hCog.text: Best burgers in town and reasonably priced! Good service too. Try the Know Poblano Burger.....Its wonderful! Be ready to wait though, the place is not huge, but has a lot of people who love it. I've been sat right away and been waiting 45 minutes depending on what time you go.

286Ro3Yr2aHG_oVQHKF_tw.text: OH MY GOD!!!! This place is amazing!!! I will admit I was skeptical at first. I went on the recommendation of a few friends and when we got there the feel of the place was very laid back and more like a beach atmosphere than I would have expected from a place with part of the name being "Rehab". The menu is very large and the options are plentiful for any palette. Secret... they have an amazing soup that is not on the menu. It is a bit spicy and the ingredients are very non-traditional but it is something you will crave after you have tried it once. I won't tell you the ingredients here... you will have to discover it for yourself! Oh yeah... did I mention they have awesome sweet potato tots? Those are great with the soup and pair well with any of their burgers too! Swing on by and try it sometime.. I have been known to show up after a good swim on a Thursday night... maybe I will see you in there!  Cheers

x3ES3LuNj0Lh_HYMh8jx4A.text: Very good burgers the only improvement i would recommend would be that the sweet potato tots were actually too sweet if that is possible. Other than that awesome burgers.

Z7ziu775_7p2_xbRs1mWjg.text: Unbelievable burgers!!!!  The combinations are so creative and tasty. Great service too!

eHPvNbfEM0p8_5JU1F1ZEw.text: The Hangover Burger is LEGIT- fried egg, bacon, colby jack cheese and hatch green chili. They also have a PB&J with bacon and siracha for anyone brave enough to try it.

-AgJEoAEc3aDYtyxygPWVg.text: Finally found the best burger place in town! The burgers were perfectly cooked and absolutely delicious.  According to my 10 year old the fries were the best ever and I agree. Amazing onion rings and wings too. Plus, the service was outstanding. Words cannot describe the pot brownie. Heavenly doesn't quite do. We cannot wait to come back!

PTjMNtKkCmLl-_YXwcmbGg.text: Large menu. Fair prices for the very large portions. Good wine prices & great happy hour. A great "joint."

63V3JmOxhLeunVdMoganJA.text: Probably my favorite place for burgers. The place is always busy and the staff has always been great. The burgers are creative and more than filling. My favorite has gotta be the Porkster, relapse size.

ezeBmmXWOqOTevdD54LFZw.text: Very good burger, had bacon and blue burger on Pretzel bread. I usually don't eat many buns, but had all of this one. Had a Pale Ale with it. All Good!

ftjvovPLhoLZ8gaKHS4Xeg.text: This place absolutely rocks!  Great, friendly service and phenomenal burgers.  Can't ask for much more.

3jFSDMdGdw8XNzDV-euk0Q.text: Been here a few times now. Told the server to pick which burger I got, as long as I hadn't tried it yet. Every burger was probably the best burger ever.

CPgr4SqzCqWML4h2vEQGqQ.text: Been here 4-5 times now and the burgers keep getting better and better. Best burgers in Old Town!

lzGsVLwCtj96tAEpKy_5vw.text: I absolutely love the atmosphere. The service is great everyone is so friendly!  Calamari is amazing and enough for 6 people there is so much!  The Hawaiian burger amazing our server was Saira she is the best!!

Wp8x_q-MoI6P3X8Li195nQ.text: An overdue 5 mo old  review. The place was chill & relaxed, fun decor, frart music, & the service was excellent. Attentive & fast. Good selection of beers & The burgers! Oh so delicious, the exboyfriend & I both agreed it was one of the best burgers we both had in awhile. I can't recall the name of the ones we ordered, I remember one had peanut butter. Yes. Peanut butter! Don't knock it until u try it! The pb just added another taste level to the already tasty pretzel bread bread & flavorful juicy beef burger. Along with the onion rings ...oh my.  I wish this was in my state near my house so I could get my once a month burger fix. I have yet too find a place that delivers one so scrumptious.

D0Tpcw5MWY1XceS29bCuRg.text: Very very good food. I had the PB&J burger and it was cooked great and tasted delicious. Sweet potato tots were perfect. 4 stars because the service was kind of slow, granted they were pretty busy, but still not an excuse for empty drinks.

lwnebYH3VdAm0rwTdGSYgw.text: Service exceptional. Wait staff were nice. Food....on another level. I had the hawiann burger and even though I was so stuffed I HAD to finish it! Only thing is that it is tight spacing because it was so packed. They need to expand ASAP...but  Definitely coming again.

OUO-aDcNA6IIoebS0PXS0g.text: The burger was the best I've ever had, had the Poblano. Everything from the pretzel bun to the meat and toppings was top notch. Unfortunately I waited 35 minutes for my food during a slow period, the service was abysmal. But, I will be back for the burgers. If not for the service, would have been five stars.

PysEiZW7x0FTpTajUSC_Yw.text: This is my 2nd favorite hamburger place I have EVER eaten at!... My food is always perfect! I love the pretzel bun! I would strongly suggest trying the pretzel bun! The sweet potato tots are amazing!!! All of the staff I have meet are amazing, the owners are awesome, and the Kimmy special drink is not only refreshing but almost guilt free. I practice out of a clinic close by so I have even had lunch meetings here! I couldn't recommend Rehab Nurger more!

vKNx4JP2062FVCcO15s7XA.text: Disrespect. My girlfriend and I chose this place because of the menu and the reviews, we came in very optimistic about it. Unfortunately we had the opposite experience. It's been a long hot day and my girlfriend and I were craving a ice cold beer. My girlfriend had a question about the size of a beer and he insulted her intelligence and told her she's acting like a 19 year old. This obviously upset her right off the bat. He also mentioned that because of our California license being vertical that we cannot order our drink. Major let down. Must be the law, but we double checked and the law passed April 2016 that it IS accepted. The second time he came along we showed him the law article just to kindly ask if we could order now. He came off stand offish and threw his hands up in the air and said "idk man" and then we ask for the manager and he threw his hands up again and walked away. No one came. We felt so disrespected as customers and he made us feel like we were being jerks. We looked at each other and walked out equally feeling pissed off and really ruined the excitement. This guy had a buzz cut and arm sleeve tattoos and really needs to be mindful on how his words and actions come across to others. It really gave us a bad taste in our mouths.  Now we're enjoying our dinner down the street and along with a delicious cocktail.

abRZdLIO3Az031gk3bay5g.text: Craving a huge, juicy burger cooked perfectly? Rehab is the place. Went here for my birthday and a month later was here again for my husband's. Fries are outstanding and lots of bun options including gluten free and lettuce wraps. If you arrive during dinner rush, be prepared to wait. Grab a drink, take a look at the menu and wait with anticipation. Service was friendly. This place won't let you down.

BqVd9ADb_VEP9ZD7HDvqDQ.text: Pretty good, would have given it more than 3 stars if they had fresh SEASONED turkey burger patties.  Their patties were from a pre - packaged store, like Costco ' freezer section...I could do that bland at home. I had the Hatch Chile Turkey Cheeseburger (I don't do pork or beef) and it was good; the toppings and the pretzel bun put the bland formed turkey patty to shame. My sister had the Know Poblano Burger (turkey too), she liked it and LOVED the pretzel bun. O'rings were good and so were the fries; better than most.  I was a bit disappointed because of the use of pre-formed turkey patties because it didn't really appear that they seasoned the patty and they charged extra for the choice of turkey. I understand it's a burger place, I know their speciality is beef...but pre - formed turkey patties...meh!  I will say, the other diners looked like they were enjoying their chow.  Don't know if I will go back, unless they figure the turkey patty thing but I will say...looking at the other diners eating their beef, they looked pretty happy. So...you eat beef...go! Turkey....just don't be shocked about the bland pre-formed patty...BYOSpices!   Tip: Get the Pretzel Bun...it is nice and light...D-licious!

photos.caption: Photo of Rehab Burger Therapy - Scottsdale, AZ, United States. Yummy Pretzel Bun! Fries and O&#39;rings D-licious!

H90uzzrkiAwC2WtA0DBcyA.text: Called in a late night To-Go order. I chose the mac-n-cheese w/fries. They said it would take 15 minutes, but it took far less. Staff was attentive and respectful. The burger was amazing and not too heavy for the size. Only gripe is the price. $14 for a burger and fries is a bit much.

IrPbH7UoaiRUhWvijPJGhg.text: Great food. Really cool fun atmosphere. Kay was the best and gave great advice about the town to us. Thanks again.

Z9Nq5cA2BY9eQNuPO3rOXA.text: One of my favorite burger spots! My little family and I go here all the time! My personal favorites are the jalapeno popper burger the pb&j burger and the spinach salad they have. Great prices and always wonderful service. If you are looking for a awesome burger spot I highly recommend rehab!

bffzyj5kdk_NyUWP5xXxHA.text: Great burgers! Great atmosphere! Vibe is relaxed and laid back! Had the bacon cheese burger, husband had the hangover burger. Perfectly cooked to medium as we requested! The onion rings were awesome! Definitely must for all you burger lovers!

aGRO7pn9iCjfIxLLOw2Bgg.text: Absolutely love ALL the burgers at Rehab and the wait staff, management and owners I've encountered on my numerous visits have been awesome!

2WvcJCmMYRmH4vLXWlNz_Q.text: Great place for an amazing burger! Atmosphere was relaxing, felt like was on a beach somewhere. Margarita was delicious and the staff was on point. Very speedy service.

maQKgOzqEPD5C3oSHAzjHg.text: Visiting from California. We had wedge salads and bacon cheeseburgers. They were spectacular. Cooked to perfection, and the fries were crispy delights.

gy83A0XfpuIav_NqOE1Jrg.text: And two hours later after my dinner I cannot move from my bed. Not for any other reason that I am completely full and satisfied with the meal I had tonight here at RBT.   OUr server was perfectly attentive with the right amount of chill, so we felt comfortable in a new place. We were five seconds away from happy hour ending and he let us sneak in our orders so we could knock a few bucks off the bill, score!   To start we shared the chicken chile lime dip, I think it was called. So good and spicy. Their homemade tortilla chips were really great too.   I ordered the hangover burger with the sweet potato tots and my man ordered the porkster burger. Thank goodness we ordered the smaller, five ounce ones, because we hardly finished what we got. I wasn't crazy about the tots, but  I did enjoy the sauces that were brought out with them.   Major props to our server and this place for standing out in this town.

N2BTvWaTCtKGWRDtAWE4gw.text: Have a Backyard BBQ and a couple Coronas! Not too much, not too little! Great place!  Loved the decor!  Great service!   Really reasonably priced, too!  I will definitely come back!

S0NHNw9ZtvtrM-uH80-YhA.text: I dont remember the last time I had a really good burger, Oh wait, yeah I do, It was here at Rehab Burger!      I had the Hangover burger and it was pretty damn perfect, a fried egg, bacon, colby jack cheese and a hatch green chili! Let alone on a pretzel bun and choosing between the large RELAPSE size or even larger REHAB size.  I got Sweet poTOToes on the side with the chipotle ranch sauce and ive never had better.  I highly recommend this place, plus it has a great happy hour and its in old town but the crowd is nothing like youd expect when youd say that which is a plus.  I cant remember my waiters name but he gave awesome service and will be back again!

pwgdy_Br-dP1_UhDICiynA.text: If you and your family are looking for a quick meal that is reasonable tasting and in the middle of the road, this is the place.  I had one of their burgers which was Ok and my wife had a salad which included lots of greens but no special taste or character.  Service was fast and reasonable.  Ok for a burger bar but I have had better nearby at the same price range.

ufYdpo0f6xez3d17vXGOtQ.text: I have probably been here 10 times, and every single time I have had a great burger. Their regular bugers are great, but I love how there is a different "specialty" burger every weekend. They come up with some amazing stuff. The icing on the cake is their sweet potato tots!.... I am a big guy and I can't finish their smaller bugers size. Great portions at a very reasonable price.

55jbwgKloiB0WZzy2QqO0A.text: Food was good, ambiance was an annoyingly overdone beach theme. (I admit I'm probably not their target demographic.) I had the Hatch Chili Cheeseburger with onion rings. It was good, and the onion rings were decent, too. They served the burger with their spicy ketchup (decent), their barbecue sauce (weak and thin), and their smoky aioli (really good).   I was disappointed that they only had two local-ish beers on tap and the one I had (the Four Peaks Eighth Avenue) was not very fresh. Service was decent. I probably won't go back as there are too many other better places to eat in Scottsdale that aren't as aggressive with their decor theming, overly loud music, and multiple television screens blaring from every wall. I liked the food but hated the ambiance.

OlTH65IgPrVg3DGuLO7iNA.text: Consistently great food and service.  I enjoyed a wedge salad with a bbq burger and it was really delicious.  Awesome stuff!!

nrOTZFPXTC1ZLdcf43QJkg.text: First time and loved this place in hooked you get what you paid for I will be coming back

Wn4v7ynRlpvz4nwBIgTBkg.text: duh Y do you answer every booties questions on dee Facebook just not mine yo'lo? sum lee. i hee the fut is gut here but i have de questions yo'lo

bsgPvHCRDVIYVdVgzaBj8Q.text: Best burger in town!!!  Amazing service, delicious food!!  This is a must try if you are in the mood for a burger! Go right now!!!!!!

0n_KaakNOCaQEEbnZY2vGA.text: The Porkster Burger at Rehab Burger Therapy is a monstrous creation. Featuring a beef patty and a healthy serving of BBQ pulled pork that is then placed between a pretzel bun and topped with cheese. The pretzel bun is the perfect platform to savor the flavor of meat. Unfortunately, the burger I enjoyed was more of a pork sandwich than a burger, and the BBQ sauce was just a little bit too peppery (making me miss out on the all the flavors of the beef). The beef was very flavorful and the bun was perfectly moist and tender. If the BBQ and pork were toned down just a bit the burger would be in elite territory.

H-7a9JJaeJy6iqpfQLIUNg.text: You have to try this place! We had the PB&J burger and the Mac&Cheese burger and both were worth coming back for BUT the winner was the pig wings. Ah-mazing!

eS1kdza00I5pMgmXVfqoEw.text: Would've have given it four stars but:  1) I placed an order for pick up. Got there and waited for the server, Lexi, who didn't show up for 10 mins so another server tried to help me and got me my food. Then kept waiting because apparently only she could take my payment! I was annoyed so in fact I asked another server "do y'all not want me to pay?".. Finally a third server took my card over to Lexi who then took my payment   2) they didn't give me any plastic ware or napkins or anything   3) disappointed with the sweet potato tater tots  The veggie burger was delicious! I asked them to give me crispy onions instead of lettuce and tomatoes. Loved it!! It came with some sort of dipping sauce - I think cilantro lime which was super duper Yum as well!  I probably paid about $12 for the burger excluding gratuity.   Got to the place on a Wednesday evening at 6pm and it was packed! Looked like a fun place to hang out at. Very very casual decor.
